item.text: rla@#// rgya gar skad/Ar+ya A kA sha gadz+hanAmam
'phags pa nam mkha'i snying
[ ]mdo// sangs rgyas dang/
byang chub sams dpa' thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo// 'di 'o
skad bdag gis thos pa dus gcig na/ bcom ldan 'das ri kha la ti kan/gas
thub pa'i drang srong rnams kyi gnas na/ nyan thos chen po bgrang ba las 'das pa'i/
dge slong gi dge 'dunachen po dang thabs cig go/ 'dilta ste/ byang chub sems dpa'
sems dpa 'chen bo gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed dpag tu med/ grangs med pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i dge 'dun chen po dang yang
thabs cig tu bzhugs te/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i dpal gyi dam tshig lung bstan pa'i mthar phyin ma thagatu/ yang de'i tshan/ nub phyogs
na rlabargya byin thegos pa'i nor bu rin po che brgya phrag stong du mas bskor cing mdun du bdar ba'i yid bzhin gyi nor bu rin po che snang ste/ yang nor
bu rin po che de'i 'od kyis/ stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jigarten gyi khams 'din/ gzugs su snang ba thams cad ma lus bar mi snang bar
gyur te/ de bzhin gshegs pa ma gtogs par gang lha dang/ mi rnams dang/ nyan thes rnams dang/ gang byang chub sems dpa' rnams dang//
gangs dang/ me dang/ chu dang/ rlung rnams kyi gzugs su sna nga ba'i 'byung ba chen bo ja snyed pa'i 'byung ba chen po snang ba de dag
thams cad ma lus par spangs par gyur cing/ nor bu rin po tshesnang ngo// lhag ma dag kyang mthu' yas mu med pa/ brjodadu med ba/ namamakha'apazhin
du snang ngo// bcom ldan 'das kyang shin tu lham me/ lhan ne/ lhang nger gyur to// gang yang sems can der 'dus pa de dag kyang/ bdag kyang mi
mthong ngo// gcig la gcig kyang ma mthong// de dag la 'byung bachen po'i gzugs su snang ba thams cad 'gogs nas/ yang mig tu snang
bar ma gyur to// bdag bdag gis lus kyi gzugs dang/ mtshan dang/ dbyibs dang/ reg pa yang mi dmigs par gyur te/ gang dang gang
gis brtags ba de dang de dag stong bar mthong ngo// nyi ma dang/ zla ba'i dkyil 'khor kyang mim shong/ skar ma'i gzugs dang/ sa'i khams
ba dang/ chu'i khams dang/ ma'i khams dang/ rlung gi khams kyang mig lam du snang bar ma gyur to// sgra dag kyang rnaba'i bu kar grag par ma gyur to// di dag kyang sna la bro bar ma gyur rgyu
te// sems dang sams las byung ba la yang ng dang/ bdag gir bya ba dang/ rgyu mched drug gi 'du shes mi 'byung bar gyur to// yang 'byung ba chen po dgakyang mi dmigs par gyur
taphyogs gang dang/ gang tu brtags pa de dang de'i phyogs thams cad du de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku'i mtshan dang/ kha dog dang/ dbyibs dang/ gzugs su mthong bar gyur
to// rgyang ma nas brgya byin thogs pa'i nor bu 'ani donus bskor ba'i yid bzhin gyi nor bu rin po che snang ba las/ gzhan cung zad kyang mi snang bar gyur to// gang den byang chub sems
dang 'a sa bcu la gnas pa/ dba' bar 'gro ba'i ting nge 'dzin thob pa/ skye ba gcigagis thogs pa srid pa tha ma pa de dag gis ltas de mthong nas/ 'jigs bar mi byed/ sdongs
bar mi byed/ skrag par mi byed de/ chos thams cad rang bzhin gyis yang dag pa'i mtha' dang/ de bzhin nyid dang/ stong pa nyid dang ldan par rtogs pas/ de'i phyir de dag 'jig
bar mi byod ! sngangs bar mi byed/ skrag par mi byed do// gang lhagam byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag dang/ nyan thos dag dang/ lhadag dang/ klu dag dang/
gnod sbyin dag dang/ dri za dag dang/ lham yin dag dang/ nam mkha' lding dag dang/ mi 'am ci dag dang/ lto 'phyachen po dang/ grul bum dang/ yi dgas/
dngasha za dang// bstan srul po dang/ lus srul po dang/ mi dang/ mi ma yin 'dus pa de dag thams cad 'jigs par gyur// stangs par gyur/ skyo bar gyur nas/ tshul dang/
pha rol la rmongs shing/ soms 'a khrugs nas de dag gcig la gcig kyang mi mthong/ den 'di ci zhig/ 'di ci lta bu zhig/ 'di ci'i rang bzhin zhes 'dri ba yang gang yang mi snang/
ngo// yang de'i tshan/ byang chub sems dpa' sams dang ba chen po tshangs pa 'i gzer bu zhes bya bas/ pacom ldan 'das ga la ba der logs su thal mo sbyar ba btud te gso' pa/
chos kun gyi ni rang bzhin la// gang zagagang dag ma 'tshal ba// gzugs phung la ni gnas gyur na// dbang po drug la rmongs par gyur// phung po gcig ni mi mthong zhing/ gzugs
kyi phung la rtog bgyad de/ 'di la gang zug kha cigani// sangs rgyas chosal thatshom 'tshal// bcom ldan 'das kyis 'di dag ka/ chos kyi de bzhin mtshan nyid gsungs// de dag
tshu rol pha rol la// bzod ba namam ba'imtshan 'tshal to// 'din mnyam gzhag dang 'a ba ste// brjod du med pa'i gnas lags so// rin chen chen po yid bzhinano// spyi bo lanams
par gda'// nor bu ni chen brgya byin thogs// gang gis rgyang thaganas mthong ba// sems can de dag skal ba che// dpa' 'gro shin tu pha rol mchi// ston pa lta bar mchis pa rnams //
de dag thams cad shes rab che/ de ring 'diran zab mo'i gtam/ mchi bar 'gyur ba gdon mi 'tshal// bcom ldan 'das gang dag 'dir phyin pa'i// sems can dag la dbugs dbyung
mdzod// sems can yongs su smin pa'i phyir// 'di ni dpa' bo'i spyod yul lo// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa// ji skad smras pa de bzhin te// gang na kun gzhi thos 'gyur zhing//
shes rab kyis ni sems can gnas// don ting 'dzin spyod yul lo// de ninamamakha'i snying po yi// byang chub sems dba' spyod yul te/ snang bamed cing spros med ba'i// ting nge 'dzin
ni de yis bstan// lta ba gnyis la gang chags pa// phyi phyir zhing ni rmongs par 'gyur// rtag dang chad lachags pani// pha rolo tshu rol shin tu rmongs// lta ba gnyis po 'di dag las//
rab tu grol bar su 'dodapa// brjod du med par bsgom par gyis// de ni myur dus thob 'gyur/ kyi grogs po dag/ gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'achen ngo
las thogam pa la de nyid brjod du yod pa'i 'du shes kyi tshul gyis// dmigs pa dang bcas pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa drug brjod par bya ste/ 'di lta ste/ ci nas kyang 'byung ba chen po rnams kyi rang
bzhin skye zhing 'jig pa shes par byas nas/ de'i 'og tu gzed chos thams cad brjod du med nga'i dbo nyidami skye ba/ mi 'gag ba/ mi dmigs la/ cung zad/
kyang med pa'i 'du byed thams cad bsgom par bya ste/ ci nas kyang rtag pa dang/ chad pa spangs bar 'gyur ba dang/ mi 'jigs mi sdangs/ skrag par mi 'gyur ba dang/ chos thams cad la
tshogs par dmigs pa'i sems su ma gyur par byas na/ demyur du pha rol tu phyin pa drug yongs su rdzogs shing phyin chad kyang chad pa dang/ rtag par mi gnas par 'gyur ro zhes bcom ldan
'das kyis bka' stsal nas ( 'khor dor lhags pa thums tsad kyang sngon gzugasakyi snang ba ji ltar mthong ba dang/ thos ba dang/ rtogs pa dang/ shes ba de bzhin du 'khor de mthong bar
gyur pa dang/ de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis phyag g.yas pa brkyang ste/ 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// nam mkha'i snying po zhes bya ba'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
chen po// ting nge 'dzin rgya mtsho dang mtshungs pa/ byang chub sems dpa'i bslab pa ri rab dang mtshungs pa/ ye shesanamamakha' dang mtshungs ba/ brtson 'grus rlung dang mtshungs pa/ bzod
pa rdo rje dang mtshungs pa/ byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyi rgyalamtshan gyi mchog lta bu / mya ngan las 'da' ba'i gnas su 'gro ba rnams kyi ded dpon lta khu/ dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyi
ni gter lta bu // sdug bsngal ba thams cad kyi ni bum pa bzang po lta bu / mun par bcug pa rnams kyi ni nyi ma lta bu / lam stor ba rnams kyi ni zla ba lta bu / 'jigs b rnams kyi ni ri rab/
lta khu: nyon mongs pa'i nad kyis yongs su gdungs pa rnams kyin snyan bcud kyi khu ba dam pa ltabu/ dge ba'i rtsa ba chad de lhung ba rnams kyin 'a khar ba lta bu / 'phreng bas 'tsho ba rnams
kyi ni me tog lta bu / sdom pa spyod pa rnamasakyinam long lta bu / ngo tsha ba dang 'dzem pa yongs su spangs pa rnams kyi ni gos lta bu / mya ngan las 'da' bar 'gro ba rnams kyi ni zam pa lta
khu/ pha rol tu 'gro ba rnams kyi ni gru lta bu / mtho ris su 'gro ba rnamasakyin skas lta bu / tshig ngan pa dang skur pas sbyin pa rnams kyi na gdugs lta du/ phas kyi rgol ba rnamasakyin
seng ge ltakhu/ chur pa rnams kyi ni chu lta bu / bdud kyi dgra rnams kyi na go cha lta khu/ bslab pa 'khrul pa rnams kyi ni mig 'byed pa lta bu / dge ba'i rtsa ba'i 'bru thams cad kyi ni sa lta
du: nad pa rnams kyi ni sman pa lta bu / bkris ba rnams kyi ni 'bru lta bu / skom pa rnams kyi ni zla ba'i nor bu lta bu / ngalab rnams kyi ni mal ltakhu/ ting nge 'dzin dang ldan pa rnams

kyin nyi ma'i nor bu lta bu / byang chub kyi lam du zhugs pa rnams kyi ni shing rta lta bu / rgyadamo tshalan rtse brnamasakyi ni rdzing bu lta bu / byang chub kyi phyogs la brtson pa rnams kyin 'phreng ba lta
bu de tshur 'ong ste/ rigs kyi bu de b.rol tu phyin pa rnams kyi ni 'bras bu lta bu / rigs kyi bu de sa bcu dang ldan pa rnams kyin nor bu yid bzhin lta bu / rigs kyi

ma bu de dar 'bar 'gro ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang ldan pa rnams kyi ni kun tu 'tsho ba'i shing dang 'dru ba gcod pa'i phyir/ lta ba ngan pa'i sbyor ba thams cad kyi ni mtshon lta bu / 'jomA ba'i phyir bag chags
kyi mtshanas sbyor ba'i nyon mongs pa rnams ni rdo rje lta bu / bdud rnams kyis nam zlogs la/ thabs can rnams kyi ni chos grangs/ ye shes kyi ni 'byedapa'i sangs rgyasakyichos
thams cad kyin gnas/ rang rgyal ba rnams kyi na 'phrang ba dang mtshungs pa/ nyan thos thams cad kyi ni gos dang mtshungs pa/ lha rnams kyi ni mig lta bu / mi rnams kyi ni lam
lta bu : byol song du gyur pa rnams kyi ni skyabs/ yi dgas rnams kyin rtan/ sems can dmyal ba pa rnams kyi ni mgon/ sbyin gnasakyi sems can rnams kyi ni snod tu gyur
pa ! byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyi ni shing rta lta bu / rigs kyi bu de dus gsum du gshegs pa'i dbazhin gshegs pa dgra bcon pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas
thams cad kyi ni blon po lta bu / chos kyi grong khyer gyi sgo srungs yinate/ rigs kyi bu do sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad kyi bar gyisani brgyan/ thams cad rdzogs pa'i
sangs rgyas kyi ye shes dang ni ldan ( rigs kyi bu de de bzhin ba/ shegs pa ma gtogs 'ad/ sams can thams cad kyi mchod pa'i dam pa thams cad kyis mchod par bya ba yin gyis/
da khyed 'di ltar lhags pa thams cad kyis bsu bar gyis shig/ mchod pa dang/ bkur ste thams cad kyis de la ci nus par rinapo che'i gdugs dang/ rgyal mtshan dang/ ba dan sna
tshogs dang/ ma tog dang/ dri dang/ 'phong ba dang/ byug pa dang/ lha'agos dang/ rgyan dang/ snod sna tshogs kyis bkur stir gyis shig/ rim gror gyis shig/ bsti
stang du gyisashig/ mchod par gyis shig lam gyi byi dor gyis shig/ brgyan par gyis shig/ bstod pa sna tshogs kyis bstod par gyis shig/ khyed thams cad kyang de lta bu'i yon
tan thob pa dang/ snod du gyur par 'ding bo ma thogs par 'gyur ro// de nas 'khor lhags pa ma lus pa thams cad kun stan las langs nas// byang chub sems dpa'
sems dang 'a chen po/ namamakha'i snying po phyogs gang legasan snang ba'i phyogs de logs su mngon du phyogs nas thal mo sbyar to// de ni rab tu dga'/ bzhin ni rab tu 'dzum/
mig kyang rab tu dang bas lta zhing 'dug par gyur ba dang/ 'khor de na byang chub sems dang 'a semasaM dpa' chen po dang/ nyanathos chen po dang/ lha'i dbang po dang/ klu'i dbang po dang/
gnod sbyin gyi dbang bo dang/ dri za'i dbang po dang/ lha ma yin gyi dbang bo dang/ nam mkha' lding gi dbang po dang/ mi 'am ci'i dbang bo dang/ lto 'phye chen
bo'i dbang bo dang/ drang srong lnga mngon par shes pa de dag thums cad 'di snyam du sams par gyur te/ bdag cag gis rigasakyi bu 'di la tshogs kyi mchog ji lta bu zhig gis bkur
bstir bya snyam mo// donas de'i tshe byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa ga chen po nam mkha'i snying pos/ mi mjed kyi sangs rgyasakyi zhing 'di thams cad m lus par rin po che
bdunalas byas shing/ ri dang 'brog dang/ ri skamadang/ phug dang/ grog po dang/ ga yangs dang/ rtswa dang/ rtsig pa dang/ bong bdang/ gsagam dang/ dring ba la sogs
bamod la/ lag mthil ltar mnyam par stsal to// des dbal dri za'i skad du brjod pa'i glu'i dbyangs dang/ shing thams cad kyang rin poche sna bdun las byas te/ dri zhim pa dang/
'dab ma dang/ ma rtog dang/ 'bras bur ljin par sprul to// shing+ga rlon dang/ rtswa dang/ skom shing dang/ 'dab mas la gnas pa thams cad kyang rin po che sna bdun las byas par
sprul to// mi mjed kyi 'jig rten gyi khams 'di thams cad na yang/ nad ni ri ba tumed/ sems can dmyal ba dang byolasong dang/ ga shin rje'i 'jig rten pa rnams kyi sdug bsngal ba thams
cad kyang rab tu zhi/ sems can dag gis kyang zas dang/ skom dang/ gos dang/ chos gos dang/ rgyan dag thob par gyur to// de'i tshe gangami mjed kyi 'jig rten gyi khams su
gtogs pa'i sems can de dag thams cad kyang bsam pa yongs su rdzogs par gyur/ bzang khamadzes pa/ blta na sdugang/ mdzes pa'i mdangs dam pa rdzogs pa dang ni ldan/
yan lag sdums cad ni yongs su rdzogs/ rdul med pa rab rib dang bral bar snang ba'i dkyil 'khor gyi 'od kyis ni mdzes par byas/ nyon mongs b rnams dang ni bral/ sems rang
chu zhi : dge ba thams cad lan somasamos/ dkonamchog gsum lan sems rab tu dang bar gyur nas/ 'khor der lhags pa'i sams can de re re'i lag pa gnyis kan yang/
nor bu 'an po cha rdzogs par mngon par sprul nas/ nor bu rin po che de re re las kyang so so 'tshul gyi'odogazer gyi snang ba byung bar gyur te/ mi mjed kyi 'jigarten gyi khams 'di thams cad ma/
lus par snang ba chen po des khyab par gyur to// nor bu rin po de las kyang sil snyan sna tshogs byung bar gyur to// nor bu rin po sna tshogs kyi char yang mngon bar bab par gyur to// gos/
bzang po sna tshogs kyi mar dang/ rgyan sna tshogs kyi char dang/ ma rtogasna tshogs kyichar dang/ dri sna tshogs kyichar dang/ 'phreng ba sna tshogs kyi char dang/ gdugasasna tshogs kyi char dang
snod sna tshogs kyi char dang/ 'bras bu sna tshogs kyi mar yang bab par gyur to// lha rdzas kyi gos dang/ chos gros dang/ gser gyi skud pa dang/ mu tig gi sa
mo do dang/ ma tog pad+madang/ ut+pa la dang/ kumu dA dang pun da' ka dang/ u rag sar dong/ tsan dan sbrul gyi snying po dang/ shing ta ma la'i 'dab ma dang/ tsan dan sbrul gyimago
lta bu'i phyi mas lam mer bkram pa'i mngon par gyur to// lam de'i g.yas g.yon gnyi ga brgya byin gyi khangapa rnam par rgyal bo dang 'dra ba'i na bo che'i khang pa yang mngon par sprulati/ khang
pa de na 'dod pa'i dbang bo'i btsun mo gtsamo dang/ slas dang/ dram dag yan lag lnga dang ldan pa'i sil snyan sgrogs shinge/ rtsa dga' yongs su spyod pa de 'dra ba dag der spruloto// bcom
ldan 'das kyi dbu'i spyi bo'i ste/ num mkha' la lhardzasakyinor bu rin po che las byas pa'i tshangs pa chen po'i gdugs lta bu dbug tshad brgya tsam larin po rje'i dra ba'i skud pa dang/ mu tagigi

kaM samo des brgyan pa mngon par sprul te/ rgyan de las kyang lha las 'das pa'i sil snyan yan lagakhargyad dang ldan pa'i dbyangs kyi sgra byung ngo// rtswa dang/ shing dang/ 'dab ma dang/ ma tog dang/
'bras bu la sogs pa gangaci yang rung sta/ sa la gnas pa de dag thams cad las kyang lha las 'das pa'i yan lagaljadang ldan po' si' gan las bstod pa'i sgra'abyung bo grag ste/ sgra
zab de gang gi rna bar thos pa'i sems can de dag blanand pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las phyi'i mi ldog par gyur to// denas 'khor de dag thams cad kyis/ byang chub
sems dang 'a sams dba' chen bonAmamakha'i snying po'i tshogs chen po demathong sto/ shin tu ngomatshar ba dngarmad du byung ba'i chos thob nas/ de dag 'di snyams du gyur te/ bcom ldan 'dra
kyi spyan sngar skyes bu dam pa de'i stan ji ltabur ba[︽]kams snyam mo// de nas de'i tshabcom ldan 'das kyis rgyun sngar rin po che 'as byas pa'am tog pad+ma sdong bu ni dngul/ lo mi
nagasar/ snying po ni rin po che am bgar ba/ ze bananor bu 'an po che tshang pa 'i 'od zer las byas pa/ nong du rgyang grags gcig tsam yod pa/ matog bad+ma'i ze ba'i stanarnam pa brgya phrag
stong du mas yongs su bskor cing mdun du bdar ba'i pad+ma byung nas/ bats+tsha'i stan de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po// nam mkha'i snying po skyolamo krung bcas te 'dug par snang
ngo/ de'i spyi bo' sanganor bu rin po che 'dug par snang ngo// dbazhin du byang chub sems dba'asems dpa' chen po nam mkha'i sang bo'i g.yog byung chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/
dpa' bar 'gro ba'i ting nge 'dzin thob pa/ brgya byinathogs pa'anor bu rin po ches brgyan pa/ brgya stong phragamang bo rnams kyang ' rangagi pad+mazi ba'istan la 'khod par snang/
dka@#/ de nas de'i tshe byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po byams pas/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sman gyi rgyal po la 'di skadaces smras so// byang chub
sems dba' grags chen rnams // gang dag sngon du 'ongs ban// gus dang ldan bas phyag byas te// phyinas stan la 'dug byedan// skyes bu dam pa 'di 'ongs nas// tshogs chen dag kyang bstan
rgyun// ston la phyug kyang m 'tshang bar// stan la 'dug pa lta bu r snang// sman gyi rgyal bos smras pa/ skyes bu dam pa 'di nyidi ni// sangs rgyas chos la rab gnas mthong// rtog pa kun la
miganas bas// sems can du ni mi mthong ngo// byang chub sems dpa'akhyams bas smras pa// yang dgamatha' la gnas pa'i phyir// da ltar sems can mi mthong na// tshogs chen dan ci
phyi'i bstan// the tsom gyur ba bshadupar gsol// sman gyi rgyal pos smras pa// kun tu rtog pa'i spyod yul can// byis bsadon dam mi shes te// sems can smin par bya ba'i phyir//
'din da pa' bo'i thabs yin no// don dam gyisan sdug bsngal ba// de dag rab tu dgrol ba'i phyir// mkhas pa kun rdzob bden pa yis// 'di 'dra ba yi tshogs bstan to/
denas bcom ldan 'das kyis/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sman gyi rgyal po la legs so zhes bya ba byinati/ legs so legs so// skyes budam pa khyod kyis
za ji skad smras pa de bzhinate so sor skye bo byas pa lta bu'i sams can thams cad ji snyad pa de dag thams cad kyis kyang/ rgyun tu zhugs pa gcig gi spyod tshul dang/ sbyor ba dang/ rnam
par grol bami shes so// yongasasu brtag pa bzung nas/ gal te sems can thams cad rgyun tu zhugs par gyuran yang/ de dag gis 'an cig phyir 'ong ba gcig gi spyod yul dang/
sbyor ba dang/ rnam par grol ba mishes kyi/ de bzhin du lan cigaphyir 'ong ba rnams kyis kyang phyi mi 'ong ba dang/ phyir mi 'ong ba rnams kyis kyang/ dgra bcom pa dang/ dag btson
pa rnams kyis kyang/ rang sangs rgyas kyis ma shes te/ gal te sams can thams cad khasa'u dang 'dra ba'i rang sangs rgyas su gyur kyang/ de dag thams cad kyis/ byang chub semA
dpa' mi skye ba'i chos la bzod pa thob pa gcig gi spyod yul dang/ rnam par grol ba dang/ don dam pa' brtag pa dang/ sams can yongs su smin par bya ba'i sbyor bami shesaso//
longs su brtag pa bzungan/ gal te sems can than sa cad mi skye ba'i chos la bzod pa thob par gyur kyang/ de dag gis byang chub sems dpa' so sor rig pa thob po/ dpa' bar 'gro
ba'i ting nge 'dzin thob pa gcig gi spyod yul dang/ mos pa dang/ don dam pa'i bden pa la brtag pa'ibyin gyis b.rabs mi shes so// rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'/
chen po nam mkha'i snying po 'di yang/ mi skyo ba'i chos la bzod pa thob/ so sor 'gi kha thob/ dba' bar 'gro ba'i ting nge 'dzin thob nas/ bskal pa dang/ ga tu
mad pa 'dus te/ ji ltar da ltar tshogs chen po 'dus pa'i sams can rnams kyi bsam pa dang/ bag la nyal ba dag shes nas ) ji ltar 'a de'i sems can kha cigatshogs chen po 'di'i
'ong zhing lta ba'i phyi'i/ 'dod chags dang bra la ba'i sa laganas par 'gyur ba dang/ ji ltar 'gos kyi bu de 'di nyid du mi snang bar gyur nas/ nub phyogs nas 'dir 'ong zhing nyan thos
dang/ rang sangs rgyas rnams dang thunamorAm yan pa mtha' yas pa'i naman/ kha' mtha' yas skye mchedakyi mngonapar shesapa dang/ ting nge 'dzin kyang bstan/ sems can thams cad kyang
skyo bar byas nas/ de'i 'og tusams can du ba ga tu mad pa yongs su sminub bya ba'i phyir/ kun rdzob kyi bden pas bsgrub pa'i tshogasachen po yang bstan/ ting nge 'dzin gyi tshogs na
bo yung bstan pa bzhin no// gal te rigasakyi bu de don dam pa'i bden pami skye ba'i tshogs ston du zin na/ lha dang bcas pa'i 'jigartenarmongs par 'gyur/ bsladapar 'gyur ro// byang
chub sems dpa' sa brgyad la gnas nga 'i bar du yang bsladasal 'gyur bas 'di'i spyod yul dang/ sbyor ba'i mtshan ma bstan par mi nus te/ de ltar chosaM zabamo'i yon tan 'o gnas so//
rigasakyi bu de ni thabs shes pa lamakhas so// sangs rgyas kyi chos rgya mtshoThams cad la gnas so// thetshom med do// pags gzhan la rag ma lus pa lamakhas so// byang chub
sams dpa' thams cad kyi rgyalamtshan gyi mchog rgyal po la 'os pa dang 'dra'o// rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa' nam mkha'i snying po dan sams can thams cad matho rusi dang thar par/
skyabar stonato// sems can thams cad kyi sams kyi nyon mongs pa'i nad las yongs su thar par byed pa'o// lus kyi dug 'byung bachen po 'i nad gsobar byed pa'o// sems can gang
dag lta ba ngan pas sdug bsngal bar gyur pa'i 'khor ba'i 'brog bslad nas// mtho ris dang thar par gnas pa'i thabs mi shes pa de dag kyang gal te/ byang chub sems dpa' nam mkha'i snying
bo'i ming rjod par byed/ phyag 'tshal bar byed/ dri 'bul// a karu'i bdug bas bdug par khyed na/ rigs kyi bu de nid dag gi bsam ba dang/ bag la nyal ba dang/ de dag gi nyon

mongs pa dang ldan pa'i lta ba sems dang 'brel pa ci 'dra ba dang/ sngon gyi dge ba'i rtsa ba bskyod pa ci 'dra pa la yang rtog cing/ sams spyang pa ji lta bu r bya ba'i rigs ba dge ba'i rtsa ba sangs rgyas
'khaskyad pa 'am/ chos la bskyed pa 'am/ dge 'dun la bskyod pa 'am/ bsod nams bya ba'i dngos bo sbyin pa'i rang bzhin nam/ tshul khrims kyi rang bzhin nam/ bsgoms pa'i rang
bzhin yang rung ste/ de dag thams cad rmi lam na'ang rung/ sad pa'i tshe yarung ste/ de bzhin du thabs mkhas pas mngon sum du lam drang po'i thabs kyis ston te/
thabs des lta ba ngan par byed pa smon lam ngan pa'i bsam pa dang/ skyabs ngan pa dang/ ngan bar 'jug pa'i sems las myur du thar par byed do// ci nas kyang de'i lus dang/ ngag dang yid
gyi sbyor ba drang por 'gyur ba dang/ smon lam drang po dang/ dge ba' bshes gnyen drang po dang bstan par 'gyur ba dang/ myur du dri mi zhim ba dang/ nyon mongs pa dang/ sdig pa'i lta ba'as
yongs su thar bar 'gyur ba dang/ de dag gi ngan song du 'gro ba'i sdig pa'i las thams cad smon lam gyi dbang dang/ legs par spyad pa'i las kyis myur du byang bar 'gyur ba dang/ de dag
myur du bdag gi sems la dbang thob par 'gyur ba dang/ zab mo'i bzod pa la gnas par 'gyur ba'i thabs ston to// gang yang sems can lus la nad smi tshogasakyis gzer ba dang/ gang
yong sogs g.yengs pa dang/ gang dag gimig gi bar chad byas pa dang/ lce bcings pa dang/ gang dag la yan lagagang yang rung ba zhig nyams par gyuran/ gal te de dag gis nad
rab tu zhi bar bya ba dang/ nadamad pa thob par bya ba'i phyir snying thag po nas/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'achen po// nam mkha'i snying po'i ming nas rjod par byed cing/ a ka ru
dang/ ta ka rus gdugs nas/ skyes bu dam pa nam mkha'i sing po la phyag 'tshal na/ rigs kyis bu ni de dag gi rmi lam na bram ze'i gzugs kyisamadun du 'dug gam/ brgya byin
gyi gzugs sam dbal gyi gzugs sam/ dbyangs can gyi gzugs sam/ rgyalarigs kyi gzugs sam/ blon po'i gzugs sam/ dpa' bo'i gzugs sam/ sman pa'i
gzugs sam/ ba'i gzugs sam/ ma'i gzugs sam/ khye'u'i gzugs sam/ bu mo'i gzugs kyisarje 'aman nad pa'i mdun du 'dug ste/ de'i nad zhi bar bya ba'i phyir sman
dang yo byad du gyur bathams cad de bzhin du ston te/ nad pa'i sbyor ba cig gis nad thams cad zhi bar 'gyur ro// de bzhin du gang zhal ta dang/ longs spyod 'dod pa dang/ gang kha ton
dang/ thos bar 'dod pa dang/ gang dben par 'dod pa dang/ gang bsam gtan la bsam gtan byed pa dang/ shes rab 'dod bdang/ gangalang grags par 'dod pa dang/ gang bzo
sbyong bar 'dod pa dang/ gang dbang phyuga'adod pa dang/ gang gzugs 'dod pa dang/ gang nor 'dod pa dang/ gang dmab 'dod pa dang/ gang rigs 'dod pa dang/ gang bu 'dod pa dang/
gangagalog 'dodapa dang/ gang yon tan 'dod pa dang gang sbyin pa 'dod pa dang/ gang tshul khrims 'dod pa nas/ gang shes rab kyi bar du 'dod pa dang/ gang tshig 'jam po 'dod
@#// ba dang/ gangasams can rnams dang 'thun par 'dod pa dang/ gang sdig pa thams cad lasazar par bya bar 'dod pa dang/ gang sbyin pa la gzhog par 'dod pa nas
shes rab la gzhag pa'i bar du 'dod pa dang/ tshe ring bar 'dod pa dang/ nye bar spyod pa dang/ yongs su spyod pa dang mi 'bral bar 'dod pa dang/ sams can ser sna can rnams gtong ba la
gzhog par 'dod pa dang/ ngang tshul ngan pa drag tshul khrims la gzhog par 'dod pa dang/ le lo can dag brtson 'grus la gzhog bar 'dod pan/ de dag la legs kyi bu 'di ni brabs ston
bar byed do// gang snying rje chen po dang ma bral zhing/ bdag la lta zhing/ sems can thams cad la btang snyoms su byed la/ bdag gi thabs gang gis sems can 'di dag khan medang yang
dag pa'i byang chub la somasagazhagapa dang/ thabs mkhas ba la dgod pa dang/ tshangs pa'i gnas bzhi nas snying rje chen po'i bar la dgod par bya snyam du sams pa des/ byang chub sems
dpa' nam mkha'i snying po la phyag bya'o// dgon pa 'am/ dbye 'am/ bla gab med pa las a ka ru dang 3 tA ka ru dang/ kAl a nus ris bdug par bya'o// thalamo sbyar te phyog
mtshams kun tu yan lag lngas phyag 'tshal nas/ sngags kyi tshigs 'di bzlas par bya'o// tad+ya thA/ su misha su mu sha/ kA ru NIka/ ca' tsar/ bi tsa ra san tsa kA ru NIka/
mur mur/ be ga d+hari/ mAmA tse b+hu dza/ mahA kA ru Ni ka/ tsin tAm tepA ra5/ kAr NIka/ sarba shAm sprupA ya sang kU d+ha ri spa gung snga gung/ ruti'i beka gung/ kA ru N+hi ka/ pA
ra la tAn ma ma A shA/ sarba phaT tsa ra a shoka/ gti swAhA/ sngags 'di lan du mar bzlas te nyal bar bya'o/ darngags kyi bu de ni de la mi'i gzugs sam/ ri dgas kyi gzugs
sam/ bya'i gzugs sam/ bdag nyid du ston pa 'am/ de'i bsod nams kyi skal ba nga lta bu de 'dra ba'i gzugs sam/ tshig gis de la tshul gcig pa de 'dra ba'i thabs ston par byed
de thabs gcig bo des sems can khrag khrig brgya stong du ma dag yongs su smin par byed nus so// gang theg pa la ni bdas pa dang/ gang nyan Dosakyi theg pa la gnas pa dang/
gang rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa gnasapa'i semasacanadag des thang cig yud tsam dang ldan paN+Di zhes rab dang/ thabs cung zad kyis kyang/ banamadu nga'itheg pa chen po la phyir mi
ldog par gzhog pa nas// ting nge 'dzin dang/ bzungs dang/ bzod pa snatshogs dang/ sa bcu la gzhig pa'i bar du nus te/ de ltar byang chub sems dang 'a sems dang 'chen
bo la nam mkha'i snying bo ni thabs dang/ ye shes dang/ snying rje chen po bsam gyis mi khyab ba dang ldan no// rigs kyi bu nam mkha'i tshad ni la las gzung nus kyi/ rigs kyi bu/
de'i thabs dang/ ye shes dang/ byams pa chen po dang/ snying rjechen po dang/ ting nge 'dzin gyi stobs bskyod pa dang/ samasacan yongs su smin par byed pa 'i/
tshad bzung bar ni ma nus te/ de ltarabyang chub sems dpa' sems dang 'chen po nam mkha'i snying bo de ni yonanabasamagyis mi khyab ba dang ldan no// rigasakyi bu sams can gang g.yo mdang/
sgyumed pa/ yang dag pa'anan tan dang ldan pa/ lta ba drang po dang ldan pa/ gzhan mi snodang/ bdag mi stodab/ phrag dog dang/ sor sna sngangs ba/ tshul 'chos pa med pa//
bsam pa lhag pa dang ldan pa de dag la ni/ rigs kyi bu 'di snying brtse bar byed de/ thabs dang/ yi shes dang/ brtson 'grus dang brtul ba'i thabs kyang ston cing/ sems
can de thabs dang/ ye shes dang/ brtson 'grus dang/ brtul ba des de 'dra ba'i sdug bsngal las yongs su thar pa dang/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub kyi sems skye
bar byed do// dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang byang chub tu sngo bar byed do// bla nAmad pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las kyang byar mi ldog par 'gyur ro// mthu dang brtson 'grus
dang : brtulabachen po des pha rol tu phyin ba drug yongs su rdzogs bar bya ba'i phyir/ slob dang brtul khachen por 'gyur/ myur du bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub
dmangon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur te/ de ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'achen bonam mkha'i snying bo da na ngon tan gyi chos dang/ bcul ba bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang
ldan ng/ sams can thams cad yongs su smin par byed pa'o// de nas bcom ldan 'das la byang chub sams dpa' byams pas 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom
ldan 'das rigs kyi bu 'dici'i slad du yan lag gi dam pamago bo la yid bzhin gyi nor bu rin po che 'chang zhing/ de shin tu lhamam/ lhang nger gda' 'a/ byang chub sems
dang ra gzhan dag la de ltaram lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal ba// rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po nam mkha'i sing po 'di ni snying rjechen po dang
ldan pa/ somasacan la phan pa'i phyir zhugs pa/ sdugabasngal chen po las thar bar byed ba ste/ sems can gang dag ltung ba'i rtsa bskyung ba ngan song du 'gro ba/ dge ba'i rtsa ba
thams cad sdug bar byed pa// 'jig par byed pa'i sems can de dag la rigs kyi bu 'di ni snyan du gyur pa'o// marig pa'i mun pa mun nagadang/ lta ba ngan ba'i sdug bsngal
bar gyur pa rnames la ni 'di nyi ma dang mtshungs pa'o// ltung ba'i rtsa ba 'chags su 'jug pa'o// de dag gi snying la the tshom yod pa 'dral bar byed pa'o// gang dag sring gi snod chag pa
gyur ro// ltung ba'i dngos por gyur pa// pas pham ba'i sems can dge ba'i chos thams cad zhig par gyur pa/ ngan song du 'gro ba/ mgon med pa/
rten med pa// mkhas pa thams cad kyis spangs pa rnams la ni/ rigs kyi bu 'di 'khar ba dang mtshungs pa la/ lam stonaba'o// sdig pa thams cad dang/ dri zhim pa thams
cad ston par byedab 'khru bar byed pa'o// 'gro ba ngan pa'i lam 'as zlog par byed pa'o// shing rta dang mtshungs pa'o// mtho ris dang thar pa la 'jog par byed pa'o// rigasakyi bu
'di ni sems can gang dag soms shani tu 'dod bar 'jug pa dang/ gang dgashin tu khro ba dang/ gnod sems dang/ gnong 'chab pa dang/ sar snas sems 'khrugs
par 'gyur ba dang/ gang dag shin tu gzhug gi mun par song ba dang/ rgyamad par smra ba dang 'jig rten kha rol gyis mi 'gas
chog mi shes pa dang/ gang dag mi dge ba'i tshes bcu'i bar du rtag tu shin tuldan pa'i sems can de dag gi ngan song gi sgo gcod par byed ba nas/ shing rta dang mtshungs pa'i bar du
uka' ngab dang/ rgyumad par smra ba dang/ 'jig rten kharil gyis ma 'jigs par lta ba dang/ gang dganor sogs pas
par 'gasakyi bu 'din lha dang bcas pa'i 'jig rtenagyis mchod par bya ba yin no// byang chub semasadaba' byams pas gsol ba/ bcom ldan 'das lhung ba'i rtsa ba gang dang ldan na
sams can rnams dge ba'i rtsa ba sdug par bgyid cing/ nasong du 'chi bar 'gyur ba dang/ lhung ba'i dngos por 'gyur zhing/ lha dang mi'i bde ba thams cad las phas pham kha de 'arigs
kyi bu 'dimatho dris dang thar pa'i bde saMs tshim par bgyid pa'i lhung ba'i rtsa ba de dag gang lags bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rigs kyibu rgyal rigs rgyal thabs spyi bonas
dbang bskur ba'i ltung ba'i rtsa ba ni lnga ste/ ltung ba'i rtsa ba de dang ldan n/ rgyalags rgyal thabs spyi bo nas dbang bskur ba'i sngon gyi dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad sdug par 'gyur/ ltung
ba'i dngos por 'gyur/ lha dang mi'i bde ba thams cad las bas pham par 'gyur/ ngan song du 'gro bar 'gyur ro// lngagang zhen/ rigs kyi bu rgyal thabs spyi bo nas dbang bskur/
mchod rten gyi rdzas 'phrog par byed/ dag 'dun gyi 'cha/ phyogs bzhi'i dgo 'dun la phulab 'phrog par byed dam/ 'phrog tu 'jug par byed pa 'di nicung ba'i rtsa badrang bo'o// gang
yang chos spong bar byed de/ nyan thos kyi 'byung bar bshad pa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi 'byung bar bshad ba 'am/ theg pa chen po'i 'byung ba'aphashad pa slong bar byed/ 'gog
par byed/ sbod par byed pa 'din ltung ba'i rtsa ba gnyis pa'o// nga yang nga'i phyir mgo dang kha spu bregs nas/ gos ngur smrig bgos ba bsub pa 'dzin kyang/
nga/ bslab pa mi 'dzin kyang rung/ tshul khrims dang ldan yang rung/ tshul khrims dang mi ldan yang rung ste/ de'i gosangur smrig 'phrog cing khyim par byed dam/ lus la chad pas
gcod par byed dam/ btson rar 'jug par byed/ srog dang dbral bar byed pa 'di ni ltung ba'i rtsa ba gsum pa'o// gang ya nga rgyal rigs kyi ched du bsams te/ ma'i srog gcod pha
dang bcom ldan 'das kyi nyan thos dgru bcom pa'i srog gcod par byed/ dge 'dun 'dus ba dbye bar byed/ ched du bsamasanas/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag
par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas la ngan sams kyis khrag 'byin par byed na/ mtshams med pa'i las 'di lnga las gang yang rung ba zhig 'byung bar byed pa 'di ni lhung ba'i rtsa ba bzhi pa'o// gang
yang rgyal rigs rgyu med par smra bar gyur/ 'jig rten pha rol la ba tang snyoms su byed/ mi dge ba'i las kyi lamakhanu blangs shing 'jug par byed/ gzhan yang sams canamang po
dgami dge ba'i 'os kyi lam bcu la 'doms par khyed/ gzhog par khyod/ gnas par byed pa 'di ni ltung ba'i rtsa bltapa ste/ rigs kyi bu gang yang rgyal rigs rgyal thabs spyi bo/
ba0 nas dbang bskur ba la lhung pa'i rtsa ba 'di lnga las/ ltung ba'i rtsa ba gang yang rung ba zhig byungan/ rgyal rigs rgyal thabs spyi bo nas dbang bskur ba de/ sngon dge ba'i rtsa ba/
bskyod pa de thams cad lcagapar 'gyur ro// ltung ba'i dngos por 'gyur zhing/ lha dang mi'i bde bzams cad las phas phamapar 'gyur/ ngan song du 'gro bar 'gyur te/ byang chub
sams dpa' nam mkha'i snying banid 'dra ba'i tshul mtha' 'khob kyi nang du skye zhing 'byung ba'i ston/ la lar na dge sbyong gi gzugs dang/ cha lugs dang/ spyod lam 'al ni bram
ze'i gzugs dang/ cha lugs dang spyod lam ston to// gang dang gangags bdag gis skya ba 'byung bar ston pa/ de dang de dag tu rgyal rigs de 'dra ba dag la chos 'chad par byed de du
sngon ma byung ba sngan chad ma byung ba thams cad mkhyen pas bshadang/ zabamo blab pa'i mdo sde dang/ gzungs dang/ bzod pa dang/ sa dag 'chad par byed/ ston par byed/ de'i phyi'i
rgyal rigs rgyal thabs spyi bo nas dbang bskur ba de sngon gyi sdig pa mi dge ba'i las langotshe bar byed desmad bar byed/ 'tshag par byed/ gtong bar byed/ spong bar byed cing/
de sbyin pa dang/ dul ba dang/ sdom pa dang/ brtul ba'i spro ba chen po la gnas shing/ mtho ris la rten par 'gyur ro// byams pa blon po'i ltung ba'i rtsa ba'i yang lnga ste/ lnga gang zhe
@#/ na/gang yang blon bo mtshod rten gyi rdzas 'brog par byed dam/ phyogs bzhi'i dge 'dun gyi rdzas 'phrog par byed pa 'di ni ltung ba'i rtsa ba dang bo'o// gang dang grong
'byed par byed/ ga zhongs 'byed pa dang/ grong khyer 'khyodapa dang/ lul 'byedabar byed pa 'dini ltung ba'i rtsa ba gnyis pa'o// gang yang blon po tshos stong bar byed de// nyan thos kyi
'byung ba bshad pa 'am rang sangs rgyas kyi 'byung ba bshad pa 'am/ thamasacad makhyen pa'i 'byung bar bshad pa slong bar byed/ 'gog par byed pa 'din ltung ba'i rtsa ba gsum pa'o//
gang yang blon po bcom ldan 'das kyi phyir/ rab tu byung ba la gasnu bar byed na/ bsgrub pa 'dzin kyang rung/ bslab ba mi 'dzin kyang rung/ tshul khrims dang ldan yang rung/ tshul khrims dang mi
ldan yang rung ste/ de dag gi gos ngur smrig 'phrog par byed/ khyim par byed dam/ lus la chad pas gcod dam/ brtson rar 'jug par byed dum/ srogagacod par byed pa de ni blon po'i

ltung ba'i rtsa ba bzhi pa'o// gang yang blon pos mtshams med pa lnga las mtshamasamadapagang yang rung ba'i lasabyed cing/ sogs pa 'di ni ltung ba'i rtsa ba lnga pa ste/ rigs kyi bu blon po gang ltung

ba'i rtsa ba lnga po 'di dag las ltung ba'i rtsa ba gang yang rung ba zhig byungan/ blon po de sngon dgaba'i rtsa ba bskyed ba thams cad sprug bar 'gyur ltung ba'i dngos por 'gyur/ lhadang mi'i bde ba thams cad
las bas pham par 'gyur/ sems can dmyal ba la rten pa ra 'gyur te/ de dag gi don gyi phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' nam mkha'i snying po de lta bu'i lul mtha 'a 'khob gzhan duganas shing
skya ba 'byung bar lang ston te/ la larani dag sbyong gi gzugs dang/ ma lugs dang/ spyod lam gyis sams can rnams 'khachos 'chad la lar ni bumo'i bar gyi gzugs kyis chos 'chad de/
gang dang gang dag tu skyo ba 'byung bar ston pa de dang de dag tu yang blon po de 'dra ba dag la chos 'chad de/ sngon ma byung ba ldan cad mabyung ba/ thams cad makhyen pas bshad// zab mo zab
pa'amadosda dang/ gzungs dang/ bzod bdang/ sa dag 'chad par byed/ ston par byed de/ 'i phyir blon po da sngon byas pa'i mi dag ba'i sdig pa'i las 'ango tshabar khyed/ smod
bar byed/ las kyi sgrib pa de yang 'chug par byed/ gtong ba byed/ spong ba byed do/ de sbyin pa dang/ dul bdang/ sdom pa la bal pa'i nan tan gyis gnas nang/ mtho
si la rten par 'gyuro// rigasakyi bu nyan thos rnams kyi ltung ba'i rtsa bani lnga pa'o// lnga gang zhin/ srog gcodapa dang/ ma byin b.ralen pa dang/ mitshangs bar spyod pa dang/

kha rdzun du smra ba dang 6/ gang de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku 'jomo zhang khrag 'byin par byed pa ste/ de lnga'o// gang ba'i nyan thos ba ltung ba'i rtsa ba de lngalas ltung ba'i rtsa po gang yang rung gzhig
byungan/ rtag tung ltar bshad pa bzhin du/ de dag gi don gyi phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' nam mkha'i snying po de lta bu'i yul gzhan dag tu skye ba 'byung bar ston cing
'a lar na dag sbyongagi gzugs dang/ cha lugs dang/ sbyong 'am gyis 'chad de/ sdam bzhin gyi bar du mtho risil rtenapar 'gyur ro// ga ba chen po la gnas pa'i rigs kyi bu
las thog ma pa'i ltung ba'i rtsa ban brgyad de/ ltung ba'i rtsa ba dodag gis 'khrug par gyur pa'i thog ba chen po la gnas pa'i las thogom pa dag ni/ sngon dge ba'i rtsa bskyed pa thams cad
sdug par 'gyur/ ltung ba'i dngos por 'gyur zhingo/ lha dang/ mi dang/ thag pa chen po'i bde ba las phas pham par 'gyur/ ngan song du 'gro bar 'gyur/ dge ba'i bshesaganyon dang/
bral zhing 'khorlaban yuna'aduduganas par 'gyur ro// brgyad gang zhenA/ sems can gang drag sngon ngan par spyad pa'i rgyus nyon mongs pa// rtog pa lnga dang ldan pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di
skyes nas/ de dag dag ba'i rtsa ba chung du dang ljon pa las/ dge ba'i bshes gnyen la bsten te gnas te/ theg pa chen po'i shin tu zab pa 'din cing/ rigs kyi bu de dag blo chung du
zan gyis kyang/ ban mdapa yang dag pa rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyod do// de dgagi nang nas byang chub sems dpa' las thog ma pa de nin tu zab ba stong pa dang ldan pa'amado sde
'de nyan par byed/ lung sbyin par byed/ klog par byed de/ de dag ji ltar thos pa dang/ de dag ji ltar kun chub pa bzhin du/ sems canagazhan sngon gyi blo dang 'dra ba dag gimadun du don
dang bcas/ yi 'bru dang bcas pas rgya cher dran par byed/ stonabarakhyedapa dang/ dka' ba ma byas pa'i byis pa lta bu 'aso so'i skye bo dadag thos nas/ 'jigs par 'gyur/ sngangs par 'gyur/
skrag par 'gyur te/ grag pas ban med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las ldog cing/ nyan thos kyi theg pa la sems smyon par 'gyur ba de ni/ byang chub sems dpa' las theg ma pa'i
ltung ba'i rtsa ba dang bo sa/ rigs kyi bu ltung ba'i rtsa ba des dag pa'i rtsa bston bskyed pa thams cad sngags par 'gyur/ ltung ba'i dngos por 'gyur/ mtho si dang thar pa'i bde ba 'as pas bam
par 'gyur/ de'i byang chub kyi sems bsusaM shing ngan song du 'gro bar 'gyur ro// de bas na 'di lta ste/ dper na/ rgya mtshomamang rnamasachen po khad kyis gzhol ba de bzhin du/
byang chub sems dpas sems can pha rol dang/ gang zag sharol gyi bsam pa dang/ bag la nyal ba thog mar shes par bya ste/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi bsam pa ji lta ba bzhin du
rim gyis chos bshad b.rakhya'o// byang chub sems dpa' namamakha'i sing po yang de dag gi phyir de lta bu'i yul gzhan dag tu skye zhing 'byung bar ston te/ de'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' 'dus shog
@#/ ma pa de lta bu'i ltung ba'i rtsa ba 'byung bar gyur la/ ngan song gis 'jig skraganas/ de dag gal te byang chub sems dpa' nam mkha'i snying po'i ming thos nas/ ltung ba de
dag bshags pa'i phyir mthong bar 'dod na/ sa po'angasakyi skrun la/ aka ma/ ta ka ru 'am/ bdug pas 'dugasanas lngalamo sbyar te/ byang chub samasadapa' nam mkha'i snying bo'i ming nas
brjod par bya'o// de'i skal ba ji lta ba bzhin du/ rigs kyi bu des sems can de mthong nas/ de ltar 'di lta bu'i gzugs su ston te/ la la'i mdun du nub+bamal par 'dug ste chos 'chad do/
la la'i mdun dun bum ze'i gzugs kyis/ 'a'a'i mdun dun bu mo'i gzugasakyi bar du 'dug ste/ byang chub sems dba'as dang po pa de'i ltung ba'i rtsa baji ltar byung ba de dga' chugs su 'jug
go[【]bla na med pa theg pachen po'i spyod pa zab pa/ thabs mkhas pa yang de la ston par byed do// ting nge 'dzin dang/ bzod pa dang/ gzungs dang/ sa'i bar du yang 'ajog par byed do//

de'i phyir nasongs thams cad las yongs su thar cing/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las kyang phyir mi ldog par 'gyur te/ pha rol tu phyin pa drug la rdo rje bzhin du mthu che zhing/
brtul ba bstan par 'gyur/ myur du blanamed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yang mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur ro// gal te des bdag nyidamadun du mngon sum du ma bstanan/

byang chub sems dpa' des skya red 'byung ba'i dus kyi tshe la ngas de/ skya reng la gsol ba gdab bar ba ste/ 'ang skad nga tshodapa 'ba'o// sa rang skya reng thub/sa rje chen po dang ldan pa skya reng
khyod 'dzam bu'i gling 'dir sharam thag tu/ padrag la thugs rjes dgab par mdzod kyis dga' ba' nyung shugs rje chun po la bdug gi tshogagis gsungs te/ ci nas kyang de bdag
gi rmi lam du stonacing/ de'i sud du bdag ltung ba'i rtsa ba 'chags par 'gyur ba dang ) 'khrags pa'i theg pa chen pal thabs dang ldan pa'i yi shes kyi migachen po thob par 'gyur bar mdzod cig/
ces bya ste/ sa 'tshen 'a du gnyid log par bya'o// skya rengasharamathag tu ya nga byang ba sems dpa'amam pa nga chub sems dpa' las thog ma pa ltang pa byung ba de'i rmi ma du ston

par byed do/ ye shesakyi thabs chen ngo sa de'i ltung ba'i rtsa ba yang 'chags su 'jug go/ thabs dang ldan pa'i ye shes kyang ston pa ru bod de/ de'i phyir byungachub sems dnga' las thog ma pa de de nyid du
byang chub kyi sems mi brjed pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin thob par 'gyur ro// theg pa chen po la yang shin tuganas par 'gyu 'o/ pha rol tu phyin pa drugakyang myur du yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro/
gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' las thog ma pa dag la la zhig la khyod kyis parol tu phyin pa drug la spyod mi nus ! khyod ldan med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon pa rdzogs
par 'tshang rgya bar mi nus kyis/ khyod myur du nyan thos kyi theg pa 'am ]rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa la sems skyed cig dang/ de'i phyir khyod mar du 'khor ba las 'byung bar/
'gyur ro zhes/ ji ltar sngar bshad pa'i b.radu de skad ces zer na/ de ni byang chub sems dpa' las thog ma pa'i ltung ba'i rtsa bganyis ba'o// gzhan yang byang chub sems dang las
thog ma nga 'a la zhig la/ kye khyod kyis so sor thar pa'i 'dul ba dang/ tshul khrims dang legs par spyad pas ci zhig bya/ khyodamyur du blunamadapa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems/
skyed cig/ theg pa chen po lcogs shig dang/ de'i phyir nyon mongs pa'i rkyen gyis khyod kyi lus dang/ ngagadang/ yid kyis mi dge ba'i las gang cung zad kyang bsgrubs pa de dag de'i phyir dag cing
rnam par smin par 'gyur bamadado zhas/ ji ltar sngar bshad pa bzhin gyi bar du de skad zeran/ de ni byang chub sems dpa' las thog ma pa'i ltung ba'i rtsa ba gsum nga 'o// gam/
yang rigasakyi bu byang chub sems dpa' las thog ma pa la la zhig la/ rigs kyi bu khyod kyis nyan thesakyi theg pa'i gtam songs shig/ ma na cig/ maglog shig/ gzhan lam ston/
cig rigs kyi bu khyod kyis nyan thos kyi theg pa'i gtam smra bar gyis shig/ khyod ni de'i phyir 'bras bu chen po thob par mi 'gyur ro// khyod ni de'i phyir nyon mongs pa rnams mthar 'byin par byed
bas/ kyang mi nus kyis/ khyod theg pa chen po'i gtam la dad par gyis shig/ theg pa chen po nyon cig/ khyod theg pachen po lhagasangashig/ gzhan la ston cig dang/ de'i phyir khyod ngan 'gro dang/ na

song gi lam thams cad du 'gro bar mi 'gyur zhing/ myur du bunamed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgyabar 'gyur gzhis de skad smras nas/ gal te de de'i tshig bzhin/
du byed cing lta ba'i rnam pa de lta bu len par khyadan/ gnyisaMka yang ltung ba'i rtsa bar 'gyur te/ 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' las thog ma pa'i ltungab rtsa ba bzhi ba'o// gzhan yang byang/
chub sems dpa' las thog ma pa dag lce gnyis par 'gyur te/ gzhan du sems la gzhan du ston cing/ theg pa chen po 'di yang sgra grags pa dang/ tshigs su bcad pa dang/ rnyedapa dang/
bkur sti'i phyir 'dodapa byed/ kha ton byed/ 'dzin par byed/ klog par byed/ 'chad par byed/ pha rol la yang thos pa tsam ston par byed cing/ bdag ni theg pa chen po pa yin gyi/ gzhan ni ma
yin no zhes de skad zer zhing/ rnyed pa dang/ bkur sti'i phyir gzhan la phrag dogatu byed la/ ba rol gang las nye bar spyod pa dang/ yongs su spyod pa thob par 'gyur ba la/ de'i rkyen gyis de dag

'khrug par 'gyur/ de dag gi mi bsngags pa brjod par byed/ smod par byed/ brnyas par byed/ ngan du brjod par byed/ bdag stod par byed cing/ de dag phrag dog gi rgyus bdag ma las bla ma'i chos dang ldan
ba'achad par byed de/de'i phyir dngos po des ltungabar 'gyur theg pa chen po'i bdeb las phas pham par gyur nas/ de'i phyir yang theg pa chen po las lcib chen po'i ltung ba byung bar 'gyur te

[& ]de'i phyirangan songadu 'gro bar 'gyur ro// par skyes bul zhig rin po che'i gling du 'gro 'dod de// rgyamatsho mching rnams chen por gru las song ba las// rgyamatsho mching rnams chen por gru nying zhig par gyur pa de bzhin

du: byang chub sems dpa' las thogam pa la theg pachen po'i rgya mtshomaching rnams brgal bar 'dod pa las/ phrag dog gi phyir brdzun smras nas/ de'i rkyen gyis de dag dad pa'i rgyu zhig cing/ shes rab kyi

srog dang bral ba thob par 'gyur ro// de lta bsan byang chub sems dpa'alasazogamab khrag dogagi phyir brdzun du smras pa'i rkyen gyis ltung brtse ba chen po 'byungangar 'gyur te/ de ni byang chub sems dpa' las
thog ma pa'i ltung ba'i rtsa ba lnga pa'o// gzhan yang 'bis kyi bu ma 'ongs ba'i dusana' sa thog ma ba'i byang chub sems dpa' khyim pa 'am rab tu byung ba dgazab ba stong ba nyid dang ldan
pa'i mdo sde gzungs dang/ bzod pa dang/ ting nge 'dzin dang/ sas brgyan pa'i skyes bu rigs pa chen po dang ldan b/ tshogs chung ba'i byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi spyod yul gyi theg pa chen po'i
mdo sde de klog par byed/ 'don par byed/ kha don byed/ bklags nas gzhan la brgya cher ston par byed de/ bdag gis chos 'di dag rang gi blos rtogs nas/ nga snying rje ba'iphyir de lta khyedal ston
0gyis/ khyed kyis ci nas kyang chos zab mo 'di la mngon sum du 'gyur ba de ltar sgoms shig dang/ de ltaragying bzhin du khyod kyang ye shes mthong bar 'gyur ro zhes smra zhing/ chos 'di lta bu
zab mo zab pa dag mngon bar ni ma byas kyi/ bklags btsan gyis bstan to zhes ni mi zer bar rnyed pa dang/ bkur sti'i phyir bdag 'tshong bar byed de/ de'i rkyen gyis dus gsum gyi de bzhin
gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyus rnams dang/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dba'achen bo dag dang/ 'phags pa'i gang zag gi spyan sngar nyos ba dang bcas
bar 'gyur/ ltung ba cib byung bar 'gyur/ lha dang mi rnams theg pa chen pos bslus par 'gyur te/ de ni de'i nyan thos kyi theg par mi 'gyur na theg pa chen po lta ci smos/ theg pa chen po
la 'jug pa'i rtogs pa'i khyad par lta ci smos/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub lta ci smos/ 'di lta ste dpar na/ skyes bu zhig 'brog dgon pa chen por
song ba las/ bkres pa dang/ skomasapA nyenacing ngal bar gyur nas/ de 'bras bu chen po dang ldan pa'i shing gi drung du zasakyi phyir 'duganas des shing 'bras bu chen po dang ldan b/ dri dang
ldan pa/ ro dang ldan pa b.rate/ dug gi shing romad pa la 'dzegs nas dug gi 'bras bu wa'o// zos nas 'chi ba'i dusabyed de/ gang zag de yang dpe de dang 'dra bar brjod do// de bas na mir
rnyed pa shin tu dkon pa redanas/ dge ba'i bshes gnyen la gnas te/ theg pa chen la 'jug par 'dod pa la red pa dang/ bkur sti dang/ grags pa'i phyir/rnyedapa shin tu dkon pa redanas/ dab/pa
bdag stod gzhan smod pa byed pas ltung brtsi ba de 'dra ba 'byung bar gyur nas/ ltung ba'irtsa ba de'i phyir shes pa thams cad kyis shin tu smadacing/ ngan song du 'gro bar 'gyur te/ gang zag de/
'dra ba ni rgyal rigs dang/ bram ze dang/ rje'u rigs dang/ dmangs rigs thams cad kyis mi bstan bar bya'o// gang de bstan par byed pa ni shes pa thamasacad kyi 'au ba dang bcas pa yin te/
! de yang byang chub sems dpa' las thog ma pa'i ltung ba'i rtsa ba drug ba'o// gzhan yang rigs kyi khu ma 'ong pa'i dusan/ rgyal rigs rnams kyi mdun du 'don pa'i phyag dam pa 'am/
blon po'i phyag dar ba 'am/ dpa' bo'i phyagadarang 'am/ sman pa'i phyag dar ba blun pa/ mkhas pas bsdoms pa/ nor chab longs spyod che ba dag 'byung ste/ de dag sbyin pa'i bsod nams
kyi dngos po rnam pa mang bo dag byed par snang sto/ de dag gtor bas rgyags shing dregasanas/ snyams pa dang rgyags pas rgyal rigs dgakyang 'byed bar byed/ dge sbyongadagakyang rgyalarigs dang
'byed par byed cing/ de dag rgyal rigs la gnas/ dag sbyong dag kyang chad pas gcod par byedade/ nor gyi chad pas 'phrog par byed pas/ gnod pa de'i phyir dgo slong de dag gis gang zag gi
wa[j]yod rung/ dge 'dun gyi yang rung/ phyogs bzhi'i dge 'dun gyi yang rung/ mchod rten gyi yang rung ste/ phrogs nas de dag la skyes su 'bul bar byed/ phyag dar pa de dag kyang rgya la 'gas/
la 'bul bar byed de/ dganyis ka ltung ba'i rtsa ba'i 'gyur ro// 'di'i lhung ba'i rtsa ba bdun pa'o/ ga zhan yang rgyal rigs kyi phyag dar pa de dge sbyong dang bcas to/ nyes ba
'gyur/ chos de lta bu dag kyang chos ma yin par 'dogs/ chos ma yin ba'i chos su 'dogs ste/ chos sangs mdo sde dang 'dul ba 'i bslab pa la mi lta/ ston pa nag po dang/ ston pa chen
po lami lta/ byams pa dang/ snying rje chen po dang/ shes rab kyi pa'i lo tu phyin pa'i slab pa dang/ thabs kyi bslab pa dang/ gang yang mdo sde gzhan dag las bslab pa bshad pa de
mang sngangs nas/ dge sbyong dag gtso ba'i phyir/ de 'dra ba'i chos dang mi ldan pa'i bya bar bya ba 'cha' bar byed de/ bya bar bya ba de dag gis dge slong dag gso bar 'gyur/ zhi gnas dang
lhag mthong la sbyor pa'i yid la byed ba gtong bar 'gyur/ bsam gtan pa de dag gnod somasamang bar 'gyur bas/ de'i phyir dge slong dag gi nyon mongs pam zhib zhi bar mi byed/ srab
mor mi 'gyur te/ de'i tshe dge slong dag bsam pa nyams par 'gyur/ tshul khrims nyams par 'gyur/ spyod pa nyams pa dang/ lta ba nyams pa 'gyur te/ de'i phyir lhod par 'gyur//
wa @#// phal cher lhod par 'gyur/ tshul khrims nyams par 'gyur/ dge sbyongam yinan dag sbyong du yi dam 'tshal/ tshangs bar spyod pa ma yin na tshangs par spyod pa sa yi
dam 'cha' zhing bong bu dang mtshungs pa dang/ chosaM shin tu bsal bar 'chad par 'gyur te/ de dag la rgyal rigs 'khor dang bcas pas shan tu pa kur sti byas pa dang/ mi gro byas pa dang
mchod pa byas par 'gyur/ dodag gis dge slong songs la brtson pa rnams kyi mibasngags pa khyim pa la brjodapa dang/ rgyal rigs 'khor dang bcas ba de 'ang dge slong song ba la brtson pa de

! dag la zhe sdang zhing 'phya bar 'gyur ro// gang de na dge slong song ba la brtson pa rnams kyi ban pa'i dang/ longs spyod du bya ba de kha ton la brtson pa'i dge slong 'bul bar byas pas/ degacig ltung
ba'i rtsa bar 'gyur ro// daci'i phyi'i zhan/ dge slongabasan gtan pa na zhing dam pa yin gyi/ kha ton ba dang zhal ta la gnas pa ni ma yin pa'i phyir te/ dge slong bsam gtanapa dgan ting nge 'dzin
[@ ]/dang/ gzungs dang bzod pa dang sa dag la snod du gyur// sbyin gnas dam pa/ snod dam bar gyur ba 'jig rten gyi snang bar byed pa/ lam ston par byed pa/ lasakyi zhing dang nyon
dmongs pa'i zhing las sems can rnams sgrol bar byed pa/ mya ngan las 'da' bar 'gro ba'i lam la gzhog par byed pa'o// rigs kyi bu de ni tshogs mkhyung ba/ 'jigs pa dang bral ba'i

pa byang chub sems dpa' las thog ma pa rnams kyi ltung ba'i rtsa ba brgyad pa ste/ ltung ba'i rtsa ba de dag dang ldan n/ byang chub sems dpa' las thog ma ba sngon dge ba'i rtsa ba brgyad pa thams cad
sdug par 'gyur/ nganasong du 'gro bar 'gyur/ ltung ba'i dngos por gyur/ lha dang mi'i bde ba thamasacad las bas pham par 'gyur/ byang chub kyi sems kyis bslus par 'gyur te/
rigos kyi bud 'dra ba dag gi phyir byang chub sems dpa'i nam mkha'i snying po ni/ de lta bu dag gi yul du skye zhing 'byung bar 'gyur te/ laM las ni dge sbyong gi gzugs dang/ cha lugs dang/ stod
lam gyis ) la 'dzani bram ze'i gakhrugs dang/ cha lugs dang/ spyod lam nas byol song gimtshan ma dang/ spyod lam gyi bar du gzugs snatshogs ston te/ rgya cheraji ltar dba' bar 'gro

ba'i ting nge 'dzin las 'byung ba bzhin klog par bya ste/ de dang de dag tu sems can de dang de dag 'ji ltaram thun ba bzhin du chos 'chad bar byed de/ sngon ma byung ba sngan chad ma byung ba/ thams cad
mkhyen pas bshad pa'i mdo sde dang/ ting nge 'dzin dang/ bzod pa dang 2 sa'achad pa te/ de'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' las dang po bathabs mi shes pa ltungababyung ba dag ngo tsha bar khyad/
ltung ba des 'jigs par byed/ sdangabar byed/ skragapar byed/ ltung ba de dag 'chags par byed gtong bar byed/ srong bar byed/ spong bar byed do// gal te sems can de dag byang chub sems/
duba'anam mkha'i snying po'i ming thos nas/ mthong bar 'dod cing/ ngan song du ltung bas 'jigs te/ ltung ba'i rtsa ba bshags par 'dodan/ gal te de dag byang chub
sems dpa'anam mkha'i sing po la phyag 'tshal zhing/ de'i ming nas brjod na/ rigs kyi bu de dag gi skal ba ji lta ba bzhin du Ams can de'i 'dun du thamal ba'i tshul du 'dug pa 'am/
lta bram ze'i gzugs nas/ bu mo'i gzugs kyi bar gyis byang chub sems dang na las thog ma pa de'i mdun du 'dug ste/ ltung ba'i rtsi ba de ji ltar khyung ba 'chags su 'jug go/ de'i thabs mkhas
pa khra ba mo dang/ blanamadapa'i theg pa chen po la spyod pa yang ston/ sa dang sa dag tu yang ting nge 'dzin dang/ gzungs dang/ bzod pa la gzhog par byed de/ rim gyis lam yan lag brgyad
kyi bar gyis gzhag par byed do// denas de dab ngan song ga'ajigs pachen po las shin tuthar bar byed// blanamed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las phyir mi ldog

pa'i sa la gzhog par byed do// de ltar de glog dang mtshungs pa dang/ pha rol tu phyin pa drug gi spyod pa lamathuche zhing brtul bar 'gyur ro// de bas na myur du bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i/
byang chub tu mngon par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur ro// gal ted dag la mngon sum du bdag ston par mi byed na/ gangado la gsol bar byed pa'i byang nub sams dpo' lasathogam pa zhes pa dang bcas pas

ma/ tho rangs kyi thun la langs te/ kha shar phyogs subastan te 'dug la/ lha'i bu skya reng la gsol ba gdab par bya ba 'di skad du brjodado// skyare ngagya leng thugs rjechen po can/ skal bachen po can khyod
'dzam bu'i gling du shar ma thag tu/ bdag la thugs rjes dgab ba'amadzod cig/ byang chub sems dpa'anamamakha'i snying bozugs rje chen po can la bdag gi tshig gis spron te/ bdag gi rmi lam du
yang de ston par 'gyur zhing/ bdag gis thabs de ltung ba bshags par 'gyur ba dang/ 'phags pa'i theg pa chen po la thabs dang ye shes thob par mdzod cig ces smras nas/ des de'i tshe nal du
gnyid log par bya ste/ skya reng 'di 'dzam bu'i gling du shar mthag tu/ byang chub sems dpa' nam mkha'i snying po 'dir 'ong bar 'gyur te// byang chub sems dpa' las dang po pa de'i rmil ma na/ tha
mal par mdun du 'dug ste/ lhung ba'i rtsa ba de yang 'chags su 'jug/ ye shes dang thabs chen pos thabs dang ye shes la mkhas pa gang dag gis/ byang chub sems dpa' las dang bo pa

de nyid du byang chub kyi sems mi brjod pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin thob par 'gyur ba dang/ theg pa chen po la shin tu brtan por gnas par 'gyur ba dang/ de myur du pha rol tu phyin pa drug yongs su
rdzogs bar 'gyur ba dang/ rang kho mi thogs par bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang nub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur ba de lta bu'i thabs dang/ shes rab kyang de
la ston to// de bas na rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po nam mkha'i snying po 'di ni shin tu dpa' ba las byung ba'i yid bzhin gyi nor bu ni po che yan/
'ag gi dam pa mgo bo la 'dug par snang ngo// de lta bas na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po na)mkha'i snying po ni yon tan bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang ldan no// rigs kyi bu gzhan yang
sems can gang/ byang chub sems dpa' nam mkha'i snying po'i ming thos sam/ gzugs 'dri 'jug gam/ de la mchod pa byed dam/ rim gro byed dam dbasti stang byed/ bkur sti byed/
mchod pa byed cing/ me tog dang/ dri dang/ phreng ba dang/ rgyugapadang/ gdugs dang/ rgyal mtshan dang/ ba dan rnam pa du ma dag gis bkur sti byed/ phyag 'tshal bar byed//
bdag gi srog kyang de la 'bul bar byed na/ sems can de dgazhi mas dus byed par mi 'gyur/ chus ma yin/ mtshon gyis ma yin/ dug gi 'chi bar mi byed de/ de dgatsho zad bam
gtogs par mi 'am/ mi ma yin pa sus kyang de de dag gi srog 'phrog par mi nus/ dus ma yin par mi 'chi/ nad pu can dum 'gyur/ bkres pa dang/ skom bas dus byed par mi 'gyu/
rgyal po'i chad pas chod par mi 'gyur/ 'chi ba'i dus la bab kyi bar du ltung ba'i rtsa ba 'byung bar mi 'gyur/ de dag mig gis gzugs mi mthong/ rna bas sgramathos/ sna'i dri mi tshor/
tsha lces romi myong/ lus kyi 'og mi shes shing/ da dung du dbugs phra mo 'byung ba dang 'jug par byed/ da dung du de'i lus la tshe dang/ drod dang/ rnam par shes pa 'jug par 'gyur ba de'i tshe/
de dag la byang chub sems dpa' nam mkha'i snying po tha mal par ston par byed sems can gang sngon bram ze la gus par gyur ba de dag gi rnam par shes pa lan/ 'gogs kyi bu de bram ze'i gzug
su ston to// gang 'dod pa'i dbang phyug la gus pa de dag la ni/ 'dod pa'i dbang phyug gi bar du ston pa nas/ gang mthu bo che la gus pa dang/ gang dbang phyug chen po la gus pa dang/ brgya
byin la gus pa dang/ 'khor los sgyur ba la gus pa dang/ nyim dang/ zla ba dang/ gnasabasrung po dang/ 'phags skyes po dang/ mig mi khabrang dang/ ngal bsos po la gus pa
dang : gang dag lha dang/ ri dang/ shing dang/ nu mig dang/ mtsho 'u dang/ lteng ka snatshogs la gus ba'i bar du/ gang dang gang gi skyabs su song ba'i sems can de dag la/ de lta
de ltar sems can de dag gi mdun dubastan nas/ gang gi bsam pa nyi 'dra ba bzhin du de'i gzugs kyis 'di skad ces smra 'o// 'phags ba'i bden pa bzhi dga'/ gang dag shes rab
kyis mthong ba//'khar ba'i srid pa sgrol ba'i phyir// 'khor ba nan de kun shes// sems can de dag gis chos 'di dag rnam par shes pas shes par byas nas/ mtho ris la rten par
a @#// 'gyur ro// sems can gang dag sangs rgyas la mngon par dad pa de dag gi mdun du 'dug ste/ sangs rgyas kyi gzugs bstan nus 'di skad ces smra'o//
[– ]sangs rgyas ye shes bden pa yin// srid pa'i rgya mtsho gang sgrol ba// ye shes de la myur du reg/ sdug bsngal kun las grol bar 'gyur// de'i tshe sems can de dag sangs rgyus yid la
byed pa'i sgras dga' zhing rangs nas 'chi ba'i dus byas te/ sangs rgyasakyi zhing rtogapa mad pa/ yongs su dag pa/ gnasangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das bzhugs pa 'tsho ba gzhes pa/chos
klo kyang ston padir skye bar 'gyur ro// de bzhin du chos dang dge 'dun la glog par bya'o// de lta bsan byang chub sems dpa' nam mkha'i sing bon yon tan gyichos bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang ldan no/
gang yang ting nge 'dzin rnam pa snatshogs pa semasakyis shin tu dbang du byu bar 'dod na/ des tho rangasakyi thun la byang chub sems dpa' nam mkha'i sing po la phyaga'atshal te/ mchod pa ci nus kyis
khya'o// san sacan thams cad la byams pa'i sams nye bar gzhag ste/ 'di skad ces brjod do// dgongs shig dgongs shig/ nam mkha'i snyingabo thugs rjechen pobares ba/ bdag
la dran ba dang/ ting nge 'dzin gyi rnal 'byor stsol cig/ 'di lta ste/ umu ran khe/ bag glan la/ sazhu dra a ba ta re nanAlan la/ mahA kA ru NIka/ ma nu pa dzam b+ha ti/
[/ ]a glu dzam ba smi ti/ badzra dzam b+hasmi ti/ koNasIti/ a nub ma ti/ bud d+ha ko Tasmi ti sAhA/ da' dran pa dang/ ting nge 'dzin la 'jug pa sbyin par byed do// gang yang sangs rgyas kyi
bka' 'ang rang nyan thos kyis bshad pa yang rung ste/ gtsug lag sna tshogs klog bar 'dod na/ des khrus byas te/ skya reng 'byung ba'i tsho/ byang chub sems dpa' nam mkha'i snying po la
phyag bya'o// mchodapa ci nus kyis bya'o// sems can thams cad la byams pa'i sems su bya'o// 'di skad kyang brjod par bya'o// dgongs shig dgongs shig/ mkhas pa chen po/
sams can thams cad kyi nang na bsam gyisam khyab da// rigs kyi bu nam mkha'i snying po gang zag gi mchog dran pa dang ting nge 'dzin gyi rnal 'byor bdag la stsol cig/
'di lta ste/ an la dzi/ bishan tu shadzAbi 'ban dza/ bi pa klu sum/ pa tal dzAsi/ sbyan shar tshe/ shA sta kar ni/ dum humamahA karu NIka sAhA/ gang rgya mtsho mching rnam
chen por 'jug 'dod pa dang/ gang khung du 'jug 'dod pa dang/ gangabacud dam paspyod 'dod par gyur pa dang/ gang brtson rar bcug ba dang/ gangamadza' ba dang bral ba dang/ gang mig dzan/
ba dang phrad padang/ gang dgams 'jigs bdang/ chu dang/ mtshon dang/ dug dang/ byad stem dang/ stag dang/ seng gengang/ dug drag po dang/ rkun po dang/ g.yon
can gyis 'jigs par bgyid pa dang/ gang dam du bcings pa dang/ gang chad pas bcad pa dang/ gang gsod pa la thug pa dang/ gang nad kyis btab pa dang/
nad kyis 'jigs pa dang/ gang dgachos gos dang/ bsod snyoms dang/ mal stan dang/ na ba'i rkyen gyi sman dang/ go khyad kyis phongs pa de dag gal te byang chub sems dpa' nam/
mkha'i snying po'i ming nas brjod cing/ mchod ra tsanus kyis khyed la/ sams can thams cad la byams pa'i sems kyis gzhegacing/ 'di skad du yang sba ste/ dgongs shig dgo/
shig thugs rje chen po dang ldan pa// grags bo chen po nam mkha'i snying po 'gro ba 'i don bzhed pa thugs rje chen po dang ldan pa bdag la gzigs shig/ bdag 'di lta bu las rab tu thar
pa mdzod cig/ skal ba stsol cig/ mthu chen po bdagani sdug bsngal gyis nyam thag go/ shin tu dbul lo// bdagan khyod la gnas nas/ zhi ba dang bdeb 'di dang tshe rabs gzhan
du thob par 'gyur ro zhes smras ba dang/ byang chub sems dpa'i nam mkha'i snying po gzugs bya mal panas/ bu mo'i gzugs kyi bar gyis sems can de dag gi mdun du 'dug ste/
dbugs 'byin par byed do// gang dag ci las 'jigs pa de dag de las rab tu thar bar byed do// gang dag dbul ba gos med pa dang/ gang dag yo byad kyis brel ba'i bar du do dag la
de lta de ltar bsam pa yongs su rdzogs par byed do// yo byad thams cad phun sum tshogs pa'i bar du 'gyur ro// rgyal po'i bu la la zhig gnas chen po'i dbang bskur ba thob par sems pa/
de/ gal te byang chub sems dpa' nam mkha'i snying po'i ming brjod cing phyag 'tshal la/ mchod pa dang rim gro byed pa la sogs te/ bram ze'i gnas chen po dang/ khyim bdag gigs/
chen po dang/ bzo'i gnas chen po dang/ thos pa'i gnas chen po dang/ sgom pa'i gnas chen po dang/ gang mos pa'i gnas chen po'i bar du 'dod pa de dgag la te/ byang chub sems dpa'
nam mkha'i snying po'i ming thos nas phyag 'tshal bar byed/ khrus byas te gos gtsang ma gosanas/ tho rangs kyi thun la/ byang chub sems dpa' namamakha'i snying po la skyabs su song
nas[u0f10 ]gsol ba gdab pa 'di skad du rjod par byed de/ nam mkha'i snying bo thugs rje chen po dang ldan pa bdag la skal ba stsol cig/ bsam pa dang/ sems pa thams cad dang//
bsam pa yid bzhin rab tu rdzogs par mdzod cig/ gang soms shing gung gsol ba thugs rje chen po dang ldan pa khyod kyis mdzod cigaces brjod na/ de nas byang chub sams
dpa' namamakha'i snying pos lha'i rna ba'i khams rnam par dag pa mi las 'das pa sa skadade thes nas/ sems can de dag la bdag ci rigs par ston te/ de dag la de ltar thabs kyang ston to/
byang chub sems dpa' sems dang chen po nam mkha'i sing po de ni de lta bu'i thabs kyi yon tan gyi chos dang ldan no// blo rgya mtsho 'ching rnamachen po dang ldan no// legs
kyi bu rgyamatsho'achung rnamA chen po'i thig pa ni la la zhig gis tshad bzung bar nus kyi byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po nam mkha'i snying po thabs dang ye shes mkhas pa dang/
thabs kyis sems can yongs su smin par bya ba'i tshang ni bzungam nus so// rigs kyi bu phyogs bcu'i nam mkha' mtha' yas mu med pa thams cad kyi tshad ni la las bzung nus kyi/ byang
chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po nam mkha'i snying po sems can yongs su smin par bya ba'i phyir/ rnam pa sna tshogs su sprul par byed pa ni tshad bzung mi nus te/ la la ni sems can yodra
su smin par byaba'i phyir/ sangs rgyas kyi gzugs su sprul bar byed do// la lar ni bram ze'i gzugs su byed cing/ sems can ji lta bu s 'dul bde lta bu'i gzugs kyi bar du sprul bar
byed de/ debyol song dugatogs pa rnams kyi nang dun byolasong gi gzugs su sprul par byed do// sems can dmyal ba pa rnams kyinang du ni sems can dmyal ba pa'ig zugs su sprul par byed pa nas/
gshin rje'i 'jig rten pa rnams la gshin rje'i 'jig rten gyi gzugs kyi bar du sprul bar byed do// khacig lan mngon sum du sprul pa sprul bar byed/ khacig lan rmi lam du sprel bar byed/ kha
sa/cig la sdig pa'i las sdug pa'i phyir/ ngan song las bsgral ba'i phyir/ mtho ris la dgod pa'i phyir/ sems can rnams kyi don gyi phyir/ 'chi 'pho ba'i dus kyi tshe/ rnam par shes pa zam rgya
ba'ini/ gzugs snatshogos su sprul bar byed de/ de dgade la thog mar skyabs su song zhing mthong ste/ bde ba thob nas mtho ris kyi 'jig rten du gnas pa'i bde ba thob pa'i bar du 'gyur bas dol
phyir sus kyang de'i sprul pa thamasacad kyis tshad gzung bar mi nus so// de lta bas na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po nam mkha'i sing po 'don thabs dang/ ma shes kyi yon tanagyi chos
bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang ldan no// sangs rgyas kyi yon tan chen po dang ldan no// de bas na rigs kyi bu de'i yan lag gi mchog mgo bo la 'di bzhin gyi nor bu rin po che 'dug par snang ngo//
de nas de 'i ni 'khor 'dus paN+Dams cad kyis byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po nam mkha'i sAng lo la ngo mtshar thob/ rmad du byung ba thob/ bla ma la bkur sti dang/ bsti stang du
bya ba thob par gyur nas/ thams cad kyis thalamo sbyar te/ byang chub semasadapa' sems dang 'an po nam mkha'i snying bo la mchod pa dang/ bkur ste sna tshogs kyis bkur stir byed/ me tog
dang : dri dang/ phreng ba dang/ byug pa dang/ maram dang/ bdug pa dang/ gdugs dang/ rgyal mtshan dang/ ba dan dang/ chos gos dang/ rgyan dang/ gos dang/ stod pa dang/ glu dang/ sil
snyan da gagis mchod pa byed do/ khyang chub sems dpa'anam mkha'i snying po des kyang/ de dag thams cad bcom ldan 'das la phul lo/ yulanas bcom ldan 'das kyi
ma zhabs la phyag 'tshal nas 'di skad ces gsol to// btsun pa bcom ldan 'das nyon mongs pa/ rtog pa ldadang ldan pa'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'di'i sems can ma rig pa'i mun pa chen pos chos
pa rnams la/ sangs rgyas kyis don ji ltar bgyi bar nus/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa 'di lta ste/ rigs kyi bu nam mkha' nam bcings ma grol ba/ nyonam
mongs pa// ma rmongs ba rang bzhin gyis dag pa'o// nam mkha' la rlung gi rkyen gyisan/ thul ba'i rdul gyis dkrigs shing yongs su ma dag pa'amtshan du snang ste chusan zhi bar byed/
dri ma med cing yongs su dag par 'gyur ro// gang na skar mdang/ garba' dang/ nyim dang/ zla ba'i bye brag mi mngonan ni/ skad cig dang thang cig dang/ yud tsam dang/ nyin mo dang/
mtshan mo dang/ dus dang lo rnams kyi bgrang ba yang mi mngon no// rigs kyi bu dbazhin du de bzhin gshegs pa'i don dam pa stong pa nyid kyi dbang du song ba'i sams ni rang bzhin gyis dang ba/
yongs su dag pa yin mod kyi/ sems can rnams kyi blo bur du byung ba'i nye ba'i nyon mongs pa rnams kyis/ soms tabar nyon mongs par byas te/ de dag gi phyir de bzhin gshegs pa thug
chen po chu dang mtshungs pasachos 'chad par mdzad do// sems nyon mongs par gyur ba'i sems can rnams kyi sems yongs su sbyong bar mdzad pas yongs su dag pa dang/ de dag gi sems dri
ma med par 'gyur to/ de'i phyir sems can de dag de bzhin gshegs pa'i nyi ma shar nas/ ye shekyi 'od zer gyis tshim par 'gyur ro// sangs rgyas kyi yon tan bsam gyis mi khyab pa
la mngon sum du 'gyur te/ 'di lta ste/ dran pa nye bar gzhag pa bzhi nas/ 'bags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa'i bar du gnas bar 'gyur ro// sangs rgyasakyi chos ma
'dres pa bcobargyad kyi bar du gnas par 'gyur ro// sems can thams cad la snying rjebalashin tu gnas par 'gyur ro// de dag las kyang 'jig rten du dgra bcomab rnams 'byung bar 'gyur
ro/ rang sangs rgyus rnams dang/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro// de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogos pa'i sa dra
rgyus rnams 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro// rigs kyi bu da nga sAm du sams nam mkha' mig la gnas sam/ gsol ba/ bcom ldan 'das dem lags so// ci mig girnam par
shes ba la gnas sam/ bcom ldan 'das de ma 'gas so// ci zhig gis kun tu rig pa la gnas sam/ bcom ldan 'das de ma lags so// gang yang nang dumig gis kun tu
reg pa 'i rkyen gyis tshor ba gsum 'byung ba de la nam mkha' gnas sam/ gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das de malags so// de bzhin du rnab dang/ sna dang/
lce dang/ lus la brjod par bya'o/ rigasakyi bu de ji snyam du sems/ nam mkha' yid la gnas pas/ yid kyis kun tu reg pa'i rgyan gyisatshor ba gsum 'byung ba de la nam mkha'
gnas sam/ gsol ra/ bcom ldan 'das de ni ma lags so// rigs kyi bu de ji snyam du sems/ sems can nam mkha' la gnas sam gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das de malags
so[：]rigs kyi bu de ji snyam du sems/ namamakha' sems can la gnas sam/ gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das de ma lags so// de skad ces bka' stsal nas bcom ldan
'das la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po nam mkha'i snying pos 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das gcig la gcigame rtan to// gcig la gcig spyod yul ma lags so//
bcom ldan 'das chos thams cad ni rtog pa ma mchis pa stong ba nyid do/ sgrom btags pa yang dgara'i mtha' de bzhin nyid du rtogs par bgyi'o// bcom ldan 'das nam mkha' ni 'di lta ste/ rang
gi mtshan nyid tha mi dad pa/ mi rtog pa/ rnam par mi rtog pa/ mig yo ba/ gsob lags te/ myu gum mchis pa/ sa bon mamachis pa/ 'bras bu ma mchis pa/ rnam par sminapa mamachis
pa yi ge ma mchis pa/ rlom sems ma mchis pa'o// bcom ldan 'das de bzhin du/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos chos thams cad la de ltar rtogasan ) mi skya ba'i tshes la//
bzod pa thob par 'gyur ro// 'di lta ste/ bcom ldan 'das/ byabarAdza/ man takA ya/ dzin dzAya// dzan ni/ ma muni ha ra/ An pa la/ gun gar lha/ ni ya min la/ bupa ya/
shata shAng/ A ma sha na/ ta thA gam/ shamang gu/ ma du gsha/ sha ma tshe tanA ya/ ke shan ta/ sang shongashane swAhA/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ legs so legs so/
rigs kyi bu khyod kyis mig las rgyal bar byed pa/ sang ga'i 'gros kyis phyir bsgyings pa'i gzugs 'dis sems can dag 'chi ba'i tshe/ rnam par shes pa'i tha ma 'a// nyon mongs pa'i sgrib
pa dang/ las kyi sgrib pa dang/ chos kyi sgrib pa sdug pa dang/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dgapar gtong nus so// khyod ni 'jig rten gyi khams dang ga tu med grangs med par 'gro ba dang/ sems
na rnams snying rje'i dbang gis grong dang/ grong khyer dang/ grong 'dab dang/ ljongs dang/ pho brang 'khor dang/ rgyal po'i pho brang du gzugs dang/ cha lugs dang/ spyod lam sna
tshogs kyis theg pa chen po'i mdo sda sna tshogs 'chad pa dang/ sams can yongs su smin bar bya ba dang/ rgyal rigs kyi phyag dar pa nas dge sbyong gi phyag dar pa'i bar du sdig pa'i chos las
snang ba dang/ thams cad dge ba'i chos la gzhug par nus so// bcom ldan 'das kyis 'di bstan pa'i tshe/ lha dang mi'i skye dgu dpagatumed grangs med pa dag gis
ting nge 'a dzin dang/ gzungs dang/ bzod pa sna tshogs thob par gyur to// gzhan dag kyang sa bcu la ye shes skyes par gyur to// srogachags khrin mi skya ba'i chos la bzod pa thob par
gyur to// sems can dag gis gang dag rtsod 'gyur ba// de dag gi ni gzhu yi rtsa ba spongs// myur du mthong bar 'gyur ba dag gi ni// rtsa ba bzhi po thams cad 'gyur bar gyis// bcog/
ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsal pa dang/ dge slong de dag dang/ 'khor de thams cad dung/ lha dang/ mi dang/ lha ma yin dang/ dri zar bcas pa'i 'jigan rnams dga' ste/
bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa la mngon par bstod do// 'phags pa nam mkha'i snying bo zhes bya ba theg pa chen po'i mdo rdzogs so//
rgya gar skad du/ Ar+ya badzraman Ta nA ma d+hA ra NimahAyAn sUtra/ bod skad du/ 'phags pa rdo rje'i snying po'i gzungs zhes bya ba theg pa chen po'i mdo/ sangs rgyas dang
byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo// 'di skad bdag gis thos pa dus gcigan/ bcom ldan 'das gangs kyi ri dang nya ba snatshogs kyi grong gi rtswa 'i spyil bon/ dge
a slong stong du tshangs pa'i dge slong gi dge 'dun chen po dang thabs gcig tu bzhugs te/ de nas bcom ldan 'das bsod snyoms kyi thas phyis len pa spangs te/ rtswa'i spyil por
skyil mo krung pa cas nas sku drang por bsrang ste/ dran pa mngon du gzhag nas bzhugs so// de nas de'i tshe bcom ldan 'das tshes thams cad la mnyam pa nyid du gnas pa zhes bu
ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs so// bcom ldan 'das soms par zhugs ma thag tu dge slong gi dge 'dun thams cad kyis/ bcom ldan 'das da ltar ga la bzhugs pa'i sku ma
mthong ngo// de nas sangs rgyas kyi mthus lha rnams kyi dbang po brgya byin dang/ mi mjed kyi bdag po tshangs pa dang/ gnas gtsang ma'i ris kyi lha'i bu sum khri nyis stong
bcom ldan 'das gal ba der dong ngo// de nas lha rnamasakyi dbang po brgya byin dang/ mi mjed kyi bdag po tshangs pa 'di snyam du/ bcom ldan 'das da ltar gangan bzhugs
snyam sems pa dang/ bcom ldan 'das rtswa'i spyil po'i nang na ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs pa de dag gis mthong bo/ mthong nas bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der dong ste/ bcom
ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar cang mi smra ba skyil mo krung bcas te 'khod do// gnas gtsang ma'i ris kyi lha'i bu rnams kyang cang mi smra bar bcom ldan 'as kyi spyan sngarade nyid du skyil mo krung
'bacas te 'a khad do// de nas de'i tshe bcom ldan 'das kyis 'di lta bu'i rdzu 'phrul mngon par 'du mdzad pa mngon par mdzad de/ ji lta bu'i rdzu 'phrul
mngon par 'du mdzad pa mngon par mdzad pas/ stong gsumagyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams na byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa'i gang zag thug pa la gsar du yang dag par zhugs
pa 'am/ theg pa la yang dag par zhugs nas/ ring du len pa 'am/ phyir mi ldog pa 'am/ sbya ba gcig gis thogs pa yang rung sta/ jisAd 'khod pa de dag thams cad sna tshogs
kyi grong ga la ba dang/ rtswa'i spyil po ga la ba der dong ste phyin pa dang/ sangs rgyas kyi mthus mi gang tsam gyis bar snang la spyil mo krung bcas te 'khod do// de nas de'i tshe
'jam dang la gzhon nur gyur pos/ sems can thams cad kyisams mgu bar byed pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs so// de nas 'jam dpal gzhon
nur gyur pa ting nge 'dzin do 'a sIms nga ra zhugs ma thag tu/ 'khor de dag thams cad sems rab tu dga' ba dang sums mgub dang/ soms rangs pa dang/ sams shin tu tshim pa
skyas so// de nas de'i tshabyang chub sems dang 'i byams pas chos thams cad rab tu zhi bar zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs so// byang chub sems dang 'a mA
pa ting nge 'dzin de la snyoms par zhugs ma thag tu/ 'khor de dag thams cad kyi dbang po rnams rab tu zhi bar gnas so// de nas byang chub sems dpa' rin po che tog ces bya
ba/ byang chub sems dpa' drug khri nyis stong dang lhan cig tu/ snatshogs kyi grong ga la ba dang/ rtswa'i spyil bo ga la ba der song ste phyin ma thag tu/ bdag nyid steng gi nam mkha'i bar snang
la 'dug pa snyam du shes te/ de steng gi nam mkha' de nyid la skyi'amo krung bcas te 'dugage/ de nas de'i tshe byang chub sems dpa' rin po che tog gi bkod pa chen po zhes bya ba'i
ting nge 'dzin la soms par zhugs so// byang chub sems dang ni rin po che tog ting nge 'dzin de la snyoms par zhugs ma thag tu/ de nas bar snang thams cad me tog ut+pal dang/
pad+ma dang/ ku mu dadang/ pad+ma dkar pos kun tu khebs nas/ nyim dang/ zla ba rnamasakyi 'od kyang mi snang bar gyur to// de nas byang chub sems dpa' 'phags pa spyan/
rasagazigs dbang phyug/ byang chub sems dpa' drug khri nyis stong dang lhan cig tu stong gi nam mkha' las sna tshogs kyi gong ga la ba dang/ bcom ldan 'das gal ba der song ste phyinam
thag tu byang chub semasaM dpa' spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug sa 'a 'dug mnus nas// dbyang chub sems dang 'a lhagam de dag dang lhan cig tu stong gi bar snang la nam mkha' la skyil mo krung
!// bcas pa 'dug go/ 'dug ma thag tu de'i tshe byang chub sems dang 'a spyan ras gzigs dbang phyugasems can thams cad kyi nyon mongs pa 'jomasab zhe bya ba'i tingang 'dzin
la snyoms par zhugs so// byang chub sar sa dpa' spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug teng nge 'dzin do la snyoms par zhugs ma thag tu/ de nas 'khor de dag thams cad kyi 'dod chags
dang zhe sdang dang/ gti mug dang/ nyon mongs pa thams cad rab tu zhi bar gyur to// de nas de'i tshe bcom ldan 'das steng gi bar snang la 'thagasanas 'dzum pa mdzad do/
de nas bcom ldan 'das kyi zhal gyi sgo nas 'od zer kha dog dum/ 'di lta ste/ sngon po dang/ sarapo dang/ dmar bo dang/ dkar po dang/ btsong kadang/ shel dang/ dngul
gyi kha dog lta bu dag byung ngo// de nas de'i tsho 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pas stong gi bar snang la/ gos phrag pa gcig tu bgos te/ dusamo g.yas pa'i lha nga bar snang de nyid la
btsugs nas/ bcom ldan 'das ga la ba de legs su thalamo sbyar ba btud de/ de bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das 'dzum pa mdzad pa'i rgyu ni gang lags//
rkyen ni ba gang lags bcom ldan 'dasakyis bka' stsal pa// 'jam dpal bor snang 'dir sangs rgyas khri rnams kyis byang chub sams dpa' rnams la/ rdo blo'i snying po'i gzungs zhes bya ba ba shad[}]
de/ yang dag par rab tu bstan to// 'jam dpal gyis gsol ba/ bcom ldan 'das kyis da yang byang chung sems dpa' 'di rnams la rdo rje'i snying po ni gzungs bshad du gsol/
bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa// 'jam dang la chog go/ rdo rje'i snying po'i gzungs la byang chub kyang med/ sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams kyang med na/ byang chub sems dpa' 'di dag ni byang
chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'dod do// rdo rje'i snying po'i gzungs la 'khor ba yang med/ mya ngan las 'das pa yang mad na/ byang chub sems dpa' 'di dgan yongs su mya ngan las
'da' bar 'dod do// rdo rje'i snying bo'i gzungs la dge ba yang med/ mi dge ba yang re dan/ byang chub sems dpa' 'di dag ni mi dge ba spong bar 'dod do// rdo rje'i snying po'i gzungs la ga do' yang
mad/tshur rol yang modan/ 'di dag ni pha rol tu 'grobar 'dod do// rdo rje'i snying po'i gzungs la zhing yang mad/ zhing yongs su grub nga yang gdan/ 'di dgan zhing yongs su bsgrub par 'dod
da/ rdo rje snying po'i gzungs la bdud kyang med/ bdud du bdags pa yang mdan/ 'di dag ni bdud 'dul bar 'dod do// rdo rje'i snying po'i gzungs la nyan thos kyang med/ nyan thos su bdag
pa yang mdan/ 'di dag ni nyan thos kyi chos las 'da' bar 'dod do// rdo rje'i snying po'i gzungs la rang sangs rgyasakyang med/ rang sangs rgyas su bdags pa yang med na/ 'di dag ni rang sangs/
rgyas kyi chos las 'da' bar 'dod do// re rje'i snying po'i gzungs lage mas can sa nga med/ sems can du bdags pa yang medan/ 'di dag gi las can rnams yongs/
su mya ngan las bzla bar 'dod do// rdo rje'i snying po 'i gzungs 'don kyang med/ don ma yin nga dang mdan/ 'di dag ni don byed par 'dod do// rdo rje'i snying po'i gzungs la 'dod chags kyang
mad/ 'dod chags su bdags pa yang mdan/ 'di dag ni 'dod chags sbyong bar 'dod do// rdo rje'i snying po'i gzungs la zhe sdang yang mad/ zhe sdang du bdags pa yang mdan/ 'di dag ni zhe

ts+tshA sngang song bar 'dod do// rdo rje'i snying po 'i gzungs gtimug kyang med/ gti nug tu bdags ba yang na da na/ 'ang dag ni gti mug srung bar 'dod de// rdo rje'i snying po'i gzungs la shes pa yang
mad mi shes pa yang med na/ 'di dag ni shes pa mngon sum du byed par 'dod do// rdo rje'i snying po'i gzungs la kun nas nyon mongs pa da nga med/ kun nas nyon mongs par bdags pa dang med na/
'di dag ni kun nas nyon mongs pa spang bar 'dod do// rdo rje'i sAng po'i 'khrungs la rnam par byang ba 5/nga med/ rnam par byang bar bdags pa yang med/ 'dul ba ngamang 'dul ba ma yin pa yang
mad: byams pa yang med/ snying rje yang med/ dga' ba yang med/ btang snyoms kyang mad/ sbyin ba lang med/ ser sna yang med/ tshul khrims kyang med/ 'chal ba'i tshul khrims kyang
med/ bzod pa yang med/ gnod sams kyang med/ brtson 'grus kyang med/ le lo mang med/ bsam gtan kyang med/ rnam par g.yeng ba yang med/ shes rab kyang med/ 'chal pa'i
shes rab kyang mad/ ltung ba yang med/ mi ltung ba yang med/ nyan shes kyang med/ rang sangs rgyas kyang med/ de bzhin gshegs pa lung nad/ chos kyang med/ chos ma yin pa yang med/
zabamo yang med/ sgrub pa yang med/ shes pa yang med/ mi shes pa yang med/ thob pa yang med/ mngon par rtogs pa yang med/ 'khor ba yang med/ mya ngan las 'das pa yang yod/
dran pa nye bar gzhug pa rnams kyang med/ yang dag par spong ba rnams kyang med/ rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams kyang mad/ dbang po rnams kyang med/ stobs rnams kyang med/ byang chub kyi yan/
lag rnams kyang mad/ lam yang med do// 'jam dpal rdo rje'i snying po'i gzungs thob par 'dod pa'i byang chub sems dpas so so'i skya bo'i chos rnams la gnas par mi bya'o// so so'i skya
bo'i chos rnams gzung bar mi bya// don bar mi bya/ rnam par bsgrub par mi bya/ 'da' bar mi bya/ 'pho bar mi bya/ btang bar mi bya/ gnas par mi bya/ brtsam par mi bya/ mngon par
'byung bar mi bya/ le 'der mibya/ chags par mi bya/ mi chags por mi bya/ yongs su mi chad par mi bya/ reg par mi bya'o!/ so so'i skya bo'i chos rnams la kun nas nyon mongs par 'du shes
[7 ]@#// bskyod par mi bya/ sbyin par 'du shes bskyed par me phya ! gtang bar 'du shes bskyed par mi bya'o// so so'i spyi bo'i chos rnams kyang sangs rgyas kyi chos su ma gtogs

par blta bar mi bya/ sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams so so'i skyo bo'i chos rnams dang sbyar bar mi bya/ so so'i skya bo'i chos rnams dang/ sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams sbyar bar mi bya/ so so'i skye bo'i chos rnam
dmigs par mi bya// nyan thos kyi chos rnams dang/ rang sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams sbyar bar mi bya'o// sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams kyang gzung bar bya/ so so'i skye bo'i chos yAkyad dor bar mi bya/

so so'i spyi bo'i chos rnams kyang bsrung bar mi bya/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag par 'a gang gnas par ma bya ste/ smon lam yang mig tong ngo// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'jam dpal rdo rje'i snying po'i
gzungs ni rnam par mi rtog pa ste/ 'dod chags su yang dag par 'du ba/ zhe sdang du yang dag par 'du ba/ gti mug tu yang dag par 'du ba/ bud med du yang dag par 'du ba/ rgyas par yang
pa dag par 'du ba/ lhar yang dag par 'du ba/ klur yang dag par 'du ba/ gnod sbyin du yang dag par 'du ba/ dri bar yang dag par 'du ba/ lha ma yin du yang dag par 'du ba/ namakha'
lding du yang dag par 'du ba/ lto 'phyachen por yang dag par 'du ba/ sangs rgyas su yang dgag par 'du ba/ chog su yang dag nga ra 'du ba/ dge 'dun du yang dag par 'du ba/ nyan thos su yang
dag par 'du ba/ rang sangs rgyas gu yang dag par 'du ba/ sems can dmyal bar yang dag par 'du ba/ dud 'gro'i rgya gnas su yang dag nga ra 'du ba gshin rje'i 'jig rten du yang dag par 'du
