sgyur ba'i rgyal bo dam mchogamapas// bsod nams ldan bsred med bu 'dra zhing// dam chos 'khor lo bar chad med pa skor/ bsod nams ldan ba bu stong yod 'gyur te// dpa' zhing rtul phod parol tshogs 'dzoms la//

yan lagamchog gi gzugs ldan matshon gyis brgyan// mthu stobs che brgyal po gtso nyid 'dra// rgyal po'i chung ma gzugs bzang gzugs mdzes pa// gsar gyi mdog 'dra mang po stong yod 'gyur// phyinas nyal zhing sngar ni ljang

u0f8b byed de// rgyal po gtso la nams kyang skyon byed// rgyal phran gang dag de la yul gnas shing// gang dag blon po'i khyim bdagagatso bo kun// rgyal po de mthong nas kyang skyo mi byed// de bas de ni bsod nams dam mchog ldan/ ma

mchog lharnam kyis kyang thub par dka'// mi yi 'jig rten dag na gnod sbyin klo// de yi yul nasems can gang gnas pa// de nas thams cad byang chub snying por 'jog/ rgyal srid rgyas shing shin tu lo legs dang// de

yi rgyal srid bde zhing sangs rgyas 'byung// de dag la nimachod pa dam pa khyed// rgyal po bdag yul nas kyang sdang sems med// sas rgyas mtshanamchog thos nas mkhas pa gang// som nyi phra zhing mi dga' su zhig/
yod/ mdo sde dam pa de yis ngas bshad pagi/ chos mchog 'di yis de la phan 'dogs gyur// gzhan du gang gis sngon gyi rgyal rnams kyi// chos spangs gyur ba na bdud kyis zin pa 'am// sems can snying po

rgyal ba mchog dag gi/ sngon chad sprong tsho khyad rtobasad ma gtogs// gzhon nu gang zhigargyal po 'i pho brang dang// lad tsa byi bkod dga' ba 'di dag dang/ shAkya seng ge nga ni ma mthong ba// de dag sangs rgyas mtshan

thos som nyi zla/ gzhon nu byang phyogs 'ogasan/ sangs rgyasakyi zhing 'di nas/ gzhon nu dpe sngam lta bu de las sumagyur gyis/ sas rgyas kyi zhing drug cu 'das pa na/ 'jig rten gyi khams ni chen dra bas
galogs zhes bya ba yod de// don de bzhin gshegs pa dgrabcom ba yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas zla ba'i dkyil 'khor rnam dag ces bya ba bzhugs te// 'tsho zhing gzhes la chos kyang ston to/ gzhon

na theg pa chen po la yang dag par gnas pa'i rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo gang la la zhig de bzhin gshegs pa zla ba'i dkyil 'khor rnam dag de'i mtshan thos nas// som nyi i za zhing ngas mthong ba la yab

yid ches/ de tshe 'das pa'i 'og tu rin chen 'byung gnas zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin 'thob par 'gyur/ gang+gA'i klung bye ma snyad kyi sangs rgyas mthong bar 'gyur/ desnyad kyi bskal pa bye bar 'khor ba las phyir

phyogs par 'gyur/ las dang bo pa'i byang chub sems dpa' de/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub la reg par 'gyur/ dbyas snyan ldan zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin kyang 'thob par 'gyur/ bla
named pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las phyir mi ldog par yang 'gyur ro// bud med gang la la zhig bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa zla ba'i dkyil 'khor rnam dag de'i mtshan thos nas som
nyi mi za zhingathe tsomam bskyed la/ ngas mthong ba la yang yade chesan/ de tsho'adas pa'i 'og tu bud med kyi dbang bo rnam par spangs par 'gyur zhing/ skyes pa'i dbang po 'grub par
'gyur/ sems can mang po bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yang dag pa 'jog par 'gyur// dbyangs snyan ldan zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin kyang 'thob par 'gyur blun re da pa yang dag
pa'i rdzogs pa'i byang chub las phyir mi ldog par yang 'gyur ro/ de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis de'i tsho tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag bka' stsal to// gang zhig nang gnyis dam pa de la/

mtshan// thos nasanAms kyang som nyimi za pa// bskal pa bye ba gang+ga'i bye ma snyad// des spongs mya ngan med ba skyo bar 'gyur// gang+gA'i bye snyad sangs rgyas du ma dag/ mthong nas de dag la ni mchod pa byed/

du snyadas sa rgyus de yi tshe gcig gis }]sas rgyas mchod nas rgyal bo myang 'dag byang chub dam pa spyad mchog spyod pa ni/ gangagis skyes bu khyumchog mchan thosanas nam kyang som nyi mad cing 'dzin

byadan// de 'dra'i khyad par de yis thob par 'gyur// gang gi mtshanamchog gtso bo 'di// thos nas som nyis khri ba rang 'byung ye shes sangs rgyas nyid 'gyur zhing/ mkhas pas dbyangs snyan tange nge 'dzin/

'thob par 'gyur// byang chub dam pa spyad mchog spyod pa na// dag pa'i bdag nyid skyes pa'i dbang po 'ab// yon tan kun dang ldan zhing mdzes pa ste// de 'dra'i khyad par de yis thob par 'gyur// phyogs
nas kun na'i nga tu snang byed cing// sa laga' yas zhing du song nas su/ 'jig rten spyod pa thub pa che 'thong nas// skyon bral te byang chub phyir reg 'gyur// thub dbang chen po de bzhin gshegs pa

ni de yi mtshan 'dir thos nas rdzu 'phrul mchog/ de 'dra'i khyad par dgan thob par 'gyur// byang chung 'dod pa bzhin yapa 'thob pa ni// dri bral byang chub 'dun pa bskyod nas su// rgyal ba'i mtshan 'di
gzhan la'ang sgrogs par byed// zla ba'i dkyil 'khor rab tu gsal ba ltar// de yi yon tan dag kyang de 'drar 'gyur// sems can mang po du ma bsam mi khyab// byang chub mchog la mkhas pa de yis
brngog/ zla bamakha' la gnas pa'i gzhal med khang// 'od bar mang po bsags pasamadzes pa ltar/ gang zhig de bzhin gshegs pa/bamtshan 'dzin ba/ de yi lus kyang de 'dra'i rnam bas mdzes//
mkhas pa gang zhig rgyal ba'i mtshan thos nas// som nyi za zhing mdaga' su zhig yod// byang chub spyadamchog dam pa spyod pa na// chos 'di dag gis de la phan 'dogs 'gyur// thub pa chen po 'jig rten
spyod mchod pas mkhas bdeni bos pa yom bgyur// gzhon nu 'og gi phyogasan/ gzhon nu dpa snga ma lta bu'i rnam pa de nga zhin du ! dgu bcu rtsa dgur bsgyur ba 'das nas 'jig rten gyi khams rgyal

mtshan mchog gi bdag po zhes bya ba yod de/ den de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzo gas pa'i sangs rgyas rab tu zhi nga mkhas pa'i gzi brjod dbyangs kyi dbang phyug gi rgyal bo zhes bya ba bzhug
te 'tsho zhing gzhes la chos kyang ston to// gzhon nu theg pa chen po la yang dag par gnas pa'i rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo gang la la zhigade bzhin gshegs pa rab tu zhi ba/

ba mkhas pa'i gzi brjid dbyas kyidabang phyug gi rgyal po de'i mtshan thos nas som nyid mi la/ sa mthongar la yang yide chesan/ de tsho 'das pa'i 'og tu/ kun nas 'od zer zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin 'thob/

bar gyur/ 'chi ba'i dus kyi tshe yang sangs rgyas bye ba khrag khrig phrag 'bumadu tshang bdagamathong bar 'gyur ) shar phyogs su ji lta ba bzhin phyogs thams cad du yang de bzhin du sas rgyas bye ba khrag khrig phrag
'bum du tshang ba dag mthong bar 'gyug/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag gis chos gang bstan ba de dag thams cad kun tu 'dzin par 'gyur/ byang chub la thug gi bar du sangs rgyas grungs med pa bye ba

khrag khrig 'bum rnams kyis byin gyis brlabs par 'gyur/ las dang po ba'i byang chub sems dpa' de bskal pa bye ba khrag khrig 'bum phrag dgu bcus 'khor ba las phyi phyogs nas/ bla na med pa yang dag par
rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu 'gyur ro// de nas bcom ldan 'dasakyis don 'di de tshigs su bcad pas bka' stsal pa/ gang zhig 'jig rten rnam 'dren sangs rgyas kyi/ yon tan rgya mtsho'i
mchog zlos gyur pa/desan sangs rgyas bye ba khri rnams la// myur du mchod pa bla mda'ab tu byed// mtha' yas dri med khyad par mchod byas shing// srid pa kun tu sangs rgyas che rnams kyi// nyim

mdzad pa'i spyad pa spyod nas su// phyis na byang chub dran dbang des reg 'gyur// ji ltar gang+ga'i bye snyad rnam par 'dren// mang po dag ni tshe gcig gis mchod de// kun nas 'od zer ting nge 'dzin thos nas//
phyis ni byang chub mya ngan mad rigs 'gyur// byang chub dri med byang chub chen thob nas// chos kyi 'khor dam pa rab tu skol// sems can sangs rgyas byang chub mchogagazhaganas// char chus mabasad
lta ni ma ngan 'dag rkang gnyis 'dren pa mi 'dul ba la sgyur// bsod nam de lta bsod nams phung bo gcig/ de lami yis dad pa tsam bskyod na// skad cig gi mi khom thams cad spong/ gang
zhig bde bar gshegs kyi mtshan 'don pa/ ma lus rnyed pa dal ba gcig thob nas// mtha' gsargya nAtsho de bzhin gshags bzhugs la// mi yi mkhas pa bsod nams rab tu byed// sangs rgyas mtshan
ni stong phrag brgya tsam du// goms byed don rjes mthun bzod pa 'thob// lha yi mig 'thob ji ltar nga yis ni// sangs rgyas mar me mdzad mthong ma tog gi/ gto kha byas nas bzod pa thob gyur ba/ de
'dra'i bzod pa dag ni thob par 'gyur/ 'jig rten mgon po 'od mdzad thub pa yi// mtshan ni thos nas su zhig 'angami nod// gzhan du gang zhig mu stags can gyur pa 'am/ phrag dog dag gis nyams
pa'i mi ma gtogs// 'dren pa sangs rgyas kyin mngon sum du// 'dibadra'i mdo sde bshad pa sus thos pa// den phyi dus dag tu 'di 'dzin cing// gzhan dag la yang rab tu ston par byed// gzhon nu stong gi
phyogasan/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'di nas/ gzhon nu dpa sngam lta bu de las lang+ga'i klung gi khyam snyad 'das nas 'jig rten gyi 'gashin tu rnam pa bye ba zhig yod de/ de na de bzhin
gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa sangs rgyas brtson 'grus gus med pas gad dog por 'batu gnas pa zhes bya ba zhig bzhugs te/ tshogade gzhas las kyang ston to// gzhon
nu theg pa chen po la yang dag par gnas pa'i rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bumo gang la la zhig de bzhinagashegs pa brtson 'grus grangs med pas yang dag par rab tu gnas pa zhes bya ba de yi mtshan
thos nas son nyi miza' ngas mthong tshu yang yid ches nas/ de tsho 'das pa'i 'og tunams kyang brtson 'grus dman par mi 'gyur/ nams kyang 'dod pa la ston par mi 'gyur/ namasakyang ma'i sdug
bsngal gyis gegs bar mi 'gyur/ kha'i sdug bsngal dang/ gnyen gyi sdug bsngal dang/ stun gyi sdug bsngal gyis gos par mi 'gyur/ sring mo'i sdug bsngal gyis gos par 'gyur/ nams kyang mdza'
ba dang/ gnyen bshes dang/ blon podang/ snag gi gnyen mtshamasakyi sdug bsngal gyis gos par mi 'gyur ]nams kyang skyes bu chen po'i mtshan sum cu rtsa gnyis kyis lus ma brgyan par mi 'gyur//
namAkyang 'dod chags zhe sdang gtinugamang bar mi 'gyur/ rnams kyang nd tshang bar mi 'gyur/ namasakyang mya ngan mang bar mi 'gyur bde ba mtha' yas pas yongs su bzung bar 'gyur/ byang chul
00 thug gi bar du yon tan mtha' yas pa bye ba khrag khrig 'bumaphrag grangasumed ngas yongs su bzung bar 'gyur ro// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis don 'di nyid tshigs su bcad pas bkab
stsalang/ gang zhig 'jig rten mgon po'i mtshan/ thos nas som nyi'i za ba// nams kyang pha ma gnyen bdun gyi/ tshogs kyi sdug bsngal mi mthong ngo// stong gi phyogs narkang gnyis mchog/ 'jig rten/
snang bar mdzad pa bzhugs// srid gsum gsal bar mdzad nas su// srog chags rnams la chos ston to// rdzogs sangs rgyas pa'i mtshan thos nas// ni gzhana rnams rab bstanan// rtag tu sum cu rtsa
gnyis kyi// mtshanadag gsan brgyan par 'gyug/ gang zhig thub pa'i mtshan 'dzazhin// de ni shes rab mi nyamasangashing// byang chub spyad pa spyod pa'i tshe// byang chub sems dpa' la yang mchod// sas

rgyas kyin mtshan bstan pas// phyis ni byang chub spyod pa na// sangs rgyas bye ba bsam mi khyab// shes pa can gyi rtag chod 'gyur// sangs rgyas mtshan 'di gang thos nas// gzhan rnams la yang rab ston
na de 'dra'i bsod nams phung po yi// tshad ni bshad par mi nus so// de ltar mtshan 'di thos pa ni// phyi dus dag ni mang bo yang// blamed sangs rgyas ye shes la// der ni som nyi za mi byed// gang
gis rdzogasasangs rgyas mthong nas// bkur bsti rim gro byas pan// phyi ma'i dus sumado sde 'di/ de yi lag tu thob par 'gyur// ngan byang chub sems dpa' yis// bskor dang dra ba can sus mthong//
des na mdo sde bad thos nas// de la som nyi za mi 'gyur// de bzhin gshegs pa dpag med de// sangs rgyasachos la the tshom spangs/ 'di ltar sngon gyi spyad pa ni/ bskal pa bye

ma bamang brgyar spyad/ lag pa rkang pa gtong ba dang/ rna ba sna dang mgo bo dang// bu pho bu mo yul 'khor dag/ byin la yade na mi dga' mad// gang zhig mdo sde 'di thos pa// phyima'i dus na rnyed nas ni/
gzhan dag la yang ston byedun// de ni mchod pa'i 'os su 'gyur// sangs rgyas kun gyi spyod yul ba/ mngon rdzogs byang chub 'dod gang gis// nam yang bajig rten mgon po yi// bstan la som nyim
zashig/ de ltar mdo sde 'di thos nas// g.yo sgyu med pa'i nAsi zungs// 'chag pa dag tu yang dang yang// mdo sde 'di ni brjod par gyis// brjod byas zla ba gsumadagatu// tshas par shan du yang brjod
na chos rnams thams cad 'dzin byed ba'i// gzungs kyi yang shis thob par 'gyur// de nasalid tsa byi gzhon nu rin chen dra ba can bcom ldan 'das kyis legs bar gsungs par rig nas
na thang med pa'i sa bcos bu gsar gyis brgyan pa zungagacig/ bcom ldan 'das la mngon par gsol to// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis de'i tshe rdzu 'phrul mngon par 'du mdzad pa ji lta

bus bcom ldan 'dasakyi sku thams cad kyi ba sbagi khung bu thams cad nas 'od zer dag byung ste/ shar phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams dbagatumed grangs med pa ji snyad ba de dag thams cad snang bar gyur pa dang/

kaM sangs rgyas kyi zhing de dgan sags can gang dag skyes pa de dag gis sangs rgyas kyi zhing mthong ba dang sangs rgyas kyi zhing bdin/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i 'a khor gyi dkyil 'khor du sems can gang dag 'dus pa de

dgagis kyang sangs rgyas kyi zhing de mthong ba dang/ de'i tshogad+hA'i klung gi bye ma dgu bcu rtsa dgu snyad kyi sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams 'khor bzhi po la snang bar gyur pa de lta bu'i rdzu 'phrul mngon par 'du
mdzad pa mngon par 'du mdzad do// de nas bcom ldan 'dasakyis yid tsa byi gzhon nu rin chen drub can la bka' stsal pa/ ) gzhon nu khyod kyis shar gyi phyogs logs na/ sangs rgyas bcom
ldan 'das 'di ltar bsam gyis mi khyab pa/ 'di ltar gzhal gyis mi lang ba/ 'di ltar thug pa med pa/ 'di ltar tshad med po// 'di ltar brjod kyis mi lang ba/ de dag mthong ngam/ gsol ba/ bcom ldan/
'das mthong lags so// bde bar gshegs pa mthong lags so// bka' stsal pa/ rigs kyi bu 'di lta sta/ stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams na lha dang/ mi rnamA
kyi ming gi tshogs pas ni/ de bzhin gshegs pa rnamasakyi mtshan ches mang ste/ ri re 'a yang na tshan gyi tshogs grangs med bsam gyis mi khyab pa yod de/ 'di ltar de bzhin gshegs pa legs par rab
tu'i kha'i dpal dbyangs kyi dbang phyug kyi rgyal po zhes bya ba rnams dang/ de bzhin du de bzhin gshegs pa zla ba'i dkyil 'khor rnam dag ces bya brnamA dang/ de bzhin du de bzhin gshegs pa me tog gi
'od kyis rnam par rol pas mngon par mkhyen pa'i rgyal po zhes bya ba rnams dang/ de bzhin du de bzhin gshegs pa me tog rgyas pa sA la'i rgyal po zhes bya ba rnams dang/ de bzhin du

de bzhin gshegs pa rin chen 'od zer zla bas brgyan pa mkhas pa'i gzi brjod dbyangs kyi dbang phyug gi rgyal po zhes bya ba rnams te/ de bzhin gshegasab gcig gi mtshan ji lta bar de bzhin gshegs pa soso
so so'i mtshan yang de dang 'dra bar mthong ngam/ gsol pa// bcom ldan 'das mthong lags so// bde bar gshegs pa mthong 'gasaso// de bzhin du lha phyogs dang/ nub phyogs dang/ byang phyogs dang/
de bzhin du 'og gi phyogs dang/ de bzhin du stang githogs te/ de ltar phyogs bcu kun gyi phyogs re re na/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i mtshan gcig pa yang grangs ma mchis la/ de bzhin gshegs pa 'am tshad
thudad pa mang bzhugs so// bka' stsal pa// gzhon nu khyod kyis 'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal srid la gnas pa de bas kyang ches lhag pa ba sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das dag mthong ngam/ de nas
lad tsa byi gzhon nu nga ni chen dra ba can mgu zhing dga' la yid ras/ rab tu dga' zhing dga' ba dang yid bde ba skyes na/ ]de'i tshes chen po g.yos par gyur to/ sems can thams cad la phan pa dang/

bde ba skyed pa dang/ sems can thams cad kyi sems rab tu dga' ba dang/ dge ba'i rtsa ba skyed pa'i snang ba chen po byung bar gyur to// lha bye ba khrag khrig 'bum phrag du mdaganamamakha' la 'khod nas lha'i
'dzam bu chu bosar gyi bu ma rnams kyi gto lo/ tshas pa bye ba khrag khrig 'bum phrag du ma dag gis kyang lhatsan dan dmar po'i phyama rnams kyis// bcom ldan 'das la gtor mngon par
gtor// mngon par rab tu gtor ko/ lha bye ba khrag khrig 'bum phrag dum dag gis kyang/ lham tog ut+pa la drang/ pad+ma dang/ kumu dwadang ) bad+ma ka do dang ) mnadar ba dang man da ra chen ngos/
gtor/ mno par gtor/ mngon par rab tugator to/ lha bye ba khrag khrig 'bum phrag du ma dag gis kyang 'ani po che'i gdugs stong phul// lha bye ba khrag khrig 'bum phrag du ma dag gis kyang bcos
ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshalanag 'dus te/ gnas bye ba khrag khrig 'bum phrag du ma dag rjes su dran no// 'di lta ste/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das kyi byin gyi rlabs

kyis kyang cho'aphrul bye ba khrag khrig 'bum phrag du ma dag rab tu bstan to// de la 'di skad ces bya ste: bya ba brgya phrag du ma yin// lha rnams khor khor yug nas/ tsan dan dmar po zhib mo yis// rdzogs
sangs rgyas la 'thor bar byed// brgya byin bye ba phrag stong dag/ mkha' la gnas nas 'dzam bu yi// chu bo'i gsar phye mang po yis: de bzhin gshegs 'thor bar byed/ tshangs pa bye ba sa lhags
nas tsan dan dmar po'ikhyu ma yis// rdzogs sangs rgyas la mtho' byad cing sgra dbyangs snyan pa kun tu sgrogs/ dri ma med pa'i bod 'ganas// nam mkha' lan lha 'khod de/ glu dbyangs dbag tu
med pa len// mkha' la ras kyis g.yob par byed/ namamakhag na lha 'khod de// brla brgya phrag stong blangs nas// 'jig rten gsa' la ston byed cing// rgyal mtshan la sogs

tsa mchod pa byed// zla med rgyal mchog thub dbang la/ khab tu li de dgas phyag 'tshal zhing// stod byed nobu rin chen dang/ mu tig rgyan 'thor 'thor bar byed// mi ni bya ba 'bum thum pa// rgyal mchog zla med//
la mchod// sngon gyi gnas ni rjes dran zhing// thub mchog zla med mgos phyag 'tshal/ de nas 'jig rten snang mdzod bas ]/chos kyi rnga ba brdungs te/ de yi sgras ni zhing rab mang/ bye ba
dag tu go bar byas// de yi tshon sems can ni/ bya ba grangs med kun nas lhags// dag rdzogasar ba sangs rgyas kyis// sangs rgyas yeng zhes bla med bkod/ de tsho gzhon nu dgal gyur nas/ tsan dan
sbrul gyi snying po gi/ gad 'bul ne chen bya ma yis// gzhon nu sangs rgyus gtsos mchod// nor bu ni chen bodacig ni// 'jig rtan stong du gtong bar byed/ chen gcig las 'od zer gi/ stong
thog bye bar gtong bar byed// de bzhin rin chen malus las// 'od zer dag ni byung bar gyur// dedag gnad yi tsha// yangs pa can yang snang bar byas/ rin chen rnam pa de sud kyis// sangs
rgyas gtso lamachod byed cing// ni po che yi phung po yang// thub pa che la 'bul bar byed// gdugasan gang dag mu khyud bcas// mu tig 'phrang gis yongs brgyan pa// re ral yang mu khyud can//
stong phrag nyi shu rtsa lnga'o/ 'di 'dra'i legs pa de yis ni// thub pa che la mchod pa byas/ byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la/ gsel thags kyis ni gos phulako/ byang chub shing dag sngags

su de rdung song ge'i khri bshams la// stong phrag bye ba nyi shulnga// de rnams la na 'khod gyur pa// lo ni khyib grangs snyad pa// bgrang ba dag tu mi chod pagi/ byang chub sems dang 'a thams cad ni khye
ba brgya phrag lhags par gyur/ shar gyi phyogs nas bzung nas su// lho phyogs nub phyogs byang phyogs dang// 'og dang stong dang de bzhin du// phyogs dgagi yang mtshams nas lhags/ ji tsam mig
gis mthong ba'i bar// de srid 'jig rten khams rnams su// skyob pa 'jig rten mgon po gi/ gsar gyi mdo 'dra'i 'od kyis gang// ston pa gangan bzhugs pa dang/ chos ni gang na 'ba' ba der//
'jig rten khams ni thams cad zhus// byang chub sems dpa 'a nye bar lhags// de ltar mtha' yas dpag tu med// bsam gyis mi khyab mchod pa// ban chen dra b.lid tsa byi// gzhon nus de yi
tshan byas// de nas bdag nyid chen po pa// lha dang klu dang mi rnams kyi// bdun du mi mchog shAkya yi/ seng ges dbugasan 'byin par mdzad// nga yi mdun du 'dug nas gu//

khyod kyis 'di 'dra'i mchod byas pa/ ]gapa'ikhyi ma jisnyang ba// de stod mchod pa dog gis mchod// rin chen dra ba can gyi phyir// mdo sde bshad pa sus rag nga// byang chub las ni mi sdogaste// sad+ma
rgyas skyabab mchog tu gyur// gang zhig mdo sde 'di 'dzin pa gi/ bsod nams phung po'i tshad dga'i// 'di snyad so gas par 'gyur ro zhes/ de ltar bshad pa mi nus so//
phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten sa dang chu// ma dang rlung gitshad dgag/ 'di tsam zhesan bad par nus// bsod nams phung po bshad mi nus// dge slongangamani dge slong ma/ dge bson namani
yA dag pasnyanam// gang gis mdo sde 'di thos nas// lha dang klu dang lto 'phya che// sems can thams cad nyar lhags pas// de yi bzo brjid mi bzod de// ma ni bsil bar 'gyur srid kyi/ de
yi gzi brjid nyams pa med// mdo sde 'di gang 'dzin pa// byang chub spyad pa spyod pa'i tshe// sems can kun gyis bstan byas paseng// byang chub sems la'ang nachod pa byed// gang zhig stobu
dang ldan pa'i mis// bye ba stong du bshags pa yi ge/ skra rtses stong gi 'jig rten khams// bskal pa bye bar bzung ba bas/ gang ni phyi ma'i dus dag tu// sangs rgyas byang chub gleng gzhi ni// 'di
'dra'i rnam pas thos nas su// gzhan dag la yang ston byedan// gang zhig sdur ni rab bsgrags pa// 'di la ngomatshar chen po yi// brgya dang grangs dang bgrang ba dang// dngar yang 'gyur ba ma yin no
phyin yin dus dag tu// 'di 'dra'i rnam pa seng ge'i sgra// bstan pa bla med thos 'gyur kyang// 'gal med don med 'gyur bar 'ong// 'jig rten mgon po rdzogs sangs rgyas// bod mdzod gang gis
'dir mthong ba// phyi ma'i dus su des thos nas// zhe sa gus par byed par 'gyur// gal te zhing rnams bye ba na// sems can gang dag 'khod de dag/ sangs rgyas ye shes ldan gyur la/ gang yi ni bye
ma snyad/ khaskal pa du ma brgya dag tu// rim gro dga'i byed pa dang/ ji ltar stong chen gyin 'jig rten khams// de snyad dag gi gtsugs lag khang mchog ni/ dbul bya lha yi tsanangan dag las byas// lha
yi gtsugs lag khang mchog re re la nga// bye baphrag stong dag gis khong bzangs byas// bye ba khragastong dag gi khang bzongs kyang// dbul bya lha yi rin chen dag las byas// re re'i khri dag bshams

nas gro pa// bye ba phrag brgyang win tu tshang bar bkod// mkhas pas de'i me chenadra bdag blangs nas de tsho khri de brgyan pa rnams // gda'i bya snyad bskal pa bye ba bcur// thub chen 'jig rten spyod
pa bzhugs pa// sangs rgyas gcig la dbul bya dbul ba dang// ji ltar gda'i klung gi bye ma snyed// yongs su mya ngan 'das kyimachod rten byas// ji ltar stong chen 'jig rten khams rnams su// sangs

rgyas gcig gi mchod rten byas pa ni// rin chen rang bzhin lha yi sgo stong ldan/ shin tu legs pa srid pa'i rtsi srid mtho// ji ltar gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed kyi// gdugs ni mchod rten gcig la 'bul bar byed//

rta rtsal le'i gdugs la mu tig gi/ rgyan 'phung bye ba rnams kyang shin tu bkram// ji ltar gang+gA'i klung gibye ma snyed// bye ba'i 'dan dang rin chen sna tshogs// rgyal mtshan byed pa phrag brgyagad+ma yi// bye snyadamachod
rten dag la 'bul bar byed// snang ba mdzad pa thams cad mkhyen cig gi mchod rten gcig la sel snyan bye ba stong// dkrol cing gus pami nis pa dag/ bye ba phrag stong tshang ba 'bul
bar byed/ me tog gdugs bcu du ma mchod rten la 'bul ba ) thub ba chel de 'dra'i mchod pa nyin gcig bzhin// gang+ga'i bye snyed bskal pa stong du byed pa bas/ gang zhig mdo sde'adi las tshigs bcad
ga thos nas// som nyimad cing 'dun pa skyed byedal/ rgyal ba'i mtshan 'di dag kyang rjod byed na// de bas bsod nams 'di ni bu medamchog/ mkhas pa ting nge 'dzin gyi ming thos shing// tshul khrim/

skyon med mtshan 'di 'dzin pa dang// de bzhinasangs rgyas lan mchod byed pa// des ni gang+gA'i bye snyadasangs rgyas mthong// thub chen rkyang gnyis mchog gyur de bdag la// rgya chen mchod pa 'ang yid kyis/
byas nas ni// rtag tu myos med chos kyang ston byed cing// bskal pa bye b.rade ni rmongs med 'gyur// 'jig rten mgon pos mdo mchog rgyalapo 'di// ston pa'i tshon gang gis sngon mthong ba// rgyal ba

mchog las 'din thos gyur nas// phyi ma'i dus su des ni dag ba bas 'dzin// dring phyi sa'i bum pa mas 'dor ltar// 'dod pa skyon du bgrang ba sbyong byed cing/ mkhas pa des 'byung zhinge la mngon dga' sta/

rtag tu mos med dgon pa ston par byed// yangs pa'i grong khyer mchog tu gnas nas su// der ni bshad tsho gang gis ngamathong zhing// dra ba'ang nga la mchod byed mthong ba na// phyi ma'i dus su mdo mchog 'di

'dzin to// nga'i bu gang zhig rtagatu rjes 'brangashing// byang chub zhi ba spyad mchog spyod pan// sems can rnams ni rtag tu 'dul byed pa// phyi ma'i dus su mdo mchog 'di 'dzin to// sangs rgyas 'dren pa/
gzhal med dpag med kyi// spyad pa spyod gang gis rim gro dang// de bzhin mchod pa mchog dag byas pa ni// de ni phyi dus rgyalamchog chos 'dzin to/ gang zhig bskal pa bye bar tshangs spyad cing// 'jig
rtan mtha'ams don ni snga spyad po// gang zhag phyi ma'i dus su mdo sde 'di// thos ba'i bsod nams gras su 'gyur ma yin// sangs rgyas 'khrugs med yang na tshe dpag med// sangs rgyas gzhal med
dbagamed de dag 'di'i// soms can snying po gang gis mthong 'dod pa// mdo sde mdzes pa dpag med gzung ba gyis// tshodapag med dang mi 'khrugs dri med 'od// seng ge dang ni tog dang de bzhin du// gang

zhig sangs rgyas de kun mthong 'dod pa// phyi ma'i dus su rgyal mchog chos zungashag/ sangs rgyas byams pa dang ni dri med 'od// bdag nyid chen po dang ni sang ge tog/ rab snangagatso bo de bzhin mthong 'dod pa//
don gyi dus rgyal mchog chos zungashig/ 'di 'dra'i mdo sde khyab par 'phags mchog dag/ ni chen dra ba na la nga yis bshad// phyi ma'i dus su de tshe khyod kyis ni/ bag med gnas la 'dug par na byed

ga phyi dus kyi ni tshor gyur pa na// tshul khrims skyon med rtag tu bag byos dang/ de nas khyod ni 'chi ba'i dus byas nas// rgyal po 'od zer mtha' yas can gyi shing// rin chen ldan zhes bya ba'i 'jig
rten khams// steng gi 'jig rten khams su bgro bar 'gyur// de nas khyod ni 'chi ba'i dus byas nas/ myur ba nyid du sangs rgyas byams pa mthong// bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces

bka' stsal pa dang/ 'di tsa byi gzhon nu ni chen dra ba can dang// byams pa la sogs pa// byang chub sems dpa' bye ba phrag bzhi bcu dang/ dgra bcom ba bye ba phrag drug cu dang/ lta bye ba phrag dgu bcu dang

! lha bye ba phrag dgu bcu dang lham yin bya ba phrag dgu bcu rtsa dgu rnams 'di langs te/ bcomaldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon par bstod do// 'phags pa zhe chen dra ba can gyis zhus pa zhes bya ba theg
ba pa chen po'i mdo rdzogs so// ]rgya gar gyi mkhan po dzAn gar b+ha dang lo tsA ba ban+de ye shes snying po sdes bsgyur ba// zhu chen gyi lo tsa ba ban+d+he dang la brtsegs kyis zhus te gtan la
rgyu phab pa/[F]@#// rgya gar skad du ! Ar+yarA dza a bab dkAnAm mahA yA na sU tra/ bodoskad du/ 'phags pa rgyal po lo gdams pa zhes bya ba theg pa chen po'i
mdo sangs rgyas dang/ byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo// 'di skad bdag gis thos pa dus gcig na/ bcom ldan 'das mnyan du yod pa na/ rgyal bu rgyal byed kyi

tshal mgon med zas sbyin gyi kun dga' ra ban dge slong stong nyis brgya lnga bcu'i dge slong gi dge 'dun chen po dang thabs gcig tu bzhugs te/ de'i tshe yul ko sa la'i rgyal po gsal rgyal bcom ldan 'das

la blta ba dang/ phyag bya ba dang/ mchod pa dang/ bsnyan bskul bya ba dang/ chos mnyan pa'i phyir rgyal po'i 'byor ba chen po dang/ rgyal bo'i mthu chen pos 'go'i sil snyan len pa mang po dang/ bram ze dang/

khyim bdag brgya stong du mas yongs su bskor cing mnyan du yod pa nas byung sta/ rgyal bu rgyal khyod kyi tshal mgon med zas sbyin gyi kun dga' ra ba ga la ba der song nas/ de gzhon du rung ba'i sa ji srid pa de srid du
bzhon po 'a zhon to/ bzhon pa las babs nas)rkang gso kun dga' ra bar song ba dang/ lul ko sa la'i rgyal po gsal rgyal gyisashing zhig gi dungan/ bcom ldan 'das mdzes pa blta na sdug pa
dbang bo zhi ba thugs zhib/ dul ba dang/ zhi gnas mchog bsnyas pa dul ba dang/ zhi ba'i mchog dang ldan ba/ bsus pa/ dbang po dul ba/ skyes bu glang po/ skyes bu seng ge/ skyes bu khyu
mchog/ skyes bu cang mkhyen pa/ mtsho ltar dang zhing gsalal rtog pa mi mnga' ba/ skyes bu chen po'i mtshan sum cu rtsa gnyis kyis sku legs par brgyan pa// dpe byad bzang bo brgyad cus sku rnam par/
mdzes pa/ gser gyi mchod sdong ltar mngon par 'phagasapa/ dpalagyis 'bar zhing bzhugs par rgyang 'ang po nas 'thong ngo// mthong nas kyang ches yid dga' zhing sems mngon bar dad nas/ des
rgyal po rgyal rigs spyi bo nas dbang bskur ba yul la dbang ba'i mthu thob pa'i rgyal bo'i mtshanam lnga gang dag yin ba 'di lta ste/ ze'u ka dang/ gdugs dang/ ral gri dang ) bsil yab no
[s/ ]@#/ dbub zhu ba can dang/ lham ri mo can de dag bor nas/ bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der song ste phyin nas bcom ldan 'das kyis zhabs gnyis la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te/ bcom
ldan 'das la lan gsum bskor ba byas nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi gnang ste/ phyogs cig tu 'dug go/ de nas yul gos la'i rgyal po gsal rgyal gyis bam ldan 'das
la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das ji nas bdag gi yunang po'i don dang/ sman pa dang/ bde bar 'gyur ba de ltar bcom ldan 'das kyis bdag la gdams su gsol// de ltar bde
bar gshegs pas bdagal rjes su bstan du gsol/ de skad ces gsol pa dang ! bcom ldan 'das kyis yul ko sa la'i rgyal po gsal rgyal la bka' stsal ga rgyal po
chen po byed de bzhin gshegs pa 'don 'di 'dri bar sems pa legs so legs so// rgyal bo chen po de'i phyire chos kyis rgyal srid gyis shig/ chos ma yin pas ni mi bya'o// khyodachos dang mthun
bar gyis shig/ chos ma yin pa dang mthun par ni mi bya'o// de ci'i phyir zhe na rgyal po chen po rgyal bo 'am/ rgyal po'i blon po gangal zhigachos sbyangs nas chos ma yin bas rgyal srid khyedan/ de
tsho 'di nyid la la rabs kyis smod par bya ba yin no// phyis kyang 'gyod pa ra 'gyur ro/ chusazhig stengashi nas ngan song ngan 'gro log par lta bar soms can dmyal ba rnamasasu skyo bar 'gyur ro/
[rgyal po chen po rgyal po 'am/ rgyal po'i blon po gang la la zhig chos ma yin pa sbyangs te/ chos kyis rgyal khrid byed kyi/ chos ma yin pas ni mkhyedun/de tsha nyid ma rabs kyis bsngags pa la

bya ba yin no/ phyis 'gyod par yang mi 'gyur ro// lus shiganas kyang bde 'gro mtho ris kyi bajig rten du lha rnams kyi nang du skye bar 'bako/ rgyal bo chen po 'di lta ste/ dper na/ bam bul snying brtse

bsan rtag tu bde zhing 'tshe ba med par 'dod do// rgyal po chen po de bzhin du rgyal bos kyang bran po dang bran mo dang/ las byed pa dang/ zho shas 'tsho ba dang/ mdza' bshes dang/ blon po dang/ gnyen dang/

grong khyer gyi skye bo dag rtag tu bsdub rnam pa bzhis bsdu bar bya'o/ bzhi gang zhen rgyal po chen po 'di lta ste/ sbyin pa dang/ snyan par smra ba dang/ don spyad pa dang/ don mthun bko de ltar bran bo dang/ bran

mo dang/ las byed pa dang/ zho shas 'tsho ba dang/ mdza' bshes dang blon po dang/ gnyen dang/ grong khyer gyi skye bo sdud pa'i rgyal po des don gnyis bsdus pa shing 'du ba'agyuko gnyis gang zhe na/ tshe

'di'i dang/ tshema'i 'o// rgyal po chen po de la rgyal po ni pha ma dang mtshungs so// bran po dang/ bran mo dang/ las byed pa dang/ lo shas 'tshob dang ma'i bshes dang/ blon po dang/ gnyen dang/ grong khyer

gyi skya bo ni rgyal po'i bu dang bu mo dang mtshungs so// rgyal po chen po 'di lta ste/ dper na/ skyes pa dang/ bud med cig gnyid kyis log pa'i rmi laman/ kun dga' ra ba nyams dga' ba dang/ ra nyanas
dga' ba dang/ nags tshal nyams dga' ba dang chu klung nyams dga' ba dang/ rdzing bu nyams dga' ba dang/ yul nyams dga' ba dang bang bzas nyams dga' ba dag mthong

b.lag de gdan ci yang mi mthong bo/ rgyal po chen po de bzhin du rgyal srid dang/ srog dang rgyal po chen po'i rgyal srid kyi bde bdang/ rgyal po'i dbang phyug gi bde ba dang/ 'dod pa'i bde ba dang/ 'dod

bab longs spyod kyi bde ba gang yin ba rmi lam dang ba'o// 'di lta ste/ glang bo che dang/ rta pa dang/ shing rta dang/ dbung bu chung dang/ bud med dang/ khang khyim dang chung ma dam pa dang/ gzhon nu dang/

blon po dang/ rtsis pa dang blon po chen po dang/ sgro bdang 'khor dang/ phadang ma dang/ sbyin dang sring mo dang chung ma dang/ bu dang/ bu mo dang na tshod dang/ bran bo dang/ bran mo dang/ las byed pa dang/

zho shas 'tsho bdang/ mdza' bshes dang/ gnyen dang/ grong khyer gyi skye bo dang/ bgron bu dang gser dang 3 nor bu dang rin po che dang/ mu tig dang/ bicun dang/ dung dang man shel dang/ byi'u dang sa le

spum dang/ dngul dang/ gos dang/ rgyan dang modang/ 'budang bang ba dang/ mdzod la sogs pa dedag thams cad bor nas 'gro dgos so// de dag thams cad kyang mi rtag ba mi brtan ba ya de brtan du mi rung ba
'gyur ba'i chos can/ yun thung ba mi gnas pa g.yo ba 'gul ba 'jig pa skad cag pa mthar sdig pa zad ba dang des pa 'i sgo mthar 'jig pa'i chos can mthar bcos pa 'gas pa dang bcas pa gnod
pa dang bcas ba/ mya ngan dang 'khrug pa mang ba 'dul ba dang/ 'bul ba dang 'chad pa dang/ bgyis pa dang/ 'dzom ba dang/ rnam par 'jig pa'i chos can te/ rgyal bo chen po de lta bas na mi rtag pa lta
shing zad pa dang/ des pa'i sgo yin par blta bar bya sta/ 'chi bos 'jigs skrag par bya'o/ rgyal po chen po khyod chos kho nas rgyal srid gyis shig chos ma yin pas ni mi go/ khyod chos dang
mthun bar gyis shig/ chos ma yin pa dang 'thun par ni mi bya'o// de ci'i phyizhin/ rgyal po chen po 'dit+ta ste dper na/ shinge rnams la me tog dag byung nas/ 'bras bu rnams 'byung bar 'gyulo//
'bras bu dag tu 'gyur nas/ 'bras bu dag kyang yal bar 'gyur ro// lo ma sngon por gyur pa lasasar por 'gyur ro/ sal bor gyur nas yongs thams cad du med par 'gyulo/ rgyal po chen po 'di

lta dpa na/ ma'i phung po chen po 'bar ba rab tu 'bar ba kun tu rab tu mched cing 'bar ba me lce gcig tu gyur pa ji ltar yun ras yang 'bar nas zhi bar 'gyur ro// nyi ma dang zla ba 'di ltar rdzu 'phrul che ba
'di ltar mthu che ba 'di ltar dbang che bar grags par khang gi gzi brjid kyis rnam par mdzes pa 'diganyis kyang 'jig rten 'di snang bar byas nas nub par 'gyur go/ lha'i bu sprin sdud dmag 'babs dag/

'brug bsgrags sgrabyung ste nam mkha khabs par byas nas char gyi rgyun phabakyang char ba tha mar mi snang bar 'gyur ro// rgyal po chen po de bzhin du rgyal srid kyi bde bdang/ rgyal po'i dbang phyug gi bde ba dang
'dod pa'i bde ba dang/ 'dod pa'i longs spyod kyi bde ba rnams kyang rmi lam dang 'dra'o// 'di lta ste glang bo che dang rta pa dang/ shing rtadang/ dpung bu chung dang bu dang/ khang khyim dang/

chum dam pa dang gzhon nu dang/ blon po dang/ rtsis pa dang/ blon po chen po dang sgo ba dang 'khor dang/ pha dang ma dang spun dang sring mo dang/ chung ma dang/ bu bo dang/ bu mo dang na tsho dang bran po dang/ bran mong

pa las byed pa dang ) khongashes 'tsho b.rang mdza' bshes dang blon po dang ) gnyen dang/ grong khyer gyi skya bo dang/ bgron bu dang/ gsur dang/ nor bu dang/ rin po che dang mu tig dang nge zurma dang dung dang/
man shel dang// phyi ru dang/ sa le sbram dang dngul dang/ gos dang rgyan dang/ nor dang 'bu dang/ mdzod dang/ bar ba la so gas pa de dag thams cad bor nas bgro dgos so// de dag thams cad kyang mi

rtag pa mi brtan pa yod ngartan tu mi rung ba 'gyur ba'i chos can/ yun thung ba mi gnas pa g.yo ba bgul ba mthar 'jig pa skad cig pamathar 'jig pa zad pa dang/ dengs pa'i sgo mtha' bgyes pa'i chos can

'jigs pa dang bcas gnodapa dang bcas pa mya ngan dang 'khrug pa mang ba badrul ba 'bul ba bachad pa 'bye ba/ 'byas pa 'jig pa'i chos can te/ rgyal po chen po'i khyod kyis mi rtag par blta zhing phrad pa dang

dengs pa'i skor blta bar bya ste/ 'chibs 'jigs skrag par bya'o// chos kyis rgyal srid gyis shig chos ma yin bas ni mi bya'o// khyod chos dang mthun bar gyis shig chos ma yini ba dang mthun par ni mi bya'o//

de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rgyal po chen po 'di lta ste dpal na/ phyogs bzhi nas chen po sra ba bstan ba snying po dang ldan bam zhag pa ma gas pa/ 'phan med pa shin tu mkhregs pa gcig tu sdug ba/ bzhi gnamal

regatsange sa zlog ste/ rtswa dang shing dang/ shing gel ba dang yal ga dang/ lam thams cad dang sems can srog chags 'byung po thams cad phye mar 'thag ri phye mar 'thag cing 'ong ba de dag las ni mgyogs
bas 'bros pa na/ stobs kyis bzlog pa 'am/ nor gyis bzlog pa na/ sngags dang rdzasadang smanarnamasakyis bzlog par sla ba ma yin no/ rgyal po chen po de bzhin du 'jigs pa chen po bzhi bo 'di/
dgabong sta/ de dag las mgyogs pas 'bros pa 'am/ stobs kyis bzlog pa 'am/ nor gyis bzlog pa'am/ rdzas dang sngags dang smanarnamAkyis bzlog par sla bam yin no// bzhi gang zhen/ na

ba dang na ba dang/ 'chib dang rgud pa'o// rgyal po chen po rga ba ni dar la bab pa 'jom zhing 'ong/ nab ni nad med pa 'jog zhing cong/ rgud pa ni phun sumatshogs pa thams cad 'jom zhing khong/ 'chi ba na srog
'dzom zhing 'ong ste/ de dga' sani mgyogs pas 'bros pa 'am/ stobs kyis bzlog pa'am/ nor gyis bzlog pa 'am/ rdzas dang sngags dang sman rnams kyis zhi bar bya bar slab ma yin no/ la

po chen po 'di lta ste dper na/ ri dgas kyi rgyal po seng ge ri dgas kyi tshogs kyi nang du zhugs nas 'degs bzung ste ji ltar 'dod pa bzhin du bya ba byed do// dgas de ni stobs bo che'i khami bzad pas/
gzung bas dbang med par 'gyur ro// rgyal po chen bo de bzhin du'achi bdag gi gsal shing gis khrug ste rgyags pa dang ni bral/ mgonanimad/ skyabs med/ dpung gnyen niyod/
gshis ni 'jig/ tshigs ni 'bye'abral/ sha dang khragani skams/ lus ni nad kyis gdungs skoman skom/ bzhi ni rgyur rkang lagazhigalob/ lasan minus/ mthunamad// ba chu dang snabs dang
gcin dang ngan skyugs kyis ni de lus la gos/ mig dang rna ba dang/ sna dang rtse dbus dang/ yid kyi dbang bo dag ni bgags/ skyi sa khu ni 'byung/ sgrur ba po ni 'a'o/ smanabs ni bor/ smanadang/

kha zas dang bzo'i ba dang thug pa thams cad kyisani glas la bor te 'gro ba gzhan dag tu 'gro bar malagyi tha ma la ni1la/ thog ma med pa'i skyo ba dang rga ba dang/ na ba dang brtsi ba'i ba khong ba'i rgyud du ni nub
srogani cung zad cige las/ gshin rje'i mis ni 'jigs skrag byur gyi dbang du na slob/ dbugs rgyu ba ni 'chad/ kha dang sna ni gdangs so ni gtsegs sbyin pa'i sbyin no zhes de skad gsol ba ni 'dongs/
las kyi srid panas yang srid b.lani 'jug/ gcig bu gnyis su med cing grogs na med/ 'jig rten bdin 'dor/ 'jigarten pha rol du ni 'gro/ skyas chenapo ni 'degs/ mun pa chen po'i ni zhug
g.yangs chen pol ni ltung khrod stug bor ni 'jug/ gom pa chen boran 'gro/ rgyamatshorin posanakhur/ las kyi rlung gis ni bdas/ sa tshugs med pa'i phyogs sun 'gro/ g.yul ngo chen
por na 'jug/ gdon chen posani zin/ nam mkha' la ni'atshel/ pha ma dang phu nu dang sring mo dang/ bu dang bu mos ni bskor/ dbugasani bachad/ nor bgo bsha' bya zhes ni zer/ kyi tung ma/
kyi dud ba/ kyi hud bzhesani zer/ sman zhig ste sbyin ba dang dka' thub dang/ chos 'babashigagrogs su gyur pa na/ chos ma gtogs par skyabs gzhan med/ mgon ga gnamed nas
gzhan med dpung gnyen gzhan med do// rgyal po chen po de'i tshe de'i dus na chos ni gling dang/ gnas dang mgon dang rton par 'gyur ro// rgyal po chen po 'di lta ste dper na/ grang bas nyen bal
ma dang nas rab tu gdungs par gyur pa la ma gsod pa dang/ tsha bas nyanapal bsal ba dang/ 'dron bo dal bal ni grib ma dang/ rlung bsil ba dang/ skom pa la tshubasil ba dang/ lam du zhug
la gzhon pa dang/ nyal ba mal 'jam po dang/ skom pa la chu grang mo dang/ shin tu bkres pa la zwa pa zang po dang/ mya ngan gyi sa non pa la dbugs 'byin pa dang ) gdubs pa la sin par byed pa dang
dgon par lam stor pa la lam mtshon pa dang/ nad kyis btab ba la sman pa dang sman dang/ nad g.yog byed pa dang chus khyer ba la gzings dang/ 'dam du byis pa la 'ju sa dang/ rgal dka' ba zlum pa/

dang/ nyamang ba la 'bab stegs dang/ mun khungan sgron dang/ rgyamatsho chen po la gru dang/ lhags pas nyen pa la rlungachod pa'i gnas dang/ yul gzhan du song pa'i lam rgyags dang/ dbul bo la mo dang/
byed par 'dod pa'i grogs dang/ bcod par 'dod pa la lag cha dang/ gzhig par 'dod ba la rdo rje dang/ g.yul so shugs nga la go cha dang/ 'jigs pa la stobs dang ldan pa'i grog

dang 'thab pa la dpung gnyenadang/ dog pa la go 'byed pa dang/ mu ge la nor dang ldan ba dag mgon dang skyabs dang gnas dang rten du gyur ba de bzhin du/ rgyal po chen po 'chi bdag gi gsalashing gas zug ste/
rgyags pa dang na bral// mgon ni med/ skyabs na med/ dbung gnyen ni mad/ gshin rje 'jig/ tshigs ni 'byed 'bral/ sha dang khragani snyam/ lus ni nad kyis gdungs/ skom ni skom bzhin ni gyur rkang 'bag
ni g.yob/ las ni mi nus/ mthun mod khachu dang gan dngangan skyugs kyis ni lus la gos/ mig dang rna ba dang/ sna dang lce dang/ lus dang yid kyi dbang po dgan 'akags/ skyigs bu ni 'byung sgrupar

ngar po ni 'thon/ sman pas ni bo sman dang kha zas dang bza'awas dang shug pa thams cad kyis ni rjes la bor te 'gro ba gzhan du 'gro bar na la gyi tha ma la ni nyal thog ma med pa'i skya ba dang grwa ba dang/
na ba dang/ 'chi ba'i 'khor ba'i rgyud du ni nub/ srog ni cung zad cig las/ gshin rje'i mdun 'jigs skrag/ byur gyi dbang dun song// dbugs rgyu pa na'achad/ kha dang sna ni gdangs/ so na gtseg

sbyin pa sbyin no zhes de skadagasal ba ni 'debs las kyi srid pa nas yang srid pa la ni 'jug/ gcig pu gnyis su med cing grogs ni mod/ 'jig rten 'di na 'dodaM/ 'jayi rten pha rol du ni 'gro/ skyo sa chen pozhi
'degs/ mun pa chen po'i nizhugs/ gangs chen po ni ltung/ khrod stug par ni 'jug dgos pa chen po na 'gro/ rgya mtsho chen pos khyer/ las kyi nga gis ni bdan sa tshugs med pa'i phyogs su ni 'gro ba
ni chosan gtogs par mgonagazhan med/ skyabs gzhan med dbung gnyan gzhanamed do// rgyal po chen po tshes de'i tshe de'i dus na klong chen po dang/ gnas dang mgon dang skyabs dang dpung gnyen dang

ton par 'gyur ro// rgyal po chen po de'i snyam du sems te/ kyi hud gang du 'gro bar 'gyur/ phyogs gang du 'gro bar 'gyur gong du yongs su 'dzin par byed par 'gyur ) bdag gi mar ni su zhig 'gyur snyam ba las

des sems can dmyal bar skya pa mthong bar gyur na/ 'di lta ste/ mnar med pa dang tsha ba dang/ rab tu tsha ba la sogs pa'i sems can dmyal ba rnams su lo mang po lo brgya phrag mang po ) lo brgya stong phrag mang

bor sdug bsngal chen po sdug bsngal mi bzad pa// drag po rtsa ba pa yid du mi 'ongs pa'i tshor bar myong ste ji srid du sems can dmyal ba myong bar 'gyur ba'i sdig pa mi dge ba'i las yongs thams cad du zad cing

byang ba'i ma gyur pa de srid du chiba'i dus byed nga ra mi 'gyur ko/ de dud 'gro'i skye gnas su skye bar mthong bar 'gyuran/ 'di lta ste rgya mtsho chen po banang du non dang/ nya rlon med la sogs pa srog chags gcig gi

gcig bsad pa dang 'tsho ba dang dbang med par skya'o// bdag yi dgas kyi nang du skye bar mi 'gyur ram snyam na/ 'di lta ste lo mang po dang/ lo brgya phrag mang po dang 'pho brgya stong phrag mang por chu'i sgra yang mi thos na//
mthong ba lta ci smos par 'gyur go/ rgyal po chen po de ltar bsan khyod kyis mi rtag par lta zhing phud pa dang dengs par lta bar bya ste/ 'chibs 'jigs skrag par bya'o// chos kyis

rgyal srid gyis shig/ chos ma yin bsan mi bya'o/ khyod chos dang mthun bar gyis shig/ chos ma yin pa dang mthun pa ni mi bya'o// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rgyu la bo chen po khyod kyi lus 'di 'di ltar legs pa
gongs su bsrungs// legs par yongs su bcad pa dang 'chi ba'i dus byed par 'gyur ro// yon tan thams cad ldan zhingashin tu yun ring por bza' ba dang bca' bdang myang bo dang ngoms par 'gyur ba bsod pa/

gtsang ma mang pos tshim par byas te bskyed bskyed pa la nga tha ma'i mal na 'dug pa'i tshe sman bas bor zhing/ sman dang kha zas dang/ bza' ba dang/ thug pas kyang gles 'a bor nas bkres pa dang skom pas nyen

cing sa dmi bde bar 'chi ba'i dus khyed par 'gyu'o/ rgyal po chen po 'di ltar khyod kyis lus bkrus shing nga skus te bdug pas bsgos ma tog gi dri zhim pos bskos kyang gdon mi za bar dus su rang bzhin gyis
lhan cig skyes pa'i bying ba 'byung bar 'gyur klo/ rgyal po chen po 'di ltar yul ka shi pab sa dang/ chon dar dar/ du ku la'i jus dang/ dar dang/ mda' mdang/ bal gos dang/ so sa la sogs pa'i

gos gyi bye brag gis g.yogasaM kyang thama'i mal na 'dug pa'i tshe snum rnam pa mang bo dang/ chus reg cing gos dri ma can gyon zhing bachiba'i dus byed par 'gyur ro/ rgyal po chen po des ltar khyod khyim na bud med kyi

nang na 'dug/ btsun mo'i 'khor gyi nangan du ste bud med kyi tshogasakyis bskor cing gar dang glu dang/ rol mo'i sil snyan byed/ phag rdob pa dang pa bang dang gling bu lenang rdung zhing yid bde bar rtse dga' ste dga'i

dgur spyod pa yang 'chibs 'jigs skraganas shin tu yid mi bde zhing 'chi ba'i dus byed par 'gyur ro// rgyal po chen po de ltar khyod khyim gyi nang na sbos drazhim po'i bsku bsan bskus/ gtan pa ni bcug
ba khung ni legs par bcad byug pa mang pos ni byugs/ 'bru mar zhim po dang ldan ba'i mar me ni sngar/ dar gyi lda lde mang po na bris/ ma tog dri zhim po sil ma mang pos na chal bar bkang/ pog por

nasan bdugs/ khri'i rtsa ba gser dang dngul dang 3 bi zur las ni byas pa ti kadang dro'u rtog gi stan dang stananang tshangs can dang tho 'og gi stan dang yul ka ling ka pa'i stan dang/ stang du gding ba dang de'i stang du

gding bas ni nga kab/ g.yas g.yon du dar dmar bo'i sngasan bzhag pa'i khri la nyal ba yang bya rog dang bya rgod dang lha dang/ rodang/ sha dang rus pa dang skra dang khrag zhag dang chu sor dang/ rnag gi gnas mchog

chu 'jigs su rung ba'i dur sa chen pos bor nas lus g.yo ba me shings la nyal du gdon mi za'o// rgyal po chen po 'di ltar yang khyong glang po che'i bya la kha 'am/ rta'i rgyab bam shing rta la zhon te dung dang rdzadang rdza rnga

dang/ khor rnga dang/ lo mo sil snyan gyi bye brag len ba dang gdugs dang rgyal mtshan dang/ ba dan dang rnam par rgyal ba'i ba dan ni bsgang bsi' g.yab nor bu'i yu ba can dang rdza yang dang shing ta lalas byos

[n, ]@#// pa ni g.yob cing glang bo che dang dpung bu chud du ma phyi bzhin 'brang/ rgyal bu dang bram zes bslab pa thog pa'i blon po dang mdunan 'don dang skye bo thal mo sbyar ba brgya stong du mas ni phyag bya 'de [--]

rgyal bar spyon cigargyal bar spyon cig ces snyan par brjod de phyir 'byung ba'ang rang bo mi thogs par g.yo ba med cing mal du shi nas mi bzhis bteg ste/ pha dngam dang phunu dang sring mo dang chung ma dang bu pho dang bumodang/

bran po dang bran modang las byed pa dang/ zho shas 'tsho ba dang 3 tshalo za dang blon po dang grong khyer ba'i skye bo dag mya ngan gyi dbang du song ste lag pa bteganas bang rdung zhing mchog tu snying rje bar kyi hud bu/ kyi hud mgon

b+ba po kyi hud bu tho/ kyi hud jom bo zhes dung zhing zhamang dang/ grong khyer pa'i skye bo dag gis 'jigs pa dang bcas par mthong ste grong khyer gyi lho phyogs kyi sgor byung nas sa'i 'og tu bcug gam 'brog dgon pa

sa'i 'og tu bcug kyang bya rog dang bya rgod dang lnga la so gas bas zos shing rus pa de dag mes bsregs sam chur bsku ma ]sa'i 'og tu bcug kyang rlung dang nyi ma dang char pas bya bar byas te phyogs phyogs/

'thor zhing de nyid du yul bar 'gyurago/ rgyal bo chen po de ltar sems can thams cad kyilus kyang 'di bzhin du 'gyur ro/ rgyal bo chen bo bdu byed thams cad ni de ltar mi rtag pa de ltar mi brtan pa/ de ltar
yid brtan du mi rung ba de ltar 'gyur ba'i chos cate/yun thung ba mi gnas pa gso ba/ bgul ba skad cig pa mthar sdig pa/ zad pa dang dengs pa'i sgo/ mthar 'byes pa/ 'jigs pa dang bcas ba gnod pa dang/

bcas pa mya ngan dang 'khrug po mang ba 'dul ba 'brul ba 'chad pa 'bye ba mthor pa rnam par 'jig pa'i chos can no// rgyal po chen bo de lta bas na mi rtag bar lta zhing zad pa dang/ des pa'i sgor blta ba'akhya ste/

'dod chags kyis ma chags pa dang zhe sdang gis mi sdang ba dang gtimug gis ma rmos pa dang rgyal srid kyi dbang phyag gi bde ba la ma chags pa dang 'dod pa'i bde ba dang 'dod pa'i longs spyod kyi bde la
ma chags pa dang/ mi rtag par blta ba dang bag yod pa dang ma chags pa dang/ mi bskam pa dang ma zhen pa dang ma chos padang srog sems pa medang ra 'chi bas 'jigs skrag par bya'o/ chos kho nas rgyal

srid gyis shig/ chos ma yin bsan mi bya'o// khyod chos dang mthun bar gyis shig/ tshesam yan ba dang mthun par ni mi bya'o// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rgyal po chen po 'dod nga 'i srid pa dang rab tu med pa dang sogs ba dang

kun tu so gas pa dang rten pa sa 'dod ba dag gis ngom par mi smra ste/ gang dag 'phags pa'i shes rab kyis ngoms par 'gyur bde dag ni ngoms so// rgyal bo chen po 'di lta ste/ ma rig pa'i rkyen gyis 'du byed

rnams dang/ 'du byed kyi rkyen gyis rnam par shes pa dang rnam pa shes pa'i rkyen gyis ming dang gzugs// ming dang gzugs kyi rgyan gyis skye mched drug/ skye mched drug gi rkyen gyi rigang ) reg pa'i rkyen gyis

tshorab/ tshor ba'i rkyen gyis sred ba srid pa'i rkyen gyis len nga ) len pa'i rkyen gyis srid pa srid ba'i rkyen gyis skye ba/ skye ba'i rkyen gyis rga shi dang mya ngan dang sma sngags 'don pa dang/ sdug bsngal ba dang
yid mi bde ba dang 'khrug pa rnams 'byung 'gyur te de ltar sdug bsngal gyi phung po chen po 'ba' shag 'di 'byung bar 'gyur ro// de lam rig pa 'gags pas 'du byed 'gag/ du/
ma byed 'gags pas rnam par shes ba 'gag/ ma ba shes ba 'gags pas ming dang gzugs 'gag ming dang gzugs 'gags pas skyo mched drug 'gag/ skye mched drug 'gags pas reg pa
bgag reg pa 'gags pas tshor ba 'gag/ tshor ba 'gags pas sred pa 'gag/ srid pa 'gags pas len ba 'gag/ len pa 'gags pas srid pa 'gag/ srid pa 'gags pas skye ba

'gag/ skye ba 'gags pas rga shi dang mya ngan dang/ rtsa sngags 'don ba dang sdug bsngal ba dang/ yid mi bde ba dang 'khrug pa rnams 'gags pa ru 'gyur te/ de ltar sdug bsngal gyi phung bo chen po 'ba'
shig bde yang 'gag par 'gyur rgyalapo chen po de lta bas na 'dod chags kyis ma chags pa dang/ zhe sdang gis mi sdang ba dang/ gti mug gis ma rnyongs pa dang/ rgyal srid kyi dbang phyug dang dbang gis
ngegs pa med par chos kho nas rgyal srid gyis shig/ chos ma yin par mi bya'o// khyod chos dang mthun bar gyis shig/ chos ma yin ba dngamathun bar mi bya'o// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rgyal bo chen po
'dod pa rnams kyi rnyed pa dang/ rab tu med pa dang/ ngoms par mi 'gyur ba'i bar du nga skya ste rab tu ngogs par 'gyur ro zhes nga snyako/ gang dag 'phags pa'i ngo shes rab kyis ngoms par gyur pa de
0 dgan ngoms so// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis de'i tshe tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag bka' stsal to// mi nyid 'di ni 'gro bar 'gyur/ 'chi bdag rab tu mi bzad 'ong// khyod kyi tshe 'di mi
brtan gyis/rgyal po bag med ma byed cig/ nang ni gtang gi lus ni srung/ yan lag gtang gi srogan srung bar bya// nor dang yan 'go rnams dang de bzhin srog/ thams cad gtang gi bda' ni chos srung

chos spyod pa ni chos la srung bar byed// dpon dbyar dus gdugs chen srung ba bzhin// chos spyod pa yi phan yon 'di yin te/ chos spyod panangan 'gror mi 'gro'o/ chos ma yin pa spyod cing nga ga med pa//

'di nas shi 'phosangan 'gro mi bzad 'gro/ gang du gnasan 'tsho bas mi tshugs pa// sa phyogs de ni yod pa ma yin te/ bar snang ma yin rgyal mtsho'i nang ma mchis// nga yi phub du zhugs kyang mi phan no//
'chibs 'jigs pa chen po de dgi/ phung po 'jig cing srog 'gagasangashes gyis la// 'chi med thob par khyod ni mos par gyis/ mya ngan 'das thos phyin cad 'chi mi 'gyur/ bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad
ces bka' stsal nas/ yul ko sa la'i rgyal bo gsal rgyal dang/ srog chags brgyad khri bzhi stong po de dag dang lha dang mi dang lha ma yin dang/ dri bar bcas pa 'jig rten yid ras te/ bcom ldan 'das
kyis gsungs pa'amangon par bstod bo/ 'phags pa rgyal po la gdams pa zhes bya ba theg pa chen po bi mdo rdzogs so// glabaka' 'khor lo dang por gtogs
pa'o @#// rgyagar skad du/ Ar+ya ma hA me g+ha su chud/ sha dika bo d+hi sa twa sa mud dra/ sa nA ga ma/ ma hod sa kyi TonAm pa/
ri brta bod skad du/ 'thags pa sprin chen po'i mdo las phyo gas bcu'i byang chub sems dpa' rgya mtsho 'dus pa'i dga' ston chen po la rtsa ba zhes bya ba'i le'u/ sangs rgyas dang/
byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo// 'di skad bdag gis thos pa dus gcigan/ bcom ldan 'das rgyal po'i khab na bya rgod phung po'i ri la/ 'od srung chen po la sogs pa// dag slong
gi dge 'dun chen po sa ya phrag brgyad dang/ skye dgu'i bdag mo chen mo la sogs pa/ dge slong ma sa ya phrag drug dang lnga 'bum dang/ byang chub sems dpa' sbyin chen snying po la sogs pa/ byang chub

zla soms dpa' sa ya brag drug dang brgyad babum dang/ seng ge la sogs pa 'di tsa byi gzhon nus ya phrag lnga dang brgyad 'bum dang thabs cig tu bzhugs so// de la tshe rgyal po chen po 'phags skyes po la sogs
pa rgyal chen bzhi pa'i lha'i bu 'bum phrag tshad med byas med pa dag bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der song ste lhags nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te phyogs gcig tu 'khod do//

lha'i bu de dag thams cad kyang theg pa chen po la mngon du phyogs pa dang/ theg pa chen po la yang dag par zhugs pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sha stag go/ yang de'i tsho sum cu rtsa gsum gyi
gnas nas lha'i dbang po brgya byin la sogs sum cu rtsa gsum gyi ris kyi lha'i bu 'bum phrag tshad med grangs med pa dag bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der dong ste lhags nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs/
la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te/ phyogs gcig 'khod do// lha'i bu de dag thams cad kyang theg pa chen po la mngon tu phyogs pa dang/ theg pa chen po la yang dag par zhugs pa'i byang chub sems dang 'a
sems dpa' chen po sha stag go/ yang de'i tsho 'phrul dag lha'i sa nas/ lha'i rgyal po rab 'phrul la sogs pa lha'i bu 'bum phrag tshad med grangs med ba dag/ bcom ldan 'das ga la ba de la 'od
ste lhags nas bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te/ phyogs gcig tu 'khod do// lha'i bu de dag thams cad kyang theg pa chen po la mngon par phyogs pa dang/ theg pa chen po la yang
dag par zhugs pa'i byang chub mas dpa' sems dpa' chen po sha stag go/ yang de'i tshogazhan 'phrul dbang byed kyi lha'i rig nas/ lha'i rgyal po dbang sgyur la sogs pa lha'i bu babum phrag tshad med
grangs med pa dag/ bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der dong sta lhags nas// bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te/ phyogs gcig tuM ba bod do// lha'i bu de dag thams cad kyang

jug pa chen po la mngon du phyogs pa dang/ theg pa chen po la yang dag par zhugs pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ngan stag go/ yang de'i tsho klu'i rgyal po pad+ma can la sogs pa klu'i rgyal
[o]/ po sa ya phrag gnyis dang brgyad 'bum la/ klu'i rgyal po re re yang 'khor klu 'bum phrag grangs med pa dag dang/ bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der dong ste lhags nas// bcom
ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te/ phyogs gcig tu bakhod do// klu'i rgyal po dodag thams cad kyang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ting nge 'dzin tha dad pa thob pa sha stag
go/yang de batsho gnod sbyin gyi rgyal bo rnam thos kyi bu la sogs pa/ gnod sbyin gyi rgyal bo sa ya khrag gsum dang drug 'bum la/ gnod sbyin gyi rgyal po re re la 'khor gnod sbyin 'bum phrag gras
med pa dag dang/ bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der dong ste lhags nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te/ phyogs gcig tu 'khod do// gnod sbyin gyi rgyal po de dag thams

cad kyang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ting nge 'dzin tha dad pa dag la rnam par rtse bsha stag go/ yang de'i tshodri za'i rgyal po dga' ba la sogs pa dri za'i rgyal bo sa ya phrag gnyis dang/
brgyad 'bum la dri za'i rgyal bo re re yang 'khor dri ba 'bum phrag grangs med pa dag dang/ bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der dong ste lhags nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te/
phyogasagacig tu bkod do// driba'i rgyal po de dag thams cad kyang byang chub sems dpa'asams dba' chen po ting nge 'dzin tha dadab dag la rnam par rtse ba sha stag go/ yang de'i tsho lha ma yin gyi/
0/ rgyal po thags zas si la sogs pa lha ma yin gyi rgyal bos ya phrag brgyad dang/ brgyad 'bum la lha ma yin gyi rgyal po ri'i yang bakhor lha ma yin 'bum phrag grangs med ba dag dang/ bcom/
ldan 'das ga la ba der dong ste lhags nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te phyogs gcig tu 'khod do// lha ma yin gyi rgyal po de dag thams cad kyang byang chub sems

dang bsems dpa'achenapo ting nge 'dzin tha dad du dag la rnam par rtse ba sha stag go/ yang de'i tshonam mkha' lding gi rgyal po dri za'i glang po la sogs pa/ nam mkha' lding gi rgyal po sa la phrag bzhi
dang dgu 'bum la/ rnam mkha' lding gi rgyal bo re mang bakhor nam mkha' lding 'bum phrag gras med pa dag dang/ bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der dong ste lhags nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs

la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te phyogs gcig tu 'khod do// nam mkha' lding gi rgyal po de dag thams cad kyang byang chu ba sems dba' sams dbang chen po ting nge 'dzin tha dad pa dag la rnam par rtsa bsha kako/
yang deb tsho mi 'am ci'i rgyal bo legs mthong la sogs pa mi 'am ci'i rgyal po sa ya khrag dgudang/ brgyad 'bum la mi 'am ci rgyal po'i ri ya'akhor mi 'am 'bum phrag gros med pa dag dang/ bcom
ldan 'das ga la ba der dong ste lhags nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te phyogs gcig tu 'khod do/ mi 'am ci'i rgyal po de dag thams cad kyang byang chub sems dpa' sems

[©]/ dang ba chen po ting nge 'dzin thadad pa dag la rnam par rtse ba sha stag go/ yang de tsho lto 'phye chen po'i rgyal po lon tan zla ba la sogru pa/ lto 'phye chen po rgyal po 'bum phrag mang po la lto ba phye
ma chen po'i rgyal pore re yang 'bor lto 'khya chen po 'bum phrag grangs med pa dag dang/ bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der dong ste lhags nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te/ phyogs

gcig tu 'khod do// lto 'phye chen po'i rgyal po de dag thams cad kyang/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ting nge 'dzin tha dad pa dag la rnam par rtse ba sha stag go/ yang de'i tshe srin po'i rgyal po
byA 'brog gnas la sogs pa srin po'i rgyal pos ya phrag brgyad dang/ brgyud 'bum la srin po'i rgyal po re te lang 'khor srin po 'bum phrag gras med pa dag dang/ bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der dong ste
lhags nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te/ phyogs gcig tu 'khod do// srin po'i rgyal pod dag thams cad kyang/ byang chubs nas dang ba sums dang ba chen po ting nge 'dzin tha dad

bdag la rnam par rtse ba sha stag go/ yang de'i tshe grul bum gyi rgyal bo drod ldan la sogs pa// grul bum gyi rgyal po sa ya phrag bdun dang brgyad 'bum la/ grul bum gyi rgyal po ri de yang bor grul bum 'bum/
ldag gras med pa dag dang/ bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der dong ste lhags nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te/ phyogs gcig tu bzod do// grul bum gyi rgyal po de dag

thams cad kyang/ byang chub sems dang/ 'a sems dpa' chen po ting nge 'dzin tha dad pa dag la rnam par rtse ba sha stag go/ yang de'i tsho gcod byed kyi bu'i rgyal po glog legs btsun la sogs pa/ gcod byed kyi

bu'i rgyal po sa ya phrag brgyad la/ gcod byed kyi bu'i rgyal po de la yang 'khor gcod byed kyi bu 'bum phrag grangs med pa dag dang/ bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der dong ste/ lhags nas bcom ldan 'das kyi

zhabs la mgo bos phyag btsal te/ phyogs gcig tu 'khod do// gcod byed kyi bu'i rgyal po de dag thams cad kyang/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ting nge 'dzin tha dad pa dag la rnam par rtse kha
sha stag go/ yang de'i tshe rig sngags 'chang gi rgyal po rin chen 'dzin la sogs pa/ ragi sngags 'chang gi rgyal pos sa khragadrug la/ rig sngags 'chang gi rgyal po re re yang 'khor rig sngags 'chang
'bum phrag gras med pa dag dang bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der dong ste/ lhags nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te/ phyogs gcig tu 'khod do// yang de'i tshe 'byung
po'i rgyal glang po'i snying bo la sogasab/ 'byung po'i rgyal bos ya phrag gsum dang/ brgyud 'bum 'a'abyung po'i rgyal po re re yang 'khor 'bum phrag grangs med dag dang/ bcom ldan 'das ga la ba
der dong ste lhags nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te/ phyogs gcig tu 'khod do// yang de'i tshe drang srong mas byin la sogs pa drang srong sa 5 phrag dgul/ drang srong de/
dag thams cad kyang/ mngon pa shes pa lnga dang ldan pa sha stag ste/ bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der dong ste lhags nas bcom ldan 'das kyis zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal
nas/khyogs gcig tu 'khod do// yang de'i tshomanyan yod kyi grong khyer chen po nas/ kos la'i rgyal po gsal rgyal ba'i 'bum phrag du ma dang/ dpung gi tshogs yan lag bzhi ba dag dang/ bcom
ldan 'das ga la ba der dong ste lhags nas/ de bzhin gshegs pa la rgyal mtshan dang/ bdana rnams dngar te/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal nas ! phyogs gcig tu 'khod do/
yang de'i tsho latsam panas/ khyim bdag legs sbyin khyim bdag 'bum phrag du ma dang lhan cig tu/ bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der dong ste lhags nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag

'tshul te )phyogs gcig tu 'khod do// yang de'i tshe grong dang/ grong khyer dang/ grong brdal dang/ rgyal po'i pho brang shums cad nas yul bcu drug gi mi rnams bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der dong ste lhag
nas bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te/ phyogs gcig tu 'khod do// dedag thams cad kyang byang chub sems dang 'asems dpa' chen po sha stag go/ yang de'i tshe mnyan yod kyi grong
khyer chen po nas/ btsun mo ma li kal sogs pa// btsun mo khri drug stong dang/ dge bsnyen ma sa galasogs ba/ dge bsnyen ma 'bum phrag dum thams cad kyang/ theg pa chen po la yang dag par zhugA
ba sha stag go/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshol nas/ phyogasagacig tu 'khod do// lha'i bu dbang phyug chen po la sogs pa/ gnas gtsang ma'i ris kyi lha'i bu 'bumaphrag du ma

lha'i bu de dag thams cad kyang/ byang b sems dab ba sems dpa' chen po ting nge 'dzin tha dad pa dag la rnam par rtse ba sha stag go/ tshangs pa nichen skyong la sogs pa/ tshangs pa 'bum phrag du ma yang/
bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der dong ste lhags nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag tshal te ! phyogs gcig tu 'khod do// lha'i bu mo chung lta bu la sogs pa/ lha'i bu mo 'bum

khrag du ma yang 'khor de nyid kyi nang du 'dus te/ gar byed cing glu len la lha'i bu mo'i res kyang/ de bzhin gshegs pa la bdugs dang/ rgyal mtshan dang/ ba dan dpe med pa dngar cing mngon par dwangar
dungar cingasan par dngar nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te/ phyogs gcig tu 'khod do/ lha'i bu mo de dag thums cad kyang bud med kyi skyon dang bral ba'i byang chub semA
dung sems dpa' chen po sha stag go/ lha'i sare re nas kyang bu mo 'bum phrag du ma gar byed cing glu len te/ bcom ldan 'das ga la ba de dongs lhags nas/ dbazhin gshegs pa la lha'i gdug/

kyi sprin dang/ rgyal mtshan gyi sprin dang/ bdan gyi sprin dag dngar cing mngon par dngar te/ mngon par rab tu dngarago/ dngar cing mngon par dpa' ro man par rab tu dngar nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabasal
mgo bos phyag 'tshal te/ phyogs gcig tu 'khod do// lha'i bu mo de dag thams cad kyang bud med kyi skyon dang bral ba'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dang ba chen po sha stag go/ yang de'i
wA tshe phyogs dang phyogs mtshams rtagan/ dge slong gnas pa de dag kyang 'khor de nyid du 'dus par gyur te tshogs nas bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te/ phyogs gcig tu 'khod do//

yang de'i tsha rlung gi rgyal po chen po bzhi la 'di lta ste/ rlung gi rgyal po chen po rnam par mthor rlung zhes bya ba dang/ rlung gi rgyal bo chen po rnam pa'i mtho rlung chen po zhes bya ba dang/ rlung gi rgyal bo chen po 'gyu

dri ma med pa zhes bya ba dang/ rlung gi rgyal po chen po rjes su cher chags zhes bya ba ma tog dang/ spos thams cad dang lhan cig ldan zhing/ bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der dong stalhagasaMnas/ bcom ldan

'das kyi seng ge'i sgra'i chos snang ba'i sgo zhu bar byed do// sngon gyi rgyal po chen po 'bum phrag du ma dang klu dang la mo'i sgra snatshogs sgrogs shing/ nor bu ni bo che sna tshogs kyi char 'bebs te/ bcom ldan

'das ga la ba der dong ste lhagasanas/ song ba'i sgra'i chos kyi snang ba'i sgo zhu bar byed do// yang de'i tsheseng ge dba' la sogs pa ngang pa'i rgyal bo 'bum phrag gras med pa dag la ngang pa'i rgyal po re re yang/
kha bor ngang pa 'bum phrag du ma dang/ bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der dong stalhags nas/ bcom ldan 'das la ngang ba'i skad deb med pa dag gis bstod nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos

phyag 'tshal te/ phyogs gcig tu ba khod do// ngang pa'i rgyal bo de dgathams cad kyang/ byang chub sems dang 'a sems dpa' chen po// ting nge 'dzin tha dad pa dag la rnam par rtse ba sha stag go/ yang de'i

tshem bya'i rgyal po legs mthong la sogs pa/ rma bya'i rgyal po 'bum phrag gras med pa la rna bya'irgyal po re re yang 'khor rma bya 'bumaphrag grasamed pa dag dang/ bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der dong ste
lhags nas rmabya'i sgra skad snyan pas/ bcom ldan 'das la mngon par bstod nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te/ phyogs gcig tu 'khod do// rma bya'i rgyal po
de dag thams cad kyang/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ting nge 'dzin tha dad pa dag la rnam par rtse ba sha stag go/ yang de'i tshe khu byug gi rgyal po sde la sogs pa/ khu byug gi rgyal kho
'bum phrag gras med pa la khu byug gi rgyal bo re re yang 'khor khu byug 'bum phrag grangs med ba dag dang/ bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der dong sta lhags nas khu byug gi skad snyan pas bcom ldan
'das la bstod de/ phyogs gcigatu 'khod do// khu byug gi rgyal po de dag thams cad kyang/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ting 'dzin thadad pa dag la rnam par rtse ba sha stag go
gang de'i tshe ka la bida'i rgyal po pad+ma'i 'dab ma 'dra ba'i mig la sogs bkal ba'i rgyal po 'bum phrag gras med pa la/ kal bide'i rgyal po re re yang 'khor ka 'bi 'bum
phrag grangs med pa dag/ ka la bde'i sgra skad snyan pa 'byin cing/ bcos ldan 'das ga la ba der dong ste lhags nas/ sangs rgyas kyi bstod pa yang dag pa dag gis/
bcom ldan 'das la bstodanas/ phyogs gcig tu 'khod do ka la bde'i rgyal po de dag thams cad kyang byung chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ting nge 'dzin tha dad pa dag la rnam pa'i rtsa lag

stag go/ yang de'i shang shang te'u'i rgyal bo rgyal nga la sogs// shang shang te'u'i rgyal po 'bum phrag grangs med pa la/ shang shang te'u'i rgya la po de yang bakho shang shang te'u 'bum phrag grangs med/
! padagadang/ bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der dong ste lhags nas/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la lha'i sgra skad snyan pas bstod de ) bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal nas/
phyogs gcig tu 'khod do/ shang shang te'u'i rgyal po de dag thams cad kyang/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dang ba chen po ting nge 'dzin tha dad pa dag la rnam par rtse ba ngasha stag go/ yang de'i

tsha bya'i rigs 'dres pa la sogs ba tha dad pa grangs med pa 'bya'i rigs 'dres pa re re la khya'i rgyal po 'bum phrag grangs med pa yod de/ bya'i rgyal bo de yang 'khor bya 'bum phrag grangs med ba dag dang//
bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der dong ste lhags nas so so bya skad kyi lo mo'i skyedapa med pa'i gdangs kyis/ sangs rgyas kyi yang dag pa'i stod pa dag gis bcom ldan 'dasalamangon par bstod nas// bcom
ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te/ phyogs gcig tu 'khod do// khya'i rigs 'dres pa de dag thams cad kyang/ byang chub sems dang sems dpa' chen po ting nge 'dzin tha dad pa dag/
la rnam par rtse bsha stag go/ yang de'i tshes ge'i rgyal po rin po che ba la sogs pa/ seng ge'i rgyal po 'bum phrag grangs med pa la song ge'i rgyal po'i yang 'khor seng ge 'bum phrag gras med
pa dang/ bcom ldan 'das gang bder dong ste lhags nas/ seng ge'i sgra skad la mo'i sgrasan pas/ bcos ldan 'dasal sangs rgyas kyi yon tan yang dag pa dag gis bstod nas/ bcom ldan
'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te/ phyogs gcig tu 'khod do// sang ge'i rgyal bo de dag thams cad kyang/ byang chub sems dpa' soms dang ba chen po ting nge 'dzin tha dad pa dag la rnam

par rtse ba sha stag go/ yang de'i tshe chos kyi glang po rgyal po'i ri ka'i na bun lta bu zhes bya ba la sogs pa/ spos kyi glang bo'i rgyal po'abum phrag gras med pa la sros kyi glang bo'i rgyal po ri'i yang 'go
spos kyi glang po 'bum phrag grangs med pa dag dang/ bcom ldan 'das gal ba der dong ste lhags nas bcom ldan 'das la sangs rgyas kyi yon tan gang dag pa dag gis bstod de/ bcom ldan 'das
kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal nas/ lan gsum bskor babyas te/ phyogs gcig tu 'khod do// sbos kyi glang bo de dag thams cad kyang/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ting nge
@#/ 'dzin tha dad pa dag la rnam par rtse ba sha stag go/ yang de'i tshe sbrul dang/ stag dang ) 'digs 'gis tha dad pa 'dres pa thams cad bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der dong ste lhags
nas bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te/ phyogs gcig tu 'khod do// sbrul dang/ stag dang 3 dgas de dag thams cad kyang theg pa chen po la man du phyogs pa dang !
theg pa chen po la yang dag par zhugs pa'i byang chub sems dbab sems dang 'a chen po ting nge 'dzan thodadang dga' rnam par rtsa bshastag go/ Ang de'i glog sbyang dang sbrang bu mchu yis dang/
te sbrang ma dang/ shi shu ka dang/ nya dang/ ru sbal nga/ chusun byis pa la/sod dang/ sos rang ) 'ug pa dang/ sdig pa dang/ srin gyi tshigs grangs med pa'i yang gras med pa dag dang/ sdug sbrul
thadad pa 'dres pa gnas pa thams cad dang/ phag dang/ phyi dang/ wa dang/ gzhan yang srog chags phra mo rnams / bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der dong ste lhags nas/ sangs rgyas kyi yon tan/
yang dag pa dag gis ! bcom ldan 'das la mngon par bstod de/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal nas// phyogs gcig tu bkod do// yang de'i tshe sbrul dang/ myur du gdug pa
dang/ sbrul gabri gu dang/ sbrul mi bzod pa'i gdug pa'i rigs 'bum phrag grasamadapa dag/ bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der dong ste lhags nas/ sas rgyas kyi yon tan yang dag pa dag gis
sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la bstod de/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal nas/ phyogs gcig tu 'khod do// yang de'i tsho lhun po dang/ lhunapo chen po dang/ btang bzung dang/
btang bzung chen po dang/ khor yug dang/ khor yug chen po dag dang/ ri gzhan dag gi lha rnams rang rang khang par zhugs nas/ bcom ldan 'das go bder dong ste lhags nas/ bcom ldan 'das
la sangs rgyas kyi yon tan yang dag pa dag gis mngon par bstod de/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal nas ) phyogs gcig tu 'khod do// lha de dag thams cad kyang/ byang chub
sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ting nge 'dzazhi tha dad pa dag la rnam par rtse ba sha stag go/ yang de'i tsho sman dang/ nags kyi lha thams cad dang nang gi khang par zhugs nas/ bcom ldan 'das ka/
la ba der dong ste lhagasanas/ bcom ldan 'das lags rgyas kyi yon tan yang dag pa dag gis bstod de/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal nas/ phyogs gcig tu 'khod do//

lha de dag thams cad kyang/ byang chub sems dpa' chen po ting nge 'dzin tha dad po dag la rnam par rtse bsha stag go/ yang de'i tshe byang chub sems dang ba sprin chen snying po'ibakhor rnams dang/ byang chub semA
dpag ga 'di snyamadu sems te/ bcom ldan 'das kyis skad cig gcig la bska'akha brgya mtshodapag tu med nga/ gras med pa bsam gyis mi khyab pa/ mtshungs pa med pa/ gzhal
du med pa tshad med pa// brjod du med pa'i yang brjod du med pa la 'jug par mdzad pa de ni ji ltar shes par rung/ bcom ldan 'das rdzogs bar sangs rgyas pa'i bskal pa bye ba zla
phrag ni ji skad/ phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams kun nas nyon mos pa can dag tu ni/ thabs rnam pa snatshogs la mngos pa'i tshul gyi mtshams sbyor ba'i 'jig rten gyi spyod pa rnams dang/ ga
shes dang/ gzigs pa dang/ khams dang/ rgyu dang/ dmigs pa dang/ des pa'i tshig dang bdags pa dang/ rnam par gzhag pa'i byin gyi rlabs kyi stobasal sbyor ba dag gis// sems

can rgya mtsho ji snyad gi bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yos su smin par mdzad cig gu snyamamo// yang de'i tshe byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' napo sgrib pa thams cad rnam par sel
bsangs rgyas kyis gnang ste/ mi 'jigs pa thog pas ! byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag gi sems kyi yongs su rtog pa sems kyis shes nas/ byang chub sems dba' sem

dba' chen bo sbra chen snying bo la 'di skad ces smras so// sprin chen snying bo sprin chen po'i mdo las/ de bzhin gshegs pa rnamasakyidaga' ldan gyi gnas su skye ba rnam par gzhag pa'i byin gyi brlang
