bsko ba rnam par gzhag pa'i byin gyis brlabs kyi stobs la sbyor bas/ byang chub sems dpa' gang dag bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu bkod pa de dag/ bcom ldan 'as
kyis 'khor 'di'i bsdu bar gsol/ bcom ldan 'das chos thams cad ni byung ba dang/ ro pa ma mchis pa ste/ byang pa dang dor ba rnam par dag pa lags so// de ci'i slad du zhe na/ blang dang
dor ba'i rang bzhin lasaM gzhan ma lags pa'i spang du ste/ blang ba dang dor ba'i rang bzhin las blang pa dang ngor ba ma mchis pa gzhan ma lags kyi byung ba dang dor ba'i rang bzhin 'de/ blang pa
[/ ]@#// dang bo ba ma mchis pa lags te/ byung ba dang go ba'i rang bzhin gyis/ blang ba dang dor ba ma mchis pa shes pa des chos thams cad byang ba dang dodo ba mamachis pa lags n/
bcom ldan 'dasakyisaklung ba dang do ba mar gzhag pa'i byin gyis brlabs kyi stobs la sbyor bas byang chub sems dpa' gang dag bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu bkod pa de
dag/ bcom ldan 'das kyis 'khor 'di'i bsdu bar gsol/ bcom ldan 'das chos thams cad ni 'deg pa dang/ 'jog pa ma mchis pa ste/ 'deg pa dang 'jog pa rnam par dag pa
lags so// de ci'i slad du zhe na/ 'deg pa dang 'jog pa'i rang bzhin las gzhan ma lags pa'i slad du ste/ 'deg pa dang/ 'jog pa'i rang bzhin las 'deg pa dang/ 'jog pa maman+ti/
pa gzhan ma lags kyi/ 'deg pa dang 'jog pa'i rang bzhin nyid/ 'deg pa dang/ 'jog pa ma mchis pa lags te/ 'deg pa dang 'jog pa'i rang bzhin gyis/ 'deg pa dang/ 'jog
! pa ma mchis pa shes pa des/ chos thams cad 'jig pa dang/ 'jog pa ma mchis pa lags n bcom ldan 'das kyis 'deg pa dang/ 'jog pa rnam par gzhag pa'i byin gyis brlabs
kyi stobs la sbyor bas byang chub sems dpa' gang dag blan med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byachub tub da pa de dag/ bcom ldan 'das kyis 'khor 'di'i sdu bar gsol bcomaldan
'das chos thams cad nib dus ma byas pa ste/ 'dus byas rnam par dag pa lags so// de ci'i slad du zhen/ 'dus byas kyi rang bzhin las gzhanam lags pa'i slad du ste/ 'dus
byas kyi rang bzhin las 'dus ma byas gzhanam lags kyi/ 'dus byas kyi rang bzhin nyid 'dusam byas lags te/ 'dus byas kyi rang bzhin gyis/ 'dus ma byas shes pa des/ chos
thams cad 'dus ma byas pa lags na/ bcom ldan 'das kyis 'as byas rnam par gzhag pa'i byin gyis brlabs kyi stobs la sbyor bas/ byang chub sems dpa' gang dag bla na med pa yang
dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu bkod pa de dag/ bcom ldan 'das kyis 'khor 'dir bsdu bar gsol ) bcom ldan 'das chos thams cad ni dngos gzhi mamachis pa lags te/ dngos/
gzhi rnam par dag pa lags so// de ci'i slad du zhen/ dngos gzhi'i rang bzhin las gzhan malags pa'i slad du ste/ dngos gzhi'i rang bzhin las dngos gzhi ma mchis pa gzhanam lags/
kyi dngos gzhi'i rang bzhin nyid/ dngos gzhi ma mchis pa lags te/ dngos gzhi'i rang bzhin gyis// dngos gzhi ma mchis pa shes pa des/ chos thams cad dngos gzhi ma mchis pa
lags n 2 bcos ldan 'das kyis dngos gzhi rnam par gzhag pa'i byin gyis brlabs kyi stobs la sbyor bas/ byang chub sems dpa' gang dag bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub
[p ]tu bkod pa de dag/ bcom ldan 'das kyis 'khor 'di'i bsdu bar gsol/ bcom ldan 'das chos thams cad ni gnas ma mchis pa ste/ gnas rnam par dag pa lags so//
deci'i slad du zhen/ gnas kyi rang bzhin las gzhan ma lugs pa'i slad du sta 2 gnas kyi rang bzhin las gnas ma mchis pa gzhan ma mchis pa lags te/ gnas kyi rang bzhin gyis/ gnas
ma mchis pa shes pa des chos thams cad gnas ma mchis pa lags na/ bcom ldan 'das kyis gnas rnam par gzhag pa'i byin gyis brlabs kyi stobasal sbyor bas/ byang chub sems dpAgang
dag bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu bkod pa de dag/ bcom ldan 'das kyis 'khor 'dir bsdu bar gsol bcom ldan 'das chos thams cad ni dngos po ma mchos pa 'gas te da
dngos po rnam par dag ba lags so// de ci'i slad du zhen ) dngos po'i rang bzhin las gzhan ma 'phags pa'i srid du ste/ dngos po'i rang bzhin las dngos bo ma mchis pa gzhan ma lags kyi/ dngos
rgya bo'i rang bzhin nyid/ dngos po ma mchis pa lags te dngos po'i ring bzhin gyis/ das po ma mchis pa shes pa des chos thams cad dngos po mamachis pa lags na/ bcom ldan 'das kyis dgos/
bo rnam par gzhag pa'i byin gyis brlabs kyi stobs la sbyor bas/ byang chub sems dpa' gang dag bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tubakod pa de dag/ bcom ldan 'das kyis 'khor/
'di'i bsdu bar gsol/ bam ldan 'das chos thams cad ni gnyis su ma mchis pa lags te/ gnyis rnam par dag pa lags so// de ci'i slad du zhe na/ gnyis kyi rang bzhin ma lags pa'i slad du/
ste gnyis kyi rang bzhin las gnyis su ma mchis pa gzhan ma 'gasakyi/ chos thams cad gnyis kyi rang bzhin nyid/ gnyis su ma mchis pa lags te/ gnyis kyi rang bzhin gyis/ gnyis su ma
mchis pa shes pa des/ mas cad gnyis su ma mchis pa lags na/ bcom ldan 'das kyis gnyis rnam par gzhag pa'i byin gyis brlabs kyi stobs la sbyor bas/ byang chubs nas dang po gang dag
bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu bkod pa de dag/ bcom ldan 'das kyis cakhor 'dir bsdu bgagasol/ bcom ldan 'as chos thams cad ni mtshan nyid ma mchis pa lags te/ mtshan
nyid rnam par dag pa 'gas so// de ci'i slad du zhe na/ mtshan nyid kyi rang bzhin las gzhan ma 'gag pa'i slad du ste/ mtshan nyid kyi rang bzhin las mtshan nyid ma mchis pa gzhanam lags kyi/ ma[&]
nyid kyi rang bzhin nyid mtshan nyid ma mchis pa lags te/ mtshan nyid kyi rang bzhin gyis/ mtshan nyid mchis pa shes pa des/ chos thams cad mtshan nyid mamachis pa lags na/ bcom ldan 'das/
kyis mtshan nyid rnam par gzhag pa'i byin gyis brlabs kyi stobs la sbyor bas/ byang chub sems dang 'a gang dag bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu bkod pa de dag/ bcom ldan 'das kyis
@#/ 'khor 'di'i bsdu bar gsol/ bcom ldan 'das chos thams cad ni dmigs pa ma mchis lags te/ dmigs pa rnam par dag pa lags so// de ci'i slad du zhe na/ dmigs
pa'i rang bzhin las gzhan lags pa'i slad du sta/ dmigs pa'i rang bzhinalas/ tshigs ba ma mchis pa gzhan ma lags kyi) migs pa'i rang bzhin nyid dmigs pa ma mchis pa lags te/
dmigs pa'i rang bzhin gyis dmigs pa ma mchis ra shes pa des// chos thams cad dmigs ba ma mchis pa lags n/ bcom ldan 'das kyis dmigs pa rnam par gzhag pa'i byin gyis brlabs
[:]kyi stobs la sbyor bas/ byang chub sems dpa' gang dag bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byung chub tubakod ba de dag/ bcom ldan 'das kyis 'khor 'dir bsdu bar gsol/ bcom ldan 'das
chos thams cad nadabu ma'i lam lags te/ mtha' rnam par dag pa lags so// de ci'i slad du zhen ) mtha'i rang bzhin las gzhan ma lags pa'i slad du ste/ dbu ma'i lam gzhan na lags kyi//
mtha'i rang bzhin nyid dbu ma'i lam lags te/ mtha'i rang bzhin gyis dbu ma'i lam shes pa des ) chos thams cad dbu ma'i lam lags na/ bcom ldan 'das kyis mtha' rnam par gzhag pa'i byin
gyis brlabs kyi stobs la sbyor bas/ byang chub sems dpa' gang dag bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu bkod pa de dag/ bcom ldan 'das kyis 'khor 'dir bsdu bar gsol/ bcom
ldan 'das chos thams cad ni lus na mchis pa lags te/ lus rnam par dag pa lags so// de ci'i slad du zhen/ lus kyi rang bzhin las gzhan ma lags pa'i slad du ste/ lus kyi rang bzhin las/
lus ma mchis pa nyid gzhan ma lags kyi/ lus kyi rang bzhin nyid/ lus mnan pa la/gas te/ lus kyi rang bzhin gyis bsam mchis pa shes pa des/ chos thams cad lus ma mchis pa lag
na/ bcom ldan 'das kyis lus rnam par gzhag pa'i phyin gyis brlabs kyi stobs la sbyor bas byang chub sems dpa' gang dag bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu bkod pa de dag/
bcom ldan 'das kyis 'khor 'di'i bsdu bar gsol/ bcom ldan 'das chos thams cad ni 'khor ba ma mchis pa lags te/ 'khor brnam par dag pa lags so// de ci'i slad du zhe na/ 'khor
ba'i rang bzhin las/ gzhan mi lags pa'i slad du sta/ 'khor ba'i rang bzhin las 'khor ba mamachis pa gzhan ma lags kyi/ 'khor ba'i rang pazhin nyid/ 'khor ba ma mchis pa lags te/ 'khor
ba'i rang bzhin gyis 'khor ba ma mchis pa shes pa des/ chos thams cad 'khor ba ma mchis pa lags na/ bcom ldan 'das kyis 'khor ba rnam par gzhag pa'i byin gyis brlabs kyi stobs la
sbyor bas/ byang chub sems dpa' gang dag bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu ba kod pa de dag/ bcom ldan 'das kyis 'khor 'di'i bsdu bar gsol/ bcom ldan 'das chos thams
@#/ cad ni brjod du med pa ma mchis b.lags te/ brjod du med ba rnam par dag pa lags so// de ci'i slad du zhen/ brjod du med pa'i rang bzhin las gzhan ma lags ba'i sladadu/
ste/ brjod du med pa'i rang bzhin las/ brjod du med pa ma mchis pa gzhan ma lags kyi/ brjod du med pa'i rang bzhin nyid/ brjod du med pa ma mchis pa lags te/ brjod du mdang ba rang bzhin
gyis: brjod du med pa ma mchis pa shes ba des chos thams cad brjod du med pa ma mchis pa lags na/ bcom ldan 'das kyis brjodadu med pa rnam par gzhag pa'i byin gyis brlabs kyi stobs
la sbyor ba// byang chub sems dang 'a gang dag bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu bkod pa de dag/ bcom ldan 'das kyis 'khor 'di'i bsdu bar gsol/ bcom ldan 'das chog
thams cadun kun s nyon mongs pam mchis pa lags te/ kun nas nyon mongs pa rnam par dag pa lags so// de ci'i slad du zhen/ kun nas nyon mos pa'i rang bzhin las gzhanam lags pa'i
slad du ste/ kun nasanyon mongs pa'i rang bzhin las/ kun nas nyon mongs pa ma mchis pa gzhan ma lags gyi/ kun nas nyon mongs pa'i rang bzhin de/ kun nas nyon mongs pa ma mchis
pa lags te/ kun nas nyon mongs pa'i rangabazhin gyis/ kun nas nyon mongs pa ma mchis pa shes pa des/ chos thams cad kun nas nyon mongs pa ma mchis pa lags na/ bcomaldan
'das kyis kun nas nyon mongs pa rnam par gzhag pa'i byin gyis brlabs kyi stobs la sbyor bas3 byang chub sems dpa'i gang dag bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tubakod pa de dag/
bcom ldan 'das kyis 'khor 'dir bsdu bar gsol/ bcom ldan 'das chos thams cad ni chags pa ma mchis pa lags te ) chags pa rnam par dag pa lags so// de'i slad du zhe na/ chags
parang nga zhin las gzhan ma lags pa'i slad du ste/ chags nga 'i rang bzhin las/ chags pa ma mchis pa gzhan ma lags kyi/ chags pa'i rang bzhin nyidi/ chags pa ma mchis pa lags
te/ chags pa'i rang bzhin gyis/ chags pa ma mchis pa shes pa des/ chos thamasacad chags pa ma mchis pa lags na/ bcom ldan bas kyis chags pa rnam par gzhag pa'i byin gyis
brlabs kyi stobs la sbyor bas/ byang chub sems dang ba gang dag bla named pa gang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu bkod pa de dag/ bcom ldan 'das kyis 'khor 'dir bsdu bar gsol/ bcom
ldan 'das chos thams cad ni smom soms ma mchis pa lags te/ rlom sems rnam par dag pa lags so// de ci'i slad du zhe na/ rlom sams kyi rang bzhin lasagazhanan lags pa'i slad
julta rlom sems kyi rang bzhin las/ rlom sems ma mchis pa gzhan ma lags kyi/ rlom sems kyi rang bzhin nyid/ rlom sems ma mchis pa 'a gas te/ rlom sems kyi nang
bzhin gyis rlom sems ma mchis pa shes pa des/ chos thams cad rlom sems ma mchis pa lags na/ bcom ldan 'das kyis rlom sems rnam da ra gzhag
ba'i byin gyis brlabs kyi stobasal sbyor bas/ byang chub sems dpa' gang dag bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tung kod pa de dag/ bcom ldan 'das kyis 'khor 'di'i bsdu
gsol/ bcom ldan 'das chos thams cad ni yod pa ma mchis pa lags te/ yod pa rnam par dag pa 'gas so// de ci'i slad du zhen/ yod pa'i rang bzhin las/ gzhan ma lags/
ba'i slad du ste/ yod pa'i rang bzhin las yod pa ma mchis pa gzhan ma la gas kyi/ yod nga 'i rang bzhin nyid/ yo da pa ma mchis pa lags te/ yod pa'i rang nga zhin gyis yod pa ma
mchis pa shes pa des) chos thams cad yod pa ma mchis pa 'a gsan/ bcom ldan 'das kyis yod pa rnam par gzhag pa'i byin gyis brlabasakyi stobs la sbyor bas/ byang chub sems
dnga' gang dag bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu bkod pa de dag/ bcom ldan 'das kyis 'khor 'dir bsdu bar gsol// bcom ldan bas chos thams cad ni ming ma mchis pa lag
te/ ming rnam bar dog pa lags so// de ci'i slad du zhon/ ming gi rang bzhin las gzhan ma lags pa'i slad du ste/ ming gi rang bzhin las ming ma mchis pa gzhan ma lags kyi/ ming gi rang bzhin
nyid ) ming ma mchis pa lags te ) ming gi rang bzhin gyis ming ma mchis pa zhes pa des/ chos thams cad ming ma mchis pa 'gasan/ bcom ldan 'das kyis ming rnam par gzhag pa'i
byin gyis brlabs kyi stobs la sbyor bas/ byang chub sems dpa' gang dag bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu bkod pa de dag/ bcom ldan 'das kyis 'khor 'di'i nga sdu bar gsol//
bcom ldan 'das chos thams cad ni bdag ma mchis pa lags te/ bdag rnam par dag pa lags so// de ci'i slad du zhen/ bdag gi rang bzhin las gzhan malags pa'i slad du ste/ bdag gi
lang bzhin las/ bdag ma mchis pa'i rang bzhin gzhan ma lags kyi/ bdag gi rang bzhin nyid bdag ma mchis pa 'gas te/ bdag gi rang bzhin gyis/ bdag ma mchis pa zhes pa des/
chos thams cad bdag ma mchis pa lags na/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bdag rnam par gzhag pa'i byin gyis brlabs kyi stobs la sbyor bas/ byang chub sems dpa' gang dag bla na med pa yang
dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu bkod pa de dag/ bcom ldan 'dasakyis 'khor 'dir bsdu bar gsol/ bcom ldan 'das chos thoms cad ni rgyu dang rkyen gyi bya ba ma nAchis pa lags te/

rgyu dang rkyen gyi bya ba rnam par dag pa lags so// de ci'i slad du zhen rgyu dang rkyen gyi bya ba rang bzhin las gzhanam lags pa'i slad du ste/ rgyu dang rkyen gyi bya ba'i rang bzhin las/ rgyu dang rkyen gyi
bya ba mamachis pa gzhan ma lags kyi/ rgyu dang rkyen gyi bya ba'i rang bzhin da/ rgyu dang rkyen gyi bya ba ma mchis pa lags te/ rgyudang rkyen gyi bya ba'i rang bzhin gyis/ rgyu dang

rgyan gyi bya ba ma mchis pa shes pa des/ chos thams cad rgyu dang rkyen gyi bya ba ma mchis pa lags na/ bcom ldan 'dus kyis rgyu dang rkyen gyi bya ba rnam par gzhog pa'i byin gyis brlabs kyi stobs laM/
ka sbyor bas/ byang chub sems dpa' gang dag bla named pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu bkod pa de dag/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bakhor 'di'i bsdu bar gsol/ bcom ldan 'das chos thams
cad ni 'dres pa ma mchis pa lags te/ 'dres pa rnam par dag pa lags so// de ci'i slad du zhe na/ 'dres pa'i rang bzhin las gzhan ma lags pa'i slad du ste/ 'dres pa'i rang bzhin las/
badres pa ma mchis pa gzhan ga ta gas kyi/ 'dres pa'i rang bzhin nyid 'dres pa ma mchis pa lags te/ 'dres pa'i rang bzhin gyis/ 'dres pa ma mchis pa shes pa des/ thams cad 'dres
pa ma mchis pa lags n/ bcom ldan 'das kyis badres pa rnam par gzhag pa'i byin gyis brlabs kyi stobasal sbyor bas/ byang chub sems rang la gang dag bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i
byang chub tu bkod pa de dag/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bakho 'dir bsdu bar gsol/ bcom ldan 'dasachos thams cad ni yi ge ma mchis pa lags te yi ga rnam par dag pa lags so// deci'i
0 slad du zhe na/ yi ge'i rang bzhin las/ gzhan ma lags pa'i slad du ste/ yi ge'i rang bzhin las/ yi ga ma mchis pa gzhan ma lags kyi/ yi ge'i rang bzhin nyid/ yi ge ma mchis pa//
lags te/ yi ge'i rang bzhin gyis yi ga ma mchis pa shes pa des/ chos thams cad yi ge ma mchis pa lags na/ bcom ldan 'das kyis yi ge rnam par gzhag pa'i byin gyis brlabs kyi stob
la sbyor bas/ byang chub sems dpa' gang dag bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu bkod pa de dag/ bcom ldan 'das kyis 'khor 'dir bsdu bar gsol/ bcom ldan 'das chos
thams cad ni nga rgyal med pa ma mchis pa 'gas te/ nga rgyal med pa rnam par dag pa lags so// de ci'i slad du zhe na/ nga rgyal med pa'ang bzhin las/ gzhan ma lags pa'i slad du ste/ nga
rgyalamed pa'i rang bzhin las/ nga rgyal med pa ma mchis pa gzhanam lags kyi nga rgyal med pa'i rang bzhin nyid/ nga rgyal med pa'i rang bzhin gyis/ nga rgyal med pam mchis pa shes pa des )
chos thams cad nga rgyal med pa ma mchis pa lags na/ bcom ldan 'das kyis nga rgyal med pa rnam par gzhag pa'i byin gyis brlabs kyi stobs la sbyor bas// byang chub sems dpa' gang dag bla na med
pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu bkod pa de dag/ bcom ldan 'das kyis 'khor 'di'i bsdu bar gsol/ bcom ldan 'das chos thams cad ni yul bsam gyis mi khyab pa ma lags te/
yul bsam gyis mi khyab pa rnam par dag pa la gsaso// de rtsa'i slad du zhen/ lul bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i rang bzhin las/ gzhan ma lags pa'i slad du ste//
ma lul bsam gyis ma khyab pa'i rang bzhin las 1 yul bsam gyis mi khyab pa ma mchis pa gzhan ma lags kyi yul bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i rang bzhin nyid/ lul bsam gyis mi khyab
lags te/ yul bsam gyisami khyab pa'i rang bzhin gyis/ ul bsam gyisagi khyab pa ma mchis pa shes pa des/ chos thams cad yul bsam gyis mi khyab pa ma mchis par gsan/
rgyu bcom ldan 'das kyis phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams kun nas nyon mongs pa can dag tu yul bsam gyis mi khyab pa rnam par gzhag pa'i byin gyis brlabs kyi stobs la sbyor bas/ byang chub
sems dpa' gang dag bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu bkod pa de dag/ bcom ldan 'das kyis 'khor 'dir bsdu bar gsol de bzhin du stong pa nyid kyi sgo 'jug pa grang med pa dgal
ban tshun gnyen por gyur pa'adres pa'i tshul dag gis 'jug par bya'o// bcom ldan 'das kyis phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams kun nas nyon mongs pa can dag tu thabs rnam pa sna tshogs la mkhas
ba'i tshul gyisamatshams sbyor ba 'jig rten gyi spyod pa rnams dang/ ye shes dang/ gzigs pa dang ) khams dang/ rgyu dang/ dmigs pa dang/ nges pa'i tshig dang/ gdags pa dang/
rnam par gzhag pa'i byin gyis brlabs kyi stobs la sbyor bas/ sams can rgya mtsho ji snyad bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yos su smin par mdzad pa'i byang chub sems dpa' gang/
lags pa de dag/ bcom ldan 'das kyis 'khor 'di'i bsdu bar gsol ) de skad ces gsol nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyis 'khor de dag gi lhags pa'i bsam pa thugs su chud de ) khyog
bcu'i byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyis mthong bar 'dod pa mkhyen nas/ bsam pa longasasu rdzogs bar mdzad pa dang/ byang chub sems dpa' de dag bsdu bar bya ba'i phyir zhabs gnyis

kyi mthal nas/ bod gzur rgya mtsho'i sprin 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho'i gang+ga'i klung lnga bcu'i byam snyad kyi rdul phra rab kyi rdul 'bum phrag bye ba khrag khrig grangs med pa snyad byung ngo// de bzhin du
zhabs kyisor mo'i tshigs re re dang/ de bzhin du rje ngar gnyis dang/ de bzhin du pus mo'i lha nga gnyis dang/ de bzhin du bloraganyis dang/ de bzhin du sta zur dang ) de bzhin du rtsib logs gnyis
dang ! de bzhin du lte ba khung dang/ de bzhin du phrag paganyis dang/ de bzhin du dpung mgo gnyis dang/ de bzhin du dbung pa gnyis dang/ de bzhin du lag mthil gnyis dang/ de bzhin du phyag sor

gyi tshigs re re dang/ de bzhin du gtsug tor dang/ de bzhin du mdzod spu dang/ de bzhin du dbu'i skra nyag ma re re dang de bzhin du mtshan re re dang/ de bzhin du dpe byad bzang po re re dang/ de bzhin du

sdu'i khung bu re re nas 'od zer rgyal mtsho'i sbyin 'ag rten gyi khams rgya mtsho'i gang+ga'i klung lnga bcu'i bye ma snyed kyi rdul phra rab kyi rdul 'bum phrag bye ba khrag khrig grangs med pa snyad

[& ]phyung ste/ shar phyogs su 'phrosaso// de las 'od zer gag gis kyang/ 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho'i gang+gA'i klung lnga bcu'i bye ma snyed kyi rdul 'bum phrag bye ba khrag khrig gras med pa snyad kyi

pa// 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho snang ba chen pos khyab par 'gyur te/ 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho gang 'od zer gcig gis khyab pa de gnyis kyis khyab par mi byed do/ shar phyogs ji lta ba de bzhin du/
lhadang 3 nub dang/ byang dang/ de bzhin du phyad shar gyi mtshams dang/ de bzhin du shar lho'i mtshams dang/ de bzhin du lho nub kyi mtshams dang/ de bzhin du nub byang gi mtshams dang/ de bzhin

gdugs dang/ rgyal mtshan dang/ bdan ni bsgrung ) dril bu g.yeraka'i dra ba'i bla resan bris/ tsan dan sbrul gyi snying pos ni khyugs/ nor bu rin po che dbang gi rgyal po'i dra bsazhing kab/ rin po che

'thon kha chen po ni mig mangs ris su bris nor bu rin po che'i dranga'i phyogs re re gnas kyang mu tig rgyag 'phreng kha dog sna tshogs po kha dog du ma dang ldan pa// 'bum phrag bye ba khrag khrig dpag tu med/

gus med pa dag 'phyang ngo// bzhi bo che'i rgyan 'phreng kha dog sna tshogs ra/ kha dog du ma dang ldan pa 'bum phrag bye ba khrag khrig dpag tu med grangs med pa dag 'byung ngo// dar gyi lda lnga bdog sna tshogs pa/

kha dogo du ma dang ldan pa 'bum phrag bye ba khrag khrig dpag tu med grangs med pa dag 'phyang ngo// zas kyi lda ldi kha dog sna tshogs pa kha dog du ma dang ldan pa/ 'bum phrag bye ba khrag khrig dbag tu med/

gros med pa dag 'phyang/ dab gyi chun kor kha dog sna tshogs pa kha dog du ma dang ldan pa/ 'bum phrag bye ba khrag khrig grangs med pa dang ga tu med padag 'phyang ngo dril bu g.yer ka'i drab kha dog sna
gas pa/ kha dog du ma dang ldan pa 'bum phrag bye ba khrag khrig dpag tu med grangs mdang dag 'phyang// rin po che'i rgyan phreng dang/ mu tig girgyan brang de dag la rlung gis khyogs na yang

lha'i sgra yid du 'ong ba dag 'byung ste/ ni po che'i rgyan 'phreng dang 3 mu tig gi rgyan 'phrang rlung gis phog pa de dag las lha'i sgra yid du 'ong ba 'byung ba de lta bu n/ sil snyan gyi yan lag dpa med pa 'dug

phrag bye ba rdung ba'i slob dbon gyis brdungs pa las kyang/ de lta bu'i sgra snyan pa mi 'byung ngo// dril bu g.yer ka'i 'phrang ba rlung gis phog pa de dag las lha yul pa'i sgra yid du 'ong zhing zab pa 'byung

ba de lta bu ni/ gser gyi snod 'dzam bu'i gling gi tshad tsam brdung ba las kyang de lta bu'i sgra brab cing yid du 'ong ba mi 'byung ngo// mig mangs ris re re la yang rin po che'i shing ljon pa re re yod de/
ni bo che'i stags bus ni bskor nor bu dang/ mu tig dang/ ni po'i 'brong bas na mdzes par byas ) gdugs dang/ rgyal mtshan dang/ ba dan bsgrung )ni bo che'i rgyan 'phung gi rgyan
dang ga tu med rgyas med pas ni brgyan dpag tu med pas kyang brgyan to// bras kyi lda lde'i rgyan dpag tu med grangs med pa dang/ ma tog gi lda ldi'i rgyan dpag tu med grangs med pa dang/ dril bu
@#// gser ka'i dra ba'i rgyan dpag tu med grangs med pas kyang brgyan to// ni po che'i shing ljon pa de'i drung na yang rin po che'i seng ge'i khri 'phang dang ga tshad lnga brgya ba yod de/
po che'i stags bus ni bskor/ nor bu dang mu tig dang/ rin po che'i 'phreng bas ni mdzes par byas/ gdugs dang/ rgyal mtshan dang/ ba dan ni ba slong/ dril bu g.yer ka'i dra bas bla resazhi/
byes/ tsan dan sbrul gyi snying pos ni byugs/ me tog maN+Da ra ba dang/ man+tar ba chen po dang/ man 'dzung ga dang/ man 'dzu sha ka chen po dang/ mdog mdzes dang/ mdog mdzes chen po dang/
'khor lo dang/ 'khor lo chen bo dang/ sna ma dang/ bar ngashi ka dang/ taru ni dang/ bal li dang/ go ta ra ni dang/ rab tu dri zhim pa dang/ da na ska ra dang lha'i sna ma dang/ ut+pal dang/
pad+ma dang/ ku mu dAdang 2 pad+ma dkar po dang/ me tog chen po rnamasan bkum/ no bu ni po che chen po glog gi sgron ma'i rgyan phrang gi brgyan dpagatumed grangs med pa dang/ lo bu 'an po chanyi

zla'i sgron ma'i rgyan phreng gi rgyun dpag tu med grangs med pa dang 2 nor bu rin po che snang ba thams cad 'dus pa'i rgyan phrengagi rgyun dpag tu med grangs med pa dang ) mo bu rin po chadabangagargyal po'i

rgyan phreng gi rgyanadabag tumadagrangasamed pa dang [7 ]la bu rin po che tre ba can gyi rgyan phrang gi rgyan dang nor bu rin po che song ba'i ze ba can gyi rgyan phrang gi rgyan dang/ nor bu rin po cheseng ge rgyal mtshan

na/gyi rgyan phreng gi rgyan dang/ lo bu ni po che brgya byin thogs pa'i rgyan phung gi rgyan dang/ lo bu ni po che lha thams cad kyi 'od kyi rgyan 'phrang gi rgyan dang )mo bu ni bo ni rdo rje'i 'od kyi rgyan 'phrang gi rgyan/

dang []no bu zhi po tshe barma ral gyi rgyan 'phrog rgyan dang/ nor bu rin po che chu bdag gi rgyan phung gi rgyan dang/ ro bu ni po che bit+taglu'i rgyan phreng gi rgyan dang/ ra bu rin po che an da sIl gyi rgyan phrad

gi rgyan gyis kyang brgyan to// mo bu rin po che rdo'i snying bo'i rgyan phreng gi rgyan gyis kyang brgyan to// nor bu rin po che dpal gyi snying po'i rgyan phreng gi rgyan gyis kyang brgyan to// nor bu na po che

mdzes bkod kyi rgyan phreng gi rgyan gyis kyang brgyan to// mu tig dkar po'i rgyan brang gi rgyan gyis kyang brgyan to// mu tig mthon ka'i rgyan phreng gi rgyan gyis kyang brgyan to// mu tig ser po'i rgyan

phrang gi rgyan gyis kyang brgyan to/ mu tig dmar po'i rgyan phreng gi rgyan gyis kyang brgyan to// mu tig gsaramadog gi rgyun brang gi rgyan gyis kyang brgyan to// mu tig nam mkha' 'dog gi rgyan phreng
gi rgyan gyis kyang brgyan to// mu tig gi 'bru'i ngos re re dang/ ni po che'i 'bru'i ngos re re nas kyang/ sems kyi skad cig re re la 'od zer rgya mtsho'i sngon dpag tu med pa dang/ grog med pa dang/

mtshungs pa med pa dang/ gzhal du med pa dang/ tshad med pa dag byung ngo// de la 'od ze rgya mtsho'i sprin kha cig las ni bsod nams kyi tshogs tha dad pa rgya mtsho grangs med ba'i khyad par bstan pa rjod pa
dag 'byung ngo// 'od zer rgya mtsho'i sbren kha cig lasan/ bshes kyi tshogs tha dad pa rgya mtsho grangs med pa ba khyad par bstan pa rjod pa dag byung ngo// 'od byer rgya mtsho'i sbyin kha

cig las na pha rol tu phyin pa phudad pa rgya mtsho grangs med pa'i khyadang rang stan pa rjod pa dag byung ngo// 'od zer rgya mtsho'i phrin kha cig las ni tha dad pa rgya mtsho grasamod pa'i khyad par bstan pa rjod pa dag

byung ngo// 'od zer rgya mtsho'i sprin khacig las ni gzungs tha dad pa rgya mtsho grangs med pa'i khyad par bstan pa rjod pa dag byung ngo// 'od zer rgya mtsho'i sbyin la cig las ni rnam par tharapa tha dad pa rgya

mtsho gas med pa'i khyad par bstan pa brjod pa dag byung ngo// 'od zer rgya mtsho'i sprin kha cig las ni ) soso yang dag por rig pa tha dad pa rgya mtsho gras mad pa'i khyad par bstan pa rjod pa dag byung

ngo/ 'od zer rgya mtsho'i sprin kha cig las na mngon par shes pa tha dad pa rgya mtsho gras med pa'i khyad par bstan pa rjod pa dag byung ngo// 'od zer rgya mtsho'i sprin kha cig las ni smon lam tha dad pa rgyu

mtsho grangs med pa'i khyad par bstan pa rjod pa dag byung// 'od zer rgya mtsho'i sprin kha cige lasan/ brtson 'grus rtsom pa tha dad pa'i rgya mtsho grangs med pa'i khyad par bstan pa rjod pa dag byung ngo//

'od zer rgya mtsho'i smin kha cig las ni) dbugs 'byin ba thob pa tha dad pa rgya mtsho grangs med pa'i khyad par bstan pa rjod pa/ dag byung ngo// 'od zer rgya mtsho'i sprin kha cig las ni byang chub sems la

0 dbajug pa tha dad pa rgya mtshograngs med ba'i khyad par bstan pa rjod pa dag byung ngo// 'od zer rgya mtsho'i sprin kha cig las ni de bzhin gshegs pa la 'jug pa tha dad pa rgya mtsho grangs med ba'i khyad par bsta

pa rjod pa dag byung ngo// 'od zer rgya mtsho'i smin kha cig lasani sems can kyi bsam padang spyod pa la 'jug pa tha dad pa rgya mtsho grangs med pa'i khyad par bstan pa rjod pa dag byung ngo// 'od zer rgya mtsho/

sbyin kha cigalasani 'jig rten gyi khams la 'jugapa tha dad pa rgyagamo grangs med pa'i khyad par bstan pa rjod pa dag byung// 'od zer rgya mtsho'i smin kha cig las ni bskal pa la 'jug pa la tha dad pa rgya
mtsho gras med pa'i khyad par bstan pa rjod pa dag byung ngo// yang de'i tsho shar phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho gang yin ba de dag 'gul/ rab tu 'gul 2 kun tu rab tu 'gul/ g.yo rab
tugayo/ kun tu rab tu g.yo/ ldeg rab tu ldeg/ kun tu rab tu ldeg/ chem chem/ rab tu chem chem 3 kun tu rab tu chem chem/ 'khrug/ rab tu 'khrug/ kun tu rab tu 'khrug/ 'ur
lu rab tu lta bu r/ kun tu rab tu 'ur 'ur ro/[” ]/ de nas 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho de dag las/ 'jig rten gyi khams re re nas kyang/ byang chub sems dang ba 'jig rten gyi khamA

rgya mtsho gang+gA'i klung lnga bcu'i bye masnyad kyi rdul phra rab kyi rdul 'bum phrag bye ba khrag khrig gras med pa snyad lhagasaso/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' che bore'i 'khor yang 1 byang chub

[©]// sems dang ba rgya mtsho 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho gang+ga'i klung lnga bcu'i bye ma snyed kyi rdul phra rab kyi rdul 'bum phrag bye ba khrag khrig grangs med pa snyed lhags so// byang chub sen

dpal re res kyang ) nor bu rin po che'i rgyal po'i sbyin bus rgya mtsho grangs med pa rjod pa stong gsum gyi stong chen po bcu'i tshod tsam gyi char gyis chags pa med cing sgrib pa med la ma 'dres pa 'inam
mkha' khyab par byas nas/ bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der dong ste lhags na/ byang chub sems dpa' de res kyang/ lha'i nor bu rin po che'i rgyal po'i smin ting nge 'dzin rgya mtsho grangs med pa rjod pa'i
stong gsum gyi stong chen po bcu'i tshad tsam gyis/ chags pa med cing sgrib pa med pa ma 'dres ba'i nam mkha' khyab par byas te/ de bzhin gshegs pa la gtod cing mngon par gtor la/ mngon
par rab tu gtor to// gtor cing mno par gtor la/ mngon par rab tu gtor nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te/ lan grangs med par bskor ba byas nas/ rang rang
gi smon lam las byung pa'i seng ge'i khri la 'bod do// shar phyogs ji lta ba de bzhin lho dang/ nub dang/ byang dang/ shar lho'i mtshams dang/ lho nub kyi mtshams dang/ nub byang gi mtshams dang/
byang shar kyi mtshams dang ) stong dang ) 'og gi phyogs kyi lag rten gyi khams rgya mtsho gang yin pa de dag kyang/ 'gul/ rab tu 'gul kun tu rab tu'agul/ g.yo rab tu gso/ kun tu
rab tu bag yo/ ldeg rab tuldeg/ kun tu rab tu ldeg/ chem chem/ rang tu chem ches/ kun tu rab tu chem chem ) 'khrug rab tu 'khrug/ kun tu rab tu 'khrug/ 'ur 'ur/ rab tu la 'a//

kun tu rab tu 'ur 'ur go/ 'jig rten gyi khams de dgare ren kyang// byang chub sems dpa' rgyamatsho 'jig rten gyi khams gang+ga'i klung lnga bcu'i bye ma snyed kyi rdul phra rab kyi rdul 'bum phrag bye ba khrag khrig

grangs med ba snyed lhags so// byang chub sems dpa' de de'i 'khor yang/ byang chub sems dpa' rgya mtsho/ 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho ga'i klung lnga bcu'i bye ma snyed kyi rdul phra rab kyi rdul 'bum/
phrag bye ba khrag khrig grangs med pased lhags so// byang chub sems dbab re res kyang 1 po bu 'an po mi'i rgyal po'i srin rnams pa thadad pa rgya mtshogs med pa rjod pa stong gsum gyi stong chen
po bcu'i tshad tsam gyi char gyis/ chags pa med cing sgrib pa med la// ma 'dres nga 'inam mkha' khyab par byas s/ bcon ldan 'jus gal bder dong ste lhags nas/ byang chub sems
rang 'dis kyang nor bu ni po che'i rgyal po'i sprin so sor yang dag par dge pa rgya mtsho grangasamed pa rjod pa/ stong gsum gyi stong chen po bcu'i tshad tsam gyis/ de bzhin gshegs pa la gtod cing/
mngon par gtor la/ mngon par rab tu gtor to// gtor cing man par gtor la/ mno par zab tu gtor nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyis zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te/ lan grangs med
par bskor ba byas nas/ rang rang gi smon lam las byung bsang gab khri la 'khod do// yang de'i tshe bcom ldan 'das kyi gtsug tor dang/ mdzod spudang/ mtshan

dang dpe byad bzang po re re dang sbu'i khung re re nas 'jig rten gyi khams myamatsho gang+ga'i klung lnga bcu'i bye masnyed kyi rdul phra rab kyi rdul 'bum phragabye ba khrag khrig grus med pa skyed kyi 'jig rten gyi khams rgya

mtsho'i rdul phra rab kyi rdul lta shin tu nyung gide bas ches mang ba'i byang chub sems dba' rgya mtsho dag byung ste/ de dag thams cad kyang 'ug 'dzam bu chu bo'i gsar gyimadog can gzi brjid nyi ma 'bum phrag bye ba
khrag khrig gus med pa bas lhags pa/ dpa' bar 'gro ba'i ting nge 'dzin la rnam par rtse ba ) sangs rgyas kyi sku mdog los su grub pa mtha' yas pa bsgrub pa'i gzungs thob pa/ 'jig rten gyi khams/

sangs rgyas mi bzhugs pa dag tu sangs rgyas 'byung ba ston ba 'jigarten gyi khamasakun nas nyon mos pacan yongs su sbyongang ) pad+ma'i stan la 'khod pa sha stag go/ bad+ma re re yang 'an po che thams cad

kyis sbasab/ sdong bu rnam ba sna tshogs pa )mo bu ni po che'i ze ba canagaser gyi 'dab ma bkod pa shin tu rgyas pa'i gzugs can 'dzam bu chu bob gser gyi snying po dang ldan pa// 'od kyi dkyil 'khor sna tshog
kyis phyogs thams cad kyi sbyin snang bar byed pa) kun nas 'od zer bkod pa 1 sangs rgyas kyi yul mtha' yas pa'i gsung rjod pa'i 'od zer/ nor bu dang/ mu tig dang/ rin po che'i phreng ba rab tu 'byed
wa/pas mdzes par byas shing ) gdugs dang/ rgyal mtshanadang/ bdon bsgo ba sha stagago/ de nas byang chub sems dpa' de dag gis bod zer rgya mtsho 'bum phrag bye ba khrag khrig grangs med pa/
btang nas/ pad+ma de dag las babs te/ lha'i gdugasakyi sprin dang/ rgyal mtshan gyi sprin dang/ bdan gyi sprinadang/ me tog gi sprin dang/ sos kyi sbyin dang/ ni po che'i sgron dang/ rol mo'i sgra'i

sbyin dang/ rgyan gyi sngon dang/ sang ga'i rgyal mtshanagyi rtse mo'i sprin dang/ lha'isil snyanadang/ phag rdzob pa dang/ klu dbyangs kyi sgra'i sprin chags pa med cing sgrib pa med la ma 'dres pa/ stong gsum
gyi stong chen po bcu'i tshad tsam gyis/ byang chub sems dpa' de dag la gtor cing mngon par gtor la/ mngon par rab tu gtor to// gtor cing mngon pa gtor la/ mngon par rab tu gtor nas/
khan grangs med par bskor ba byas te/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal nas/ lan grangs med par bskor ba byas te ) rang rang gi pad+ma'i stan la 'khod do// byang chub sems dpa'

gangadag de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku'i nang du chud pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams rgyamatsho'i 'jig rten gyi khams draganas byung ba de dag thams cad kyang 1 byang chub sems dang ba de dag gis bla na med pa yang dag par
rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yongasasu smin par byas pa sha stag go/ de nas 'khor de dag 'disnyam du sems te/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku'i nang du chud pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams rnams sas
rgyas kyi mthus/ bdag cag gis mthong ma du snyan mo// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyi byang chub masadang 'a de dag gis sems kyi yongs su rtog pa thugs kyis
mkhyen nas/ gtsug tor nas de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku'i nang du chud pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams ston pa zhes bya ba'i 'od zer 'khor 'od zer grangs med pa dag byung ste/ des phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi
khams rab 'byams thams cad snang ba chen pos khyab par byas nas/ bdud kyi gnas thams cad mog mog bor byas so// sangs rgyas kyirnam par 'phrul pa thams cad kyang bstan te/ sems
( can gyi khams mtha' yas pa// yongs su smin par byas nas yang phyig thog ste/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag pa rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'o/ lan grangs med par bsko bar byas
rgyunas: byang chub sems dpa' de dag lus la thogs par gyur to// byang chub samasadapa' de dag gi lus la 'od zer des thogam thag tu yang de ba tshe byang chub sems dpa' de dag thams cad kyis bcom

ldan 'das kyi mdo sdudang gtsug tor dang ) mtshanadang dadi byad bzang po'i rerang sbya'i khung bu re re la 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho gang+ga'i klung lta ba'i bye ma snyad kyi rdul phra rab kyi rdul 'bum phrag bye

ba khrag khrig gras med pa snyad kyi 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho'i rdul phra rab kyi rdul lta shin 6nyung gi/ de bas ches mang pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho dag nams 'jig pa dang/ rgyus 'jig pa dang da

[6]/ rlung gis 'jig pa dag mthong ste/ dang ra na 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho g+hAklung gi bye ma snyad kyi rdul phra rab kyi rdul 'bum phrag bye ba khrag khrig grangs med pa snyad kyi 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho srid pa'i rtse
mor thug gar bas bskor t+taM/ rdo dang gsog ma dang/ rgya mo med cing log mashIl ltar mnyam par gyur nas rdul phra rab kyi rdul gyis gang ngal/ 'jig rten gyi khams gang dag tu mas 'gang
dang/ chus 'jig pa dang/ rlung gis 'jigapa mthong ba de dag ni ra ba de'i nang gi rdul phra rab kyi rdul gcig lta bu r blta bar bya'o// 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho de dag bas/ 'jig rten gyi khams

rgya mtsho gnas pa ni rdul phra ba kyi rdul lhagamaji nad yod pa tsam du blta bar bya'o/ de la 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho la lani/ mom bu can po ris 'od las grub pa yin no// 'jig rten gyi khams rgya

mtsho' lani/ lo khu rin po che glog gi sgron ma las grub pa yin no/ 'drage rten gyi khams rgya mtshol lani/ nor bu rin po che nyi zla'i sgron ma las grub pa yin no// 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsholawan/
nor bu 'ani po che snang ba thams cad 'dus pa las grub pa yin no// 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho lan) ra bu rin po che dbang gartsol po las grub pa yin no// 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho la la ni//

'i bu sman po mi bye ba can las grub pa yin no// 'dzeg rten gyi khams rgya mtsho la lani/ nor bu ni bo che sang ga'i ze b.las grub pa yane no// 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho la la ni/ nor bu 'an po chesang ge'i rdo
ka/ @#// rje rtse mo las grub pa yin no// 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho la ni/ nor bu ni po che brgya byin thogs pa las grub pa yin no// 'jig rten gyi khams rgyamatshol la ni/ ma bu ni po che

lha thams cad kyi 'od las grub pa yin no// 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho la lan/ nor bu 'an po che rdo rje'i 'od las grub pa yin no// 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho la la ni/ nor bu rin po che pad+ma rA ga las
tsa grub pa yin no// 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho la lan/ nor bu ni boche chu bdag las grubab pa/nen// 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho la la ni/ yid bzhin gyi nor bu rin po che las grub pa yin no//

'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho la ni/ nor bu rin poche barma las grub pa yano// 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho la la ni/ nor bu rin po che an da sel las grub pa yin no// brdzage rten gyi khams rgya mtsho

la lani/ nor bu ni po chamathon ka chen po las grubapa yin no// 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho la lan/ nor bu rin po che rdo'i snying po las grub pa yin no// 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho la la ni ) nor
ba bu ni pochedapal gyi snying po las grub pa yin no// 'jigarten gyi khams rgya mtsho'a' na/ nor bu rin po che mas bkod las grub pa yin no/ 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho la ni/ mu tig dkar po las
grub pa yin no// 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho la la ni/ mu tig gser mdogo'as grub pa yin no// 'jig rten gyi kham rgya mtsho la ni/ mu tigenamamakha'i mdog las grub pa yin no//
[&/]'jig rten gyi khams rgyamatshol la na/ 'o bu ni po che bsod nams kyi tshogs rgya mtsho grangs med pa'i khyad par bstan pa rjod pa las grub pa yin no// 'ag rten gyi khams rgya mtshol la ni/ nor bu

rin po che ye shes kyi tshogs rgya mtsho grangs med pa'i khyad par bstan pa rjod pa las grub pa yin no// 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtshol lan/ nor bu ni po che pha rol tu phyin pa rgya mtsho grangs med pa'i/
khyad par bstan brjod pa las grub pa na no// 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho la la ni/ nor bu rin po ches rgya mtsho grangs med pa'i khyad par bstan pa brjod pa las grub pa yin no/ 'jig rten gyi kham

rgyamatsho'alan/ nor bu rin po tshe gzungs rgya mtsho grangs med pa'i khyad par bstan pa rjod pa las grub pa yin no// 'jig rten gyi khams rgyan tsho'al ni/ lo bu tshane po che rnam par thar pa rgya mtsho grangs
med pa'i khyad par bstan pa rjod pa las grub pa yin no// 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho' la ni/ nor bu rin po che soso yang dag par rigs pa rgya mtsho grangs med pa'i khyad par bstan pa brjod pa las
grub pa yin no// 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho la la na/ nor bu rin po che mngon par shes pa rgya mtsho grangs med pa'i khyad par bstan pa rjod pa las grub pa yin no/ 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtshol

lan/ nor bu rin po che smon lam rgya mtsho grangs med pa'i khyad par bstan pa rjod ba las grub pa yin no// 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho' 'an/ ma bu ni po che brtson 'grus rtsom pargya mtshograngs mang pa'i khyad
par bstan pa rjod pa las grub pa yin no// 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho lani/ nor bu rin po che dbugs 'byin thob pa rgya mtsho grangs med pa'i khyad par bstanapa brjod pa las grub pa
yin no// 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho la ni/ nor bu'in po che byang chub sems dpa' la 'jug pa rgya mtshograngs med pa'i khyad par bstan pa brjod pa las grub pa yin no// 'jig rten gyi khamasargya
mtshol lani/ nor bu rin po che de bzhin gshegs pa la 'jug pa rgya mtsho grangs med pa'i khyad par bstan pa brjod pa las grub pa yin no// 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho la ni/ nor bu rin po che
sems can gyi bsam pa dang/ spyod pa 'da'ajug pa rgya mtsho grangs med pa'i khyad bar bstan pa brjod pa las grub pa yin no// 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho la la ni/ nor bu ni po 'jig rten gyi khams

la 'jug pa rgya mtsho grangs med pa'i khyad par bstan pa brjod pa las grub pa yin no// 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsholul ni/ ro bu ni po che bskal ba la 'jug pargya mtsho grangs med pa'i khyad par bstan pa

brjod pa las grub pa yin no// 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho la lani/ 'jig rten gyi khams kyi rdul phra mo re re la zhing bsam gyi mi khyab pa// zhinge thams cad kyi rdul snyed du sna tshogs su gnas pa
dag snang ngo// zhing re re na yang sas rgyas bcom ldan 'das bsam gyis mi khyab pa dag snang bar gyur te/ zhing thams cad kyi rdul snyad kyi kha dog du gnas pa dag snang// sangs rgyas bcom ldan
[/]bdas de dgasngon byang chub semasadapa'i spyad pa spyod pa na ) sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das gang dag gis byang chub tu sems skyod du gcug pa dang byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa slob tu gcug pa'i/
sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag kyang snang bar gyur to// sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag sngon byang chub sems dpa'i spyad pa spyod pa na ) byang chub tu sems skyed du bcug pa'i sangs rgyas bcom
ldan 'das gang yin pa de dag kyang snang ngo// de bzhin du sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'dus gcig nas gcig tu brgyud pa phyi ma'i mthar thug pa'i bar du bstan kyang/ sangs rgyas gcig nas gcig
chu brgyud pa de dag gi mtha' bstan pa mi nus so// sas rgyas bcom ldan 'dus re re la yang 'khor gyi dkyil '-ikhor rgya mtsho dpag tu med/ grangs med pa dag snang ngo// byang chub sems dpa' de

dag gi byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa rgya mtsho rnam pa sna tshogs bstan ba gang yin pa de dag kyang thos so// byang chub sems dpa' de dag gi mngon par rdzogs par byang chub pa yang snang ngo// de dag gi

byang chub sems dpa'i 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor rgya mtsho dag kyang snang ngo// byang chub sems dpa' de dag gi byang chub kyi spyod pa rgya mtsho rnam pa sna tshogs bstan pa gang yin pa de dag kyang thos so//
byang chub sems dpa' de dgagi mno par rdzogs par byang chub b dag kyang snang ngo// sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das re re'i byang chub sems dpa' 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor dpag tu med/ grangs med
[k ]@#/ dpa dag kyang snang ngo// de dag gi byang chub sems dpa' spyod pa rnam pa sna tshogs gang yin bde dag kyang snang zhange thos so// de bzhin du ma 'ongs pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan

'das de dag gi sangs rgyas gcig nas gcig tu brgyud pa yang bskal pa rgya mtsho 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad kyi rdul phra rab kyi rdul snyad kyi bar du bstan kyang mthur phyin par mi 'gyur ro// de ci'i
phyi'i zhen/ sku dang ye shes chags pa med pa brnyes pa'i phyi'i lo/ de nas byang chub sems dpa'i 'khor de dag 'di snyam du sems te/ byang chub sems dpa' gang dogachos kyi rnam
gras bad thos nas/ mos par byed ci 'chang ba dang/ klogaparang ) 'don pa dang/ 'don tu 'jug pa dang/ mar ma dang/ gdugs pa dang/ spos dang/ me tog 'phreng dang byug pa dang/
phya ma dang ) chos gos dang/ gdugasadang/ rgyal mtshan dang/ ba dan la sogs pasumachod pa de dag gi bsod nams ji snyed cig 'phel bar 'gyur zhag gu snyam mo// de nas
bcom ldan 'adas kyis byang chub sems dpa'ade dag gsems kyi yongs su rtog ba thugs kyis mkhyen nas/ 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa la bka' stsal pa/ 'jam dpal 'jig rten gyi kham

rgya mtsho gang+gA'i klung lnga bcu'i bye ma snyad kyi rdul phra rab kyi rdul 'bum phrag bye ba khrag khrig grangs med pa snyad kyi 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho'i rdul phra rab kyi rdul shin tu nyung gi/ de bas ches mang ba'i

byang chub sems dpa' rgya mtsho dag gi dge ba'i rtsa ba pha rol tu phyin pa lnga las byung ba bskal pa dpagatumed grangs med pa'i bar du bskyed pa yang/ chos kyi rnam grangs 'di la mos pa'i byang chub
sems dpas than dud 'gro'i skye nus su gyur pa la zan chang gcig tsam yongs su btang bas/ byung chub sems dpa' de dag gi dge ba'i rtsa ba pha rol tu phyin pa lnga las byung ba de zal gyis gnon/
par 'gyur ro// 'jam dpal dpon/ zla ba yar gyi ngo tshabaco lnga'i nam phyed kyi dusan zla ba'i dkyil 'khor gyis 'di ltar mtho ba dang mtshungs pa medad dang che bas skar ma'i 'khor thams cad
zil gyis gnon te/ lham me lhan ne/ lhang nger 'dug go/ 'jam dpal de bzhin du/ chos kyi rnam gras 'di la mos pa'i byang chub sems dpa' 'di ltar dge ba'i rtsa ba mtho ba dang mtshungs pa med
ba dang/ chos byang chub sems dpa' 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad kyi rdul snyed kyi dge ba'i rtsa ba pha rol tu phyin pa lngalas byung ba rnams zil gyis gnon te/ lham me lhan ne/ lhang nger 'dug go/
'jam dpal byang chub sems dpa' gang las/ stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams su gtogs pa'isams can thams cad dubyug pas bsnun nam/ mtshon gyis btab ste/ bdog
pa thams cad phrogs pa bas/ 'jam dpal byang chub sems dang 'a gzhan zhig gis byang chub sems dpa' la gnod sems dang/ thob dang khro ba'i sems bskyedade/ bsAs
[©]@#// pa'i sems kyang bskyed na/ 'di na de ngas ches sdig pa mang po 'phel bar 'gyur ro// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ byang chub sems dang 'a byang chub sems dang 'al gnod
soms dang tha ba dang/ khro ba'i sems bskyod pa dang/ bsdus pa'i semasabaskyod nga phrani/ chos kyis phos par 'gyur ba'i las byas par 'gyur te/ chos ma yin pa yongs su bzung
par 'gyur ro// chos ma yin pa yongs su 'dzin pa ni sangs rgyasakyi gdung gcod par byed pa yin/ sangs rgyas rnams ma byung na ) rgyalachen bzhi'i lha'iresi rnams 'byung bar mi 'gyur/
sum cu rtsa gsum pa rnams dang 'thab bral ba rnams dang/ dgaM' ldan pa rnams dang/ 'phrul dga' ba rnams dang/ gzhan 'phrul dbang byed pa rnams dngo/ bdud kyi sa rnams
kyang 'byung bar mi 'gyur ro// brgya byin dang/ tshangs pa dang/ 'jig rten skyong thams cad kyang 'byung bar mi 'gyur ro// zla ba dang/ nyin thams cad kyang 'byung bar mi 'gyur ro//
'khor 'os sbyar ba dang/ stobs kyis 'khod 'dos sgyur ba rnams kyang 'byung bar mi 'gyur ro// mi'i 'jig rten yang 'phying bar mi 'gyur ro// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de dag thams cad ni rdzogs pa'i
sangs rgyas dang phrad pa las 'byung la// sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni/ byang chub sems dpa' las 'byung ba'i phyir go de ngas nasangs rgyas thams cad la mchod par 'dod pas ni )
[4: ]byang chub sems dpa' rnams la mchod par bya'o// byang chub sems dba' rnams mchod pa byas na/ sangs rgyas thams cad la mchod par 'gyur ro// byang chub sems dang ba rnams la bkur ste/
byas na/ sangs rgyas thams cad la bkur sti byas par 'gyur ro// 'jam dpal byang chub sems dang 'a gang la lasasangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das 'jig rten kyi khams thams cad kyi rdul snyed/

lha zhal zas ro brgya dang ldan pa dang/ lha'i na bza' phul te/ sbyin pa de lta bu bskal pa rgya mtsho gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyad kyi 'jig rten gyi khams kyi rdul snyed kyi bar du phul la/ byang chub sems dpa'
gzhan zhig gis ni byang chub sems dang 'a la dmigs pa gang yang rung ba zhig gis byang chub tu sems bskyed de/ bdug pa las dmigs pa bam/ mar mo las dmigs pa 'am// ma tog lu
dmigs pa bam/ spos lus dmigs pa 'am/ gzhan gang yang rung ba zhig las dmigs te byang chub tu sems bskyed na/ 'di ni de bas ches grangs med nga ra bsod nams 'phel bar 'gyuran/
gzhan skyod du 'jug pa gang yin pa dag lta ci smos te/ 'di ni de bas bsod nams ches grangs med par skyed par 'gyur ro// snga ma des ni bsod nams mngon par 'du byed pa bde'i rgya'i char yang mi pod/

stong gi char yang mi phod/ 'bum gyi char yang mi phod/ bye ba'i char yang mi phod/ bye ba rgya'i char yang mi phod/ bye ba stong gi char yang mi phod/ bye ba 'bumagyichar yang mi phod de/ dpe dang rgyur yang
mi bzod do// 'jam dpal byang chub sems dpa' gang la las/ sems can thams cad byang chub kyi sams la bkod la/ byang chub sems dpa' gzhan zhig ni stong pa nyid
lamos par gyuran/ 'di ni de bas ches grangs med par bsod nams 'phel bar 'gyuran/ gzhan mos pa skyed du 'jug pa gang yin pa dag lta ci smos te/ 'din de bas bsod nams chos gras
med pa skyed pa 'gyur ro// bsod nams mngon par 'du byed ba snga ma de ni bsod namasamangon par 'du byed pa 'di'i brgya'i char yang mi phod/ stong gi char ya nga ma bod/ 'bum gyi char yang mi phod//

bye ba'i char yang mi phod/ bya ba brgyab na yang mi yod/ bye ba stong gi char yang mi phod/ bye ba 'bumagyi char yang mi bod/ dpe dang rgyur yang mi bzod do// 'jam dpal byang chub sems dang re gang la
las byang chub sems dpa' zan bcad dam/ khros te tha na byang chub sems dpa' glang po ches skyes pa de'i dag ba'i rtsa bsangs rgyas la bskyid pa gcig bcad la 'jam dpal byang chub sems dpa' gzhan zhig

gis ni: chos kyi rjes su 'brang bdang/ don gyi rjesasu 'brang ba dang/ brgyad pa dang/ rgyun tu zhugs pa dang/ lan cig phyir 'ong ba dang/ phyi'i a'ong ba dang/ dgra bcom pa dang/ rang sangs rgyas 'jig
gyi khams thams cad kyi rdul snyad kyi zan bcad de/ khros nas lhung bzed dang/ chos gos med par byas la/ sems can thams cad long bar byas n 2 mi dge ba'i las 'di ni snga ma'i mi dge ba de'i brgya'i
char yang mi phod panas ) dpo'i bar du yang mi bzod do// bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsal nas/ dge slong dang/ dge slong ma dang/ dge bsnyen dang/ dge bsnyen ma de dag dang/ lha dang

kludang/ gnod sbyin dang 2 dri ba dang/ lha ma yin dang/ nam mkha' lding dang/ mi 'am ci dang/ lto 'phye chen po dang 3 brgya byin dang/ tshangs pa dang/ 'jig rten skyong ba dang/ mi ma yin pa rnams dang
phyogs tha dad pa nas lhags pa'i byang chub sems dpa' rgya mtsho grangs med/ tshad med pa rnams ya ras te/ bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon par bstod do/ mdo'i rgyal po chen po sprin chen

po'i le'u re re la/ chos snang ba'i sgo stong phrag gapa'i klung gras med pa'i bye ma snyed yang dag par 'du ba snang ba'i dkyil 'khor gyi dpal gyi glogagis gsal bar byas pa'i le 'u chen po'i tshogs mtha' yas pa/

gang+gAb klung gi bye masnyad las dga' ldan na gnas ba la sogs pa 2 'jig rten grangs med pa dang mthun par 'jug pa'i stobs la sbyor ba'i mthu las byung bas dbang byed cing/ phyogs bcu'i byang chub sems
dpa'i rgya mtsho 'dus pa'i dga' ston chen po la rtse ba zhes bya ba'i 'a ste sum cu bdun pa rdzogs so// kargya gar gyi mkhan po su len dra bo d+hi dang 3 zhu chen gyi lo ts+'a ba ban de ye shes sdes
zhus te gtan la phab pa/// @#// rgya gar skad du/ Ar+ya a pa lo kin nA ma ma hA yA na sU tra/ bod skad du 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs zhes bya ba theg pa
chen po'i mdo// sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dbab thams cad l phyag 'tshal lo// 'di skad bdag gis thos pa dus gcig na/ bcom ldan 'das rgyal bo'i khaban/ bya rgod phung
bo ba'i la/ dge slong gi dge 'dun chen po dang/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rab tumang po dang thabs cig tu bzhugs so// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems dpa'/
blo gros rnan par dag pa la bkalaM stsal pa/ blo gros rnam par dag pa// tshul khrims yongs su dag pas/ de bzhin gshigs pa yongs sudag go/ blo gros rnam par dag pa ting nge 'dzin yongs
sudag pa dang/ bzod pa yos su dag pa dang/ phan ba'i dngos po yongs su dag pas/ de bzhin gshegs pa yongasasu dag go/ blo gros rnam par dag pa// byams pa yongs su dag pas/ de bzhin
gshegs pa yongs su dag go/ blo gros rnam par dag pa// snying rje yongs su dag pas/ de bzhin gshegs pa yongs su dag go/ blo gros rnam par dag pa/ dga' ba yongs su dag pa dang/ btang
snyoms yongs su dag pas/ de bzhin gshegs pa yongs su dgago/ blo gros rnam par dag pa// rnam par grol ba yongs su dag pa dang/ rnam par grol ba'i ye shes yongs su dag pas/ de bzhin gsheg
pa 'ongs su dag go/ blo gros rnam par dag pa// stobs yongs su dag pas/ de bzhin gshegs pa yos su dag go/ blo gros rnam par dag pa/ mi 'jig pa yongs su dag pa dang/ sangs rgyas
kyi chos yongs su dag pa dang/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes yongs su dag pas de bzhin gshegasapa yongs su dag go/ blo gros rnam par dag pa ) de ltar de bzhin gshegs pa yongs su
dag pa la su zhig me tog dang/ 'phreng ba dang 3 spos dang gdugs dang/ rgyal mtshan dang/ bdan dang/ la mo'i sgra dang/ byug pa rnams gyis bsti stang du byed pa de'i bsod nams kyi phung po'i mtha'
rtogs par mi nus te/ de'i mtha' na theg pa gsum la/ theg pa gang yang rung bsamya ngan las 'das pa'i mthar thug pa gtogs par bsod nams kyi phung po de phyi ma'i mtha' dang zad par mi nus so//
de ci'i phyir zhe na/ blo gros rnam par dag pa ji ltar de bzhin gshegs pa sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad kyis tshad med pa de bzhin du de bzhin gshegs pa la yon phul ba yang tshad med do// mtha' yas
so= bsam gyis mi khyab bo// mtshungs pa med do// dpagatu med do// grangs med do// dang ga gis mi lang ngo// brjod du med do// blo gros rnam par dag pa su zhig/ de bzhin gshegs

pa de ltar bzhugs te/ mtsho zhing gzhes pa la bsti stang byed pa dang/ bla mar byed pa dang/ ri mor byed pa dang/ mchod pa dang/ rjod pa dang/ phyi ma'i tshe phyi ma'i dus lnga brgya tha ma la su zhige de bzhin
gshegs pa yongs su mya ngan las 'das pa'i ring bsrel yungs 'bu tsam la bsti stang byed pa dang/ blo mar byed pa dang/ ri mor byed pa dang mchod pa dang/ rjed pa dang/ yang dag par sems nye bar gzhag
@#/ ste: byang chub tu gzhol ba'i sams bskyed pas phyag 'tshal ba dang/ phyag byed pa dang/ bsti stang byed pa dang/ bla mar byed pa dang/ mor byed pa dang/ mchod pa dang/ rjedung
dang : gsol ba dang/ bsngags pa dang/ sol babyed pa des phan yon lnga yongs su bzung bar 'gyur te/ lngagang zhen/ dran pa dang ldan par 'gyur bdang/ rtogs pa dang ldan par 'gyur bdang/ ngo tsha shes

shing khrel yod pa dang ldan par 'gyur ba dang/ myur du sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das mthong bar 'gyur bdang/ mthong nas kyang dad pa skyed par 'gyur ba ste/ phan yon lnga po de dag yongs su bzung bar 'gyur
ro// de chos bzhi dang ldan pa 'gyur te/ bzhi gang zhe na/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i bstan pa'adzin pa dang/ de yang ji skad bstan pa bzhin du bsgrub pa dang bsgrubs nas kyang sangs rgyas bcom ldan
'das rnams dang nye bar 'gyur ba dang/ myur du sangs rgyas kyi zhing yos su dag par skye bar 'gyur ba ste/ chos bzhipo de dag/ blo gros rnam par dag pa byang chub sems dpa' chos bzhidang ldan na
bdud dram 3 bdud kyi ris kyi lha'i bu rnams kyis mi brdzi bar 'gyur te/ bzhi gang zhe na/ rigs mtho zhing 'gis che ba dang/ btsasam thag tusangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams yid la byed pa dang/
phyi ma'i dusan dam pa'i chos 'dzin pa dang/ rtag tu de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'isangs rgyas rnams kyis byin gyis brlabs par 'gyur ba ste/ blo gros rnam par dag ba//
byang chub sems dpa' chos bzhi po de dag dang ldan n/ bdud dam bdud kyi cis kyi lha'i bu rnams kyis mi brdzi bar 'gyur ro// de nasabcom ldan 'das kyis de'i tsho tshigasasu bcad pa 'di dag
bka' stsal to// srog chags kun la phan pa'i phyir// byang chub tu sems bskyed nas// 'jig rten mgon gyi mchod rten la// su zhig bskor ba byed pa ni// tshe rabs dag ni thams cad du// byang

chub spyad pa spyod pa'i tshe// dran dang ldan zhing blo gros ldan// bsod nams ldan zhing 'jigs med 'gyur// mchod rten bskor ba byas na ni/ tshorabs dag ni thams cad du/ lha dang klu dang gnod sbyin dang/
srin po rnams kyis mchod par 'gyur// ngasani gang dgabastan pa yin// mi khom brgyad po de dag song// sangs rgyas 'byung ba bab mdzes pa// mnyes par byed 'di dag pa gcig/ mdog ldan gzugasani phun
sum tshogs// mtshan gyis legs par brgyan ba dang// mthudang stobs dang ldan par 'gyur// le lo can du de ma 'gyug/ de ni phyug ci nor cher 'gyur// bsod nams ldan zhing brdzi ba med// 'jig rten
sgron ma mnyes byas nas// yang dang yang du bsti stang byed// bdag med stong pa'i chos thosan// de ni chos la rmongs ma 'gyur// myur du dad pa thob 'gyur zhing// chos don ji bzhin mkhas par 'gyur//

tshong dpon khyim dang rgyas pa dang/ phyug po rnams su skye bar gyur// dpa' zhing sbyin pa'i bdag por 'gyur// gtong ba btang zhing sar sna med// 'dzam bu'i gling na gang yang rung// khyad par can gyi risamadzes
@##// pa// deb ni brtan pa de skyo ste// dma' ba dag ni rnam par spangs// mchod rten bsor ba byas na ni// skyab thams cad kun tu yang// dbangacher grangs pa'i khyim bdag dang/

dpal dang ga'i brjed gzi ldan 'grub// bram bresA la che bdu dang// tshul khrims ldan zhinge mang thos dang// rgyal rigs sA pachenabadra dang// phyug cing nor chen ldan par 'gyur// sa bskor rgya mtsho tshun

a chad kyi/ sa kun la na gang smos pa// gling ba'i dag gi dbang phyug bla// rgyal po chos dang ldan par 'gyur// 'khor los sgyur ba rdzu 'phrul che// rin chen bdun dang ldan par 'gyur// rgyal srid gnas nas

saargyas la// yang dang yang du bsti stang byed// 'di nas shi 'bos mtho ris su// song nas sangs rgyas bstan la dang// lhun po'i thom gyi dbang phyug po// lha yi dbang po brgya byin 'gyur// lha dbangashin tu
'thab bral dang/ de bzhin du ni dga' ldan dang// lhadabangashin tu 'phrul ba dang// dbang sgyur 'jigs pa med par 'gyur// mchod rten bskor ba byasonan// denatshangs pa'i 'jig rten du// tshangs pa'i
dbang phyug mkhas 'gyur zhing// lha rnams bye bas mchod pa ra 'gyur// 'jig rtenamagon gyi mchod rten la// mi gang bskor ba byed pa yi// bsngags pa bskal pa bye bar yang// brjod pas zad par bya mi

nus// su zhigabyang chub sems bskyed nas// ston pa'i mchod rten phyaga'atshal ba// de ni bskal pa bye bar yang// nams kyang 'ong zhing 'thung mi 'gyur/ 'jig rten mgon gyi mchod rten la// mngon du bskor ba byed/

pa ni/ bung ba sngon po mdzes 'dra yi// rnam par dag pa'i mig thob 'gyur// mchod rten bskor ba byas na ni// den nges par rtag tu yang// mthun pa'i don kun gros 'gyur shing// don min rnams ni spangs par/
'gyur// mchod rten bskor ba byas na ni// mthu dang stobs dang ldan par 'gyur// de nale lo med 'gyur zhing// rtag tu bag yod ldan par 'gyur// mchod rten bskor ba byas na ni// brtson 'grus brtan/
zhing mthu brtan la// brtan zhing rnam par gnon brtan dang// de ni myur du mkhaMs par 'gyur// me dang dug dang mtshon gyis de/ mas kyang 'tshadus khyedami 'gyur// mkhas pa ni rdzogs rdzogs su// zad/
par byas nas 'chi dus byed// mchod rten bso babyas nan// pho brang 'khor dang yul 'khor dang// grong brdal rnams su longs spyod dang// gzugs kyi khyad bar 'phags par 'gyur// byang chub spyad pa/
spyod pa'i tshe// den 'dod pa mi bstan cing// lus kyang gtsang la gos gtsang zhing// gtsang ma'i chos 'a gnas par 'gyur// blo gros rnam par dag pa/ byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa la yang dag par/

zhugs pa gang gis de bzhin gshegs pa'i mchod rten mthong nas dad pa bskyed de// pus mo gnyis ka'i lha nga sa la btsugs nas phyag 'tshal zhing phyag byed de/ de bzhin gshegs pa skyes bu chen po'i mtshan

sum cu rtsa gnyis kyis sku legs par brgyan pa de/ ci 'dra bar bdag gi lus kyang de dang 'dra bar gyur cigaces de la mos pa bskyang na/ blo gros rnam par dag pa// bsod nams kyi phung bo de'i mtha' brjod dad
mi nus te/ bla na med par yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub la gnas pa'i phyir ro// bsod nams kyi phung po de ni rgyal po nyid dam ) brgya byin nyid dum/ tshangs pa nyid dam/ rang sangs

ma rgyas nyid dam// yang dag par rdzogs pa'isangs rgyas kyi thig pa bla na med pas kyang bad par bya bar mi nus so// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ blo gros rnam pa lnga dag nga 3 gis kyi bu des bsonganams kyi phung po bsam gyis

mi khyab pa yongs su bzung ba'i phyire go/ blo gros rnam par dag pa 'di lta ste dpa kun/ de bzhin gshegs pa bla named pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas pa/ grong khyer/
ram gtsug lag khang ngam/ grong du 'jugakyang rung/ 'chag kyang rung/ 'greng yang rung/ 'dug kyang rung/ chos ston kyang rung/ stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams na/ sems can
lha 'am klu 'am gnod sbyin nam/ dri za'am/ lha ma yin nam/ nam mkha' lding ngam/ mi 'am cibam lto 'phud chen po 'amaM )mi 'am/ mi ma yin pa sems can gyi gras su ma gtogs pa/
shingengam/ ra 'om/ khung bu'am/ bu ga bam/ bya skyibs kyang rung ste/ de bzhin gshegs pa ga la ba de logs su bdud pa dang ) rab tu bdud ba dang/ kun tu bdud mi byedapa de gang yang med de/
ji ltar de bzhin gshegs pa dag ba'i rtsa ba thams cad dang ldan pa la byed ba de bzhin du/ rigs kyi bu de dag grong ngam/ grong khyer ram/ grong brdal lam/ yul 'khor ram/ pho brang 'khor na rgyub la/
sems can rnams 'dud rab tu bdud/ kun tu 'dud par 'gyur ro/ de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis de'i tsho tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag bkan+ta stsal to/ 'jig rten sangs rgyas ji ltar
'gyur zhes mos bskyod de// sangs rgyas mchod rten la ni pus mo gnyis 'dzugs dang/ su zhig byang chub gzhol nas phyogs rnams kun bgro ba/ de 'gro tshon 'jig rten gsum po 'dud pa byed// mi

rnams gtso bo rang 'byung gang du 'gro byed pa// de 'alogs su ni rtswa dang shing dang sdong lcag dang sman dang shing lo rnams dang 'bras bu bdang mdang/ yade khong dri ldan me tog rnams ni 'dud par 'gyur/ bcom
ldan 'das mchod rten rnams la pus mo btsugs pa ni/ 'di la mi yi dbang po kun kyang 'dud par 'gyur// gnod sbyin dbang dang klu dang lha yi rgyal bo dang// tshangs pa'i dbang po thams cad rkang par
gtugs par byed// bcom ldan mchod rten rnams la pus btsugs phyag byas na// dpa' zhing stobs dang ldan pa'i 'kholos sgyur bar 'gyur// gser gyi mdog ldan mtshan rnams kyis ni go mar
'gyur// mthu chen bla mar bya zhing thub par dka' bar 'gyur// de yi yul nasems can gang dag gnas gyur pa// de dag thoms cad byams pa'i sems dang dga' bar 'gyur// de la
sams can gang yang sdig pa mi skyed de// skye bo tshogs chen dga' zhing yid du 'ong bar 'gyur/ bcom ldan mchod rten dag la pus btsugs phyag 'tshal ba// de la sems can kun gyi rgyal po/
rab 'dud// lha dang klu dang mi dang lto 'phye chen po 'dud// bskal pa mtha' nas rnams su dbugs phyin thob par 'gyur// bcom ldan mchod rten dag la pus btsugs phyag
'tshal ba gang tshe rgyal ba dam ba byung bar gyur pa'i tshe// de bzhin gshegs pa rnams dang nye bar 'gyur ba thob// 'dren pa gzha' yas rnams la mchod pa byed par 'gyur// 'jig rten sangs rgyu
gyur ces mos pa bskyod nas ni/ bcom ldan mchod rten rnams la pus btsugs phyag 'tshal pa// bskal pa bye ba khrag khrig brgya grangs zad 'gyur na// de ni dang por mi thogs byang chub mtshungs med thob/
gang zhig sangs rgyas bye ba khrag khrig rgya stongal// bskal pa bye ba gzhal yas bsti stang byed pa bas// gang zhig phyi dus mi bzad bskal pa 'di lan/ ]mchod rten phyag 'tshal de yi bsod nams ches
mang ngo// sangs rgyas dam pa sbyin gnas mtshungs pa med gyur pa// spyod pa dam pa spyad nas khyad par b.res gyur pa// mi yi khyu mchog de la 'di'i ni mchod byas na// rnam par smin pa dam pa mtshus
med rang bzhin 'gyur// byang chub tu ni sems bsngo ste/ me tog 'phreng ba byas nas su// mchod rten dag la su 'bul pa// de ni nags kyang yongs mi 'gyur// mi yi nang nas shi 'phos nas/ gsum
cu rtsa gsum 'gro bar 'gyur// der ni rin chen sna tshogs kyi// gzhal med khang pa thob par 'gyur// mchod rten 'phreng ba 'dir yulan/ ]khang bzangs dag dang khang brtsegs pa// lha yi bu mos bstan
pa rnams // sum cu gsum du spyod par 'gyur// yan lag brgyad ldan chus gang zhing// gser gyi bye ma bdal gyur pa// de dang shel dgagi/ lha yi rdzing bu thob par 'gyur// der na lha
ye dga' spyad nas// mkhas pa tsho tshad rdzogs par 'gyur// lha yi 'jig rtenangashi 'phos nas// mi dang longs spyod ldan par 'gyur// dge ba'i rtsa ba de nyid kyis// mkhas pa bag yod gyur nas
ni de bzhin gshegs pa mnyes byas te/ rkang gnyis mchog la mchod pa byed// mchod rten 'phrang ba 'bul byed pa// de ni 'dod chags mi 'phrogs zhing// zhe sdang gis kyang 'phrogs mi 'gyur/
de na nams kyang rmosami 'gyur// rkang gnyis mchog la mchod byas na// de ni tshe rabs thams cad du// chags pa med cing zhe sdang med// bkam pa med cing dbang po bsdams// mchod rtan 'phrang ba
'bul byed pa// tshe rabs bye ba stong rnams dang// khrag khrig dag ni brgya bgras ba// kun tu bkur stir byas par 'gyur// mchod rten 'phreng ba 'bul byed pa// de ni 'khor los sgyur bar 'gyur//
brgya byin lha yi dbang phyug 'gyur// tshangs pa'i 'jig rten tshangs par 'gyur// 'jig rtenamagon po skyob pa la// dar gyi dbul ba phul byas na// lha yi dag dang mi rnams kyi// don rnams thams cad
grub par 'gyur// dma' ba'i rigs ni rnam spangs te// der ni de skyed 'gyur ma yin// phyug cing nor chen ldan pa dang// 'jig rten dbang phyug de 'gyur ro// de bzhin gshegs la mchod byas na// gzug
dang don dang longs spyod dang// kha dog dang ni 'byor ba dang// kun tu grags dang ldan par 'gyur// de ni tshe bas dran 'gyur zhing// 'dod chags kyis kyang bathogs mi 'gyur/
'dod pa rnams kyi skyonashesashing// tshangs par sbyang pa sbyong bar 'gyur// de bzhin gshegs ba mchod byas na// gzugs rnams dang ni sgra dog dang// ro rnams kyis kyang mi tshugs shang// sdig
'a7 pa'i las ni byed mi 'gyur// rnam par 'dren pa mchod byed na/ 'di ni spos dang me tog gis// rnams kyang 'phongs par mi 'gyur zhing// dran ldan shes rab ldan bar 'gyur// de bzhin gshegs la
su mchod pa// de yi nor gyi phung po la// rgyal po dang ni chom rkun dang// mdang chus kyang legami 'gyur// 'jig rten mgon po'i mchod rten la// dar gyi dbul ba su 'bul ba// de ni skam dang mya
ngan dang// nad bu can du gzhar mi 'gyur// 'jig rten sgron mamachod byedang// tshe rabs dag ni thams cad du// mya ngan med cing gnod med dang// 'khor los sgyur ba 'byor chen 'gyur// 'dren
tshe la mchod pa byas na ni// rkang pa lag pa mnyen 'gyur zhing// yan lag rnam par dag 'gyur la// gzugs dang kha dog ldan par 'gyur// sdig pa'i las ni rnam pos te// byang chub sbyang pa
spyod par byed// gang dag 'jig rten rab dakon pa// rkang gnyis mchog rnams mthong bar 'gyur// bskal pa bye stong rnams dang// khrag khrig dag ni brgya bgrangs par// mchod cing bde la
0/ shes rab ldan// byang chub dam pa 'tshang yang rgyu// 'jig rten mgon po skyob pa la// 'phreng ba'i khang pa byas na ni// de ni g.yog 'khor mi phyed cing// rgyal po'abyor pa chen por 'gyur// 'thag
pa rnams kyis gang sbas pa// sdig pa'i las ni spong bar byed// rdzogs sangs rgyas kyis bshad pa yi// dag pa'i las la bstan par byed/ lha 'am 'on te klu rnams sam// 'jig rten dag na gang
mkhas pa// de dag dga' zhing mgu ba dang// bsti stang byas shange bsngags par 'gyur// brten pa de na gar skyes par// bsod nams gzi brjid shin tu brjid// yul 'bor dag dang grong khyer
ngag gis der bste stang byed par 'gyur ro/ sangs rgyas gzhan gyis mi thub pa// rkang gnyis mchog la sumachod pa ]/de dgamathu stobs che ba drang/ g.yog 'khor chen pos mdzes
par 'gyur// byang chub tu sems bsngos te// 'phung ba'i gtsug lag khang byas na// sajus rgyasa rnams kyis gang ba sngags pa'i// 'byor pa dganang thob bo// den 'theng dang zhar ba dang/
smad dang ma rus mi 'gyur gnas// gang dang gang du skyes par yang// mtshan rnams kyisan brgyan par 'gyur// sems can dbul po rnams mthong na// de ni nor gyis sdud par byed// de ni/
ra dang ldan 'gyur zhing// de ni byang chub spyad pa spyod// blo gros chen pos sa 'di kun// yongs su btang ba byas nas kyang/ dman pa'i sems su mi 'gyur zhing// de nams kyang 'bongs
@#/ mi 'gyur// gang dag byang chub mngon zhugs pa// de dag bu dang bu mo dang// chung ma dge zhing bzang mo dag/ gtadanus mya ngan byed mi 'gyur// de ni sngon du 'gro 'gyur zhing
bkri ba med la mthongan dgag/ phrag dog dngani nga rgyal gyis// rnams kyang de la gnod mi 'gyur// gang dag byang chub rab zhugs pa// de drag phrag dog med cing des// 'bod pa'i pha rol
phyin par 'gal/ na pa 'dod cing yon tan ldan// gang dag byang chub mngon zhugs pa// 'jig rten kun n de ni chon/ de dag 'byung ba shin tu dkon// smad pa med pa'i sbyin gnas 'gyur//
sa 'di dag ni rim gyis su'u dbagrang bar bya zhing dbag par nus// de dag rnams kyi yon tan mthal/ tshig gis bstanapar mi nus so// sems can drag ni thams cad kyi// dus gsum saA
ni shes par nus// de dag rnams kyi yon tan mtha'// tshigagis bstan par mi nus so// rgya mtsho chen po bzhi po dag/ skrani byi ba stong gshags pa'i// sku yis zad par bya bar nus// de dag
yon tan zad ma nus// sa rnams thams cad brlags pa/ rab tu phra rdul shes par nus// sas rgyas sras podi dag gi/ yon tanamatha' ni brjod mi nus// chu klung thams cad rab 'bab//
rgyun las bzlog ste 'gro yang srid/ de sangs rgyas sras po de dgagi/ yon tan mtha' brjodade lta mni// sems can dag ni thams cad kyi// sngon gyi lus rnams ji snyed pa// bgrang bar bya zhing
[zo/ ]dpag par nus// de dag yon tan zad mi 'gyu/ sngon gyi lus rnams thams cad la// sdu'aphrang je snyad yong ba rnams // bgrang bar bya zhing dpag par nus// de dag yon tan khyad mi 'gyur//
'gro ba lnga por 'khor pa yi// sems can kun gyi spu rnamasani/ bgrang bar bya zhing dpag par nus// de dag son tan zadami 'gyug/ sa 'di ji skad thams cad pa// chu yi phung por gnas gyur kyang//
re ni bgrangs zhinge dpag par nus// de dag yon tan brjod mi nus// mar ma mdzad nas bzung nas// ma 'os bskal ba ji snyed pa// de yi bar du shing ljon rnams / ji snyed ma 'ongs 'byung 'gyur pa//
de dag 'bras bu me tog rnams // de dag zad pa shes par nus ) )bskal pa bye ba stong rnams dang// khrag khrig dgan brgya bgrangs par// brtson pa zhig gis de dag gi bsngags 'brang yid du 'ong bad
kyang/ sangs rgyas sras po de dag gi/ yon tan mtha' ni brjod mi nus// sas rgyasasras po de dag la// mi gang mi dga' byed pa de// lha dang mi'i srangs nas su// de dag dma' ba spyod yul 'gyur//
byang chub sems dpa' rnams la ni// mi gang la la gnod byed pa// migamed pa tsam long ba dang// sdug bsngal dpung gnyen med par 'gyur// shi 'phos nas ni mnar med 'gro// de na 'bar zhing 'jig/
sgrug 'gyur// lus ni chen por gyur nas kyang// sdug bsngalatshor ba myong bar 'gyur// tshe rabs de dang de dag tu// de lus dpag tshad tsam 'gyur te// de dag phyam ltar zlum gyur la/ kun nas yongs su/
bza' bar brgyu// de tshe lus la mgo bo na// lnga stong yod par 'gyur 'gyur zhing// mgo bo de dag re re las 'ang// lce ni lta rgya tham pa yod// gcig la'ang thongashol brgya dag gis//
lce nar ba rta rmo bar 'gyur// sdig pa'i las ni rnam smin gyis// mi bzad chen por gshegs par 'gyur/ mnar med de nas shi 'phos nas// de ni tshadang rab tshabar/ blo grosangan patshor ba myong/ de
sngon nyes byas 'bras bu yin// byang chub sems dpa' rnams la ni// ma bsdams gang zhig gnod byed pa// de la dud 'gro'i skyo gnas dang// dmyal ba'isan dkon ma yin// tshorabs bya ba stong rnams
dang// khrag khrig dgazhi brgyu bgrangs par// sdug bsngalatshor ba myong 'gyur zhing// des na bzang po rnams mi mthong// sangs rgyas sras po skyob rnams la// gnod pa dag ni byas 'gyur na// ma la
gartan 'jigs pa yi/ shin tu gdug pa'i sbrul du skye// de ni bkres dang skom pas nyen// sdig pa'i las rnams byed pa 'gyur// de ni bus kyang mi rnyed de// nams kyang 'bras par zami myong// shi
'phos gshin rje'i 'jig rten du// de ni rtag pa'i gtun du rdung// dge slong dag la gnod byas pas// nams kyang skabs ni red mi 'gyur// de nasangashi'apos dus byas te// mi yi lus ni thob gyuran// blo
ngan de ni dmus lo 'gyur// gnod sems ldan zhing sdom pa med// de ni nyes par smras byas te// 'phags pa rnams la skur btab pas// mi yinang nas shi 'phos nas// ngan song dog tu myur du
bgro byang chub sems dpa' rnams lan// ma bsdams gang zhig gnod byed pa// bskal pa bye ba stong dag tu// nams kyang sas rgyas mthong mi 'gyur// rdzogs sangs rgyas kyi sras rnams 'ag/
gang zhag chos bzhin bsrung byed pa// des ni ngan 'gro kun spangs te// rgyun du bzang 'gror 'gro bar 'gyur// phyug cing nor chen ldan pa dang// stobs dang ldan zhing 'jigs pa med// dran dang ldan

zhinge shes rab ldan// bde zhing ngo tsha khrel ltas ldan// gang du 'jigs rten rnams kyi sgron// yongs su mya ngan 'das gyur pa// sangs rgyas mchod rten mthong nas ni// yang dang yang du bsti stang byed//
rdzogs sangs rgyas kyis gsungs pa yi/'a'adra'i chos 'di thos gyur nas// sangs rgyas sras po rnams la ni// su zhig phyi phyir dad mi byed// gang gis sangs rgyas stong rnams dang/ brgya dang bye
ba bgrangs dgal// bskal pa gang+ga'i bye ma snyed// de snyad bskal pa bka' pa bas// 'jig rten mgon gyis gsungs pa yi// dam chos 'jig tshegang zhigagis// nyin dang mtshan du 'dzin byed pa//
de ni bsod nams khyad par 'phags// chos 'jig dus na chos 'dzin pa// sngon gyi sangs rgyas thamasacad dang/ gsas rgyas ye shes rab gnas pa// nga la des mchod pa byas/ dam pa'i chos ni 'jig

ba'i tshe// ston pa'i bstan pa bsrung byed pa// bskal pa bye ba stong rnams su// de ni nams kyang rgyud mi 'gyur// lus kyis bde ba myong 'gyur zhing// de ni nad kyis btab mi 'gyur// de ni yid du mi 'ong
bas= rnams kyang 'brogs par mi 'gyur go/ ston pa'i bstan pa bsrung byas na// bzod pa phun sum tshogs pa dang/ 'des rang gsal dang gnyen ba dang// sems can rnamA
la byamasasams 'gyur// 'jig tshe rgyal ba mchog gi chos bzung bas// bde dang dga' thob mdzod ni mang por 'gyur// sngon gyi rim gro bya ba thob 'gyur zhing// mi khom brgyad po ma lus zad par sdong/
jig tshe rgyal ba mchog gi chos bzungs bas// dpalan nam mkha' skar mas yongs gang ltar// rtag tu mtshan gyis gochar byas pa dang// rab tu tshig snyan yod bongs dbyangs ldan 'gyur// 'jig tsho rgyal ba
mchog gi chos bzus pas// gang na yad bde med cing bab sdug ga/ rigs dman de ni de las spangs par 'gyur// phyug cing shin tu bde la longs spyod ldan// 'jig tshe rgyal ba mchog gi chos bzung bas//
mthu dang stobasadang ldan zhing brtson 'grus ldan// mi dman sa rnams kun tu rnam par rgyu// sangs rgyas rgya stong dgalo pasAn bkur byed// 'jig tshe rgyal ba mchog gi chos bzung bas// mchog tu
rab mdzes gzungs ldan shes rab ldan// mi yi 'jig rten mchog tu bsnyen bkur 'gyu// rgyal bo mkhas pa mdzangs pa rnams kyis bsngags/ 'gatshe rgyal ba mchog gi chos bzung bas//
mchog tu gzungs mdzes blta na sdug pa dang// skyod pa bud med lha rnams dga' ba dang/ bde zhingamakhas la bsngagasashingashesarab ldag/ ston pa stobs bcu mnga' ba lha yi lhas// gang gi mdun
dumado 'di rab bshad pa// mi de'i lag tu mdo sde 'di 'dra 'di// phyi ma'i dus kyi tshe na thob par 'gyur// gang zhig ston pa mi mchog gzugs byed nga// cas 'du rtsigs ngos 'dra 'am gsar las//
byas de yi chos kyi khyad par gang yin pa/ de dag ma lus rab tu bstan gyis nyon// de ni bsta min long bar gzhan min 'gyur// srul po mi 'gyur yan lag ma ldug min/ de ni gzugs dang

ldan zhing kha dog ldan// sum cu rtsa gnyis mtshan gyis go mar 'gyur// lus ni rnam par dag cing khyad par thob// stobs pa thob cing sgra snyan yid du 'ong// shes bzhin ldan zhing 'jig rten kun gyi gtso//
de mthong sems can bde zhing dar bar 'gyur// sdug byed mi 'gyur zhe sdang med sems ldan// g.yo med mi na rgyal po 'khrug mi byed// mthu dang ldan zhing dbang cher grags par 'gyur// byams
la gnasangashing mi dman sems dang ldan// 'dren pa'i sku gzugs sku rab mas byas n// de ni mchog 'gyur skye bo mang mchod 'os// blo ldan phyug cing che nyid rgya cher ldan// dbang ldan 'khor los
sgyur ba'i rgyal por 'gyur// 'dren pa'i sku gzugs rab tu mdzes byas ni// lha yi dbang po dbang phyug dbang thob pa// lhun po'i broman dbang thob brgya byin 'gyur// bdag po lhun po'i zom na rgyal srid
ston de ni dran dang blo gros mi ldan mni// de ni rtogs mos shes rab tshang bar 'gyur// 'jig rten kun na dbugs phyin thob 'gyur te// 'di ni yang shes ldan zhing dmyal ba sbangs// sems can snying
'apo mtshungs med mchod byas nas// dud 'gro'i skyes gnas gshin rje'i yul mi 'gro/ ngan 'gro gsum po des ni rnams sbas te// bdag der phyis mi skye bar shes par 'gyur//
'dren pa'i sku gzugs rab tu mdzes byas nas// dbang ldan dbang phyug nyid kyi lhar 'gyur te/ midamanadaga' ba'i sems kyis sangs rgyas mchod// rgyal ba mchog gi bstan la dad par 'gyur// tshangs
ba'i 'jig rten dbang thob tshangs par 'gyur// yid 'o shin tu mdzes pa'i spos ngad can// 'dzam bu'i gling gsar 'od byed ngaga' 'gyur ba'i// gzhal med khang mchog blta sdug thob par 'gyur// den
ded dbon stobs bcu ldan pa po// sems can snying po mtshungs 'dra med pa thob// kha dog mtha' yas 'jig rten kun na gsal// gser stong ni chen po bcu dang mtshungs// su zhig dga' ba'i yid
kyis me tog blangs// dad skyes 'jig rten mgon la cha'adu gtor// de ni mi yi 'jig rten ngasod nams ldan// rgyal srid gnas nas rgyal ba mchog bskur 'gyur// mya ngan skamangashing tha ba dra'i ldan
lus[：]yan lag legs gnas mtshungs med thob par 'gyur// skye bo mang pos blta ba'i 'os yin te// dmyal ba dag rtsa 'dod pa sbyong bar 'gyur// skyed pa rnam par sbyong tshe 'do ba la/// ngan skyugs
khung ltar smad pa shes par 'gyur// tshungs sbyod dge ba khyad par 'phags la sbyod// dga' ba'i sems kyis rtag tu spyod par 'gyur// bskal pa mtha' yas mang du de khanas// rab mdzes ut+pal bosung

ni 'byung bar 'gyur// de yis nagasar gyi mdog 'dra zhing// tsan dan lta bu r dri zhim bad kyang 'byung// sbyang pa rnam bar spyod tshe khro ba dang// tha ba dri skyon gti mugaganong mi byed// dman pa med pa'i/
sems kyis dbugs phyin red// bag yod lha yi nang na rgyal po thob// gang tshe rgyal ba mya ngan 'das pa na// de ni gus pas de dag chos kyang 'dzin// mi dman dga' ba'i sems kyis sbyin pa
sbyin[：]bcom ldan mya ngan 'das pa'i ring bsrel mchod// rgyal ba mchog gi bstan pa 'jig dus tshe// rab tu dga' bas ston pa'i chos tshul 'dzin// des ni chos mchog mdzes pa de spyad pas//
gnod pa sa 'chi ba'i dus byed gzhan mi 'gyur// gal te sems can thams cadusas rgyas shing// nyon mongs med pa gsol mdog stobs bcu'i gyur// de dag bskal pa bye ba khrag khrig
brgya stong du// rgyal ba mchog la mchod pa'i bsngags brjod nus// 'jig rten kun tu sdig pa las spangs te// dga' ba'i sems kyis mchog gi las byas shing// rlabs chen spyod
tshodon ni legs byas nas// 'jig rten mthu chen rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'gyur// gang gis sos chu yungs 'bru tsamaM blangs te/ dbcom ldan mchod rten rnams la bdug khyod nga/ dad
yi phan yon brjod kyis soms dang zhing// rdul dang dri ma spongs lamanyan par gyis// de ni bsod nams ldan zhing phyogs kun rgyu// nad med gyur cing blo brtan bag yong la// spyad pa rnam par
[r]@#// spyod tshe ma na 'dul// skye bo mang po dga' zhing yid du 'ong// rgyal po thob nas rgyal ba mchog bkur 'gyur// mthu chen rab mkhas 'khor 'as sgyur 'gyur te//
gser gyi mdog ldan mtshan gyi gom can// 'jig rten kun n yid 'ong dri ldan thob// de la yid mi bde dang sdug bsngal med// spyad pa spyod tshe longs spyod nyams mi 'gyog/phyug
cinganor ldan mdzod ni rab tu mang// mya ngan med 'gyur 'jig rten kun tu rgyu// skye bo mang po lhags te de la 'dri// rgyal ba mchog gi bstan pa khyad 'phags chos// tshig rab brjodaM
cing thu tsomasal bar byed// chos thos yid bde s+sor yang sna bar byed/ sdug pa'i las med blo rgya chu dang ldan// rgyu' pas gsungs pa'i chos mchog khyad 'phags pa// dga' bar 'gyur
la rtag tu mkhas byas te// mag kyang sbyor zhing mun pa sel bar byed// 'dod chags mi chen zhe sdang che ma yin// mi yi 'jig rten gti mugachem yin)/ den tshangs spyad dag pa mchog 'di spyod
mi yi don ni dpag tu med pa byed// bcom ldan mchod rten rnams la spos bdugs na// de'aganod par sems pa su yang med// den nems kyang longs spyod nyams mi 'gyur// blta ba/
'os shing nor chen ldan par 'gyur// bskal ba bye ba khrag khrig brgya rnams su// sems ni rnam dag sdig pa rnamadag cing// zhi zhing rab zhi zhi dul ldan gyur nas// mi dman soms kyis byang
chub mtshungs med thob// sems can bye ba khrag khrig brgya mtha' yas// mya ngan med bde zhi ba mchog bkod cing// 'khor lo mtshungs med 'jig rten kun bskor nas// phyi nas nyon mongs rdul
mod mya ngan 'as// su zhig dga' mgu soms kyis gos kyis ni// bcom ldan mchod rten rnams la mchod byedapa// den gos mdzes bye ba stong rnams dang// khrag khrig brgyabagrangs mtha' yas
rtag tu rnyed// bcom ldan mchod rten gos kyis dkris byas n// de ni btsas ma thag tu gos mchog thob// lha yi khyad 'phagasada'agos rab babrang red/ dbatsas ma thag tu de lus shin tu bde//
gang zhig gos kyis bcom ldan mchod rten dang// 'dren pa mtshungs med rnams la mchod byed// de 'di'i mtshungs pa med pa'i lus thob ste// sum cu rtsa gnyis mtshan gyi ma tog rgyas//
bcom ldan mchod rten gos kyis dkris byas na// lag mthalas ni mu ge phung gas pa// sna tshogs dag dang song ge'i phreng ba dang// gser skud 'bamadzes bskal pa mtha' yas 'byung// bcom

ldan mchod rten gos kyi dkris byas na// lha las klu 'am ma 'am lto 'phye che// su yang de la ma dad skyed mi byed// rtag tu tshangs par spyod pa mchog 'di spyo bcom ldan mchod rten gos kyis dkris byas
na: stong gi 'jig rten khams kun zil gnon te// 'dzam gling gser gyis gser ni zil mnan bzhin// skye dgu'i don ni dpag tu med pa byed// gal te ran chen rab mchog sna bdun gyis// stong gi
zhing kun rab tu bkang pa 5na// de 'dra'i dpa' khyad par du nus kyi// rgyal ba'i mchod rten gos gcig phul ba yin// nor bu ni chen zla ba bod rnams kyis/ bye ba phrag
khrig brgya stong zhing bkang ba// de 'dra'i dpal bde zad pa bya nus kyi// rgyal ba'i mchod rten gos gcig phul pa min// 'jig rten sas rgyas 'grub zhes mos bskyod de 3/ bcom ldan mchod rten/
ba dan phul byas na// de ni skye bo mang po'i mchod chos 'gyur// byang chub mchod spyod dam pa shib spyod// bcom ldan mchod rten bdan phul byas na/ dag cing mchog gi lus ni thob 'gyur te//
zla dbab nags ra ltar shin tudakar 'gyur zhing// lha yis bsngags mchod cing byamar byed// de yi lus gsar gyi mdog 'drar 'gyur// las kyi gos dang la bababang rab dang// du gul dang ka shi
pa rnams dang/ shin tu mdzes pa'i gos kyang red ba'agyug/ 'dzam bu'i gling rigs mchog dam pa gang// phyug cingam nying bdag dang nganor mang ba// de dag ni rtag tu de skya ste// dman
shing mchog tudabul ba rnam par spangs// de la sems can su yang phrag dogamad// sems can gnod pa/rasams pa gzhan mi 'byung// gzhan gyi sdig pa'i las la de snod de 3rtag tu bag yod
tshul khrims rnam dag 'gyur// 'dzin pa med cing ser sna med par 'ong// gtong ba ba btang mya ngan med pa thob// de ni srog phyir gzhan la sbyin mi byed// phong pa med byed rtag tu bag yod 'gyur:/
sangs rgyas stobs bcu ded dpon mthong nas ni// dga' ba'i sems kyis gdugs dang ba dan dang// ma ma rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das la mchod// byang chub spyong mchog 'di ni rtag pa sbyong//

mi yi 'jig rten bla mar bsnyen bkur bye// lha dang lha yi dag dang mi yi gtso// yange 'ong sgros mdzes blta na sdug pa dang// nor bu shes 'dra sna tshogs ldan pa thob// ri rab rtse mor lha nang rab tu gsal
lha kun slob mar gyur nas mtshon du 'dud// chos kyis de dag yid bde skyed par byed// de la dad mchog gzha' gang thob par gyur// de nas sha 'thosami yi 'jig rten du// rgyal po dmapa stobs
ldan 'khor los sgyug/ de la sems can su yang sdigami skye// skye bo mang po dga' zhing yid 'ong 'gyur// rdul bsal sems can mchog la rgyal mtshan phul// ring por mi thogasanob mang red par
