'gyur// shes ba mtha' yas mdzod mang ldan 'ong// sems chung mi 'gyur dmanar bsemasami 'gyur// los spyod rnyed nas bgyed cing bdag kyang sbyong/ rten 'jigs med yid mi bde ba dag/
rgyal po dga' nas grong dang yul 'khor bskyed/ de lasems canas yang sdig ma skyo// gtso bo khyad par 'phags pa mdzod mang zhing// khyim bdag ni chon snatshogs lus brgyan 'gyug/ rgyal po'i
bu 'am de bzhin blon po 'ong// rgyal por gyur na stobs ldan brtsi bamad/brnyes pa'i rigasadaman thams cad yongs su song// longs spyod khyad 'phags dges mchog rnyed nas ni// rtag tu bag yod
sems ni zhumami 'gyur// 'dod pa rnams ni ngan skyugs khung ltar spong// khyad 'phags gzugs dang mtshan rnams rab tu thob// khyad 'phags 'ges dang de bzhin dbang phyug
nyid de yi g.yog 'khor rtag tu mi phyad bgyur// skye bo mang pos mdun du bdar bar 'ong// den gzhan la gnod pa'i sems mi skye// sems ni bdang rtag tu bag yod ldan// de la ma dang
bkaM dug dang mtshon mi tshugs// skye bo tshogs chen gyisakhalta bu r 'gyur// rab tu dga' zhing thub pa'i chos la spyod/ shes bzhin ldan nas yid bde skyed par byed// 'dzin pa med cing chags
zla mad sems dang ldan// chags med gyur nas de la mi mthunamed// de yi lus gtsang kun nas nyon mongs med// rnam dgasams ldan de ni bdenapar sku// 'jigapas nyes pa rnams la yid bde
skyod sems can rnams kyi skyabs dang dpung gnyen 'gyur// de ni bdagadon rgya chen byas nas su// gzhan 'ang sangs rgyas ye shes rdzogs pa 'god/ shing dbangashing mchog dam pa'i drung song/
nus mtshungs med mchog zhing byang chub tshang yang rgya// sangs rgyas mchod rten mar ma gcig phulan// 'di nas bzung ste srid pa'i rtse mo'i bar// sangs rgyas zhingani 'dzam gling gser gyis gang//
de 'dra'i dpalade zad par bya mi nus// bcom ldan mchod rten mar me phul byas na// de yi lus ni mdog ngan song mi 'gyur// gzugs mchogs zhing lagapa gzu ba 'dra// snang nga thob nas 'jig

07 rten kun tu rgyu// gal te rgyal ba dam par byung gyur na// de bzhin gshegs pa rnams dang nye bar 'gyur// nye dus 'gyur 'am yang na bur yang 'gyur// de ni ye shes phung po myur du thob// gal te khrag
khrig brgya stong sangs rgyas zhing// yungs 'bu dag gis byung bur gang gyur pa// bgrang ba dang ni gzhal zhing rjod par nus/ bde gshegs mar ma gcig phul de lta min// sas rgyas rnam pa mtshus med spyi
pa'i gnas// spyod pa mchog sbyang khyad par brnyes gyur ba// mi mchog de la mchod pa 'di'i byas pa// rnam par smin pa dam pa gzhal yas 'gyur// gal te mi mjed 'jig rten khams 'di na//
nor bu rin chen po chus gang ba// zad par byanus sangs rgyas mchod rten la// mar mgacig phul dpal de zad mi 'gyur// ka sha pa Nas mi mjed 'jig rten khams// 'og nas srid pa'i rtse mo
bar gang ba// zed par bya nus sas rgyas mchod rten la// mar mgacig yul dpal de phrad mi 'gyur// sangs rgyas zhing stong de dag tsan dan gyis// chog nas srid pa'i rtse mo bar gang ba// khyad par
bya nus sangs rgyas mchod rten la// mar ma gcig phul dpal de cad mi 'gyur// tshangs pa'i 'jig rten yod pa'i lha ras kyi// gos kyis sangs rgyas zhing stong gang gyur pa// zad par bya nus sangs
rgyasamachod rten la// mar ma gcig phul dang la de zad mi 'gyur// klu dang lha min mi dang lto 'phye che// lha yi lha rdzas nor bu ni chen mang// zad par bya nus sangs rgyasamachod rten la// mar
@#// ma gcig phul dpal de zad ma 'gyur/ lha yi 'jig rten yod pa'i lha yisos// de dag mi mjed 'di kun gong gyur ba// zad par bya nus sangs rgyas mchod rten la/ ma
lam gcig phul dang lade zung mi 'gyur// khyogs dang phyogasamatshams tshad min par nus/ ma mkha'i khams 'di'i tshad kyang shes par nus// sangs rgyas mchod rten ma mo gcig phul bas/ de
'dra'i dbal de zad par bya mi nus// sangs rgyasadam pa mi mchog bzhud pa'i// 'dren pa mtshungs pa med la da byas te// ston pa'i sku la nye zer mi 'bab par// ma tog ma li ka bdugs bcos
rgyu ldan phul// des na las mdzes dam pa gus byas pas// lha dbang brgya byin du ni lan 'bum gyur// 'jig rten kun tu tshangs pa'i bdag por gyur// rgyal ba'i mchod rten la ni 'bum phul nas/ 'khor
los sgyur ba'i rgyal po stobs ldan gyur// stong phrag bcu la dbang bar nga gyur te// nor chen rab tu mdzod mang tshong dpon gyur// khyim bdag blo ldan bsod nams ldan par gyur// bde gshegs mi/
mchog bya ba le'u dag/ sa ni mnyes byas gzimasachan bza' yis// mi mchog dag la bla mar brnyastang byas// de dag gtsug lag khang la sos kyis bskus// nga yi kha dog dpa kun med gyur//
san tsha dang grang dngangal ba spangs// sas rgyas spyan sngar dam medasemasagyur cing// de dgamachod pa dam pa mchog gis mchod// rgyan gyis brgyan pa'i gdugs mdzes blta sdug pa// su zhig/
bcom ldan mchod rten 'bul byed pa/ de 'dir lus mtshungs bamed 'gyur te// sum cu rtsa gnyis mtshan gyis go char 'gyur/ gangags rgyal ba'i sku ni re ba 'bar zhing// khyad par 'phags
pa'i gzugs dang sems badra dang// 'dzam gling gsar ltar 'bamadzes ldan sdug/ mtshan gyis me tog rgyas bsamangon tu gang// mngon nga rasab thob cing dbang cher grags/ byang
chub spyod mchog dam pa zhi ba spyod// de ni mas kyang longs spyod 'grib mi 'gyur/ lhas kyang bsti stang bya zhing mchod par 'ong// brtan pa 'dod pa'i longs spyod gshar mi dka'// tshul khrim
rnamag khab mkhas tshangs bar spyod// yi dam bcas nas nags dang nags 'dab song// mngon shes thob cing khyad par thob pa 'gyur// bcom ldan mchod rten rnams la gdugs 'bul ba// ji
lta bu r yang byang chub sems mi 'da'o// byams la gnas shing mi dman sems su 'gyug/ de yi shes pa rnams kyang nyams med// la mo'i sgra yis ni mchog mchod byas na// mya ngan med
cing dbang ldan rgyal por 'ong// mi ya'ag rten ya nga 'ong sgra ldan 'gyur// de sgra yan lag tshang zhing dag par song// bcom ldan mchod rten rol mo'i sgra byas// shes bzhin ldan zhing
mig ni rnam dag 'gyur/ rna ba rnam par dag cing sems kyang dgag/ sa yi dbang po mchog dang ldan par 'gyur// de yi rtse na ba mdzes blta na sdug/ thob mar gnyan mdzes shing sgra
yid 'ong// dbas na lha yis ban chen bya ru 'dra// sgra skad ma lag bye ba dpag med 'byin// bcom ldan mchod rten rol mo'i sgra byas n// nams kyang sbrul du mi 'gyur
lce mang ma// gzhar ba skur bo ya yo can mi 'gyur// lus ni khyad par 'phags shingashin tu mdzes// bcom ldan mchod rtan lo mo'i sgra byas na// lha 'am klu bas mi 'am lto 'phye che//
su yang de la ma dad skye mi 'gyur// dbugs phyin thob nas 'jig rten kun du rgyu// bcom ldan mchod rtan 'ol mo'i sgra byas na// de ni mning za mar gzhar mi 'gyur/ nams kyang mdze dang
shabakra mi 'byung zhing// bsngags bar 'os pa'i lus ni thob par 'gyur// bcom ldan mchod rten rol mo'i sgra byas n// lce 'ang 'gyur zhing lus kyang bar 'gyur// gser gyi gzugs
ltar kha dog 'bar bar 'ong// ting 'dzini brtan zhingashinatu rtogs par 'gyur// bcom ldan mchod rtan rol mo'i sgra byas n// lhan ng padag po 'gyur shing dbang phyug 'gyur// mi yi 'jig
rten skyes na dga' bar 'ong// brtson 'grus ldan zhing bag yod 'bar bar 'gyur// bcom ldagamachod rten rol mo'i sgra byas na// rdo lasu yAng yid mi bde mi skyed/ de lasu yang tshig rtsub skye ba
mad phra ma thams cad sbas shing yang dag sna/ bsod nams 'dod pa su zhig phyags thogs to// bcom ldan mchod rten gus pas 'phyag byed pa// den smad cing mi gtsang lus m 'gyur/ dab
spu khung nas tsan dan dri ngad 'byung// bcom ldan myan 'jug pa'i mchod rten phyags// bskal pa bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong du// yan lagam snyad khyad 'phags lus thob cing// mdzes la mtshan gyis
gom ra byas par 'gyur// bcom ldan mya ngan 'dasapa'i mchod rten phyags// lha yi tsan dan khyad 'phags rab mdzes pa// gzhal med khang mchog yid 'ong dri ldan thob// de de la gzhar yang srid/
mi skyod/ 'bcom ldan m zhu bas pa'i mchod rten phyogs// yid 'ong dri ldan mchog tu bltasdug pa'i/ lha yi bu mo bya ba sto 'thob cing// den de la nams kyang chags mi skyong// bcom
ldan mya ngan 'das pa'i mchod rten phyogs/ bskyodachos tshalamchog yod pa'idzing bu// yan lag brgyad ldan chugatsang mdzes gyur pa// ma tog ut+pa las ni rgyas pa thob// bcom ldan mya ngan
khas mchod rten phyags// de yi g.yog 'khor rtag tu mthun 'gyur zhing// me dman sems can lha yi sgra yang thos// lha mo rnams kyi glu dbyangs snyan sgra thob// bcom ldan mya ngan 'das pa mchod
rtan phyags// 'jig rten kun du skyes tshe bdag nyid kyis// 'dinas shi bcos ngan 'gror ma 'gro zhing// mi yi 'jig rten sangs rgyas mthong ba'i shes/ bcom ldan mya ngan 'das pa'i mchod rten phyags//
de na lha la snyan pa'i gtam byas te// sas rgyas ye shes rdzogs la lha bkodanas// shiba'i dus byas 'dzam bu'i gling du skye/ bcom ldan mya ngan 'das pa'i mchod rten phyags/ btsas ma thag
tu bskal pa mtha' yas dran// sngon gyisangs rgyas gtso rnams bkur bdang// de dgamtshanadang yon tan chos kyang dran/ 'jig rten sas rgyas ji ltar 'gyur zhes te// chos pa
bskyod nas mchod rten rtswa skyes sel// de yi phan yon de dag ngas bshad kyis// tha ba drisol dang ba'i sems kyis nyon// mthu chen skyes bu dam pa khyad 'phags pa// rgyal ba dam pa ma 'ongs dus
@# namathong// de dag mchod pa dam na chogagis mchod// de ni gzhagasang dad pa dam pa thob// sangs rgyas stobs bcu ded pon des mthong nas// 'dren pa mtshungs pa med pa mchod pa byed//
mtshan gyis go char byas pa'i sangs rgyas su// bgyur zhes thugs dgyes de drag lung yang ston// grong khyer yas pa nyams dga' mchog gnas shing// nga chos ston gang gis mthong gyur pa// de
[”]dag phyi dus rab tu 'jigs pa'i// rgyal mchogamya ngan 'das pa'i chos 'dzin 'gyur/ mchod rten rtsa skyes sel bar byed pa na// rgyal ba dam bu mi thul mthong 'dod pa'i// rgyu dang sa bon bgyur ba/
sma 'di yin no// 'dod dang dam la dang dud 'gro'i skye gnas song// byang chub sems dang ba gang gis mdo mchog 'di// phyim rab 'jig dusan 'dzin byed pa// de ni 'jig rtenasangs rgyas lha yi lha/
bsod nams khyad 'phags mtshungs mod zhing du 'gyur// 'di bshad tshon gang dag 'dir mchod dang// tshul 'di bshadapa gang dag thos pa dang// gang dgamado mchog 'din 'dir bzung ba// de dag
btsan/ phyi ma'i dus na bsi 'di 'dzin// gang dag phyin chad mdo mchog 'di 'dzin pa// de dag rtag tung dang mthun pa'i sras// sas rgyas bye bas de dag bsngags brjod kyang// de dag bsngags pamathar ni/
phyin mi 'gyur// gang dgaphyi dus rgyalaba'i chos 'dzin pa// sangs rgyas bye ba khrag khrig brgya mtha' yas// bskal pa byeda' bzhugs te de dgagis// bsngags pa brjod kyang mtha'amar thun minus//

dri zhim yide 'ong spos kyis chogabazhin// sangs rgyas mchod rten la ni su skud pa// de ni thob red 'jig rten kun tu rgyu/ de nas 'di'i snying po blangs bar 'gyur// rgyal ba'i mchod rten sngos byugaphul
byas na// bcom ldan 'das kyi bstan pa 'jig 'gyur tshe// 'dzam bu'i gling du skye bar mi 'gyur zhing// de ni nga tshomatho si bdag por 'gyur// rgyal ba'i mchod rten pos byug phul byas n/ 'drim

zhim dang mi gtsang smad pa rnams // rtag tu spong zhing tshul khrims phung po gnas// deni rtag tu tshangs spyod mchog 'di'i spyod// rgyal ba'i mchod rten thos byug phul byas na// 'di nas shi 'phos mtho

sa lha dbang 'gyug/ bani por mi thogs don stong rnams la rtog/ lha rnams la ni rgyu chen don kyang byed// rgyal ba'i mchod rten sos byug khul byas na// gang gi tshon me ya'ajig rten na// zhe sdang med
sams 'jam zhing mnyen 'gyur ba// de tshe den 'dzam bu'i gling du gnas// rgyal ba'i mchod rten sbos byug phul byas na// khyad 'phags galdan rgyudabyangs yid 'ong 'gyur// skye bo mang po yid 'od
dga' zhing bkur// de yi ba bzhin rtag tu gsal bar 'gyur// rgyal ba'i mchod rten sngos byag phul byas na// de ni ngan song sa rnams ma lus spong/ de bzhin gshegs dang
nye bar thob par 'gyur// dad pa thob cing rtag tu bde la dga'// rgyal ba'i mchod rten sngos byug phul byas n// rgyal bo stobs ldan 'khor los sgyur kun gas// blon po tshong dpon khyim bdag bsod
rnams ldan// chos rje bod mdzad sangs rgyas su yang gyur// dga' ba'i sems kyis mgu baTishugs bskyed de// bcom ldan mchod rten nor bu'i dra 'khu de ni rgyal po mtshan gyi go da na/
mthu che bla ma 'khor los sgyur bar bgyur/ blta 'os mtshan gyi go cha ldan gyur nas// gzhal med khang chen rab mdzes blta sdug pa// kha dog sna tshogs gamed ldan pa dang/ zhe chen khang bzangs che
bos dag pa thob// rgyal po'i pho brang khyad par 'phags gyur pa// skyes pa bud med dag gis gang ba dang// mnyam zhing legs byas r mdzes blta sdug pa/ rlabs sna tshogs bde byed 'jub thob//
rgyal mtshan ba dan gsa' bas mdzes byas shing// gdugs rjes nyin tu mdzes la blta sdug dang// mu tig dra ba sdong ba de 'dra ba'i// rgya srid yon takhyadar[2]]sa kun ngatho'o// de la su lan
kha 5nor NaM k+kA byed// thos rku la/yo ldan s yo can pa ka[']'gyur/ bse ru sa can rgya chen blo mchog ldan pa dang// nganad+yed byams sems ldan pa na la// shi'os bag yod de ni lhan
[j]/'gro ste// dkar nag gang yin bdag cig ji ltar gnas// 'di nas shi 'phos ji ltar[… ]ny+tsanas// blo ldan de ni mtho ris 'di gnas 'gyur// sangs rgyas sbyin ganas mur du mthong 'gyur te//

mthong nas mchod cing mtshungs med bsti stang byed// sangs rgyas mthong nas byang chub mos skyed cing// rdul brala rnams la phyir zhing bsti stang byed// ye shes mtha' yasaM ldan dang mthu chen 'gyur//
khyad pas gnas 'phags pa'i sems can 'gyur// bcom ldan 'das 'a dad pa'i sems bskyed nas// 'di 'dra'idang 'a 'di phyir zhing myong bar 'gyur// nga yi bya nga 'di nangodapa/ra ngas
brjod 'di la the tsomam spyod cig/ sangs rgyas dka' sbyangs mnar med 'gror 'gyu zhing// phyin chad sdug bsngal nyon mongs gyur ta re// 'jig rten sgronAmamatshungs med bsod nams zhing
de yi mchod rtenab rgya su sal ba// bag yod gyur nas de ni bdud brgya 'dral// dus rnams kun tu ngan song sa yang spong// rtag tu sangs rgyas rdul bral bsti stang byed// rtag tu stobs ldan
lo sgyur bar 'gyur// mi yi 'jig rten skyesan bsod nams ldan// rgyal po kun gyis mchod pa'i gnas su 'gyur// lha nang lha yi dbang bo mchod gnas 'gyur// der ni myur du lha yi tsho dang lo
dang lo ldan gsar gyi gzhal med khangapared/ lha yibadeb mtshungs med dbang phyug nyid// gzugs dang sgra dang dri rab ro mchogadang// reg bya dpal ldan lha yi 'jigarten thob// mthu chen ldan don
blta bar 'os su 'gyur// lha mo rnamasal 'dod pa'i srid ye skyid// bcom ldan machodarten brgya gsal byas n// 'di nas shi 'phos mi yi 'jig rje na 'gro// yan 'a
gnas khyad par 'gro bar 'gyur/ nam yang bstan bcos ma nyungamang po thog/ bcom ldan machod rten brgya bsal byas na// de ni mi khom brgyad po kun spong zhing// de ni dal 'gyur de bzhin khyadapar
'phags// de ni sangs rgyas mtshungasamed mchod pa byed// bcom ldan mchod rten brgyabs la byas// bag yod blo gros brtan la nga 'a bor 'gyur// 'dod pa'i yon tan dag la dga' mi skye/
mi dman sems kyis mngon par 'byang bar 'gyur// bcom ldan mchod rten brgya bsal byas na// de ni nams kyang byang chub sems mi 'dor// tshul khrims skyon med shin tu bsdamasapar 'gyur[/]rnam
dag 'dod chags bral ba'i chos kyang thob// bcom ldan mchod rten brgya bsal byas na// de yi mdog na rdzun rgyur/ kun tu song// 'cha' pa'i nyag rab na lus rnam par spong// shes paNats+tshA
chen grub nas spyod la gnas// bcom ldan mchod rten brgya bsal byas na// kha zas gtsang ma dag kyang red 'gyur 'ag khyad 'phags kha ton ldan zhing blta sdug la// de gdang ldan zhing rab mdzos gos
rnams thog/ dad pa shugs bskyed bcom ldan mchod rten la// me tog skam po nyal nyale kas byas na// 'do pa snyad pa sdug bsngal byed pa song// stob sa btsumanga' ba'i ded dpon mnyes par//
byed mchod rten me tog nas pa su 'phyags pa// de ni mdzes shing rnam dag lus su 'gyur// skye bo mang pos mchod 'os blta 'os 'gyur: 'de la rgyal po gnod par semasam 'gyur/ bcom ldan
mchod rten dag la snga rabs nas// me tog phul ba skam po phyags byas na// ngan song sa yi las ngan thams cad gcod// byang chub sems dang 'tshul khrims phung por gnas/ mchod rten me tog nyis
pa su 'phyag da// bag yod nu na rnams dang skyon rnams spong// nad rnams dum ma lus rnam par spong// bskal pa mtha' yas rnams su dbugs phyin thob// mchod rten ma rtogs pa su 'jug pa/
spyin gnas mtshungs med sangs rgyas thob par 'ong// tshus med thob cing lha mas mchod 'os 'gyur// rnam dag lus ldan rgyan gyis brgyan par 'gyur// lha yi me tog rab mdzes mar// mtshungasamed/
patal yang su 'bul dang// mchod rten ma tog nyal nyil su 'phugang// de dag rnam smin 'dra stamchog tu gyug/ mchod rtename tog ris pasu 'phyug pa de lus dug gis mi tshungs mtshon mtshus/
me 'bar 'od 'bro phung po ches mi tshugs// nor gyi phung po kun pos brku mi 'gyur// mgu zhing rab tu dga' ba'i shugs bskyod de// bcom ldan mchod rten me tog skam phyagasan/ de yi bsod
nams bzung bar gang gyur pa// gras sum cha yang brjod bar sla ma yin// mchod rten mo rtog sa bsu 'phug pa// sum cu rtsa gnyis mtshan gyis go la 'gyur// mi yi 'jigartenanani rtag tu
@#/ dgag/ mthudang ldan zhing yang 'ong sgra skad 'byung/ mchod rten ma rtogasIs pasu 'phyog pa// chos mchog rab madzes yang dag spyod byed cing/ 'de lus rnam par dag pa chen
bo 'ong// dang por mi thogs 'jig ste sangs rgyas 'gyug 'jig rten sas rgyas 'gyur byar mo bskyod de// ston pa mchod chen thal sbyar phug tsA2ba// 'jig rten dag na bla mar bku
bya de ni mdzes shing blta na sdug par 'gyur// de ba'i rgyal srid thob nas lha klu ge/ lto 'phye ched 'a sa chu 'dung/ gi 'jig rten[8 ]na pa pAka
dudabang thob rgyal srid ston// de yi yul nasems can gangaganas pa// de kun s rgyas ye shes rdzo ga la ragong pe ningan sod sa yang rnamada' stongs// de ka rnamAn m+mon mcho[=je '']da/
bsod nams blo gros dran ldan mtsho bos 'gyur// dbugs phyin thob nas 'jig rten kun tu rgyu// de yi g.yo 'khor yid 'ong glu skad ldan// bsam pa ji bzhin de dag ka' ba skyed// soms can rnams
mi lhod zhi tshig ston// de la suyang dbang phyug med ma byed// skye bo tshogs chen dag gis palta 'os 'gyur/ de yi g.yog kyang sgra dbyang A kA pa sangs rgyas mchod rten thal spu

phyag 'tshal ba// sbyin dang snyan par sgra dang don spyod dang// don mthun ba dang skye bo mang la byed/ spyongashing brgyad kyang khro ba'i dngos mi skyod// sangs rgya mtsho rten tha' sbyar phub tsha2
mtho 'i 'jig rten gnas shigalhadabang 'gyur// mar gyur na yang ma yi rgyal po 'ong// de ni gzhar yang yos su nyams mi 'gyur// sangs rgyas nad rten thal sbyar phyag 'tshal pa// de ni
gzhar yang ngan song phyis mi lhung// 'jig rten 'di'i de rtag tu 'dod pa smos// nor cag nang naphyag rungamadzod mang 'gyur// yon tan ldan la tshig gcig su smag/ de nas rigs sngags la gzhar
mi spyod// mi 'jig rten gnas gne spyod mi 'gyur// de lasams can mi ngoms dga' bar 'gyur// yid 'ong dbyangs ldan pho brang 'khor gshegs shing// 'jig rtenamagon po sgo gtan bzhugs
pa'i tshe// su zhig shugs bskyed ma tog bas rtagator// de ni brgyan nas rgyal ba dan pa mthong// rangagi khyim du stobs bcu bsnyen bkur byed// de yi bshos gsol chos bzang ston pa mdzad//
da pa skyes nas mi mchog bstan bkur byed// gos kyang thogs te rnam par 'dren la 'bul// sangs rgyas byang chub matshus med mchog thob nas// stobs bcu ldan zhing g.yo ba med gyur la//
byang chubs pas rgyas sdug bsngal skya bo 'gro'o// 'jig rten kun tu mtshungasamed sangs rgyas shog/ de yi smon lam 'di 'dra 'di dang ni// sas rgyas ye shes desams dga' mkhyen nas// stobs
bcu'adzum mdzad 'jig rten thams cad du// mtshungs medasangs rgyas 'gyur zhes lung ston to// skyes bu dam pa mchog gi gsung thos nas// bde gshegs mchogagasung gzhan du mi 'gyur te//
bdagani rgyal bamchoga'agyur dogs med ces// dga' zhing mgunas bar snang kun tukyu// 'jigarten lha yi lhar gyur sangs rgyas su// khyad 'phags mtshungs med sbyin gnas
s+sa 'gyur bdang/ 'degams sbyong dang dga' bar gnas mkhyenanas// del stobs bcu mnga' bas bzhes pa rgyu// bde gshegs mchog gis gsan bzhes gnas// de na ngeshugs skyesarab dga' sogs ]
mgu ste// mtshus med 'jig rten mgon la bltas nasan// bajig rten sangs rgyas bdag 'gyur mos pa skyed// skye shi pha rol sems can bsgral bar bya// grol nas skye bo mang po 'dus byas dgrol//
'jig rten kun na 'ang ba'i dge bdag gyur// snang ba thob nas nun pa rab rib bsal/// de ltar na don dam pa 'di thos nas// me tog phreng ba rgyal mtshan gos mchog dang/ pho mo sgra dang
gdugs dang byug bdug gis// mgon po mchogal sA pa rgyas gyur bas gyis// bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsal nas// dge slong de dag dang/ blo gros rnam par dag pa la sogs
pa byang chub sems dpa' de dag dang/ lhadang/ mi dang/ lha ma yin dang ) dri bar bcas nga 'a 'jig rten pa u0f7ada rangs te// bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon par bstod do// 'phags
pa sbyan ras gzigs zhes bya ba theg pa chen po'i mdo rdzogs so///rgya gar gyi mkhan po dzan mi tra dang gshi la dang zhu chen gyi lo tsa ba ban+de ye shes sdes bsgyur [“]nga na
skad gsar chad kyis kyang bcos nas bstan la phab pa/ @#/// rgya gar skad du/ Ar+ya 'danA lo kanA ma d+hur mahA yA na sU ti/ bod skad du 'phag
bdakonamchog ta la 'a'i gzungs zhes bya ba theg pa chen ngo 'amado/ bam po dang ngo// sangs rgyas dang byang chub segs dang 'a thams cad 'o phyag 'tshal lo// 'di skad bdag gis
thos pa dus gcigan/ bcom ldan 'das rgyal bo'i khab na bya rgod kyi phung po la dge slong stong du tshang ba thams cad kyang dkar po'ichos yongs su rdzogasapa/ seng ge'i sgra chen po sgrog pa//
yengashesakyi tshogs dang gtumed pa tshol pa la mkhas pa sha stagagi dag slong gi dge 'dun chen po dang// thabs cig tu bzhugs// byang chub sems dpa'i dga' dun chen po 'di lta ste/ byang
chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po kun tu bzang po dang/ byang chub sems dang ba sems dpa'achen po lag na phyag rgya rin po che dang ! byang chub sems dang bsams dpa'achen po rtag tu brtson dang/
byang chub sems dang 'a sems dpa' chen po yon tan gyis brgyan pa dang ) byang chub sems dang bsems dpa' chen pobasod nams mtshon bsgrags dang// byang chub sems dang 'a roms dang ba chen
po blo gros chen po dang 2 byang chub sems dang 'a sems dang ba chen po yon tan bkod bdang/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dang 'chen po rdo rje'i blo gros dang/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
ki/ @#// chen po rdo rje'i snying po dang/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'achen ngod rdo rje'i 'od dang/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rdo rje'i mtshon chadang/ byang chub sems
dpa' sems dpa'achen po rdo rje'i sra ba dang/ byang chub sems dpa'/mas dang rwa chen pos 'dzin dang/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'achen po gzugs kyi blo gros dang/ byang chub sems
dpa' sems dpa' chen po don kun mthong dang/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug dang 3 byang chub soms dang bsems dang ba chen po mthuchen thob dang/
byang chub sems dpa' sems dang ba chen po blo gros brtan pa dang/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po lag na rdo rjadang ) byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'jam dpal gzhon
nur gyur pa dang/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ngan song sbyong dang/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po mya ngan dang mun pa thams cad 'joms pa dang/ byang chub sems dpa'
soms dpa' chen po rab kyi rtsal gyis rnam par gnon pa dang/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po mi len mi 'dor ba dang/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po tsan dan snying po dang/
byang chub sems dpa' sems dang 'chen po blo gros rgya mtshodang/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'byung dka' dang/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po dga' byung dang/ byang
chub sems dpa' sems dpa'achen po spyod pa'i blo gros dang 2 byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'achen po spobs pabartsegs dang 2 byang chub sems dpa' sems dang ba chen po mgyogs pa'i snying po dang
byang chub sems dpa' sem dpa' chen po byas pa dang/ de dag lasogs pa byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnam par thar pa bsam gyisami khyab pa la gnas pa/ dpa' bar 'gro ba'i ting nge 'dzin gyis
sa par byung ba/ dbyangs sgra thogs pa med pasangs rgyas kyi zhing dpag tu med pa brilakyis gnon pa la mkhas pa/ mi 'jigs pa la gnas pa// rjes su chags pa dang/ khong khro ba dang bral ba/
yude du 'ong ba'i dbyangs dang ldan pa khams gsum la ma chags pa// g.yog 'khor mi phyadapa dang ldan pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid las nges par skyes pa/ ting nge 'dzin dang/ snyoms par

'jug pa tshad med pa dang ldan ng/ re ba thams cad yongs su skong ba/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa rtogs par khong du chud pa/ lus dang ngag dang yid kyi las kyi mtha' don yod pa la mos pa// thams

cad mkhyen pa nyid la mngon par brtson pa/ ) ting nge 'dzini dang spyod pa tshad med pas byin gyis brlabs pa/ mi 'jigs pa thob pa/ stong pa nyid kyi spyod yul ba/ mtshan ma med pa la gnas pa sha stag dang
yang thabs gcig go// de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po kun tu bzang bo zhes bya ba 'khor de nyid du 'dus par gyur te 'dug pa des ) bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bo/
phyag 'tshal nas// bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das chos kyi dbyings ji ltar rtogs par bgyi/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa )/
'ges kyi bu chos kyi dbyings na dngos po med par rtogs par bya'o// rigs kyi bu chos kyi dbyisani nam mkha' dang mtshungs pa dang/ spros pamed pa dang/ ma spros pa dang 2 blang ba med pa dang/ dor ba
mdapa dang ) dngos po med pa dang/ gnas pa med pa ste/ de ltar rtogs par bya'o/ byang chub sems dpa' kun tu bzang pos gsol pa 3 bcom ldan 'das ci lags/ chos kyi dbyings 'byung ba
a lags sam/ bcom ldan 'das kyi bka' stsal pa )'ges kyi bu chos kyi dbyangs ni 'byung ba med pa'o// rigs kyi bu chos kyi dbyis ni bsam mi khyab pa'o// dges dpu yus kyi dpangs ni dngos
po med par rtog pa ste/ das po gang du yang brjod par bya ba ma yin zhing bstan par bya ba ma yin pa// byang chub sems dpa' kun tu bzang pos gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das byang chub la rnam
pa du mas/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa rigs kyi bu byang chub kyi rnam pa ni tshad mad de/ de ni tshad dang ldan rgyud bstan par mi nus so// byang chub sems dpa' kun tu bzang pos gsol pa/
bcom ldan 'das ci lags chos kyi dbyings rnam par rtogabar bgyid dam/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ 3 rigs kyi bu chos kyi dbyings ni rnam par mi rtog go/ byang chub sems dpa'
[n/]kun tu babrang pos gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das gal te chos kyi dbyings rnam par mi rtog palags na 2 byis pa so so'i skye bo rnams ci'i slad du rtog par bgyid/ bcom ldan 'das kyi bka' stsal pa
rigs kyi bu byis pa so so'i skye bo thams cad ni rtog pa dang/ rnam par rtog pa dang/ yongs su rtog pa las byung ba'o/ nga sa dad pa kun tu rang zang pos gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das de
bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyis byang chung ba ni zab lags so/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rigs kyi bude de bzhin taM/ ji skad smras pa bzhin no// rigs kyi bu gzhan yang chos
thams cad spros pa med pan byang chub ces bya'o// de nas 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa 'khor de nyid du 'dus pa te 'dug pados/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag
'tshal te/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das kyis dkon mchog ta la la zhes bgyi ba'i gzus bshad du gsol ) bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' 2 pa/ rigs
kyi bu byang chub sems dpa' kun tu bzang po chos thams cad la thogs pa med pa'i spobs pa la gnas pa 'di la duse shig dang/ 'dis khyod la ston par 'gyur ro// de nas 'dras dpal
gzhon nur gyur pas bcom ldan 'das la mngon du phyogs te 'duganas ) sor mo bcu'i thal mo sbyar te ) bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// thams cad mkhyen cing thams cad gzigs pa/
bcom ldan 'das nyid kyis ci'i slad du mi bshad/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ ragisakyi bu gang na byang chub sems dpa' yon tan 'di lta bu dang ldan pa dag 'bod/
pa de na de bzhin gshegs brnanas btang snyoms su bzhugs so// 'jam dpal gyis gsol pa ) bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa rnams ni btang snyoms su bzhugs pa sa 'gasaso//
bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rigs kyi bu nga nisams can gyis khams yal bar 'dor ba ma yin te/ 'gos kyi bu 'on kyang byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyis 3 pa ni bstan pa tshad med
cing bstan pa bsam gyis mi khyab bo// de nas 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pas yang bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das kyis dkon mchog ta la la//
zhes bgyi ba'i bzungs bshad du gsol/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa// rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa' kun tu bzang po 'di la dris shig dang/ 'dis khyed la ston par 'gyur// de
ci'i phyogazhen/ rigs kyi bu skyes bu dam pa 'di ni ye shes kyi tshogasal gnas pa'o// 'jam dpal gyis gsol pa// gal te de bzhin gshegs pas bdag la dgongs na/ bdag gis skyes bu dam/
pa 'di'i dri bar bgyigo/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal// 'jam dpal khyod ting nge 'dzin rdul phurab kyi rdul snyad thob pa yanan/ de bzhin gshegs pa la gsol ba gdab ci dgos/ rigs
kyi bu khyod ni sangs rgyasakyi chos thams cad la skul ba dang ldan pa yin no// 'jam dbal gyis gsol pa// bcom ldan 'das bdag gis sangs rgyas kyi chos gang dag kun tubastan pa dang/ bsgoms
pa dang/ mngadu bgyis pa de thams cad ni/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i skyes bu'i mthur cig par bgyi'o// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa// rigs kyi bu legs so legs so//
khyod kyi tshig 'di legs par sbas te/ 'on kyang 'jamadapal nga khyod la gsol ba 'debs kyis khyod byang chub sems dpa' kun tu btsang po la dris shig/ de nas bcom ldan 'das
la 'am dpal gzhon nur gyur pas 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' kun tu bzang po 'di ni shin tu zab mo ston pa ste/ theg pa chen po rtogs par khong du chud
pa lags so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa// rigs kyi bu khyod kyang chos thams cad kyi dbang phyugagi rgyal po yin gyis bdag la ma srung shig/ yang 'gas kyi bu khyod ni stong pa nyid la
gnas pa/ ting nge 'dzin bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang ldan pa'o/// de nas 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur bas byang chub sems dpa' kun tu bzang po lasor mo bcu'i thal mo sbyar te phyag 'tshal
nas byang chub sems dpa' kun tu bzang po la 'di skad ces smras so/ dkye rgyal ba'i sras khyod kyis bdag la skabs phye na/ khyod la bdag yi ge 'bru gnyis shis 'dri'o/ byang chub
sems dang ba kun tu bzang bos stsas pa/ rigs kyi bu de'i dus la da bab pa shes na dris shig 'de nas 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur ngas/ byang chub
sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po kun tu bzang po la 'di skad ces smras so// kye rgyal ba'i sras sas rgyas sangs rgyas zhes bya bar gzhi'i donagang yin/ byang chub sems dpa'i

kun tu bzang pos smras pa kye rgyal ba'i sras ) sangs rgyas kyi gzhi'i don na med pa'i don to// sangs rgyas kyi gzhi'i don ni dngos po na da ba'i don to// sangs rgyus kyi gzhi'i don ni bsam gyis mi khyab

pa'i don to// sas rgyas kyi gzhi'i don ni mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa'i don to// sangs rgyas kyi gzhi'i don ni spros pa med pa'i don to// sas rgyas kyi gzhi'i don nim spros pa'i don to// sangs rgyas kyi

gzhi'i don ni blangs bamadang 'i don to// sas rgyas kyi gzhi'i don ni dor ba med pa'i don to// sangs rgyas kyi gzhi'idonan namamakha' dang mtshungs pa'i don to// sangs rgyas kyi gzhi'i don ni bstod du
spyi med pa'i don te/ gosakyi busangs rgyas kyi chos rnamasakyi rang bzhin ni de lta bu yin no/ 'jam dpal gyis smras pa/ kye rgyal ba'i sras gal te chos thams cad spros pa med pa/
yinan/ 'o na sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams zhes ji skadabastan/ byang chub sems dpa' kun tu bzang bos smras pa/ kye rgyal ba'i sras bstan pa 'di'i bstan tu mad pago/ 'jam
dpal gyis smras pa/ kye rgyal ba'i sras bstan tu med na ci zhig bstan byang chub sems dpa' kun tu bzang pos smras pa ) 'jam dang 'a bstan tu mang pan btags te bstan
to 'jam dpal gyis smras pa// kye rgyal ba'i sras btags pas cishig 'gas par byed/ byang chub semasadapa'akun tubazang pos smras pa/ ) 'jam dpal btags pas na dngos po
yang mi 'dogs/ dngos pomad pa yang mi 'dogs so// 'jam dpal gyis skyesapa// kye rgyal ba'i sras gal te btags pas dngos po mngag 'dogs/ dngos po med pa yang mi 'dogasan/
theg pa gsum po dag ji ltar bstan/ byang chub sems dpa'akun tu babrang pos smras pa/ 'jam dpal khyod chos kyi dbyings chags pa med pa la chags par ma byed/ de su'i phyi zhe na/ 'jam
dpal de bzhin gshegs pas chos thams cad ni de sa po med pa'o zhes bstan pa'i phyi'i te/ gang dngos po med pa'i phyi zhen/ phung po lngami dmigs pa'i phyir ro// 'jam dbal gyisasmas
pa byang chub spros pa dang bcas pa yin nam/ 'on te sbosapa med pa yin/ byang chub sems dpa' kun tu bzang pos smras pa/ rigs kyi bu byang chub n sbos pa dang bcas pa yang ma yin/
spros pa mdapa yang ma yin te/ 'diltar byang chub dang sbos pa dang bcas dang spros pa med pa de ni gnyis su med de gnyis su dbyer med do/ denas bcom ldan 'das kyis byang
chub sems dpa' sems dpa'achen po kun tu bzang po la/ rages kyi bu bsam gyi mi khyab pa bstan pa 'di legs so legs so zhes bya ba stego/ gtam 'di brjod pas lha dang
bcas pa'i 'jig rten 'di la rmongs par 'gyur ro// 'jam dpal gyis gsol ba/ ) bcom ldan 'das chos bstan pa 'di lta bu'i rnam pa tshal bar mi rung ngo// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal ba
'gas kyi bu de de bzhin te/ ji skad smras pabazhin no// de nas bcom ldan 'das la 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pas 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das chos thams cad batag
ba 'dis btags pa lags sum/ bcom ldan 'dasakyis bka' stsal pa// 'gas kyi bude de bzhin te ji skad smras pa bzhin no// de nas bcom ldan 'das 'a byang chub sems
dpa' kun tu bzang pos 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das rnam par dag pa'i sgo 'di'i chos par gyi dka'abalags so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rigs kyi bde de bzhin
te ji skad smras pa bzhin no// denas bcom ldan 'dasal byang chub soms dang 'a blo gros rgya mtshos 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan bdas byang chub sems dbab kun tubazangos/
rnam par dag pa'i sgo bstan pa 'di legs par smras lags so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rigs kyi bu de de bzhin te/ ji skad smras pa bzhin no// rigs kyi bugazhan la 'di'i
chos thams cad kyi rgyu mthun pa yinego/ 'di'i chos kyi 'chen po yin no// de nas re sA'achen po lta bu'i bram ze mnyam pa nyid du gnas pas 2 bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces
gsol to// bcom ldan 'das byang chub namanyamapa nyid bsam gyi mi khyab pa lags te/ de la yi ge midamigs/ tshig 'bru mi dmagasaso// bcom ldan 'das kyisabaka' stsal pa// rigs
kyi bu de de bzhinate 2 chos kyi dbyig la tshig 'bru ma snang don kyang mi snang ngo// de nas bcom ldan 'das 'jam dpal gzhonanu gyur pas 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan
'das stong pa nyid kyi rgyu mthun pa gangalags/ rnam pa gang lags rtags galags ]mtshan ma gang lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa// 'jam dpal stong

pa nyid ni brjod du med paM/ bsnyad du mdapa ste/ brjod du med pa'i chos nyid 'di la mos pagang yin pa de stong pa nyid ces bya'o/ stongapa nyid de ni yi ga mdapa ste/ de'i phyir stongapa nyid ces bya'o//

stong pa nyid de ni bsnyad du med pa ste/ de phyir stong pa nyid ces bya'o/ rigs kyi bu chos thams cad ni chos kyi ngo bo nyid kyis stong ngo// de nas bcomaldan 'das la tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i
busa'adi skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das byang chub samasadapa' bsam gyisami khyab pa'i chos la gnas pa rnams kyi rnam par 'phrulab la gzigs bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa//
tshodang ldan pa shAr dwa ti'i bu sems dang bo bskyod pa'i byang chub sems pa shes pa ni mchog yin gyi/ dgra bcomaparishes pa ni de lta ma yin no// ci'i phyir zhe na/ dgra bcom
ma bzhisangs rgyas kyi chosa rnams las 'di duganasal// byang chub sems dpa' de ni sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das su 'gyur ba'i phyi go/ de nas bcom ldan 'das la byang chub sems
la dpa' chos thams cad kyi dbang phyug gi rgyal pos 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das ji ltar bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa'i don bdag gis 'tshal ba ltar na/ nyan thos kyisan nyan
zla chos kyi chos rnams ma thob pa nyid lags so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rigs kyi bu nyan thos kyisanyan thos kyi chos rnamasam thobabani ma yin te/ 'on kyang nyan thos la byang chub sems
dpa' dang lhan cig tu dris pa lan gdab pa 'am/ spyod pa'i byin gyis brlabapa bya ba'i nus pa dang mthug la yod/ de nas bcom ldan 'das la 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pas 'di skad
mi ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das shAr dwa ti'i bu 'di nid bzhin gshegs pas shes rab dang ldan pa rnams kyi mchog tu bstan pa 'a gsan 3 bstan pa 'dagangal bstan pa lags/ bcom ldan
'das kyis bka' stsal pa// 'jam dbal ngas gang bstan pa 'dzinabastan pa modang ko// de nas 'jam dang la gzhon nu gyur pas/ gnas brtan ra dwa ti'i bu la 'di skad ces
skyasaso// gnas brtan gyis nyan thos kyi chos rnams thob bam/ smras pa de ni ma yin no// 'jam dpal gyis sbasapa/ 'o na ci khyod so so'i skya bo ga/ smras pa de ni ma yin no// 'jam dpal
gyis smas pa/ 'on khyod ci slobapa 'am/ sa paden ma yin go/ 'jam dpal gyis smras pa// 'on khyod ci shes rab dang ldan pa'i mchog yin nam/ skyes pa/ de ni ma yin no// 'jam
dpal gyis smras pa/ gal te btsun pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu soso'i skye bo yang ma yin slob pa yang ma yin/ shes rab dang ldan pa'i mchog kyang ma yinan 2 de nyid khyod dmigs pa can du 'gyur ro// shA/

ra dwa ti'i bus smras pa// rigs kyi bu lo bo ni skyes bu dam pa rgya mtsho ltar gting dpag dka' ba khyodadang 'gyod pa mi byed do// 'jam dpal gyis sbas pa/ btsun pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu khyod ni rgan rabs
thu bo mchog yin gyis/ btsun pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu de skad ma zer cig/ gnas brtan gyis smras pa/ rigs kyi bu rgas pa'i dngos po ni ci yang thob par mi 'gyur/ mngon par rtogs par mi 'gyur
'gasakyi budon de nyid shes par bya ba'i phyir khyod la dbu bya'o// rigs kyi bu 'di lta ste dper na/ rdo rje ngan don gyis kyang ra brag chen po rnam par 'jig go/ rigs kyi bu de bzhin du khyod kyi'i
khung bu gcig nashesab 'dug pa gang yin pa de ni kho bo lta bu'i sems can rdul phra rab kyi rdul snyed rnams la nod do// rigs kyi bu don nyid shes par bya ba'i phyir yang khyod 'dapa bya'o// rigs kyi
'di lta ste dang pa na/ ba glang glang po shin tu mi bzad pa chen po de yang/ mi stobs dang ldan pas lcags kyu chung dus dul bar byedado// rigs kyi bu de bzhin du khyod ni
stobs dang ldan ng/ kho bo ni nyam chung ba sta/ glang bo che chen po 'di lta bu dang kho bo 'byed ga la nug/ de nas bcom ldan 'das la gnas brtan shA ra dwa ti'i bus 'di skad ces gsol to//
bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste dper na/ mi dmus long gis shul du mchis pa 'am grong khyer mthong bar yang rngo mi thog na/ khrims khyim dumachiba'i rngo lta ga la thog sta de ni gnas ma yin no//
de bzhin du glang po che chen po 'di lta bu 'di dgagi mdun na bag ni dmus 'dong dang mtshungs par mthong sta/ sangs rgyas kyi chos 'di dgan datsam du rgya che ba lags so// bdagan sas rgyas kyi
chos rnams kyi snod du ma gyur te/ de'agyur la ngamamachis so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ shA ra dwa ti'i bu de skadam zer cig/ shA ra dwa ti'i bu 'di lta ste dper na/ de bzhin
gshegs pa'i bod kyis sems can ji snyad cig la reg [“] pa de dag thams cad sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams thob pa yin no// shA ra dwa ti'i bu de bzhin du khyod ni ting nge 'dzin mtha' las shing bsam gyis
mi khyab pa thob pa yin no// bcom ldan 'das kyis chos kyi rnam grangs 'di bshad pa na/ lha dang mi'i skyo dgu las sems can dgu khri nyis stong gis chosamangon par rtogs par gyur to/
de nas byang chub sems dpa' chos kyi blo gros byang chub sems dpa' ting nge 'dzin dkon mchog ta la la sbyor ba mtha' yas pa zhes bya ba de la snyoms par zhugs so// byang chub sems dpa' chos kyi blo
gros snyoms par zhugs ma thagatu/ phyogs bcu'i phyogs re re'i 'jig rten gyi khamasasas rgyas kyi zhing stong phrag bcu'i rdul phra rab kyi rdul snyed kyi rol nas/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das

sangs rgyas kyi zhing stong phrag bcu'i rdul phra rab kyi rdul snyad kyis zhal man pa bstan to// sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag thams cad kyang mtshan rdo rje'i snying po zhes bya b.rayathun pa sha stagago/
phyogs gcig ji lta bar phyogs bcu rnams nas kyang de bzhin te/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan bdas de dag gis de la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// chos kyi blo gros khyod de ltar byang
bsems dpa' tange nge 'ani sbyor ba mtha' yas pa la snyoms par zhugs pa legs so legs so/ dges kyi bu 'di lta ste/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa rnam par snang mdzad 'di

nyid kyi sngon gyi smon 'a ma dang/ sngon gyi byin gyis brlabs dang/ khyod nyid kyi dge ba'i rtsa bas nye bar brtan pas/ 'di lta ste/ chos thams cad bstan par bya ba dang ) sangs rgyas kyi ye shes rnam
par sbyang ba dang/ sangs rgyu kyi ye shes rnam par 'phel bar bya ba dang/ chos kyi dbyings su 'jug par bya ba dang/ sems can gyi khams rnam par dgrol bar bya ba dang/ chags pa med pa'i ye shes
la 'jug cing chud par bya ba dang/ kun tu sbyor bar bya ba dang/ skad thams carjod par bya ba dang/ thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes la 'jug par bya ba dang/ chos thams
cad la sgrib pa med par bya ba dang/ dus gsum thams cad yongs su shes pa'i chos bstan pa la 'jug par bya ba'i phyir/ phyogs bcu nas de bzhin gshegs pa sangs rgyas kyi zhing stong brag
bcu'i rdul phra rab kyi rdul snyed thams cad kyang mtshanamathun pa 'di dag thams cad khyod la byin gyis brlobakyis/ dwagasakyi bu 'di lta ste/ byang chub sems dpa' rnam par gzhag pa bcu
pa las rtsom ste/ sas rgyas kyi mthudang/ sangs rgyas kyi byin gyis brlabasakyis chos bstan pa 'di la spobs pa skyed cig/ de nas sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag
gis byang chubs mas dang ba chos kyi blo gros la thog ba med pa'i ye shes kyi snang ba dang/ sgrib pa med pa dang 3 chod pa med pa dang/ brjod pa med pa'i chos nyid dang tha dadang med pa'i ye shes
dang khan ma tho ba med pa dang/ zil gyisamanon bdang ) zhum pa med pa nga/ 'phrogs pa med pa'i chos nyid dang/ brjod pa bzang po nyi par sgrub du mdzad do// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di
ltar ting nge 'dzin 'di nyid kyi chos nyid thob pa'i phurer// de nas sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag gis phyag g.yas pa brkyang sta/ byang chub sems dpa' chos kyi blo gros kyi mgo la
ba zhug pamadzad de/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag gis byang chub sems dpa'achos kyi blo gros la regam thagatu/ de nas ting nge 'dzin de las langs nas/ byang chub sems dpa'
de dag la smras pa/ ) kyirgyal ba'i sras dang// byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi rigs 'di ni 'di lta sta/ chos kyi dbyings kyis spus pa dang namamakha'i khams kyi mthas gtugs pa sa rgya che ba'o//
kyi rgyal ba'i srasu dag 'di ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'an po rnams ni 'das pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi rigs su skye ba la/ ma byon pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan
'das rnams kyi ri gis su skye ba yin ) da ltar byung ba'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi rigs su skyo ba ma yin no/ de nas byang chub sems dpa' de dag gis/ byang chub semyu
dpa'achos kyi blo gros la 'di skad ces smras so// kye rgyal ba'i sras/ gang dag 'das pa dang/ ma byon pa dang/ daltar byung ba'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi rigs su skye ba'i byang chub sam
dba' sems dpa' chen po de dag gang yin ) gang las bsams te de skad smras/ kye rgyal ba'i sras byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi byang chub sems dpa' rnam par gzhag pa bcu po de dag gang yin
pade shodacig/ de skad ces smras b dang/ byang chub sems dpa'achos kyi blo gros kyis/ byang chub sems dang 'de dag la 'di skad ces smras so// kye rgyal ba'i sras dag/ byang chub sems
dpa' rnams kyi byang chub sems dpa' rnam par gzhag pa ni bcu po 'didegaste/ de dag na 'das pa dang/ ma byonang dang/ da ltar byung ba'i sas rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyisagasungs

pa so// gsung ngo// gsung bar 'gyur go// bcu gab na ) 'di lta ste/ sems dang po bskyed pa'i byang chub sems dpa' rnam par gzhag pa dang/ las dang po pa dang ) rnal 'byor spyod pa dang/ skye bar skyes pa//
dang sbyor ba phun sum tshogs pa dang/ bsam pa phun sum tshogs pa dang/ phyir mi ldog pa dang/ gzhon nur gyur pa dang/ rgya'atshab dang dbang bskur ba thob da 'i byang chub mas dpa' rnam par gzhag

pa'o kyi rgyal ba'isras dag/ byang chub sems dang ba rnams kyi byang chub sags dang ba rnam par gzhag pa ni bcu po de dag ste/ de dag ni 'das pa dang/ ma byon pa dang ) da ltar byung ba'i sangs rgyas bcom
ldan 'das rnams kyis gsungs so// gsung ngo// gsung bar 'gyur ro// kye rgyal ba'i sras dag/ de lasems dang po skyod pa'i byang chub sems dang 'a rnam par gzhag pa gang zhe na/ kye rgyal ba'i sras dag
'di la sems dang po skyopa'i byang chub semasadapa' ni sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams mthong ma thag tu gzugs bzangang ma/ mdzes da bam/ kha dog bzang po rgyas pa 'am/ rgya che ba 'am/ gzi/
brjid chab 'am/ rdzu 'phrulagyi rnam da ra 'phrul pa 'am/ kun rjodang 'i rnam par 'phrul pa 'am/ rjes su bstan pa'i rnam par 'phrul pa mthong ngam ) sems can sdug bsngalab dag mthongangs ) de bzhin
gshegs pa'i bsngags pa rgya cher thos na/ 'di lta ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa'i yongashes 'dodacing/ thog ma nyid du bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed do
sems bskyed ma thag tu de nyid kyis bson bar dka' ba'i gnas bcu yongs su bzung bar 'gyur te/ bcu gang zhe na/ 'di lta sta gnas dang gnas ma yin pa shes pa dang/ 'das pa dang/ ga 'os pa dang
da lta khyung ba'i ras dang/ chos gang dag de la bsab shes ba dang/ thams cad du 'gro ba'i lam shes pa dang/ khams du ma sna tshogs shes pa dang/ chos pa rnam par grol ba du ma shes pa dang/
dbang po mchog dang mchogam yin dngashesapa dang ) bsam gtan dang/ rnam par thar pa dang ) ting nge 'dzin dang/ snyoms par 'jug pa'i kun nas nyon mos pa dang/ rnam par byang ba dang ldan pa thams
cad shes pa dang/ sngon gyi gnas rjes su dran pa'i shes pa dang/ lha'i mig gi shes pa dang/ zag pa zad pa'i shes pa ste ) bsnyan par dga' ba'i gnas bcu po de dag yongasasu bzus bar 'gyur ro//
kyi rgyal ba'i sras dag 'di'i sogs dang po bskyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa' rnam par gzhag go/ kye rgyal ba'i sras dag/ sems dang po bskyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sogs dang kha
chen bo de sas rgyas mchod pa dang/ byang chub sems dpa'i bde ba'i yo byad la sbyar bar bya'o// de la 'jig rten gyi bdagapo 'gyur ba dang/ mchog tu bya ba dang/ zil gyisami non pa dang/ sangs
@#/ rgyas dpag tumed dang phrad pa dang/ rab tu zhi ba'i ting nge 'dzin la rnal 'byor tu bya ba dang/ 'khor ba'i 'khor lo rnam par bzlog pa dang/ dam pa'i chos kyi 'khor lo rab tu bskos
ba dang/ sogs can sdug bsngal ba yongs su bskyab pa yang brjod par bya'o// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di lta sams bskyed ma thag pa de nyid kyis// shas che sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad la sbyor zhing
gong du gnas gang dag thos pa'i gnas de dag la yang bdag nyid sbyor gyi gzhan gyi dring lami 'jog pa thob pa'i phyir te/ kye rgyal ba'i sras dag/ 'di ni sems dang bo bskyed pa'i byung
chub sems dbab rnam par gzhag pa'o/kya rgyalapa'i sras dag/ de la las dang popa'i byang chub sems dpa' rnam par gzhag pa gang zhen/ kye rgyal ba'i sras dag/ 'di la las dang po pa'i
byang chub sems dpa' ni sems can rnams la thog ma nyid du sems rnam pa bcu bskyod de rnam pa bcu gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ phan par bya ba'i sems dang/ bde bar bya ba'i sa nas
dang snying brtse ba'i sems dang ) gnyen pa'i semasadang/ sdug pa'i sams dang/ phan bdags pa'i sems dang/ kun tu bsrung ba'i sems dang/ snyoms pa'i sangs dang/ slob dpon
gyi sems dang/ ston pa'i sems te/ sems rnam pa bcu po 'di dag bskyed do// kye rgyal ba'i sras dag 'di ni las dang po pa'i byang chub sems dpa'o// kye rgyal ba'i sras dag
lasadang po pa'i byang chub sems dpa' de 'ang gnod pa dang ) kha ton 'a sbyor bar bya'o// mang du thos nas rab tu dban ba la sbyar bar bya'o// rab tu dben par gyur nasadage ba'ishes gnyen mngon/
bar dga' ba la sbyar bar bya'o// dga'i bshes gnyen la mngon par dga' nas bka' blo bde ba la sbyar bar bya'o/ dbaka'ablobado bar gyur nas dusangashes pa la sbyar bar bya'o// dus shes par
gyu nas mi 'jigs pa la sbyar bar bya'o// mi 'jigs par gyur nas go shes pa la sbyar bar bya'o/ don shes par gyur nas// chos kyi rjes su 'brang ba la sbyar bar bya'o// chos kyi rjes su 'brang
bar gyur nas 3 brjod pa med pa'i chos nyid la sbyar bar bya'o// rmongs nga med par gyur nas chos rnam par dgod pa la sbyar bar bya'o// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di ltar sems bskyed ma thag pa de nyid

kyis shas cher sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad la mngon par brtson par byed cing gong du gnas gang dag thos pa'iganasade dag la yang bdag nyid sbyor gyi/ gzhan gyi dring la ma 'jog pa thob pa'i phyir te/
kyi rgyal ba'i sras dag 'di ni las dang po pa'i byang chub sems dpa' rnam par gzhag pa'o/ kyi rgyal pa'i sras dag/ de la rnal 'byor spyod pa'i byang chub sems rnam par gzhag
ba gang zhen/ kye rgyal ba'i sras dag/ rnal 'byor spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa' ni dmigs pa rnam pa bcus chos rnams rtogs par byed do// bcu gang zhen ) 'di lta ste/ chos thams
cad lami rtag pa nyid du rtogs bar byed pa dang/ chos thams cad la sdug bsngal ba nyid dang/ bdag med pa nyid dang/ stong pa nyid dang/ g.yo ba med ba nyid dang/ dbugs/
'byin pa med pa nyid dang/ gnas med pa nyid dang/ rnam par rtog pa med pa nyid dang/ rtsol bamed ba nyid dang/ mngon par 'du byed pa nyid du rtogs par byed de/ chos kyi rjesasu 'brang bar gyur
ka pa'i phyir sbyor ba yang mi byed/ mi sbyor ba yang mi byed de/ kye rgyal ba'i sras dag/ 'din rnal 'byor spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa'o/ kye rgyal ba'i sras dag/ rnal 'byor spyod pa'i byang chub
sems dpa' de ni sems can gyi khams brtag pa la sbyar bar bya'o// chos kyi dbyings brtag ba la sbya byi'o/ 'jig rten gyi khams brtag pa la sbyar bar bya'o// saki'ams brtagang la sbyar bar bya'o/
chu'i khams dang/ ma'i khams dang/ rlung gi khams dang ma mkha'i khams dang/ gzugs kyi khams dang/ gzugs med pa'i khams brtag pa la sbyar bar bya'o// de ci'i phyir zhe na//
bdeltar de cheshasache chos rnams la snang ba 'dug cing gong du gnas gang dag thos pa'i gnas de dag la yang bdag nyid sbyor gyi/ gzhan gyi dring la ma 'jog pa thob pa'i phyir te/ kyargyal ba'i sras
dag/ 'di'i rnal 'byor spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa' rnam par gzhag pa'o kye rgyal ba'i sras dag/ skyo bar skyes pa'i byang chub sems dpa' rnam par gzhag pa gang zhen/ kye rgyal ba'i
sras dag/ 'dil skye bar skyes pa'i byang chub sems dpa' ni yos su sbyang ba byed pa bcus gsung rab 'phags par skyes pa yin te/ bcu gang zhen/ 'di lta ste/ chos nyid las phyi'i mi
ldog pa dang sangs rgyus la mi phyed pa'i dad pa mthar thug par 'gyur ba yongs su grub pa dang 2 chos nges pa bsags pa dang/ sams can la rnam par dpyod padang/ shingel rnam pa
dpyod pa dang/ 'jig rten la rnam par dpyod pa dang/ las la rnam par dpyod padang/ rnam pa smin pa la rnam par dpyod pa dang/ 'khor ba la rnam par dpyod pa dang/ mya ngan las
'das pa la rnam par dpyod pa ste/ yongasasu sbyong ba byed pa bcu po de dag gis de dag gis gsung rab 'phags par skyes pa yin te/ kye rgyal ba'i sras dag/ 'di'i skye bar spyod
ba'i byang chub sems dpa'o// kye rgyal ba'i sras dag/ skye bar skyes pa'i byang chub sems dpa' de ni 'das pa'i sangs rgyas kyi chos mnyam pa nyid rnam par dpyad pa la sbyar bar 'o// ma byon/

pa'isangs rgyas kyi chos mnyam pa nyid rnam par dpyad pa la sbyar bar bya'o/ da ltar byung ba'i sangs rgyas kyi chos mnyam pa nyid rnam par dpyad pa la sbyar bar bya'o// sangs rgyas thams cad kyi chos
mnyam pa nyid rnam par dpyad pa la sbyar bar bya'o/ 'das pa'i sangs rgyas kyi chos yang dag pa 'grub pa rnam par dpyadapa lasbyar bar bya'o// ma byon pa'i sas rgyas kyi chos yang dag par 'grub
pa rnam par dpyad pa la sbyar bar bya'o// da ltar byung ba'i sangs rgyas kyi chos yang dag par 'grul ba rnam par dpyod pa la sbyar bar bya'o// sangs rgyas thams cad kyi chos/
yang dag par 'grub pa rnam par spyad pa la sbyar bar bya'o// 'das pa'i sangs rgyas kyi chos yongs su 'grub pa mnyam pa nyid rnam par dpyad pa la sbyar bar bya'o// ma byon pa'i sangs rgyasakyi
sa yongs su grub pa mnyam pa nyid rnam pa'i dpyad pa la sbyar bar bya'o// da ltar byung ba'i sangs rgyus kyi chos yongs su 'grub ba mnyam pa nyid rnam par dpyad pa la sbyar bar bya'o// sangs
rgyas thams cad kyi chos yongs su 'grub pa mnyam pa nyid rnam par dpyad pa la sbyar bar bya'o// de ci'i phyir zhen/ 'diltar de de rishas cher dus gsum mnyam pa nyid du rtogs par byed cing
gong du gnas gangadag thos pa'i gnas de dag la yang bdag nyid sbyor gyi gzhan gyi dri la mi 'jog pa thob pa'i phyir tu/ kyi rgyal ba'i srasadog/ 'di ni rgyab skyas pa'i byang chubs mas
dpa' ma dar gzhag pa'o// kye rgyal ba'i sras dag/ de la sbyor ba phun sum tshogs pa'i byang chub samasadapa' rnam par gzhag pa gang zhen/ kyargya'aba'asus dag/ 'di la sbyor ba phun sum tshogs
ba'i byang chub sems dpa' na gaba'i las ka gang ci rtsom yang de thams cad sems ru thams cad yongs su bskyab ba dang/ sams can thams cad la phan par 'dod par bya ba dang/ soms can thams cad
la bde bar sbyar bdang sems can thams cad la snying brtsabar bya ba dang/ sems can thams cad rab tu thar bar bya bdang sems can thams cad 'du gnod pa med pa la bya ba dang/ sems can thams cad
drang bar bya ba dang/ semasacan thams cad dad pa'i bya ba dang ) sems can thams cad gdul ba'i bya ba dang/ sems can thams cad yongasasu mu na las bzla ba'i phyi'i rtsom ste/ kyi
rgyal ba'i sras dag 'di'i sbyor ba phun sum tshogs pa'i byang chub sems dpa'o// kye rgyal ba'i srasadag/ sbyor ba phun sum tshogs pa'i byung chub sems dpa' de 'a gnas bcu lang dug sa brjod par
bya sta bcu gang zhen/ 'dilta sta/ sems can mthun las pa dang/ sogs can dpag tu med pa dang/ sems can grangs med pa dang/ sems can bsam gyis mi khyab pa nga/ sams tsamatshungs/
pa med pa dang/ sems can gzhal du med pa dang/ sems can stong pa nyid dang/ sems can g.yo ba med pa nyid dang/ sems can med pa nyid dang/ sems canarang bzhin med pa nyid do// de ci'i phyir

yin/'diltar de shas mngon da ra zhen pa med pa la sems 'jog cing gong du gnas gang dag thos pa'i gnas de dag la yang bdag nyid sbyor gyi gzhan gyi dring la mi 'jog pa thob pa'i phyir te ) kyirgyal ba'i
sras dag/ 'din sbyor ba phun sum tshogs pa'i byang chub sems dpa' rnam par gzhag pa'o/ kye rgyal ba'i srasadag/ de la bsam pa phun sum tshogs pa'i byang chub sems dpa'arnam par gzhag pa'ong
@#// rtenakyi rgyal ba'i sras dag/ 'di'i bsam pa phun sum tshogs pa'i byang chub sems dpa' ni chos bcu thob pan/ sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams la bsam padres pa yin te/ bcu
gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ sangs rgyas kyi bsngags ba bam ) bsngags pa ma yin pa 'chad kyang rung sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams la bsam pa des nga ni/ chos kyi bsngags pa 'am/
'khaM/ bsngags pa ma yin pa 'chad kyang nang/ byang chub sems dang ba rnams kyi bsngags pa ma/ bsngags pa ma yin pa 'chad kyang rung sta/ sangs rgyasakyi chos rnams la bsam pa nges pa yin/ byang
chub sems dang baspyod nga 'i bsngags pa 'an/ bsngags pa ma yin pa 'chad kyang rung ste/ sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams la bsam pas nga yin/ sams can gyi khams chung zhes 'chad pa 'am/ semA
can gyi khams rgya che'o na 'am/ sems can gyi khams kun nas nyon mongs ba cazhe 'am/ sems can gyi khams kun nas nyon mongs pa canam yin zhe na/ sems can gyi khams gdul bya the ma/
sems can gyi khams gdul dkazhe 'am/ chos kyi dbyings chung zhe 'am/ chos kyi dbyis rgya che zhebam/ 'jig rten gyi khams dag 'jigatse'am/ mi'ajig rtse 'am/ chos kyi dbyings yod ce
'am/ chos kyi dbyings med ces 'chad kyang rung ste/ sas rgyas kyi chos rnams la bsam panges pa yin te/ kye rgyal ba'i sras dag 'di ni bsam pa phun sum tshogs pa'i byang chub sems dpa'o// kye rgyal
ba bsras dag/ bsam da phun sum tshogs pa'i byang chub sems dpa' de la chos kyi rjes su 'jug pa bcu yang dag par brjod bag bya ste/ bcu gang zhen/ 'di lta ste/ chos thams cad

mtshan ma med pa nyid du yang dag par brjod par bya ba dang/ chos thams cad mtshan nyid med pa nyid dang ) das pomad pa nyid dang/ chad pa nyid dang/ brdzun pa nyid dang ) dgon pa nyid dang/ ngo bo nyang mang/

pa nyid dang/ skyam lta bu nyid dang/ rmi lam lta bu nyid dang/ rnam par rtog pa med pa nyid du yang dag par brjod par bya'o// de ci'i phyir zhen/ 'di ltar de mi 'phrogs pa'i phyir shas cher lhags pa'i
bsam pa rnam por 'phel ba'i chos can du gyur cing ) gong du gnas gang dag thos pa'i gnas de dag la yang bdag nyid sbyor gyi/ gzhan gyi dring la mi 'jog pa thob pa'i phyir te/ kyi rgyal
ba'i sras dag/ 'dinungasam pa phun sum tshogs pa'i byang chub sems dpa' rnam par gzhag pa'o// kye rgyabracigus dag de la phyir mi ldog pa'i byang chub sems dpa' rnam par gzhag pa gang zhen/
kyi rgyal ba'i sras dog/ 'di la phyir mi ldog pa'i byang chub sems dang ba ni dmigs pa bcu thos na sas rgyas kyi chos rnams las phyir mi ldog ste/ bcu gabazhe na/ 'a di lta ste/

sangs rgyas yod do zhe 'ag/ med de zhes thos kyang sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams las phyir mi ldog pa dang/ chos yod do 'am med do zhes bya ba dang/ byang chub sems dpa' yod do zhi 'am med do zhes bya ba dang
pa/ @#// byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa yod do zhe 'am med do zhes bya bad nga/ byang chub sems dpa' byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa la nges pa 'byung ngozhi 'am nges par mi 'byung ngo zhes bya ba
dang/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgu 'das so zhe 'am ma 'das so zhes bya ba dang/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgam byon to zhi'amamabyon pa ma yin no zhes bya ba dang/ de bzhin gshegs po dag de ltar byung ba'o

dang/ zhe'am da ltar byung ba ma yin nozhes bya ba dang/ sangs rgyas kyi ye shes zad don las mi zad do zhes bya ba dang/ dus gsum po dag mtshan nyid gcig ces sam mtshan nyid gcig pa ma yin no zhes thos kyang
sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams las phyir mi ldog paste/ kye rgyal ba'i sras dag 'di'i phyir mi ldog pa'i byang chub sems dpa'o// kye rgyal ba'i sras dag/ phyir mi ldog pa'i byang chub
sems dang ba de la chos kyi rgyun bcu yang dag par brjod par bya ste/ bcu gapanan/ 'di lta ste/ chos thams cad gcig ba nyid dang/ tha dad pa nyid du yang dag par brjod par bya'o// mang ba dang
gcig pa nyid dang/ yi go la don sgro btags pa da 2 don la yi ge slobatags pa dang/ dngos pos dngos po med pa sgro btags pa dang/ dngos po mad pas dngos po sgro btags pa dang ) mtshan/
mtshan ma med pa sgro btags po dang/ mtshan ma med bas mtshanamasgro btags pa dang/ mtshan nyid kyis mtshan nyid med pa sgrobatags pa nga/ mtshan nyid med pamtshan nyid sgro btags pa yang dag par bdo

par bya'o// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di ltar de shas cher chos thams cad la mkhas pa yongs su smin pa'i tshul la nges par byung shing ) gong du gnas gang dag thos pa'i gnas de dag la yang bdag nyid sbyor gyi/
gzhan gyi drang lami 'jog pa thobapa'i 'i te/ kye rgyal ba'i sras dag/ 'di ni phyir mi ldog pa'i byang chub sems dpa' rnam par gzhag pa'o// kye rgyal ba'i sras dag/ del gzhon nur gyur pa'i byung
chub sems dpa' rnam par gzhag pa gang zhe na ) kyi rgyal ba'i sras dag/'dir gzhon nur gyur pa'i byang chub sags dang 'ani chos rtogs pa bcu dang ldan pa yin te/ bcu gang zhe na/
'di lta ste/ lus kyi las 'bras bu yodapa dang ldan pa yin/ ngag gi las 'bras bu yod ba dang ldan pa yin/ yid kyi sa 'bras bu yod pa dang ldan pa yin/ sems bskyed pa tsam gyis skye ba
mngon pa la bsgrub pa yin/ sems can gzhan dang gang zag gzhan rnams kyi bsam pa shes par byed cing mos pa la rtog pa yin ) sems can gyi khams tha dad pa rab tu shes pa yin/ da
pa khams thad par b tu shes pa yin/ gzugs kyi khams tha dad pa rab tu shes pa yin/ gzugs mang pa'i khams thadadang rab tu shesapa yin/ dus ji lta ba bzhin du 'gro ba'i phyir mngon
par shes pa myur ba yin te/ kye rgyal ba'i sras dag 'di'i gzhon nur gyur pa'i byang chub sems dpa'o/ kyi rgyalaba'i sras dag/ gzhon nur gyur pa'i byang chub sems dpa'
( de la chos mngon par bsgrub pa bcu yang dag par brjod par bya sta/ bcu gang zhen/ 'dilta sta/ sangs rgyasakyi zhing yongs su shes pa dang/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing rab tu

g.yo bar bya ba dang/ sas rgyas kyi shing byin gyis brlabapa dang 2 sangs rgyas kyi zhing rnam par dpyad pa dang/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing du 'gro ba dang/ 'jig rten gyi khams grangs med par 'gro ba dang

s+sa dri ba gras med ba dri ba dang/ yid kyi lus mngon par sgrub pa dang 2 sku skad la sbyor ba tshad med pa dang de sams bskyed dus sangs rgyas kyi zhing grasamed pa yongs su 'grub pa yang dag par brjod/

par bya'o// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di ltar shas cher mngon par sgrub ba tshabs pa la sbyor zhing/ gong du gnas gang dag thos pa'i gnas de dag la yang bdag nyid sbyor gyi gzhan gyi dring la mi 'jog pa//
thob pa'i phyir te/ kye rgyal bsus dag/ bdin gzhon nur gyurab se byang chub sems dpa' rnam par gzhag nga 'o// kya rgyalaba'i sras dag/ de la rgyal tshab kyi byang chub sems dang ba rnam par
gi gzhag pa gang zhe na/ kye rgyal ba'i sas dag/ 'di la rgyal tshab kyi byang chub soms dpa' ni chos rtogs par bya ba bcu la mkhas pa yin te/ bcu gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ sems can gyi skye ba rtogs/
par bya ba la mkhas pa yin/ nyon mongs pa rgyu ba rtogs par bya ba la mkhas pa yin/ bag chags kyi mtshams sbyor ba rtogs par bya ba la mkhas pa yin/ spyod yul la sbyor ba rtogs par bya
ba la mkhas pa yin/ chos nyid rtogs par bya ba'amakhas pa yin/ nye bar spyad pa rtogs par bya ba la mkhas pa yin/ 'jig rten gyi mkhas pa rnam par dbye ba rtogs par bya ba la mkhas
pa yin/ sngon gyi mtha' dang phyi ma' mtha'adang/ daltar byung pa shes pa rtogs par bya ba la mkhas pa yin/ kun rdzob kyi bden pa la nges par rtogs pa rtogs par bya ba la mkhas pa yin/
don dam pa'i bden pa rtogs par bya ba 'a mkhas pa yin te/ kyi rgyal ba'i sras dag/ de ni rgyal tshab kyi byang chub sems dpaso// kyargyal ba'i sras dag/ rgyal tshab kyi byang chub sems dang 'a de
la gnas bcu yang dag par brjod par bya ste/ bcu gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ rgyal po'i tho brang 'khor la mkhas pa 5dang dag par brjod par bya'o// rgyal po'i pho brang 'khor du kun tu spyang pa dang/
rgyal po'i pho bra'akhor du 'jugapa dang/ rgyal po'i pho brang 'khor du rnam par dpyad pa dang/ chos kyi rgyal bo'i dbang bskur ba dang/ chos kyi rgyal po'i byin gyis brlabs dang/ chos kyi rgyal
po'i pha rol gnon pa dang/ chos kyi rgyal po'i gnas dang/ chos kyi rgyal po'i bka' lung yang dag par brjod par bya'o// de ci'i phyir zhe na 'di ltar de sams shas cher chos thams cad la
sgrib bamed par bsgrub la 'jug cing gong du gnas gang dag thos pa'i gnas de dag la yang bdag nyid bsgrubakyi gzhan gyi dring la mi 'jog pa thob pa'i phyir to/ kye rgyal ba'i sras dag/ 'di ni
bka) @##// rgyal tshab kyi byang chub sems dpa'i rnam par gzhag pa'o// kye rgyal ba'i sras dag/ 'di la dbang bskur ba thob pa'i byang chub sems dpa' rnam par
gzhag pa gang zhe na/ kye rgyal ba'i sras dag/ 'di la dbang bskur ba thob pa'i byang chub sems dad 'ani/ shes pa mngon par sgrub pa bcu dang ldan pa yin te/ bcu gang zhe na/ 'ad lta ste/
'jig rten gyi khams grangs med pa rab tu g.yo bar byed pa mang ba yinaM 'jig rten gyis khams grangs med pa byin gyis brlob pa mang ba yin/ 'jig rten gyi khams grangs med pa sems gcig gis
'da' bar byed pa mang ba yane/ 'jig rten gyi khams grangs med pa yongs su sbyar ba byed pa mang ba yin/ sems can grangs med pa'i sems gcig gis rnam par rig par byed pa mang ba yin/
'jig rten gyi khams grangs med pa la rnam par lta ba mang ba yin/ sems can grangs med pa'i sams kyi spyod pa bsam gcig gis rnam par dpyod pa la mkhas pa yin/ sems can gros
med pa'i dbang po sams gcigags rtogs par byed pa la mkhas pa yin/ sems can grangs med pa 'dul ba 'a mkhas pa yin/ sems can grangs med pa rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa
kyi sems la 'dzad pa lamakhas pa yin no// kye rgyal ba'i sras dag/ rgyal tshab kyis la gnas pa'i byang chub sems dba' man can gang gis kyang dbang bskur ba thob pa'i byang chub sems dang 'a
de'i lus kyi lasas par mi nus ngagagi las shes par mi nus/ yid kyi las shes par mi nus/ rdzu 'phrul shes par mi nus ) rdzu 'phrul la rnam par lta ba shes par mi nus/ 'das pa de
dus la rnam par lta ba shes par mi nus zhing mngon par 'du byed nga shes par mi nus/ blos rnam par lta ba shes par mi nus ) semasakyi yul shes par mi nus/ ye shes kyi spyod yulangashes
ra mi nus te/ kye rgyal ba'i sras dag/ 'di'i dbang bskur ba thob pa'i byang chub sems dpa'o// kye rgyal ba'isras dag dbang bskur ba thong ba'i byang chub sems dpa' de lasas rgyas bcom
ldan 'das dag gnas bcu yang dag par brjod par mdzad de/ bcu gang zhe na/ 'dilta ste/ dus gsum shes pa dang/ sangs rgyas kyi chos shes pa dang/ chos kyi dbyangs
dbyer med pa shes pa dang/ chos kyi dbyings mtha' dang dbung med pa dang/ 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad rgyas par dgang ba dang/ 'jigarten gyi khams thams cad snang bar byed pa dang/
'jig rten gyi khams thams cad byin gyis brlab pa dang/ sems can thams cad yongs su shes pa dang/ chos thams cad mngon par shes pa dang/ sangs rgyas kyi lashes mtha' yas pa brjod
par mdzad do// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di ltar de ni shas cher thams cad mkhyen pa nyid la sems 'jug pa'i phyir te/ kye rgyal ba'i sras dag 'di'i dbang bskur ba thob pa'i byang chub sems dpa'
[© ]rnam par gzhag pa'o// byang chub sems dang 'a chos kyi blo gros kyis/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi byang chub sems dpa' rnam par gzhag ba
bcu bshad ma thag tu/ de nas de'i tshe sangs rgyas kyi mthus phyogs bcu phyogs re rer yang sangs rgyas kyi zhing stong phrag bcu'i rdul phra rab kyi rdul snyad kyi 'jig rten gyi khams nam/
badrug tu ga yos ) rab tug yos/ kun turab tu g.yos so// 'gul rab tu 'gul kun tu btu 'gulato// ldeg/ rab tu ldegaM kun tu rab tu ldeg go/ bur gyur/ rab tu
ra'ur/ kun rab tu 'ur 'um/ chem chem )rab tu ma cham/ kun tu rab tu chem chemamo ) 'khrugs rab tu 'khrugs/ kun tu rab tu 'khrugs so// sangs rgyus kyi mthu dang chos

nyid thob pas lha'am tog gi sprin gyi char pAngamangon par babang// lha'i bdug pa'i sprin gyi char yang mngon par bab go/ lha'i sros kyi sbyin gyi char yang mngon par bab bo// lha'i phyi ma sprin gyi char

dang/ lha'i phyang ba'i sprin gyi ma dang/ lha'i gos kyi sprin gyi mar dang/ lha'i rin po che'i sprin gyi char dang/ lha'ipad+ma'i sprin gyi ma dang/ lha'i rgyan 'phrong gi sprin gyi ma dang/ lha'i rgyan gyi sprin gyi

char yang mangon par babe go/ lha'i sil snyan rnams kyang ma dgrol bar sgra byung ngo// lha'i snang ba yang rab tu byung ngo// lha'i nga'o yang grag go/ gling bzhi pa 'dir ri rab kyi rtsa nor lha'i dbang po'i

khang par ji lta ba de bzhin du 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad du yang chos bstan pa 'di byang po'agyur nas byung ste lhagachad med do/ tshig 'bru 'di dag nyid kyis don 'di nyid ston to// sangs rgyas kyi mthus/

sangs rgyas kyi zhing stong phrag nga cu'i rdul phra rab kyi rdul snyad kyi 'jig rten gyi khams rnams kyi ba lo nas byang chub sems dpa' sangs rgyas kyi 'dre stong phrag bcu'i rdul phra rab snyed lhags te/ phyogs
bcu rgyas par bkang nas// 'di skad ces 'dzer to// kye rgyal ba'i sras de ltar khyod byang chub sems dpa'i chos nyid 'di ston pa legs so// legasaso// kyi rgyal ba'i sras//

bdag cag kyang mingachos kyi blo gros shes bya ba sha stag ste/ 'jig rten gyi khams chos kyi sprin ces bya ba dganas/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i mtshan chos kyi blo gros bzang po zhesabya ba sha stag gi thad nas

'dir phyin to// sangs rgyas kyi byin gyis brlabs kyis de dag thams cad du yang chos bstan pa 'di byung ste/ 'khor 'di lta bu dag gi nang du tshig 'bru 'di dag gis don 'di nyid ston te lhag chad med do/
kye rgyal ba'i sras bdag cag ni khyod kyi dbang du gyur te/ sangs rgyas kyi mthus/ 'jig rten gyi khams 'dir phyin to// bdagacig ji ltar 'jig rten gyi khams 'dir phyin pa de bzhin

du phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad kyi gling bzhi pa thams cad du ri rab kyi rtsa mor lha'i dbang po'i khang pa rnams su yang byang chub sems dpa' sangs rgyas kyi zhing bcu'i rdul phra rab kyi rdul
07 @#// snyad phyin par gyur to/// bam po gnyis pa// de nas sangs rgyas kyi mthus byang chub sems dpa'achos kyi blo gros kyis phyog
bcu ba rnam par bltas te/ thams cad dang ldan pa'i 'khor dang/ chos kyi dbyangs la yang rnam par bltas nas/ de'i tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag smras so// rang byung shin tu rnam dag blo mnga'
ba ba mdzes shing gzugs kyi stobs dang ldan 'gyur pa// red dka' mtshan gyis brgyanapa mthong gyur nas// byang chub don du bstan pa sems 'jog byed// rdo zlumed pa'i rdzu 'phrul stobs rnams
dang kun rdzob bzang dang rjes su bstan pa dang// sdug bsngal bzad rung 'jig rten 'gro mthong nas// byang chub don du bstan pa sems 'jog byed// yon tan kun gyi 'byung gnas de bzhin
gshegs// kun tu bzang po'i yon tanathos gyur nas// nam mkha'i dbyis 'dra 'gyur ba med pa yi// byang chub don du bstan pa sems 'jog byed/ 'ganas rnams ji snyad gang dag yod gyur dang//
rang bzhin gnas ba'i gnas rnams gzhan dag kyang// gzhan min dngos bo rnam par rtogs bya'i phyir// byang chub don du bstan pasems 'jog byed/ 'das dang ma 'ongs da ltar dus dag na/
dge dang mi dge las rnams gang yod pa// de dag rgyu rnams rtogs par bya ba'i phyir// byang chub don du bstan pa sems 'jog byed// ting nge 'dzin bsam gtan rnam thar spyod pa dang// de bzhin
[4 ]soms 'jug rnam dag mthar thug pa// de dag gnas skabs rtogs pa bya ba'i phyir// byang chub don du bstan pasems 'di 'ag/ 'jig rten brtson 'grus stobs dang dbang bo rnams / su/
'dra ci 'dra de la de dang der// rim pa de dag rtogs pa byaba'i phyir// byang chub don du bstan pasoms 'jog byed// 'jig rten kun gyi mos pa ci 'dra dang// lhag pa'i bsam pa tha dad rnam gsum
nas bstan bcos du ma rtogs par bya ba'i phyir// byang chub don du bstan pa sems 'jog byed// rnam pa sna tshogs rnam pa du ma khams/ gang dag 'jig rten gsum 'di'i yod kun gyi//
khams gyi rang bzhin rtogs par bya ba'i phyir// byang chub don du bstan bsamasade 'jog/ chos 'di'i kun tu 'gro bar gang gyur cing// ngagaba'i 'jug pa gang la rab 'jugapa// yang dag rang bzhin/
rtogs par bya ba'i phyir// byang chub don du brtan pa sems 'jog byed// zhing rnams thams cad ji ltar 'byung ba dang// sams can ji ltar sa la 'byung 'gyur zhes// chags med mig ni rab tu
dbyeba'i phyig/ byang chub don du brtan pasoms 'di'ajog/ 'das pa'i dus dang da ltar byung dus na// sems can ris dngos mtshananyid gang yod dang// sngon gyi gnas rnams rtogs par bya ba'i
phyir byang chub don du brtan pasems 'di 'ag/ ji ltar 'gro bar sems cana'aching byed pa/ kun tu sbyor ba 'jig rten gang yod pa'i// nyon mongs zad pa rtogs par bya ba'i phyi'i// byang
chub don du brtan bsams 'di 'jog/ 'jig rten gsuman tha snyad gang btags dang// ngag2masngags tshul spyod pa gang yod pa// brda yi bden pa rtogs par bya ba'i
phyi'i/ byang chub don du brtan ba sems 'di 'jog/ chos rnams thams cad brjod du med pa ste// stong pa mig yor rangabazhin ngo bo nyid// don dam bden pa rtogs par bya ba'i phyir// byang chub
don du brtan pa sems 'jog byed// zhing rnams dag tus g.yo bstan pa dang// rgya mtsho dag kyang rnam pa 'khrugs pa dang// de bzhin gshags kyis rdzu 'phrul brtan pa'i phyir// byang chub
don du brtan pa sems 'di 'jog/ bod bar rtse mo res 'od zer rnams / dbazhin phyogs bcu kun tu rab tu 'gyed// de dag bod gcig rtogs par bya ba'i phyir/ byang chub don du brtan
pa sams 'jog byed// khring mang bsam gyis mi khyab gang yodapa// de dag rang gi lagatuman sbal te// sgyu ma'i tshul de rtogs bar bya ba'i phyig/ byang chub don du bstan pa sems
nga'ajog byed// zhing rnams ji ltar de bzhin sems can kun/ 'ganod pa med par lag pa'i mthal bzhag nas/ chos rnams srog med rtogs par bya ba'i phyir// byang chub don du brtan pa sogs
'di 'jog/ rgyamatshornamasan jisnyad nu yodapa// skra rtse'i thigs pa'i nang du 'jug par byed// ma lus mthar thug rtogs par bya ba'i phyir// byang chub don du brtan pa sems 'di 'jog zhing
rnams kun n phra rab rdul gyi bag/ gang yod de dag ma lus bgrang byed cing// phra rab rdul grangs rtogs par bya ba'i phyir// byang chub don du brtan pa sems 'jog byed// 'jig rten 'din 'das/
dang de bzhin du// ma'os sreg pa'i bskal pas 'jig pa rnams // bskal pa zad pa rtogs par bya ba'i phyir// byang chub don du brtan pa sogs 'de 'jog/ dus gsum dag gi de bzhin
gshegs rnams dang// ston pa rang rgyal thos las byung rnams kyi// chos kyi rang bzhin rtogs par bya ba'i phyir// byang chub don du brtan pa sems 'di brjog/ brjod du mdanga'i 'jig rten
khams kyi rnams // sku yis bcings nas ma lus srang la 'debs// dngos po'i rang zhin rtogs par bya ba'i phyir// byang chub don du brtan pasems 'di 'jog 'khor yug ri bo bsam gyis mi
khyab pa// sgra yis bcings nas ma lus srang la 'debs/ rags dang phra ba rtogs par bya ba'i phyir// byang chub don du brtan pa sems 'di 'jog/ lus pa med pa'i 'jig rten khams rnams su/
skad cig gcig la dbyangs kyis go bar byed// dbyangs kyi yan lag dag pa bstan pa'i phyir// byang chub don du brtan pa sogs 'di 'ag/ 'jig rten kun gyi sgra rnams ci 'dra ba// skad cig/
gcig la skad cig rjod byed cing// zhi ba'i rang bzhin rtogs par bya ba'i phyir/ byang chub don du brtan pa sems 'di'ajog/ 'jig rten gsum po ma lus rtogs par byed// sems can kun
@#// gyis rab tu rnam par shes// lce yangs rgya chen rtogs pa bya ba'i phyir// byang chub don du brtan pasags 'di 'jog/ zhing rnams kun tu brjod dang 'dra bar yang/
[E ]/skad cig gcig la lta rgyur sel bar byed// rnam rtogachos rnams rtogs par bya ba'i phyir// byang chub don du brtan pasems 'jog byed// 'dir zhing rnams thams cad m lus par/
de bzhin gshegs pas gang zhigang byung gi/ chos rnams skad cig gcig la rtogs pa'i phyir// byang chub don du brtan pa sems 'di 'jog/ rdul phran tha dad lta bu r 'jig rten khams
rnam pa kun mngon par sprul byed cing// yid las byung ba de dag rtogs pa'i phyir// byang chub don du brtan pa semasa'ajog byed// 'das dang de bzhin ma khyon sangs rgyas rnams // ji sudagang dag
'jig rten bzhugs so cog/ sams kyis skad cig gcig la rtogs pa'i phyir// byang chub don du brtan pa sams 'jog byed// tshig gcig brjod kyang bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i// bskal
[% ]pa zad kyi de la nyams pa med// tshig rab dbye ba rtogs par bya ba'i phyi'i// byang chub don du brtan pa sems nad 'jog/ phyogs bcu rnams kyi 'jig rten thams cad kyi// 'gro ba ci 'dra ldog nga
rtsi'adra ba// sems kyi skad cig gcig la rtogs pa'i phyir// byang chub don du brtan pa sems 'jog byed// phyogs rnams kun tu 'gro yang lus kyis sam// ngag gam yid kyis gang
du'ang chags pa med// dus gsum stong pa nyid du rtogs pa'i phyir// byang chub don du brtan pa sems 'di 'jog/ byang chub semasan ji ltar bskyed pa bzhin// gzhal yas bskal par phyog
su rgyu byed cing// sangs rgyas spyan sngar mchod par bya'ozhes// 'di ldog rnams kyis bstan pa la// phyogs bcudagani 'jigarten tha dad pas// 'jig rten bdag po la rgyal ba'i sras 'gyur
ba gang yang rung ba dam pa sgrog bar byed// 'di ni mi ldog rnams kyis bstan pa yin// byang chub don tu srid pas sbyang spyodatso// byang chub sems dpa'i bde sbyar gang yin pa// de yi bsngags
ba rtag turjod par byed// 'di ni ldog rnams kyis bstan pa yin// chos mchog chos rab phul tu phyin pa dang/ khyab par 'phags chos bla med gang yod bu// de dag byang chub sems
dpa' rnams la ston// 'din mi ldog rnams kyi bstan pa yin// yon tan kun ldan de bzhin gshegs pa yi// chanyid 'di ni yod kyi gzhan med pa// 'dini byang chub samasadapa' sbyor
bar byed/ 'di'i ma ldog rnams kyis bstan pa yin// tshad mdagazhal yas bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i// sangs rgyus rnams dang phrad 'gyur ci 'dra ba// byang chub sems dpa' de la ston pa
byed 'di ni mi ldog rnams kyis bstan pa yin// ting 'dzi gang dag ji snyed yodapa dang// de bzhin dpe'adzin rgyud kyi rnam pa rnams / de dag bde gshegs sras rjod par byed/ 'di ni mi
ldog rnams kyis bstan pa yin// 'khor ba'i 'khor lo rnam par zlog pa dang/ dam pa'i chos kyi 'khor lo rab skor ba/ 'jig rten kun gyis rtag tu ma bskor ba//
@# byang chub sems dpa' rnams la de bstan bya/ shin tu sdug bsngal 'jig rten thas cad dang// ngan song rnam par dag tu gnod gyur pa'i// gnas dang skyabs dang dpung gnyen 'gyur bde//
byang chub sems dpa' rnams la bstan par bya// gang zhig byang chub don t+tasems 'jog pa// de ni dang po ba byang chub sems dpar bstan// bslabs pa'i gdams ngag ji bzhin nges byas
pa ji bzhin rnam par gzhag 'di de yi yin// nad bral rnams kyis bstan pa ji bzhin du// 'jig rten kun la phan pa bya ba'i phyir// de ltar thog ma su zhig sems bskyed ba/ ]'din
gnyis te dang po'i las can no// phan pa thob byedasems dang rab dang bde/ gnyen dang sdug dang de bzhin sdud sems dang// kun tu bsung ba'i sems dang snyoms pa'i soms// slob
dpon sems dang snyoms par ston nga 'isams/ de 'dra ngag lasams gnas gyur pa de// lung nod kha ton byed par sbyar bar bya// mang du thos nas dgon par gnas su gzhug/ dben
par gyur nas dge bshes bsten du gzhug/ dge bshes rnams la bka' blo bde bar bya// dus tshod shes la shes bzhin ldan par bya// dus shes gyur nas shin tu 'jigs med bya//
0 'jigs pa medas don la brtson par bya// do shes gyur nas de bzhin chos brjod bya// chos rnams kun ' rmongs gyur med par bya// chos pa med par gyur nas rgyal ba'i sras//
legs par gsungs pa'i chos la gnas par bya// 'di ni dang po'i las can brjodapa ste// byang chub zhugs pa'i byang chub sems dpa' yin// 'di ni gdams pa 'di ni bstan pa ste// 'di
la su slob de ni sangs rgyas sras// byang chub soms dpa' gsum pa gang yin pa// chos kyi rgyal po'i bstan pa rab tu sbyor/ mi rtag nyid dang sdug bsngal stong nyid dang// bdagamed pa dang/
g.yo ba med pa dang// de nga zhin chos 'di thams cad bdag min dang// mno bar bdu byed med dang dben pa dang/ 'dodag thams cad rtog pa med yin par// byang chub sems dpa' de ltar
rtog par byed// sams can khams dang chos kyi dbyig la yang// brtag par bya phyir de ni gzas yang bstod// 'jig rtan ni mtha' yas mu med ces// de ltar don byed du gzhug par bya
'di nas sa dang chu dang de bzhin ma// rlung dang nam mkha' ji snyed yod pa dang// phyogs na 'dod dang gzugs dang gzugs med pa// de dag rnams la de ni dpyod du gzhug/ rgya chen chosa rnams kun dang
khams rnams kyi// rang bzhin ma lus mthar thug brtag bya ba// de nasas rgyas sras ngo sbyor byedal// phan par bya phyir rjes su bstan pa yin// byang chub soms dang bskye bar gang skyes pa//
bstan la skyes shing rab tu 'byung bar byed// blo ldan de ni dngos mdangos po rtogs// dam chos gnas su skyes legs par skyes// de ni nga gis sa las yod mi ldog
sas rgyas mthar thug yin par 'dzin pa ste// rtag tu chos la nges par sems dang ldan// sems can rang bzhin ci 'drar rnam par dpyod// las dang 'jig rten dag dang zhinge rnamasadang/ rnam
bar smin dang 'khor dang mya ngan 'das// rnam par dbye brgyal ba'isras kyis shes// de thugs skyes pa'i byang chub sems dpar brjod// thams cad mkhyen pa 'das dang byung rnams dang// ma byon
drag kyang chos rnams ma dpyad nas// grub dang gang yang legs skyes mthar thug dang// rang byung rnams kyi grub pa ci 'dra ba// sangs rgyas dam pa de dag thams cad ni// dus gsum mnyam
nyid rjes su zhugs pas shes// nam yang mnyam nyid byed brag 'byod ma byed// de na dus gsumaM tha dad med par 'jug/ gang gi phan yon rnam pa 'di 'dra ba// de ni byang chub sems dpa' bzhi pa
ste 'di dag rab bsgrubs byang chub sems dpa' de// byang chub don tunges par 'byung bar 'gyur// de ni byang chub sems dpa' lnga pa ste// sbyor ba phun sum tshogs par brjod pa yin// thab
la mkhas pa'i rjes su zhugs pa ste// bsod nams las dag brtsoms pas mthar phyin byed// de ltar bsod nams rab tu ci byed kyang// 'jig rten kun gyi rten du 'gyur ba dang// phan par 'dod dang
bde ba thob byed dang// snying brtse ba dang skye dgu 'grol 'gyur byed// 'jig rten gnod rgyud gdul bar bya ba'i phyir// 'dren par byed cing rab tu dad pa byed// sems can mang po thams cad gdul 'dod
dang/ mya ngan 'das pa'i sems kyi byed mthu yang che// 'jig rten thams cad tha ma med pa dang// de bzhin dpag tu med cing grangs med dang// mtshungs med bsam yas mnyam med gzhal yas dang/

stong pa mi g.yo med pa'i nang pazhin shes// de ni byang chub sems dpa' lnga pa ste/ sbyor ba phun tshogs phan dang snying brtser ldan// de la rjes su bstan pa 'di 'dra ste// 'on tan kun dang ldan pa rnams kyi
bstan// den sams can mtha' yas thams cad dang// chos kyi ngo bo nyid la rmongs pa med// shin tu blo ldan rtog bral rnam rtogamed// 'jig rten lha dang bcas pas dbyer mi phud// sangs rgyas chos
dang byang chub samasadapa' dang// spyod pa'i bsngags dang bsngags pam yin dang// sems can chung ngam yang na che'o zhes// thos par gyur kyang bsam las nub ba med// sems can nyon mongs can
ma rnam dag gam// gdul bla zhe 'am gdul bar dka' zhe 'am// chos dbyings chung zhi ba sangan rgya chanye lam/ 'jig par 'gyur zho 'am 'chags pa 'gyur zhe 'am// chos dbyings yod ce'am
med ces thos gyur kyang// dus gsum rtogs pa'i byang chub sems dpa'ade// nges par soms shing thams cad rnam dpyod de// sangs rgyas chos 'di'i bsam pa shin tu nges// mtshan ma med dang
@#// mtshan nyid med pa dang// das med rang bzhin rdzun zhing dben pa dang// sgyu ma'i rang bzhin mig sor 'du ba yi// chos mchog zhi ba de 'dra nyan par byed// de ltar mi ldog byang
chub sems dpa'ani// sangs rgyas chos dang byang chub sems dpa' dang// spyod pa yod dam med ces nges par dpyod// 'byang ngam mi 'byung zhen 'ang phyi'i mi ldog/ de bzhin gshegs pa 'das zhe
la9 'am ma 'dus zhe bam// ma byon ci bam ma khyon ma yin zhe'am// byung ngam ma byung da dam mi drad dam// de bzhin mtshan nyid gcig gam mtshan nyid med// gcig dang tha dang rnam pa mang po dang//
glun dang tshig 'bru dngos dang dngos med pa// thams cad sgro btags rnamaM pa gzhan nyid du// mi ldog byang chub sems dang ba yid ces byed/ mtshanam med dang mtshan ma yod pa dang// mtshan nyid
mdang mtshan gyis mtshon pa dang// rnam par phye bapan tshun sbyar ba rnams // thos nas bde la mthar thug 'jugapar byed// gzhon nur gyur pa 'i byang chub sems dpa' ni// lus dang ngag dang de
! bzhin yid kyis kyang// 'bras bu yod pa'i las rnams byed 'gyur zhing// ji ltar 'dod pa yin 'dir ni skye ba ston// pha rol rnams kyi bsam pa rtogs byed cing// de dag rnams kyi mos pa dpyad par
byed sems can spyod dang rjes su mthun chos dang// zhing rnams 'jig dang bachags pa rnams kyang shes// ji lta 'dod bzhin myur du mngon shes thob/ phyogs rnams kun tu yid ni 'jug par byed//
[42 ]bde gshegs bsngags pa'i chos rnams shos nas kyang// de la dri ni chur bar 'gyur pa med// yongs su shes dang zhing g.yo byed pa dang// de bzhin byin gyis brlabs dang rnam dpyod dang// ji/

lta skad ceng grag med 'gro 'gyur ba// zhing du 'gro bar bya ba brjod par bya// de ni dri ba grangs med 'dri bar byed// lus rnams ci 'drar yid kyi lus kyang ston// de la sgra skad sbyor ba 'jam klas dang
sems gcig la yang sangs rgyas grangs med brjod/ byang chub sems dba'argyal tshab gang yin pa// sems can rnams kyi 'jug pa ji bzhin shes// de dag nyon mongs rgyud dang bag chags dang//
