spyod yul gang yin sbyor ba gang yin dang// tha dad chos dang sgrub ci 'dra dang// 'jigarten rnam par phye dang sngon mtha' dang// brda yi bden dang don dam bden pa dag/ ma lus rtogs bar bya la mkhas ba
yin tho brang 'khor la mkhas pa tshar 'byin te// de yang dzi ltarakun tu spyad pa dang// gan pa dang de bzhin 'jug pa dang// pho brang 'khor nici 'dra dpyadapa dang// dam chos rgyal po'i dbang bskur
ci'adra dang// byin gyi brlabs dang gzhan gnod 'dra dang// chos la 'jug dang bka' lung brjod bya ste// 'di ni rgyal tshabs la 'jug pa yin// de tsam gyis na de yi mthar thug ste// ji skad
bstan bzhin gzhan du 'gyur ba med// tshe yi 'du byed nam zhig 'dod ban// tshul ldan rgyal tshab rgyalabar mngon du phyogs// dbang bskur gang yin bde gshegs sras gcig ste// thu gokhyad/
'phags mthar phyin bdag nyid can// sa thigs gcig gis chu tshad gzung du rung// 'di ni bsam pa bgrangs pas rtogs ma yin// rgyal sras rnams kyi spyod pa 'di/
da 'du ste// 'di nisams can la las zhing rnams kun// phra rab rdul du rlags nas ma lus bgrang// grangs med 'di snyad cig ces gcod byed pa// de kun 'di'i na byang chub sems dpas
la shes// 'dus dang de bzhin ma byon sangs rgyas dang// gang dag phyogs bcu dgan bzhugs pa dang// rang sangs rgyas dang de bzhin nyan thos kyi// sa bon gyur pa byang chub sems de skye// thog
ma byang chub sems nas gang brjod pa// de ni jilta'i tshul du'ang grangs med de// 'jig rten khams 'di kun kyang khyab gyur na// de las gong du brjod du ci zhig yod// de nas
byang chub sems dpa' kun tu bzang pos/ byang chub sems dpa' chos kyi blo gros la 'di skad ces smras so// rigs kyi bu khyod kyis dkon mchog ta la la'i gzus bshad pa legs par
sbas so// rigs kyi bu sangs rgyas kyi yon tan rnams ni bsam gyis mi khyab ste/ gang dag chos kyi rnam grangs 'di'i ming thos pa'i sems can de dag thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du 'bar gyur pa
yin na// gang dag chos kyi rnam grangs 'di 'dzin pa dang klog pa dang kun chub par byed pa dang de bzhin nyid du sgrub par byed pa lta smos kyang ci dgos te/ de dag nges pa sangs rgyas su 'gyur ro//
chos kyi blo gros kyis smras pa/ kye rgyal ba'i sras de de bzhin no// ji skad smras pa bzhin te/ shes rab zab mo dang ldan pa de dag de bzhin gshegs pas dbang bskur ba yin par
gi par bya'o// byang chub sems dang 'a kun tu bzang pos smras pa// rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo gang la la zhig gi rna lam du 'di lta bu'i chos 'di dag grags par 'gyur ba'i skye bu dam pa

de dag kyang sangs rgyus kyis chos rnams la lung bstan par rig par bya ba yin na/ chos kyi rnam grangs 'di gang dag gis lag tu thog pa lta smos kyang ci dgos// den tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bus
bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te ) 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das gzigs su gsol/ bdagagis 'di lta bu'i chos 'di dgam 'tshel bas/ bdagan dmus
long dang 'dra lags so// bcom ldan 'das bdag gcig pu dmus long lta bu r gyur pa yang ma'ags kyi/ bcom ldan 'das sems can gang dag gis chos kyi rnam grangs 'dim thos pa de
dag thams cad kyang dmus long lta bu r gyur pa lags so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ gnas brtan de de bzhin te/ ji skad smras babazhin no// shA ra dwa ti'i bus gsol pa/
bcom ldan 'das kyis bsam gyis mi khyab pa nyid bshad du gsol/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ shAr dwa ti'i bu songal/ brgya byin dang/ tshangs pa dang/ 'jig rten skyong
[©el ]ba thams cad bskul ga/ de bzhin gshegs pa bka' yang slogs shig/ chos kyi phyag rgya dam pa dkon mchog ta la la zhes bya ba'i gzungs 'di yang 'khor der
pa sgrogs shig/ de nas tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bus de bzhin gshegs pa'i bka' thos nas/ dkon mchog ta la la'i gzus 'di'i don gyi phyir yongs su skom pas//
brgya byin dang/ tshangs pa dang/ 'jig rten skyong bde dag la don 'di skabs brjod de chos nyan pa thams cad 'du bar gyis shig/ de bzhin gshegs padakon mchog ta la la'i gcus
('chad cing bsam gyis mi khyab pa nyid kyang ston par 'gyur gyis 'du bar gyis shig/ khyod phyis 'gyod par gyur ta re/ kye grogs po dag mdo sde rin po che 'di lta bu dag 'jig rten du 'byung ba
ni shin tu rnyed par dka'o// de nas skad cig de nyid la brgyabyin dang/ tshangs pa dang/ 'jig rten skyong ba thams cad 'dus nas/ bcom ldan 'das la lan gsum bskor
ba byas te/ bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar 'khod nas/ thal mo sbyar te/ bcom ldan 'das la gsol ba btab pa/ bcom ldan 'das kyis dkon mchog ta la la'i gzungs bshad
gsol// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis cang mi gsungs bar gyur pas gnang ba mdzad do// brgya byin dang/ tshangs pa dang/ 'jig rten skyong ba thams cad kyis lan gnyis lan gsum
du gsol ba btab na yang/ bcom ldan 'das cangami gsung bar gyur to/ de nas bcom ldan 'das latshadang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bus 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das
kyis dkon mchog ta la la zhes bgyi ba'i gzungs bshad du gsol/bde bar gshegs pas bshad du gsol/ de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis de'i tsho zhal nas ljags kyi dpang po byung ste rigs/
kyi bu gang la la dag dkon mchog ta la'i gzungs 'di'i don gyi phyir/ dbazhin gshegs pa la gsol ba 'debs pa de dag thams cad ni bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las
phyir mi ldog par 'gyur ro zhes// stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams su dbyangs kyis gob mdzad do// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu la
'di skad ces bka' stsal to// tshodang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu khyod song la// 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa la gsol ba thobashig/ de'i tshe 'jam dang gzhon nur gyur pa// shing pag sha dang

sA la'i drung gzhan zhigan 3 skyil mong krungabacasangashing lus mi g.yo bar 'dug sta 1 nyin bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong bsalhag pa'i kha dog bkod pa chen po dang ldan pa'i khang pa brtsigs pa na/ brgya
byin dang/ tshas pa dang/ 'jig rten skyong ba rnams kyis yongs su bskor cing mdun gyis bltas nas 'dug par gyur te/ gser gyi kha dog lta bu r lus dang dpal gyi lham me lhan ne lhang nger
[@#// 'dug go/ de nas tshe dang ldan pa shAr dwa ti'i bus 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pag la bder song ste phyin nas 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa la 'jiskad/
ces smras so// rigs kyi bu de bzhin gshegs pa ni khyod la chos bshadu par gsol ba'adebs so// de nas 'jam dbal gzhon nur gyur pas tshodang ldan pa shA ra duti'i bu la
'di skadaces smras so// btsun pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu de bzhin gshegs pa zhes bya babagazhi'i don 'di gang yin/ shAr dwa ti'i bus smras// rigs kyi bu khyod ni shes rab zab pa sta/ kho bo ni khyodadang/

'gyed mi nusaso// 'jam dpal gyis smras pa/ khyod snying las chung ngur 'dug shig dang/ khyod kyis ji ltar bzod pa de bzhin du bstaneng ra bya'o// shAr dwa ti'i bus smras pa/ rigs kyi bu kho ngo nyan gyis
khyod kyis shod shig/ de nas 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pas ting nge 'dzin de las langs te/ stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams dbyangs kyis go bar byas so// de

nas de'i tshe stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jigarten gyi khamasan/ gnas gtsang ma'i se kyi lha'i bu gnas 'og min gyi bar gyi lha'i bu ji snyad 'khod pa de dag thams cad 'dus par gyur te// rgyal po chen

po bzhi dpung dang g.yog tu bas pa yang gnod sbyin bye ba du ma dang lhan cig 'dus par gyur to// brgya byin dang/ tshangs pa dang/ 'jig rten skyong ba rnams kyang 'dus par gyur to// chos 'dod pa rnams dang/

bya chos 'dod pa ma yin pa'i gang zag rnams kyang 'dus par gyur to// lha'i bumamang po yang 'dus par gyur to// dag slong gi 'khor dang dge slong ma'i 'khor dang/ dag bsnyen gyi 'khor dang/ dge bsnyanama'i/
'khor dang/ de bzhin du sum cu rtsa gsum pa'i bar gyi 'khor dang/ 'thab bral gyi 'khor dang/ dga' ldan gyi 'khor dang 'thul dag 'khor dang/ gzhan 'khrul dbang byed kyi lha'i 'khor dang//
tshas ba'i khor dang/ de bzhin du 'og min gyi bar gyi lha'i 'khor rnams 'dus par gyur to// de bzhin du nyan thos kyi tshogs kyang 'dus par 'gyur te 'di lta ste/ tshe dang ldan pa//

rab 'byor dang/ tshe dang ldan pa'od bsungs chen po dang/ tshe dang ldan pa mo'u 'gal gyi bu chen po dang/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu dang/ tshodang ldan pa ka rkyab bu chen po dang/ rmodang ldan pa ma 'gags pa

dang tshe dang ldan pa ga ya 'od bsrungs dang/ tshe dang ldan pa gsus po che dang/ tshodang ldan ng lam phran brtan dang 3 tshodang ldan pa nam gru dang/ tshe dang ldan pachu klung 'od srungs dang/ tshodang ldan pa steng/

rgyas 'od sus dang/ tshe dang ldan pa byamasama'i bu gang po dang/ tshodang ldan pa sgra gcan zin dang/ tshe dang ldan pa bzang skyong dang/ tshodang ldan pa rlangs pa dang/ tshadang ldan pa kun dga' bo dang/ de dag/
dnganyan thos chen po gzhan dag dang/ grags 'dzan la sogs pa dge slong ma lnga brgya yang 'dus par gyur to// khams kyi rgyal bo dang/ stobs kyi 'khor 'as sgyur bdag kyang 'dus par gyur to/
rgyala'ages dang/ bram ze dang/ khyim bdag gi 'khor dag kyang 'dus par gyur to// de nas tshodang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bus/ bcom ldan 'das la lan gsum
bskor ba byas te 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das deng 'di ltar 'khor chen po 'das pa 'di su'i mthu lags/ de ji ltar 'tshal bar bgyi/ bcos ldan 'dusakyis bka' stsal pa// tsho
dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu 'din dkon mchog ta la 'a'i gzungs kyi mthu yin no/ shA ra da ti'i bus gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das dkon mchog ta la'a'i gzungs mnyan par 'tshal lo/ bcom ldan
sku 'das kyis bka' stsal pa// shA ra dwa ti'i bu song la/ ) 'jam dang la gzhon nur gyur pa dang/ byang chub sems dpa' kun tu bzang po 'a gsol ba thob cig/ de nas tshadang ldan pa shA ra
dAti'i bus 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur ba la 'di skad ces smras so/ dges kyi bu khyod kyis ting nge 'dzin rin po che bstan pa dkon mchog ta la la 'di shod cig/ 'jam dpal gyis smras pa/ ]btsun pa shA
ra dwa ti'i bu dkon mchog ta la'a'i gzungs 'din par 'gyur pa su yin/ shA ra dwa ti'i bus smras pa// 'khor bzhi 'dus pa 'di dag dang/ brgya byin dang/ tshangs pa dang 'jig rten skyong ba rnams 'dus
pa 'di dag ste kho bo yang nyan pa'i phyir 'ongs so// de nas 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pas 3 gnas brtan shA ra dwa ti'i bu la 'di skad ces smras so// gnas brtan shA ra dwa ti'i bu chos
0 nyan pa 'di dag ni skyam byung ba sha stagan kho bos su la chos bshad nyan pa ni su yin/ 'chad pa ni su yin/ gnas brtan gyis smras pa// skyes bu dam pa khyod kyis shod cig/ kho bos mnyan to/ 'jam
dpal gyis smras po/ btsun pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu bshad ces bya ba de gang gi tshig bla dgas yin/ smras pa// 'jam dpal bshad pa zhes bya ba de ni stong pa nyid kyi tshig bla dgas so// smras pa// shAr

du te bu stong pa nyid gang gi tshig bla dgas yin/ smras pa/ ! 'jam dad la stong pa nyid nitshigamed pa yin no// 'jam dang/ gyis smras pa/ btsun pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu gal te stong pa nyid tshig med pa
yin na/ zhig bshad par bya/ btsun pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu chos thams cad ni bstan du med pa yin te/ de dag ni bstan tu med cing tshenyan du med do// gnas brtan gyis smras pa/ rigs kyi bu khyod
kyis ji lta bu bstan pa// de thams cad ni stong pa nyid bstan pa/ mtshan ma med pa bstanapa/ smon pa med pa bstan pa// blang ba med pa bstan pa/ 3 do ba med pa bstan pa/ spos pa med pa bstan
pasum smos pa bstan pa yin no/ gang nas thams cad dang ldan pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i 'khor de dang/ brgya byin dang ]tshangs pa dang ) 'jig rten skyong ba de dag kyang rab tu dga'
nas/ mgrin gcig tu 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa dang 3 tshe dang ldan pa shAr dwa ti'i bus dkon mchog ta la la'i gzungs 'di legs par bshad do// zhes legaso zhes bya ba byin no/
[©]// de nas tshodang ldan pa rab 'byor gyis 'jamadapal gzhon nur gyur pa la 'di skad ces snyasaso// 'jam dpal byang chub sems dpas dkon mchog ta la la'i gzungs ji ltar/
gzung bar bya/ klag par bya/ kun chub par bya/ gzhan dag la yang rgya cher yang dag par bshad par bya/ 'jam dpal gyis smyos pa// rab 'byor gzungs 'di'i skye ba med par yid la bya'o// dngos
pas po med pa dang/ mtshan nyide med pa dang/ spros pa med pa dang/ dor ba med par yid la bya'o// 'jam dang la gzhon nur gyur pas chos kyi rnams grangs 'di bshad pa na/ 'khor de'i nang nas byang chub
sems dpa'i dgu bcu rtsa gnyis kyis dpa' bar 'gro ba'i ting nge 'dzin thob par gyur to// lha dang mi drug cu rtsa gnyis ni mi skye ba'i chos la bzod pa thob par gyur to// de nas byang chub
sems dang 'a kun tu bzang po stan las langs te/ bla gos phrag pa gcig tugazar nas thal mo sbyar to/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa'o/
soms dang/ 'a chen po rnams kyi snying rje chen po ji 'dra ba zhig lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rigs kyi bu 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi snying rje chen po na/
gang khams gsum pa yongs su mi gtong ba ste/ 'di ni snying rje chen po yin no// gangasams can thams cad la sangs rgyas kyi zhing kun tu ston pa 'di ni snying rje chen bo ni yin no/ gangasims ma

tshul khrims 'chal ba yongs su 'dzin pa 'di ni snying rje chen po yin no// gangashes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa mi 'dor ba 'di ni snying rje chen po yin no// gang sems can thams cad kyi don gyi phyir lus dang
srog yongs su gtong ba ni snying rje chen po yin no// gang 'dod chags spyod pa'i ams can rnams la byams pa yang dag par rjod pa 'di ni snying rje chen po yin no// gang sems can stobs
dang ldan pa rnams la byams pa 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi snying rjen po yin no// rigs kyi bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa'ams dpa' chen po sems can
thams cad 'dazhe 'gras pa med pa'i sams su bya'o// 'du ba med pamang du bya'o// de nas bcom ldan 'das la byang chub sems dang 'akun tu bzang pos 'di skad ces gsol to// skye bo mang po
la sman pa dang/ skya bo mang bo la bde ba dang/ 'jig rten la thugs brtse ba dang/ rgya bo phal po che dang/ lha dang mi rnams kyi don dang/ sman pa dang/ bde bar 'gyur ba'i slad du/ bcom ldan
'das kyis dkon mchog ta la la zhes bgyi ba'i gzungs bshad du gsol/ sems can thams cad la sman pa dang/ thugs rtsa ba mnga' ba/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bshad du gsol//
de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis tshangs pa'i dbyangs kyis ) byang chub sems dpa' de dag la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/ khyad kyi nang na phyi ma'i dus lnga brgya pa tha ma la dam pa'i chos nub
pa'i dus kyi tshe chos kyi rnam grangs 'di yang dag par rab tu ston par spro ba su yod/ de nas byang chub sems dpa'akun tu bzang po dang/ byang chub sems dang 'a 'dras
dbal gzhon nur gyur pa dang byang chub sems dpa' spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug dang 2 byang chub sems dang 'a mthu chen thob dang/ byang chub sems dpa'i ngan song sbyong dang 2 byang chub
paNaM sems dpa' sman gyi rgyal po dang/ byang chub sems dpa' sdebs pa brtsegs pa dang/ byang chub sems dpa' chos thams cad kyis mngon 'phags rgyal po dang/ byang chub sems dang/
blo gros mi bod pa dang/ byang chub sems dpa' blo gros rgya mtsho dang/ byang chub sems dpa' rin chen za bldan dang/ byang chub sems dpa' nor bu 'od dang byung chub sogs dpa'
gtsugananor bu can dang/ byang chub sems dang ba rnam pa lta dang/ byang chub sems dpa' bltar mi mthong dang/ byang chub sems dpa' rtag tu lta dang/ byang chub sems dpa' lagan rdo
rjodang/ byang chub sems dpa'ani chenaphung po dang/ byang chub sems dpa' dkon mchog 'byung gnas dang/ byang chub sems dang 'chos dpal dang/ byang chub semasadang 'a tog dpal dang
byang chub sems dpa' bo dpa' dang byang chub sems dpa' bsod nams dang la dang/ byang chub sems dpa' tsan dan dpaladang/ byang chub sems dpa' chos kyi blo gros dang/ byang chub
thabs/ sems dang bdud rtsi blo gros dang/ byang chub sems dpa' bsam yas blo gros dang/ byang chub sems dpa'abasod nams kyis brgyan dang/ byang chub sems dpa' yon tan gyis brgyan dang/
byang chub sems dpa' mtshan gyis rgyan dang/ byang chub sems dpa' rtag tudagod cing dbang bo thams cad rab tu dga' ba dang/ byang chub sems dpo ri'i rtse mo rdol pa'i rgyal po dang/ byang chub
sogs dranga' spobs pa mkhas dang/ byang chub semasadapa' rtag tu lag kharkyang dang/ byang chub sems dpa' sa 'dzin dang/ byang chub samasadapa' spobs brgya dang/ byang chub sems dpa'am/
mkha'i sing po dang/ byang chub sems dpa' zlaba'i snying po dang/ byang chub sems dpa' nyi ma'i snying po dang/ byang chub sems dpa' sgrub dri ma med pa'i snying po dang/ byang chub sems dang 'anyi
gdugs snying po dang/ byang nubasems dpa' mngon 'phags rgyal po dang/ byang chub sems dad na lhun po chen po dang/ byang chub sems dpa' blo gros brtan ba dang/ byang chub sems dpa'asngohA/

pa dbal ba dang/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po byams pa dang/ de dag la sogs pa byang chub sems dpa'abye ba khrag khrig brgya stong phrag drug cu rtsaganyis kyi mgrin gcig tu tshig tu smras pa/
bcom ldan 'das slad ma'i tshe slad ma'i dus lnga brgya pa tha ma la/ dam pa'i chos nub pa'i dus kyi tshe/ bdag cag thams cad 'adus shing tshogs te/ dkon mchog ta la la zhes bgyi ba'i gzungs yang
dag par bshad par spro lags so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ gos kyi bu dgalegs so legs so rigs kyi bu dga' di ni bya dka' ba ste/ go cha'adi dra
ra 'di shin tubyudaka' ba'o// de nas bcom ldan 'dasakyis byang chub sems dang la kun tu bzang po la 'di skad cesabaka' stsal to// rigs kyi bu skya bomang po la phan pa dang/
skye bo mang po la bde bar 'gyur pa dkon mchog ta la 'a'i gzungs nyon cig/ donas bcom ldan 'das kyi bkod pa chen po'i seng ge'i khri la nga zhugs te sngags bkaT stsal pa/ de bzhin gshegs pa/
dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sas rgyas thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo// tad yathA 3 omaM/ b+har te lha ra Te/ b+ha ra b+ha ran te sAhA/ de nas bcom ldan 'das kyi a la la chos a la la chos
sa la'achos shes lan gnyis lan gsum du ched du brjod pa ched dubarjodapa mdzad do// de nas bcom ldan 'dras la byang chub sems dpa' kun tu bzang pos 'di skad ces gsol to//
bcom ldan 'das chos chosangashes bgyi ba 'di'i gzhi'i don gang lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rigs kyi bu chos thams cad kyi gzhi'i don ni gzhi mad pa'i don to// chos thams

cad kyi gzhi'i don ni dngos po med pa'i gzhi'i don to// chos thams cad kyigazhi'i don ni namamakha'i gzhi'i don to// chos thamasacad kyi gzhi'i don ni blang ba med pa'i gzhi'i don to// chos thams cad kyi
0 gzhi'i don ni dor bamed pa'i gzhi'i don to// de nas byang chub sems dpa' kun tu bzang pos gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das 'o na ci'i slad du chos thams cad ces bgyi/ bcom ldan
'dus kyis bka' stsal pa/ rigs kyi bu chos thams cad ces bya ba ni/ mig dang/ rna ba dang 3 snadang/ lce dang/ lus dang/ yid dang/ de bzhin du khams rnams dang/ skye mched rnams dang/
rten cing 'brel pa 'byung ba ste/ rigs kyi bu 'di'i chos thams cad ces bya'o// jigasakyi bu gzhan yang chos thams cad ni bzod ma nas ma skyes pa'i phyi'i stong pa'o// de nas yang 'jam dpal gzhon
nur gyur pas/ byang chub sems dpa' kun tu bzang po la 'di skad ces smras so// kye rgyal ba'i sras ) dkon mchog ta la la'i gzungs 'di ji ltar gzung bar bya/ de skad ces smras pa dang/
pa[“]byang chub sems dpa' kun tubazang pos/ 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa la 'di skad ces smras so// de bzhin nyid bstan pa dang/ skya bamed pa'i de bzhin nyid dang/ 'byung ba med pa'i de

bzhin nyid dang/ mtshan nyid med pa'i de bzhin nyid dang/ nam mkha'i de bzhin nyid dang/ dngos po med pa'i de bzhin nyid dang/ ngo bo nyid kyi de bzhin nyid dang/ dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi de bzhin nyid kyi
de bzhin nyid du gzungs 'di gzung bar bya ste/ rigs kyi bu dkon mchog ta la larigazungs 'di gzung ba dang/ kun tu gzung ba dang/ bsgom pa dang/ rnam par dpyad pa dang/ gdags pa dang
rab tu gzhag pa dang/ rnam par dgrol ba dang/ rnam par dbye ba dang/ gsal bar bya ba ni 'di 'dra ste/ 'gos kyi bu 'di ni dkon mchog ta la la'i gzungs bsgom pa
dang rnam par brtag pa'i don no// de nasatshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bus/ 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa la 'di skad ces smras so// 'jam dpal khyod chos kyi rnam grang 'di la yang dag
par zhugs nas yun ji srid cig lon ) 'jam dpal gyis smras pa// shA ra dwa ti'i bu 'do chags dang zhe sdang dang/ gtimug rnams yun ji srid ciganas/zhugs pasrid do// shA ra dwa ti'i bus smras pa//
gas kyi bu'adod chags dang zhe sdang dang/ gti mug rnams yun ji sridacig nas zhugs/ 'jam dpal gyis sbas pa/ shA ra dwa ti'i bu'i sa'i khams yun ji srid cig nas zhugs pa srid do// shA/
dwa ti'i bus smras pa/ rigs kyi bu sa' khams yun ji srid cig nas zhugs) 'jam dpal gyis smras pa// shA'adwa ti'i bu rig pa dang ma ge pa yun ji srid cig nas zhugs pa srid do// shA ra dwa
ti'i bus smras pa/ rigs kyi bu gapa dang ma rig pa yun ji srid cig nas zhugs ) 'jam dpal gyis smras pa// shA ra dwa ti'i bu nam mkha'i khams yun ji srid cig nas zhugs pasrid do// shA ra
dwa ti'i bus smras pa// 'jam dpal nam mkha'i khams kun ji srid cig nasazhugs/ 'jam dang lagyis smras pe/ shA ra dwa ti'i bu dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi chos thams cad yun ji srid cig nas zhugs
pa srid do// de nas tshodang ldan pa shAr da ti'i bus 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa la 'di skad ces smras so// kho bo skyes bu dam pa 'di lta bu dag dang gtam bya pa'i nus pa ga la yod/

gis kyi bu 'di lta ste dpar na/ khyi dang byi la thams cad dam wa thams cad kyis kyang pa'i rgyal po ri re ba gzhig par mi nusaso// bags kyi bu de bzhin shA ra dwa ti'i bu 'dra ba'i nyan thos thams cad
kyis kyang/ byang chub sems dang 'i bstan pa gcig gimathu'ayang rtogs par mi nus na ! 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa'i bstan pa lta smos do nas byang chub sems dpa' kun tu
bzang pos/ 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa la 'di skad ces smras so// 'jam dpal bzhud la phyi ma'i tshe phyi ma'i dus na/ mdo sde'i rgyal po 'dzin pa chos sgrub de dag la kun tu bsrung ba dang/
yongs su bskyang ba mdzad par/ de bzhin gshegs pa la gsol ba thobashig/ de nas 'jamadapal gzhon nur gyur pas rang gi chos kyi stan las langs nas/ bcomaM ldan 'das la
'di skad ces gsol to// gang dag chos kyi rnam grangs 'di 'dzin pa dang klog pa dang/ kun chub par bgyid pa dang/ gzhan dag la yang rgya cher yang dag par ston par bgyid pa// chos smras ba de dag gi
yon tan gyi khyad par rnams bshad du gsol/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa// 'jam dpal dge slong mdo sde'i rgyal po 'dzin pa chos sgrub de dag ni nga'i chos kyi sku la nges par 'byung bar
@#/ 'gyur ro// de dgan sangs rgyas kyi byang chub thob par 'gyur ro// de dganasas rgyas kyi chos rnams la nye bar 'gyur ro// de dag la bdud dang bad kyi cigs kyi lha'i bu glagA
lta ba rnams kyis glags mi red par 'gyurago 'gosakyi bu gang su dag chos smras ba'i dge slong de las gol gtogs pa gcig tsam sridatsog mi byams pa'i sems bskyed pa de dag ni mi'i 'gyur ba

ka las kyang ring du gyur pa yin/ sas rgyas kyi byang chub las lta smos kyang ci dgos/ 'jam dpal gzhan yang gang dag mdo snga'i rgyal po 'di 'dzin pa'i dge slong rnams la ma dad pa'i sems bskyod pa de
dag ni so thags ngan pa ra 'gyur ) lce dang sna med par 'gyur/ rkang lagaphyi phyogs su 'gyur ) lus nad bu can du 'gyur/ mig med par 'gyur ro// shes rab 'chal pa'i rang bzhin can du 'gyur/
brtson 'grus chung bar 'gyur te 'jam dpal 'di dag ni mi gti mug bde dag gi skyon du 'gyur ba'o/ 'jam dpaMl mdor bshadan/ de dag 'chi ba'i dus kyi tshe/ de dag gi spyi khung bu re rer yang
sems can dmyal ba'i sdug bsngal dpag tu med pa 'jug go/ gal te mir skyesan yang rtag tu dmus long du 'gyur/ lce med par 'gyur ro// 'jam dpal gzhan yang gang dag chos kyi rnam grangs
'di stong ba de dag ni/ tshe 'di nyid la rus mdzecan du 'gyur ) mchu 'jigs 'jigs ltar 'dug par 'gyur/ lus zhom par 'gyur ) lus gcer bur 'gyur ) lus skam por 'gyur/ mi
0 gas 'dra bar 'gyur ro// 'jam dpal gzhan lang mi gtimugapa de dag gang du skye bar 'gyur ba de dag gi gnas ni/ sa sangs rgyasakyi ye shes bsam gyis mi khyab pas mkhyen to// 'jam dpal
gzhon nur gyur pas gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das kyi lung bstan du gsol// bde bar gshegs pas bstan du gsol/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ 'jam dpal kha rog pa
skadam 'di shig/ 'di la lha dang bcas pa'i 'jig rten mos par 'gyur te/ skrag par 'gyur/ dngang bar 'gyur/ rab tu dbang bar 'gyur ro// 'jam dpal gyis gsol pa/ sems can
'di dag gis 'di lta bu thos nas/ slan cad nam yang dam pa'i chos spong bar mi 'gyur bar bgyi ba'i slad du thugs brtse bar dgongs te/ bcom ldan 'das bshadangu gsol/ bcos ldan
'das kyis bka' stsal pa ) 'jam dpal sa'i 'og nasems can dmyal ba yod po'i ming la 'di lta ste/ tsho ba dang/ rab tu tsha ba dang/ thig nag dang/ kun tu 'bar dang/ rab tu 'bar
dang/ reg dka'adang/ drag po dngaman rnon dang/ lcags kyi thu lum dang/ lcags kyi be con dang/ mun khung dang/ mgo bstod dang sbyi'u tshugs dang sba'u gdong dang/ rtag tu rab
'bar dang/ rul ba dang/ rtag tu dring dang/ rab 'joms dang/ ngos 'jom dang/ shin tu gnod 'byung rnams te/ 'jam dpal mi gti mug pa de gang du skye bar 'gyur ba'i sems can
@#// dmyal ba 'di dag go// de nas bcom ldan 'das la byang chub soms dang kha kun tu bzang pos 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das chos sna
ra ba de 'di nas shi 'phos nas gang du skye bar 'gyur/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa// kun tu bzang po khyod kyis zhu pa de 'degs par shus so// kun tu bzang po rigs kyi bu ma
rigs kyi bu mo chos smra ba de 'di nas shi 'phos nas/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa spobs pa bsam gyi mi khyab pa'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'jig rten gyi khams rab tu brgyan par skye bar
ba 'gyur te/ 'jig rten gyi khams de na byang chub sems dang 'a kun nas mdzes pa sha stag go/ 'chi ba'i dus kyi mi rigs kyi bu de la sangs rgyas bye ba phrag bcu gnyis mngon du 'gyur ro// rigs kyi bu
mdor na rigs kyi bu de'i phan yonani grangs med/ dpagatumed de/ de dag ni bskal pa stong dag gis kyang brjod par mi nus so// byang chub sems dpa' kun tu bzang pos gsol pa/ bcom ldan
kyi 'das slad ma'i dus na gang dag chos kyi rnam grangs 'di slong bar 'gyur ba'i sems can ji lta bu dag 'byung bar 'gyur/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ kun tu bzang po 'di lta bu chos 'di
dag spong bar 'gyur ba'i sems can de dag ni phal cher 'ab tu byang ba dag 'byung ba sta 3 'di skad du 'di ga ni snyan dngags sur ba na: 'di dag ni de bzhin gshegs pas gsungs pa ma na no// 'di

[z/]dag ni rang bzod byas pa yin te mdo sde 'di dag ni sngon nam yang ma thos so zhes 'dzin cing de dag chos kyi rnam gras 'di slong bar 'gyur ro// spangs nas kyang 'thol shinge 'chags par mi stagyur te/ de dag
chos spangs pas 'chi ba'i tshesems can dmyal pa kun tu 'bar ba mi bzad par skye bar 'gyur ro// skyes ma thag tu lcags kyi'akhor lus mi gcigug pa de dag gi mgo bcad nas sa la ltung bar 'gyur ro/ de

ltar gyur nas kyang b.ralapa mang po) bskal pa brgya phrag mang po dang ) bskal pa stong phrag mang por dmus long du 'gyur ro// gal te bskal pa brgyadag 'das nas mir skye bar gyur nayang tshe rabs thams

cad du dmus long du skye bar 'gyur zhing lce mad pa dang/ gdong phyin phyogs su 'dug pa dang/ ltag sgur dang 3 mjing pa nub pa dang 3 skang gyol dang 3 da lo khyi skad lta bu dang/ rtag tubakresashing skoms
pas nyen pa dang/ lus skams pa dang/ kha mnam pa dang sems can thams cad kyis mthong ngam/ thos na yid du mi 'ong bar skye bar 'gyuro// de nas thams cad dang ldan pa'i 'khor des
mgrin gcig tu smras pa// bcom ldan 'dasam 'tshal ba bdag cag gis mdo sde 'di lta bu dag spangs pa dang/ chos skya ba de dag la khros pa'i sems kyis pa ltos par gyur pa rnams nongs pa la rmongs par
'chags so// bcom ldan 'das bdag cag ji ltar byas par gyur pa dang ) ji ltar rmongs par gyur pa dang/ ji ltar shes rab 'chal par gyi pa dang/ ji ltar blo chung bar gyur pa rnams 'chags shing mchis
@#/ na/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams dgongs su gsol// de nas nyan thos chen po de dag dang/ brgya byin dang/ tshangs pa dang/ 'jig rten skyong ba de dag dang 1/
dge slong dang/ dge slong ma dang/ dge bsnyen dang/ dge bsnyan cha de dag sdongs nas/ bcom ldan 'das bdag cag ni bstan pa 'di lta bu 'di thos nas rab tu sangs lags so// bcom ldan 'das kyis
bkaM bka' stsal/ grogs podag de de bzhin no// ji skad smras ba bzhin te/ khyed kyis skyag bar bya pa'i rigs so// grogs po dag nga thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes bsus pa yin na/ nga nyid kyang skragan/

gang dag nga'i slob ma rnams lta ci smos/ rigs kyi bu dag chos 'di ni zab pa ste/ de ni mi 'am mi ma yin pa 'am/ lha 'am klu bam/ gnod sbyin nam/ dri ba bam/ sus kyang rnam par dkrug par mi nus na/ dag

sbyong ngam/ bram ze gzhan dag gis lta ga la zhus te ci smos/ rigs kyi bu dag chos kyi rnam grangs 'di ni lha dang bcas pa'i 'jig rten kyi mchod rten dugyur ba ste 1 gis kyi bu dag dpar na/ dkon mchog bla ma
tog ji lta bar mdo sde'i rgyal po 'di yang de bzhin du blta bar bya'o// denas bcom ldan 'das la 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pas 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das 'din legs
par gsungs pa legs so// bcom ldan 'das dge slong de lta bu de dag gis dad pas stsal ba ji ltar yongs su 'ju bar 'gyur/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ 'jam dpal gang dag chos kyi
0 rnam grangs 'di slong ba dang/ chos skya pa de dag la mi byams pa risems bskyed pa de dag ni nyi ma gcig gam/ sa gol gtogs pa gcig srid tsam zhig dad pas byin pa yongs su spyad pa'am/ tha na dge
dun la phul ba'i sa la mchil ma thal cig 'don du yang ngas ma gnang ngo// de nas bcom ldan 'das la tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bus 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das mtshamA

ma mchis pa lnga po dgu 'di dang nye ba lags sam rang b.lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ gnas brtan shA ra dwa ti'i bu kha rog de skad ma 'dri shig/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ shA ra dwa ti'i bu mtshamA

med pa snga po dag ni bla'i/ chos kyi rnamagrangs 'di sngangs pa ni nam yang de lta ma yin no/[︽]shA ra dwa ti'i bu mtshams med pa lnga byed pa ni mtshams med pa lnga po dag myur du zad par byas nas mir skye bar 'gyur go/

dam pa'i chos spong ba'i gang zag de ni nam yang sas rgyas kyi chos rnams thob par mi 'gyur te/ de ni bdag kyang phung la gzhan yang phung bar byed par 'gyur ro/ de nas tshe dang ldan pa shA ra du ti'i

bu bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngon du zhing 'di skad ces smras so/ e ma co dam pa'i chos spong ba'i sems can rnams ni sdug bsngal lo// las kyi sgrib pa 'di lta bu dag ni bdag gis rmi lam na yang mthong bar ma
bam po gsum pa/ bde nas bcom ldan 'das kyis/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// shAr dwati'i bu de snyamam
sems shig/ ngas chos bstan pa ni 'byung ba dang bcas pa yin na 'jig rten ni las bdag gir bya ba nga gi las kyi bgoskal la spyod pa/ rang gi las brtan par bya ba ste/ sems
na dag rang rang gi las rnams kyis sdug bsngal gyis tshor bamyong gi/ de la de bzhin gshegs pas ni ma 'gano/ shAr dwa ti'i bu sa na dge legs su 'gro pa ma bshad de/ bde bar 'grob dang/ 'jigs

'tsho pa med pas 'gro ba dang mya ngan las 'das par 'gro ba dang/ 'chi ba med par 'gro bam bshad na/ na kyang sems can 'di dag ni lus kyis nyes par spyod pa dang ldan/ dag gis nyes par spyod pa dang ldan/

yid kyis nyes par sbyong pa dang ldan zhing 'phags pa rnams la skur pa 'debs pa dang/ log par lta ste/ log par lta ba'i las dang chos yang dag par blangs pa'i rgyusalus zhig nas shi ba'i 'og tu ngan song
ngan 'gro log par ltung ba sems can dmyal ba rnams su sku ste/ de la de bzhin gshegs pas nam lanano// shA ra dwa ti'i bu sems can thams cad la nga'i snying rje 'di lta bu skye ste/ ngas sems can
gcil ba don du yang bskal pa 'am bskal pa las lhag sems can dmyal ba'i sdug bsngal rnams myong bar bya'i/ sems can gcig po yongs su btang bar mi bya'o snyam ste de shA ra dwa ti'i/
bu de bzhin gshegs pa'i snying rje chen po nide 'a'o/ 'dwa ti'i bu 'di lta ste dpe 'an/ mo zhig la bugacig gzugs bzang ba mdzes pa blta na sdug pa kha dog bzang po rgyasapa mchog dang ldan pa zhig

00 yodal/ de rkyen 'ga' zhig dang phrad nas/ 'chi ba'i dus byas par gyur na/ mi de bu la sems pas sdug bsngal zhig yid mi bde bar gyur tedu zhing sde sngags 'don to/ shA ra dwa ti'i bu de bzhin du de bzhin gsheg
pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyang soms can sdug bsngal ba dag la bu cig ba bzhin du dgongs pa mdzad de/ de bzhin gshegs pa dag nyon mongs pa rnams dang/ lhan cig gnas

bani ma yin no// shA ra dwa ti'i bu 'di lta ste/ dpon rgya mtsho chen po ni shi ba'i rodang lhan cige mi gnas so// shA ra dwa ti'i bu de bzhin du de bzhin gshegs pa dag kyang nyon mongs pa rnamasadang lhan cigami

gnas so/ shar dwa ti'i bu 'di lta ste ) dpalan skyom mkhananam sgyu ma mkhan gyi slob ma mkhas pas lam po che'i bzhi mdor skye bo'i tshogs chen po mngon par sprul te: bya ba dag ston kyang bya ba de dag ni
yul na mi gnas/ phyogs na mi gnas te/ ma skyes ma 'gagasashing 'gags pas mi 'gyur ro// shAr dwa ti'i bu de bzhin du de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyang sems can rnams yongs su smin par mdzad

cing 'dod chags kyi spyod pa yang ston te mdzad pa ston kyang spyod pa de dag ni yod pa ma 5na no// dper na nam mkha'i khams ni rnam par rtog pa med cing spros pa med pa'o// de bzhin du de bzhin gshegs pa'i
sku la yang rnam par rtog pa med cing spros pa med pa'o// 'on kyang sems na rnams dang mthun pa de de bzhin gshegs pa rnams mthun par mdzad de/ sems can rnams ji ltar 'dul bar 'gyur ba de bzhin du/
de bzhin gshegs pa rnams mthun par 'jug go/ shA ra dwa ti'i bu de bzhin gshegs pa' 'khrul pa mi mnga'o// de bzhin gshegs pa la mi mkhyen pa mi mnga'o// de bzhin gshegs pa

la bsnyal ba mi mnga'o// shA ra dwa ti'i bung ni lha dang bcas pa 'jig rten gyi thu bo dang/ gtso bo dang/ rab dang ]mchog dang phul dang ! bla ma dang/ bla na med pa dang/ gong na med pa dang mi mnyam pa dang mnyam

pa yin te/ shAr dwa ti'i bu tshig smras pa 'di ni bden pa'i rjes sumathun pa'o// rab tu byung ba'am/ khyim pa'ang rung sta/ sems can gang dag chos kyi rnam grangs 'di spong ba de dag thams cad ni sems can dmyal
wat+tA ba'i sdug bsngal 'di lta bu dag red par 'gyur// de nas tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor gyis bcom ldan 'das kyis bstan pa 'di thos nas thal mo sbyar te ]bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces
gsol to// bcom ldan 'das sems can de dag gis ni redapa nongs par red do// gang dag chos kyis rnam grangs 'di slong bar 'gyur ba de dag gi lce ci 'dra ba zhig tu 'gyur ba 'gas bcom ldan 'das
kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor de dag gi lce ni dpag tshad 'bum par 'gyur te/ de la lcags kyi thong gshol 'bar ba rab tu 'bar ba kun tu rab tu 'bar ba/ kun tu rab tu mchod cing 'bar ba ma lce

gcig tu gyur ba bye ba phrag lnga brgyas rmo bar 'gyur ro// de ci'i phyir zhe na 'di ltar des ngag ma bsrungs pa'i phyir te/ rab 'byor mi gti mug pa de dag gis las kyi sgrib pa ni de lta bu r 'gyur ro/
de nas sangs rgyas kyi mthus thams cad dang ldan pa'i'akhor des de bzhin gshegs pas bstan pa ni rmad du byung ba chen po lags so zhes ched du rjod pa ched du brjod do// de nas/
bcom ldan 'das la lha'i dbang po brgya byin gyis 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das bdag gis chos smra ba'i dge slong de dag phrag pa la bkur bar bgyi'o// me tog dang bdug pa dang//
spos dang/ phreng ba dang/ phyug pa rnams kyis mchod par bgyi'o// gdugs lan gsum mtshan lan gsum du phyag bgyi'o/ bsnyen bkur bgyi'o// bsti stang bgyi'o// bla mar bgyi'o// ri mo/
bgyi'o// mchod par bgyi'o// brjod par bgyi'o// gsol bar bgyi'o// bsti stang bgyi ba dang/ bla ma'i bgyi ba dang/ gus pas bsrung bar bgyi'o// de ci'i sladu zhin/ de dag ni bcom
ldan 'das kyi sras te chos kyi sku las nges par 'byung ba'i slad du'o// bcom ldan 'das 'di lta sta dbar na/ rgyal porgyal 'ges spyi bo nas dbang bskur ba'i bur gyur pa/ gzugs bzang ba mdzes/
ba blta na sdug pa de ni 'og ma thams cad kyis mchod pa 'i 'os dang phyag bgyi ba'i 'os lags so// de bzhin du chos smra ba de dag kya lhadang bcas pa'i 'jig rten gyi mchod pa'i 'os dang phyag bgyi
ba'icos lags so/ gad nas bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems dpa' kun tu bzang po la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// rigs kyis bu lha'i dbang po brgya byinagyis chos smra
@#/ ba'i dag slong de dag snying las chung ngur bya ba dang3 yongs su bskyang ba dang/ kun tu bsrung ba dang/ bskyab pa'i phyir tshig 'di'i gas par smyos so// byang chub sems dpakun
tu bzang pos gsol pa// bcom ldan 'das bdag gis kyang gis kyi bu 'am// gos kyi bu mo de dag kun tu bsu bar bgyi'o// yongs su bskyab pa dang/ yongs su bzung ba dang/ zhi ba dang bde
legs su 'gyur par bgyi'o// dpag chod brgya khor yug tu yongs su bskyang bar bgyi'o// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems dpa' kun tu bzang po lags kyi butshig 'di legs pa smras pa/
legs so legasaso zhes bya ba byin no/ de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis tshangs pa'i dbyangs kyis tshigs su bcad pa 'di bka' stsal to// gzhan la phan dang bde ba byed pa bsags pa po// rnam
pasnatshogs rab mdzes mchog rab tshegaldan pa// shin tu dri med bzhin ldan khyod kyi bsam pa mchog/ yon tan ldan na mi mnyam mnyam pa'i tshig legs smas/ de nas bcom ldan 'das la
byang chub sems dpa' kun tu bzangapos 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das khyang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po dag chos du dang ldan n/ dkon mchog ta la la'i gzungs thob par 'gyur/
bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po dag chos gcig dang ldan n/ dkon mchog ta la'i gzungs thobabo// chos gcig po gang zhe na/ 'di
bka ltaste: sems can thams cad la khong khro bkod pa'o// kun tubazang po byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po dag gi chos gnyis te/ gnyis gang zhen 'di lta ste/ phrag dog med pa dang/ rlom sems/
med pa ste/ kun tu bzang po 'di dag na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po dag gi chos gnyis so// kun bzang po gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni sems can thams cad la//
dpang po gnod bar mi 'gyur ko/ rigs kyi bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems can thams cad la thams cad kyithams cad du rnam par 'tshob bskyod par mi bya'o// byang chub sems dpa'i yon tan
brjod pa 'di bshad pa dang/ dkon mchog ta la la'i gzungs kyi khyad par gyi yon tan yongs su brjod bya bshadaban/ lha dang mi'i skya dag las sems can dpag tu med pas gzungs thob par gyur to//
dkon mchog ta la la'i gzungs kyi khyad par gyi yon tan yongs su brjod pa'i le'u'o/// de nas tshodang ldan pa kun dga' bo stan las langs te 3 bla gos phrag pa gcig chu gzar nas/
pus mo g.yas pa'i lha nga sa la btsugs te/ bcom ldan 'das ga la ba de logs su thal mo sbyar ba btud nas/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das chos kyi rnam grangs 'di
ni zag pags so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bkalnga stsal pa// kun dga' bo de de bzhin te/ gzugs zab pa'i phyi'i zab bo// tshor ba dang/ 'dushes dang/ 'du byed dang rnam par shes pa zab pa'i phyir
zab bo// stong pa nyid zab pa'i phyi zab bo// namamakha' zab pa'i phyir thab go/ kun dga' bos gsol pa// bcom ldan 'das bdag gis chos kyi phung po brgyad khri bzhi stong de bzhin/
gshegs pa las mngon du shosan/ chos kyi rnam grangs 'dilta bu ni nam yang m shosaso// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal// chos kyi rnam gras 'di ni shan tu thos par bya dka' ba yin no// kun dga'/

pa'o bos gsol pa/ slang ma'i tshe slad ma'i dus lnga brgya tha ma la dam pa'i chos nub ba'i dus kyi tsho sems can mang po dag sangs rgyas kyi mdzad pa bgyid bar 'gyur ba/ bcom ldan 'das kyis chos kyi rnam grangs/
'di byin gyis brlab tu gsol/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa// kun dga' bos chos kyi rnam grangs 'di byin gyis brlabs zin te/ de bzhin gshegs pa shAkya thub pas chos smra ba de dag kyang byin
gyis brlabs so// kun dga' bo ga la la zhig chos kyi rnam gras 'di yi ger 'dri bde ni mig na bar mi 'gyur ) lcen bar mi 'gyur/ sna na bar mi 'gyur ) son bar mi 'gyur/ lag pa dang rkang pa na bar
mi 'gyur/ klad pa na bar mi 'gyur/ rna ba na bar mi 'gyur/ lus dman par mi 'gyur ) lus dri mi zhim por mi 'gyur/ bgrol gyi gnod pas 'chi ba'i dus byed par mi 'gyur go/ de la mi dang mim yin pa
thams cad srung bar 'gyur go 'di nas shi 'phos nas kyang de spros pa thams cad yongs su sus nas bde 'gro mtho ris kyi 'jig rten du lha rnams kyi nang du skye bar 'gyur ro kun dga' bos gsol pa// bcom
ldan 'das chos 'di bshad pa'i tsho bdud b.ran mi bgyid pa'i rgyu gang lags/ rkyen gang lags ) bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ kun dga' bo bdud thams cad chos kyi rnam grangs 'di la bar chad/

byed mi nus te/ kun dga' bo gang gi tsho bdud sdig can 'di snyam du bdag dkon mchog ta la la'i gzungs 'chad pa la bar chad byed du 'gro'o snyam pa'i sems bskyed pa de'i tsho/ bdud sdig can gyis rang gi khyim kun tu

'bar bar mthong ste/ kun dga' bo chos kyi rnam grangs 'di de ltar zab bo/kun dga' bos phyogs gang na chos kyi rnam grangs 'di spyod pa'i sa phyogs de mchod rten du 'gyur/ phyag bya ba'i 'os su yang 'gyur ro// kun
dga' bos gsol ba/ gal tede bzhin gshegs pas phyogs gang nabazhugs pa'i sa phyogs de nyid na chos kyi rnam gros brda dang gnas par gyur la// bdag de bzhin gshegs pa la blta brtsi slad du mchis
shing mchis nas kyang/ sngar de bzhin gshegs pa la phyag bgyis nas slad kyis chos kyi rnam grangs 'di la phyag bgyis na nongs pa ci mchis/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ kun dga' bo gang gi

rmakhyod kyis chos kyi rnam grangs 'di lta bu bkol te nga la phyag tshalab de'i tshe khyod nyid shes pa dang bcas par 'gyur ro// kun dga' bo gzhan yang nga lha dang bcas pa'i 'jig rten gyi thu bo dang/ gtso bo dang/ mchog
dngadam pa yin mod kyi/ kun dga' bo ngas snga chos kyi rnam grangs 'di thos nas/ phyis byang chub mngon par rdzogs bar sangs rgyas so/ kun dga' bos gsol ba/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gsheg/
pas gang las ting nge 'dzin bzhi chen dkon mchog la la bstan pa 'di gsan ba// de bzhin gshegs pa'i gongan su mchis/ bcom ldan 'das kyi bka' stsal pa/[:]kun dga' bo
mi'i 'jig rten dang lha'i 'jig rten dang dri za'i 'jig rtenan ngab gong nas lang med de/ 'on kyang byang chub sems dpa'i spyad pa spyod na/ sa bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa ye shes thogs

ba pa med pa'i snying po gsar bzang po bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i 'od zer du ma'i lte ba rgyas pa las mngon du thos te/ kun dga' kho bya dka'abachen po bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong du ma myong nas/ sa chos kyi rnam
'a grungs 'di thos te 3 de'i tshe de bzhin gshegs pa des nga 'ang bstan to// kun dga' bore lta bas na khyod kyis sngar chos kyi rnam grangs 'di la phyag bgyis la phyis pa la phyag tshol cig/ de
nasabargya byin dang/ tshangs pa dang/ 'jig rten skyong bde dag thams cad kyis mgrin gcig tu tshig 'di skadaces smras so// a la 'a chos/ a la la chos chos rnams kyi rnam par 'phrul dra a la

rgyu la'o sems can gang dag chos kyi rnam grangs 'di'i ming thos pa de dag kyang phyag bya ba'i chos yin na/ gang dag 'dzin pa dang/ klog pa dang kun chub par byed pa dang/ gzhan dag la yang rgya chen yang
dag pa la rab tu ston pa ltasmos kyang ci dgos te/ de dag ni de bzhin gshegs pa zhes brjod pa ra bya'o// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis brgya byin dang tshangs pa dang 'jig rten skyong ba de dag la kyi
grogs po dag khyod kyis tshig 'di legs par smras pa legs solegs so zhesalegs so zhes bya ba byin no// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis zhal nas ljags kyi dbang po phyung ste/ stong
gsum gyi stong chen po 'i 'jig rten gyi khamasalcags kyi dbang pos snang bar byas nas byang chub sems dpa' kun tu bzang po la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// sems can gang dag chos kyi rnam grangs

'di thos pa de dag ni ji ltar mi dmus long gis nye ma'i snang ba mi mthong ba dang/ jiltaratshong pa thabs mi shes pa dang ji ltar mi dbul po gzhan gyi ngor lta ba dang 'dra sta/ de dag gi don du ngas dpe 'di dag

byas na ci nas sems can rnams chos ni po che'i phung po 'di 'dra ba lasa'ang du mi 'gyur bar bya ba'i phyir/ chos kyi rnam grangs 'di'i ched dang/ sems can thams cad kyi don tung khyod la gsol ba 'debs
na 'ges kyi bu khyod sngo'am de nas byang chub sems dpa' kun tu bzang po stan las langs te/ bla gos phrag pa gcig tu gzar nas/ pus mo g.yas pa'i lha nga sa la btsugs te/ bcom

ldan 'das ga la ba de logs su thal mo sbyar ba btud nas ) ngu shing byang chub sems dpa' kun tu bzang po rang gi chos kyi stan las langs ma thagatu3 de nas de'i mod lastong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi
khams 'di rnams pa drug tugayos ) rab tu g.yos/ kun tu rab tu g.yos so// 'gul// rib tu 'gul/ kun tu rab tu'agul to// lteg/ rab tu ldeg/ kun tu rab tu ldeg go/ wur cun deb tu 'u 'u
[si ]/kun tu rab tu 'ur cur bo// chamachem/ rab tu chem chem/ kun tu rab rtachem chem mo// thugs ba chu 'khrugs )kun tu rab tu 'khrugs so// 'jig rten du snang ba chen po
yang byung bar gyur to// de nas byang chub sems dpa' kun tubazang pos sor mo bcu thal mo spyar tang zhing bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das bdag sngo
lags so// bde bar gshegs pa bdag spro lags so// bcom ldan 'das khyod ni thams cad mkhyen pa sems can thams cad la phan par bzhed pa thugs rje chen po dang ldan pa lags kyi stang du/
sgyu bdag ni de bzhin gshegs pa las skyes pa lags na/ ci'i slad du de bzhin gshegs pa'i bka' ltar mi bgyid/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa'i bka' ni bdud rtsi'i bka' lags na/
ba bag de bzhin gshegs pa'i bka'ad/ 8gal bar bgyid pa'i mthu bdag la ga la mchas bcom ldan 'das bdag gis ni byas pa gzo bar bgyi ba lags kyi/ byas pa mi gzo bar bgyi bam
lags so// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems dpa' kun tu bzang po legs so zhes khyab byin te/ kyi rgyal ba'i sras legs so'i gsaso// khyod ni de bzhin gshegs

b rnams kyi sras thubodang/ gtso bo dang ) mchog dang/ dam pa dang phul yin to ) chos kyi rnam grangs 'di khyod la khongs su gtad do// 'di ni nga'i ston pa yin te de'i phyir khyod kyis bsrung bar bya'o//

[/]dus dus su bsti stang gyis shig/ bzhi bo che'i snod du chugal khragal thogs shika/ phyi ma'i tsho phyi ma'i dus na dge slong sdig pa can de dgal yid ma rton cig/ ges kyi bu 'di ni khyod la rjes su bstan pa'o//
byang chub sems dpa' kun tu bzang pos gsol pa/ 2 bcom ldan 'das rab tu byung ba ci 'dra ba de dag 'byung bar 'gyur/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa// rigs kyi bu khag de skadam 'dri
shig byang chub sems dpa' kun tu bzang pos gsol pa 2 sems can mang po la sman par bskyed par 'gyur lags na/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bshad du gsol ) bde bar gshegs pas bod
du gsol/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ kun tu bzang po bshad kyis nyon cig/ 'khor rgya mtsho lta bu 'di dang/ 'jam dpal dang spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug la sogs pa/ 3 byang chub
sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gras med dpag tu med pa thams cad yid la byed pa gzhan thong la/ phyi ma'i tsho phyi ma'i dus na rab tu byung ba ci 'dra ba dag 'byung bar 'gyur ba de dag nyon cig/
de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems dpa' kun tu bzang po la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// kun tu bzang po rab tu byung ba dam pa'i chos sun 'byin pa/ khyim la chags pa// rnyed
pa la chags pa/ 2 gtsug lag khang la chags pa// gnas la chags pa/ lhung bzed dang/ chos gos la chags pa// khyim sun par byed pa// sdig pa'i chos kun tu spyod pa/ de dag 'byung ste kun
tu bzang po mi gtimug pa de lta bu dag gi don tungs mdo 'di yongs sugatad kyis mdo 'di nub par gyur ta/ de nas phyogs bcunas lha dang/ kudang/ gnod
sbyin dang 3 drikhra thams cad lhags te/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das bdag cag kyang thams cad 'dus shing tshogs te/ ji srid 'tsho'i bar dang ) dam
'a7 pa'i chos ji srid gnas kyi bar du chos kyi rnam grangs 'di yongs su bskyang bar bgyi'o// chos smra ba'i dge slong de la yang yongs su bskyang bar bgyi'o/ bste stang du bgyi'o// btsun par bgyi'o//
rim gro bgyig/ mchod pa bgyi'o// brjod par bgyi'o// gsol ba bgyi'o// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems dpa' kun tu bzang bo la sogs pa byang chub
somasadapa' bye ba phrag dgu bcu rtsa gnyis po de dag la yang dag par bskul ba'i tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag gsungs so// yon tan pha rol phyin pa de dag gi/ yon tan kun bshad thams cad
las nyon// nga rgyal rgyags dang bag med spang byos la// dga' zhing mgu ba'i yid kyis mnyan par gyis// mag d+ha 'di'i shing dbang byang chub dung ]/rang byung mA ya sang ge bzhugs shes grags
tange 'dzin rnam par thar pa mchog la gnas// shing rgyal chen po de yi drungan bzhugs// phyogs bcu'i zhing rdul snyad dngade thabasacig/ skyes bu dam pa rnams kyis dad 'a bo bskor// sangs rgyas
phal chen zhes bya'i ting nge 'dzin// ting 'dzin de la mi yi dbang po gnas// mi dbang de ni snyoms par zhugs rtogs nas// 'jam dpal gzhon nu shar gyi phyogs legs nas// sas rgyas zhing
bcu'i rdul snyad lhan cig tu// skyes bu dam pa rnams dang rgyal drung 'ongs// de bzhin sbyar te phyogs bcu'i zhing kun nas// sangs rgyas sras po dang la zhes bya ba kun// phyogs bcu'i zhing rdul
snyad dang lhan cig tu// skyes bu dam pa rnams dang lhags par gyur// der 'dus gyur nas 'jig rten phan 'dod pa// 'jam dpal grags pa mtha' yas ldan rnams la// sems can dam pa
bzang po'i dpal gyis dris// sangs rgyas sras kyi spyod gang yon tan ni// de nas sems dpa' 'jam dpal zhes bya ba// rtog pa med pas byang chub yon tan dang// bden yangs yon tan ldan
gyi spyod yul gtsang// sems can dam pa bzang po'i dpal la des// sangs rgyas sras po rnams kyi spyod yul gtsang// rgyal bas bstan pa bdag gis 'di'i sgras kyis// khyod kyang sangs rgyas
sras kyi yon tan dang// spyod pa gang dag yin pa brjod par gyis// bzang po'i dpal gyis smras pa rgyal sras nyon// yon tanamatha' yas ldan de'i yon tan las// dpa tshul cung zad tsam zhig brjod
par bya// rgyamatsho'i thigs pa bzhin du shin tu chung// byang chub gzhir 'gyur ba yi rang byung sems// thog ma nyid du bskyod pa gang yin pa// de yi yon tan bsngags pa mtha' yas te// mtshusamed
kyis kyang yongs su brjod mi spyod// pha rol phyin dang sa yi yon tan rnams // bskal pa mang por spyad pa ci smos te// phyogs bcu'i rgyal ba kun gyis de dag gi/ na
chubo zad pa mdzad mi spyod// yon tan mthu'u yasa rnams kyi yon tan las// dpe tshul cung zad tsam zhig brjod pa ste// mkha' la bya rjes 'dra bar chung ba dang// sa chen rnams las rdul phran gzhi/
dang mtshungs// byungachub yon tan gnas kyi sems skye ba/ rgyu med ma yin gyi nam lin gyi// rgyal dang rgyal ba'i chos dang dge 'dun la// nga dang dang ba bskyed nas sems skye ste// den 'dod dang
longs spyod rgyal srid dang// bdag la bde dang snyan dang grags phyi'i min// 'gro ba'i sdug bsngal ma lus zhi bya'i phyir// 'jigarten phan pa byed pa'i[“]mas skyago/ rtag tusems canapan pa bya phyir

dang/ zhinge rnams sbyong dang sangs rgyas mchod pa dang// chos yongs gzung dngasangs rgyas byang chub dang// ye shesarnamapar sbyang phyir sems de skye// rgyal ba kun dang chos dang de bzhin du// 'phag

ba'i tshogs la rtag tu dad pa dang// dang zhing mos dang gus pa babaskyod nas// bla ma gus par mchod phyir sems de skye// rgyal dang rgyal ba'i chos la dad gyur cing// sangs rgyas sras kyi spyod la dad
khyod la// byang chub bla na med la dad gyur nas// skyes bu chen po rnams kyi sems skya'o// dad pa'i stobs kyis mi bdag gyur pa rnams // bsam las rgya chen mchod pas mchod byas shing// chos dang
de bzhin mi phyad dge 'dun la// bsam yas mchod pas mchod nas sems skya'o// dad pa sngon 'dren ma ltar skyed pa des// yon tan thams cad bsrung zhing 'bal bar byed// dogs pa sad cing
chu bo rnams las sgrol// dad pa bdeba'i grong khyeramatshon payin// dad parog pa med cing sems dang byed// nga rgyal spong zhing gus pa'i rtsa ba yin// dad pagata' dang nor dang rkang pa'i mchog/
lag ba bzhin du dge sdud rtsa ba yin// dad pa yongs su gtong la dga' bar byed// dad pa rgyal ba'i chos ba rab dga' skyed// dad pa yon tan ye shes khyab par byed// sangs rgyas go 'phang
ston mi thob par byed/ dbang po rno shing rab tu gsal bar byed// dad pa'i stobs 'a gzhan gyis mi brdzi zhing// nyon mongs rnam par sal ba'i gzhi rten yin// dad pa rang 'byung yon tan
rnams kyang tshol// dad pa chags pa tsi sgo la chags pa med// mi dul sbyangs shing dal ba'i mchog cig yin// dad pa bdud kyi lam las 'da' byed cing// thar ba'i lam mchogaston par byedapa/
yin yon tan zhing gi sa bon ma rul ba// dadab byang chub shing ni rnam par skyod// ye shes khyab par yon tan 'phel bar byed// dad pa rgyal ba thams cad ston pa yin// dad pas mos pa'i khyad par

dga' rnams kyi// de la spyod pa rim gyis brjod par bya// 'di 'dra'i chos ni 'jig rten rab dkon te// rgya mtsho'i nang na rin chen rgyal po bzhin// gang dag rtag tu sangs rgyas dad gus pa// de dag tshul
khrims bslab pa yong mi 'do// gang dag tshul khrims bslab pa me 'dor ba// yon tan ldan de yon tan ldan pas bstod/ tshul khrims byang chub sems ston byed pa ste//
slob pa'i sa yi yon tan rnams la sbyor// tshul khrims bslab pa 'dor bar mi byed pa// de dag rgyal bsabasngags pa'i 'os su 'gyur// gang dag rtag tu sas rgyas dad gus pa// de dag rgyal la
mchod pa rgya chen byed// gang dag rgyal lamachod pa che byed pa// de dag sangs dad ba bsagami khyab// gang dag rtag tu chos la dad gus pa// de dag rgyal ba'i chos nyanangoms pa med// gang dag rgyal
ba'i chos nyan mi ngoms pa// de dag chos la mos pa bsam mi khyab// gang dag rtag tudage 'dun dad gus pa// de dag mi ldog dge 'dun dadapa yin// gang dag mi ldog dge 'dun rab dad nga// de
dag dod pa'i stobs kyis mi ldog 'gyur// gang dag dad pa'i stobakyis mi ldog pa// de dag dbang po rno zhing rab tu gsal// gang dag dbang po rno zhing rab gsal ba// de dag sdug pa 'i grogs po rnam
tshe bar sbangs// gang dag sdig pa'i grogs po rnam sbyangs pa// de dag chos ldan grogs kyis yongs su gzung// gang dag chos ldan grogs kyis yongs gzung ba// de dag dge ba rgya chen sogs par byed/

gang dag dge ba rgya chen sogs byed pa// bdag nyidi chen po de dag rgyu stobs ldan// bdag nyid chen rgyu stobs gang ldan pa// de dag mos pa'i khyad par rgya chen 'gyur// gang dag mos pa'i khyab par rgya che ba//

07/de dag rgyal ba kun gyis rtag byin rlabs// gang dag rgyalaM ba kun gyis byin brlabs pa// de dag byang chub don tu sems kyang skye/ gang dag byang chub don tu sems skye ba// de dag drang srong chen po'i yon tan
brtson// drang srong chen po'i yon tan gang brtson pa// de dag gis mtho sangs rgyas rigs su skyo// gang dag 'gas mgosangs rgyas ragis skyos pa/// de dgamanyam zhing sbyor dang mi sbyor spangs// mnyam
zhing sbyor dang mi sbyor gang spangs pa// de dag dad dang bsam pa rnam par dag/ gang dag dad dang bsam pa rnam dag pa// de dag lhag pa'i bsam pa dam pa mchog/ gang dag lhag bsam dam pa mchog ldan
pa de dag rtag tu pha rol phyin pa sod// gang dag rtag tu pha rol phyin spyod pa// de dag theg pa chen po 'di la zhugs// gang dag theg pa chen po 'di'i bzhugs pa// de dag sangs rgyas rnams la sgrub
pas mchod// gang dag sgrub pasasangs rgyas mchod byed pa// de dag sangs rgyas rjes su dran mi byed// gang dag sangs rgyas rjes dran mi phyed pa// de dag rtag tusangs rgyas bsam yas mthong//
gang dag sangs rgyas bsam yas rtag mthong ba// de lanam yang sangs rgyas mi bzhugs min// gang dag nam yang sangs rgyas mi zhugs min// de dag bar skabs chos las nyams mi 'gyur/ gang
dag bar skabs chos las mi nyams pa// de dag stobs bsgrub pamed par 'gyur// gang dag spobs pa sgrib pa med gyur pa// de dag chos stab stonapa mtha' yas 'gyur// gang dag chos rab ston pa mtha2
@#/ ]yasapa// de dag 'gro la byams shing nang la 'dod// gang dag 'gro la byams shange phan 'ad pa// dedag snying rje chen po'i rtsa ba brtan// gang dag snying rje chen po'i rtsa brtan pa//
de dag chos dga' dga' ba'i dbang por 'gyur// gang dag chos dga' dga' ba'i dbang po can// de dag 'dus byas skyon gyis yal bar bor// gang dag 'dus byas skyon gyis yal bor// de dag ngargyal
rgyags med bag med min// gang dag nga rgyal rgyags mad bag med min// de dag rtag tu bdag dang gzhan don brtson// gang dag rtag tu bdag gzhan don brtson pa// de dag 'khor bar yongs su skyo ba
mad// gang dag 'khor bar los su mi skyob// de dag rten pa dam pa mchog dang ldan// gang dag rkun pa dam pa mchog ldan pa// dedag mngon shes rnam par dag pa skyes// gang dgama'on shes
rnam par dag skyesang/ dudaga' ba'i spyod pa mang po rtogs// gang dag 'gro ba'i spyod pa mang rtogs pa// de dag 'gro ba yongs su smin byed mkhas// 'gro ba yongs su smin byed gang mkhas pa// de dag
'gro bsdu shes chog mkhas ]/'gro ba sdud shes chog su mkhas pa// de dgabasdu ba'i dngos po bzhi la brtson// gang dag bsdu ba'i dngos po bting brtson pa// de dag 'gro ba'i don ni mtha' yas byed/ gang
dag 'gro don mtha' yas byed gyur pa// de dag shes rab thabs la rten pa yin// gang dag shes rab thabs la rten gyur pa// dba'i bodi dag bla med lam la gnas// dpa' bo gang dag bla med lam gnas pa//
0/ de rtag bdud dpung rnams kyis 'os mi tshugs// gang dag bdud dpung rnams kyis mi tshugs pa/de dag bdud kyi lam las rab tu 'das// gang dag bdud kyi lam las rab 'as pa// de dag mi ldog pa ni

rjes su thob// gang dag ma ldog an thob gyur ba// de dag mi skya bzod pa thob pa yin// gang dag mi skya bzod pa thob gyur pa// 'jig rten sgron de rgyal bas lung bstan to// 'jig rten sgron gang rgyal bas lung
bstan pa// de dag rgyal ba kun dang mngon sum gnas// rgyal ba kun dang mngon du su gnas pa// de dag rgyal gsang rnam 'phrul chogamakhas// rgyal gsung rnam 'phrul chog su mkhas ba/dedag rgyal ba
kun gyis dgongs pa yin// gang dag rgyal ba kun gyis dgongs gyur pa// de dag yon tan kun gyis legs par brgyan// gang dag yon tan kun gyis legs brgyan pa// de dag bsod nams dam pas lus
kyang sbyangs// bsod nams mchog gis gang lus rnam sbyangs pa// de dag gsar gyi ri bo 'dra bor 'bar// gser gyi ri bo 'dra bar su 'bar ba// de dag sum cu rtsa gnyisamtshan rnams rdzogs// gang
dag sum cu rtsa gnyis mtshan rdzogs pa// de dag lus rnams dpe byad bzang pos spras// gang dag lus rnams dpe byad bzang smras pa// de dag lus kyi 'od ni mtha' yas so// gang dag lus kyi 'od ni
mkha' yas pa// de dag 'od zer bkod pa bsam mi khyag/ gang dag 'od bkod bsam gyis mi khyab pa// de dag 'od las pad+ma rnams kyang 'byung// gang dag bod la sa bda rnams byung ba// de dag rgyal gzugA
ba'i gdan 'khod par// phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten dag tu ston byed cing// don yod gnas pasems can 'dul bar byed// gang dag rgyal gzugs pad+ma'i gdan 'bod par//
phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten dag tu ston byed cing// don yod gnas pa sams can 'dul byed pa// de dag mngon shes rnam 'phrul mtha' yas so// gang dag mngon shes rnam 'phrul mtha' yas pa// de
dag bsam gyis ma khyab dang rgyu zhing// bsam gyis mi khyab chos rnams ston par byed// sams can bsam gyisami khyab tshom par byed// gang dag bsam gyis mi khyab chos ston cing// sems can
bsam gyis mi khyab tshim byed pa// de dag so so rigs shes stobs rnams kyis// bsam pa ji bzhin 'jig rten sems can 'dul// gang dag so so rig shes stobs rnams kyis de bas da ji
bzhin 'jig rten sems can 'dul// de dag rtag tu lus dang ngag dang yid// ye shes sngon du 'gro zhing rjes su 'brang// gang dag rtag tulus dang ngag dang yid// yang shas sngon du 'gro zhing rjes 'brang
rgya ba de dag smon lam stobs kyis ci 'dod par// sems can rgyud na gzugs ni ston par byed// gang dag smon lam stobs kyis ci'adod pa// sems can rgyud na gzugs ni ston byed pa// de
ga tshig rnamasarjod par byed pa'i tshe// dbyangs kyi yan lag bsaMm yas sgra byung ngo// gang dag tsheg rnams rjod par byed pa'i/dbangs kyi yan lag bsam las sgra 'byung ba// de dag 'gro
ma lus kun gyis sems// skad cig gcig la sems kyis rnam par shes// gang dag bgrob ma lus kun gyi sems// skad cig gcig lasems kyis rnam shes pa// de dag nam yang mi 'chi skye
mi 'gyur/ nyon mongs rgyu ba'ang 'byung bar 'gyur ma yin// gang dganam yang mi 'chimi skye zhing// nyon mos rgyu ba 'byung bar mi 'gyur// de dag yon tan chos nyid ye shes lus// chos kyis rab

tu phye bas 'jig rten rgyu// gang dag yon tan chos nyid ye shes lus// chos kyis rab phye 'jig rtan rgyu byed pa// de dag sobacu rnams dang dbang bcu dang// pha rol phyin dang rnam thar mchog laganas//
gang dgas bcu rnamasaM da dbang bcu dang// pha rol phyin dang rnam thar mchog gnas pa// de dag dbang skul bkod dang rnam 'phrul dang// ting 'dzin mchog la gnas ba rjes su thob// gang dag dbang bas
bkod dang rnam 'phrul dang// ting 'dzinamchog la gnas pa rjes thob pa// de dag phyogs bcu'i rgyal ba thams cad las/ dbang bskur thams cad ma lus nod par byed// gang dag phyogs bcu'i rgyal
pa thams cad las// dbang bskur thams cad ma lus nod byed pa// de dag spyi bor phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas kyis// phyag mthil bdud rtsi can gyis dbang bskur to// gang dag spyi bor phyogs bcu'i sangs
rgyas kyis// phyag mthil bdud rtsi can gyis dbang bskur pa// mthu brtan de dag nam mkha' lta bu r ni// ma lus khyab byas phyogs rnams kun na gnas// mthu brtan gang dag nam mkha' lta bu'i ni// ma
u/ lus khyabatus phyogs rnams kun gnas ba// mtshungs med de dag spyod yul lha bcas kyi// 'jig rten rnams kyis shes par so ngas minus// mtshungs med gang dag spyod

tshul lhar bcas kyi// 'jig rten rnams kyis shes par mi nus pa// de dag rdzun pa kun dang mthong bdang// mang thos pa dang rdzobs pa don yod do// gang dag rdzun pa kun dang thong ba dang// ming thos pa
dang spobs pa don yod pa// skyes chenade dag sbyin pa sbyin byed kyi// sbyin pa thams cad don yod 'gyur ba yin/ skyes bu dam pa de dag rnams kyi mthus// chos kyang gnas shing byams pa nyams mi 'gyur/
dge ba'i las lam rab tu sbyong 'gyur tu/ dkon mchog mthu yang dam pa mchog tu 'gyur// rdo rje 'khrig pa'i rin chen mchog yod pa// de yi mthu yis rgya mtshor bde chen rnams // mi zad mi 'grib
'phel bar mi 'gyur te// de bzhin yon tan mtha' yas yon tan chu// gangan sas rgyas med pa'i zhing gyur pa// der ni byang chub rnam par sangs rgyas ston// phyogs rnams gang ni chos kyang med
gyur pa// phyogs der chos kyi gten ston par byed// de dag rtog med rnam par mi rtogs cing// de dag lhun gyis grub par phyogs kun tu// zla pa lta bu r snang ba rab ston cing// thabs stong
dag gis sems can 'dul bar byed// de dag skad cig re la phyogs bcu yi// 'jig rten kun tu byang chub sangs rgyas ston// 'khor lo skor dang mya ngan 'das zhing dang// ring bsrel rab tu rgyas
pa'ang dpa' bo ston// mkhas pa de dag nyan thos rang rgyalas// sangs rgyas bkod pa rnam 'phrul mtha' yas pa// bskal pa bsam mi khyab par ston byed cing// theg gsum sgo nas sems can
'dul bar byed// chos pa kun gyi bsgrub pa shes pa rnams // khye'u dang bu mo budamed lus rnams dang// lha me lha min klu dang gnod sbyin dang// grul bum lto 'phya chen po'i gzugs rnams ston//
rgyam phyag rgya ting 'dzin gyi skos// dpa' bo dengag 'gro ba'i gzugs spyod dang// rtags dang sbyong dang sgra skad 'jug pa dag/ jisnyad thams cad ma lus ston par byed// de dag zhing bkod bsam
gyis mi khyab pas// phyogs bcu'i rgyal pa kun la mchod par byed// gang dag zhing bkod bsam gyis mi khyab pas// phyogs bcu'i rgyal ba kun mchod byed pa// de dag 'od brer bkod pa bsam
yas shing// sems can 'gro' pa'i ye shes mtha' gso// gang dag 'od zer bkod pa bsam yas shing// sems can 'grelar sengashesamatha' yas pa// de dag lus dang ngag gi rnam
'phrul dang// yid kyis rnam par 'phrul pa bsam mi khyab// gang dag lus dang ngag gi rnam 'phrul dang// nad kyi rnam 'phrul bsam gyis mi khyab pa// de dag sbyin dang tshul khrims rnam 'phrul dang
bzod dang brtson 'grus rnam 'phrul bsam mi khyab// gang dag sbyin dang tshul khrims rnam 'phrul dang// bzod brtson rnam 'phrul bsamakyi mi khyab pa// de dag sangs rgyas phal chen ting 'dzin sgos//
bsam gtan rnam par 'phrul dngashes rab dang// thabs dang mngon shes rnam 'phrul bsam mi khyab// yon tan kun gyis rnam 'phrul mthar yang yas// de dag phra rab rdul/
bajug ting nge 'dzin// rnal rnams kun l mngon par sgrub byed cing// rdulacig steng nazhing rnams bsam mi khyab// ston par byed kyang rdul la 'khel ba med// rdul de'i steng du sangs rgyas bcas zhing
dang sangs rgyas med pa'i zhing yang kha cig ston/ )nyon mongs rnam dag dog pa kha cig dang/ yangs shing bradang chab 'i zhing yang ston// zhing rnams la la 'jig dang 'chags pa dang// la la/
stong g.yogs mad dang mthun pa dang// la la chol pa smig rgyu lta bu dang// la lamig 'phrul lta bu r gyur pa rnams // ji ltar rdul gcig stang duston byed ga/ de bzhin rdul rnams ma lus kun la ston//
drang srong ting 'dzin rnam 'phrul 'di 'dra ste// grags pa mtha' yas rnam thar 'di 'dra'o// dedag rgyal mchod rnam 'phrul ting nga 'dzin// rgyalab kun lamangon par grub byed cing// lag pa'i mthil du
stong gsum rgyus bkang ste// skyes bu chen po rnams la mchod pa byed// phyogs bcu dag nam tog phreng ba dang// sos byug ni chen rin chen ji snyed pa// de dag byang chub shing drung bzhugs pa yi//
rgyal rnams mchod phyir lag pa'i mthil nas byin// gos dang bya ma nin ji skad dang// rgyal mtshan ba dan gdugs mchog snatshogs dang// gser gyis brgyan pa'i pan chen bla re rnams //
00 de dag lag pa'i mthil nas char du 'bebs// phyogs bcu dugan yo byad mtha' yas gang// drang srong chen po rnams la mchod 'os pa// de dag lagapa'i mthil nas char 'bebs shing/ byang

chub shing drung bzhugs pa ste rgyal ba mchod// phyogs rnams dag na rol cho ji snyed pa// rje dang rdza rnga sgra snyan pa bang dang// sil snyan sgra dang sgra chen gling bu nas// de dag lag pa'i mthil nas
rab tu sgrogs// phyogasabacu kun gyis dpe zla med rnams kyi// yang dag yon tan bsngags pa snatshogs ngang// bstod pa'i tshigs bcad bsgrub pa snatshogs pa// de dag lag pa'i mthil
nas rab tu sgrogs// 'od zer gang dag las dag pa yongs bsags pa// lag pa g.yas nas yongs su 'gyed byed cing// spos chus rgyal ba'i zhing rnams thams cad du// 'debs shing 'jig
tan sgron ma rnams la mchod// 'od zer bkod dang ldan pa mdzes pa'i 'od// pad+ma'i rgyan byung bsam yas rab 'chang ba// pad+mamatshon rab gzugs can du ma dag/ lag nas rgyal ba rnams la
mchod pa byed// me tog phal chen me tog bar dang// ma tog bkod pa'i 'od zer rab bkye ste// me tog sna tshogs kun tu bkram byas shing// bdag nyid chen bo de dag rgyal khamachod// bdug pa
phal chen bdag pa'i blarer dang// bdug pa bkod pa'i 'od zer rab bkye ste// bdug pa sna tshogs kun tu bkram byas shing// bdag nyid chen bo de dag rgyal ba mchod// thal chen spos dang spos kyi
bya@#// bla re dang// sos kyi bkod pa'i 'od zer ba bkye ste// sna tshogs gros rnams kun tu bkram byas shing// bdag nyid chen bo de dag rgyal ba mchod// lung ba phal chen
'breng ba'i bla re dang// 'brang ba bkod pa'i 'od zer rab bkye ste// 'brang ba sna tshogs kun tu bkram byas shing// bdag nyid chen po de dag rgyal ba mchod// phyam phal chen phye ma'i zla re dang/
phya ma bkod pa'od zer 'babakye ste/ 'phyam snatshogs kun tu bkram byas// bdag nyid chen po de dag rgyal ba mchod// na bza' pha' chonan brda'i bla re dang// nababra' bkod pa'i 'od zer
pa bkye ste// na bza' snatshogs kun tu bkram byas shing// bdag nyid chen po de dgargyal ba mchod// phal chen gdugs dang gdugs kyi bla re dang// gdugs kyi bkod pa'i 'od zer rab bkye ste
sna tshogs gdugs rnams kun bkram byas shing// bdag nyid chen po de dag rgyal ba mchod// ban chen phal chen rin chen bla re dang// rin chen bkod pa'i 'od zer rab bkye ste/ zhe chen snatshog
kun tu bkram byas shing// bdag nyid chen po de dag rgyal ba mchod// pad+maphal chenapa'i bla re drang// bad+ma bkod pa'i 'od zer ba bkye ste// pad+masnatshogs kun tu bkram byas shing bdag nyid

chen po de dag rgyal ba mchod// rgyan 'phrong 'phalachen rgyun 'phrang bla re dang// rgyan 'phrang bkod pa'i 'od zer rab bkye ste// rgyan 'phreng sna tshogs kun tu bkram byas shing// bdag nyid chen po de dag/
09 rgyal ba mad// rgyalamtshanamchog bkod 'od zer ba bkya ste/ de dag rgyal mtshanadakar dmanar po dang// sngo dang rgyal mtshan bkod pa sna tshogs pa/ du mas rgyal ba'i zhing rnams brgyan/
ba byed ]/nor bu'i dra bsnatshogasabakod pa'i gdugs// dar gyi ldaldi bdalab sbyas shing/ dri'i g.yar dra ba rgyal ba'i gsung sgrogs pa// de bzhin gshegs kyi dbu la de dag 'dzin//
lag ba'i mthil nas mchod pa bsam yas rnams // rgyal ba gcig la de dag byedapa ltar/ rgyal ba ma lus kun la'ang de bzhin te// drang srong ting 'dzin rnam 'phrul de 'dra'o// de dag 'gro ba sdud/
pa' ye shes kyis// rnam par 'phrul dang ting 'dzin mchog bsgrubs shing// bya ba dag dang bsnyen bkur kun gyi sgo )/ thabs stong dag gis sems can 'dul bar byed// kha cig de bzhin gshegs
bamachod sgo dang// sbyin pa bsam gyis mi khyabagatong sgo dang// sbyas pa'i yon tan tshul khrims kun skong ) bzod pame zad mi 'khrugasasgo dag dang// kha cig brtul zhugs dka' thubabartson
sgod// bsam gtan rab tu zhi bar gnas sgo dang// dola rnam nges shes rab sgo rnams dang/ spyod pa kun ldan thabasakyi sgo dgadang/ tshangs pa'iganas pa dag dang mngon zhes sgo// bsdu/
'dangos pos phan par 'dod sgo dang// bsod nams bsagasadang lu shes sgo dag dang// bdenadang brten dngarnamabar sgo dang
[fe]// pas rnam par sgrol sgo dang// rkyen gyi theg pas rnam par dag sgo dang// thegapa mchog gi rnam par 'phrul sgo dang// khacig mi rtag nyid dang sdug bsngal sgo/ (bcig bdag
med srog med sgo dag dang// mi sdug 'du shes 'dod chags bral sgo dang// zhi 'gog ting nge 'dzin gyi sgo yis 'dul// 'gro ba'i spyod pa'i sgo rnams ji snyed pa// de snying chos kyi sgol rab zhugs
ste de dag kun tu rnam thar sgo dag nas// bsam pa ji bzhin 'jig rten sems can 'dul// gang dag kun tu rnam thar sgo dag nas// bsam bzhin 'jig rten sems can 'dul byedapa// de dag
sus kyang mtshan mar gzung mi nus/ ting 'dzin rnam par 'phrul pa de 'dra'o// de dag dga' ba dkodapa'i ting 'dzin mchog/ 'gro ba thams cad yongs smin mthun byed pa// dga' bade spro ba rab
dga' kun ldan pas// bsams pa bstan nas sems can 'dul bar byed// gang du lo nyesa'ajig rten yod byad gang// bde byed thams cad rab tu dkon 'gyurag/ der ni kun gyis bsams bzhin bya
ba yis// sbyin pa sbyin zhing 'gro ba'i don rnams byed/ de dag zas skom mchog dang ro mchog dang// gos dang bgo pa rin chen snatshogs dang// rgyal sridanor dang bdag phangs yongs gtong bas// sbyin
la mos pa'i 'gro ba 'dul bar byed// brtan pa de dag mtshan mchog lus spras shing// gos dang rgyan mchog bgos shing brgyan byas te// 'phung bas sdud cing sos kyis bskus pa yi// gzugs
rnams bstan pas sems can 'dul bar byed// mthong na dga' chami rab tudaga' rnams la// blomchog de dag gzugs mchog gzugs bzang ba// gzugs kyi dam pa yongs su ston
byed cing// gzugs la mos pa sems can 'dul bar byed// de dag ka labade'i sgra snyan dang// khu byug kun la ngang pa'i sgra skad dang// rngadang tshongs dang mi 'am ci yi sgras// mos pa kun la//
de bzhin chos kyang ston// stong phrag brgyad cu rtsa bzhi gang yin pas/ rgyal ba gang dag 'gro ba'i don mdzad pa// chos kyi bye brag sgo mo de dag gis// bsam pa ji bzhin 'jig rten sems can
'dul// de dag bde dang sdug bsngal grogs kyang byed// don dang gnod pa'i grogs kyang de bzhin byed// bya ba kun la grogs su 'gyur byas shing// grogs kyi sgo nas sams can 'dul bar
byed sdug bsngal gnod pa 'dus byas skyon gyi rnams // grogs kyi don du de dag bgrod byed cing// 'grob kun la phan don bde don tu// de dag grogs don gnod pa dang du len/ dkang na mngon
'byung med cing chos med de// dgon par 'gro dang thar ba mi dramegs pa// der ni rgyal srid 'byor pa rab spangs to// zhi ba'i yid kyis gnas mdamangon par 'byung// de dag khyim dang 'chid dang
srad ba'i nas/ 'gro ba thams cad yongs su dgrol ba'i phyir// 'dod pa'i dga' ba kun la mi gnas par// mngon par 'byung shing thag pa rab tu rjod// de dag spyod pa bcu rnams rjod byed cing/
09 @#// skyesan rnams kyis chos sbyod gang yinadang/ drang srong rnams kyi spyod kun ma lus par// yos su brjod cinge 'gro ba'i don rnams byed// gang na sems can dpag med tshe
pa ldan zhing// bde dang ldan la nyon mongs chung yod pa/ 'di na rga bas nyen cing nad bu can// bdag la dbang med 'chi ba'i dbang gyur ston// 'dod chags 'bar zhing zhe sdang rab 'bar 'a 'jig
rten gti mug ma chen rab 'bar zhing// rgadang nadang 'chib rab 'bar ba'i// 'jigarten bstan nas sems can 'dul bar byed// de dag sangs rgyas stobs bcu brtson bzhi dang// chos kyi khyad par
bco brgyad rnams kyis kyang// sangs rgyas che ba'i bdag nyid rjod byed cing// sangs rgyas yon tan rnams kyis 'gro don byed// de dag kun brjodardzu 'phrul rjes bstan pas// zugs kyi byin rlabs/
stobs kyis thams cad du// de bzhin gshegs pa'i rdzu 'phrul ston byed cing// rdzu 'phrul rnam par 'phrul pas sems can bdul// de dag thabs tshul rnam pa sna tshogs kyi// 'jig rten rgyu
zhing 'gro ba'i don rnams byed/ 'jig rten mi chags chu la pad+ma bzhin// dga' zhing dad par byed la rnam par rgyu// de dag snyan dngags mkhan rgyal snyan dngags sbyor// gar mkhan rdza mkhan gyid
dang rol mo mkhan/ ) zhags mdzes rgyan 'phreng thogs shing gar byed dang// sgyu ma mkhan po gzugs med kun tu ston// grodapa krongadapokha lo sgyur ba 'gyur// de bzhin ded dpon tshong dpon
khyim bdag 'gyur// rgyal po blon po mdun 'don bo nyadang// sman pa 'jigasamadabastan bcos chog mkhas// de dag dgon par ljon shing chen por 'gyur/ sman dang rin chen mi zad gter rnamA
dang// yid bzhani nor bu 'dod 'byin sdong bo dang// lam gol dong ba rnams la lam ston 'gyur// 'jig rten byung nas mi 'jishes gyur cing// sems can las kyi tshul rnams mi shes pa/ de
dag kun la rmongs chos tshong thabs dang// sna tshogs bzo rnams 'jig rten brjod par byed// 'chemad gnod pa med pa'i sbyor ba gang// sems can bde byed mkhas pas rab bsngags pa//
rig stobs sman dang bstan bcos sna tshogs kun// drang srong de dag rnams kyis rab tu brjod// gang la lhar bcas 'jig rten mos 'gyur ba// drang srong skyong mchog dam pa gang yin dang// brtul
zhugs dka' spyad dka' thub mchog kun kyang// mkhas pa de dag rnams kyis rab tu brjod// de dag spyod can kun rgyu mu stags can// gdung ba go'u ta ma dang mi snar spyod// cer bu gos med
lhur len dag sbyong la/ mu stags can gyi slob dpon mkhas par ston// de dag kun tu 'tsho ba'i chos 'dzin dang/ 'then yod dang bla na med rnams dang// khal pa de dang gzhon nu'i brtul zhugs can/
de dag tu yang slob dpon 'gyur pa yin// nyi ma'i rjes lta dka' thub lnga ldan dang// khyi dang ba glang brtul zhugs ra dgas spyod// gle'u can dag dang mu stags sum cu pa// de dag tu yang de dag
slob dpon 'gyur// lha ye shes la 'jug pa dga' rnams dang/ mu stags nye sngog yul du rgyu rnams su// rtsa ba 'bras bu chu spyod gyur nas kyang// bsam yas chos la de dag
ma ba mchog/ cog bur 'dug dang gcig pu rgyu ba dang// tshor ma rtswa dang thal bar nyal ba dang// gang dag garnyan shin mal can kun pa dang// de dag tu yang de dag slob dpon 'gyur/ pha rol
mu stegs can rnams ji snyed pa// de dag bsamaM pa mos pa rtogs byas shing// bsnyan dka' ma bzad drag shul dka' thub kyis// mu stegs can gyi sdug bsngal spang bar 'dul/ 'jig rten
lta bas 'khrugs pa shes byas nas// lta ba ngan la gnas pa'i mu stegs can// kun la phra ba'i gzhi dang thabs tshulagyis// de dag rnams la bden pa ston par byed/ la lar 'gro nge pa yi sdugs
kyi gzhi/ shin tugasang ba'i gzhi yis bden pa ston// la la dag la gsal zhing drang tshig gis// la la dag la lha yi gsang tshig gis// la la dag la yi ge dbyatshig dang// don la rnam nges rdo
rjeN+Di tshig rnams dang// rgol ba 'dul ba shes pa'i tshig rnams dang/ bstan bcos thub med thar pa'i tshig rnams kyis// la la dag la mi skad tshig rnams dang// kun la 'jug pa'i tshig des ga
rnams kyis// la la dag la lha tshiganges tshig dang// klu yanges tshig gnod sbyin nges tshig gis/ kal la srin po 'byung bo sha zadang// dri za grul bumalto 'phye chen tshig dang// mi cilha min mkha'
ldang tshig rnams kyis// bden pa bstan cig thar par 'dren pa byed// de dag bden dang nges tshig tshul shes te// de ltar rgyal ba'i chos rnams ma lus pa'i// chos nyid bsam yas tshig lam shes
bas ston// de dag ting 'dzin rnam 'phrul de 'dra'o// dbam po bzhi pa ste tha ma/ de dag 'gro bde mchog gi ting nge 'dzini/ 'gro ba kun la
mngon par sgrub byed cing// 'od zer bsam gyis mi khyab rab bkye ste/ gcod brer bkye nas sems can 'dul bar byed// mthong na legs pa'i 'od zer rab gtong zhing// sems can ji snyad
'od zer de shos pa// de dag mthong legs don med ma yin te// bla na med pa'i ye shes mchog gi rgyu// mi rnams kun la sangs rgyas los bstan cing/ chos kyang yongs su bstan te lam
bstan cing// rgyal ba'i sku gzugs mchod rtenabastanabyas pas/ des na mthong lags 'od zer grub par 'gyur// lha yi 'od zer zil gyis gnon pa yi// 'od zer 'od byed ces bya ba gtong zhing/
rdul dang mun pa thams cad bsal byas te// 'jig rten phan pa'i 'od de rab snang// sems canagang dag bod dos bskul byas pa// de dag rgyal ba mchod phyir sgron ma'adzin// de dag rgyalab mchod
phyir sgron bzung bas// 'jig rten sgron ma mdzad pa'i rgyal bar 'gyur// 'bru mar mar me mar gyi mar me dang// rtswa shing 'dam bu 'od ma'i sgron ma dang// spos dang bcud len rin chen sgron ma/
gdag/ rgyal ba rnams la phul nas cod byed thopa// sgrol zhes bya ba'i 'od zer 'ab gtong zhing// sems can gang dag 'od des bskul byas pa// de dag srid yangs srid

kyang yang dag 'dzin 'jug pas// yongasaMgadung med pa'i 'od sa de grub bo// bzod pa bkod pa'i 'od zer sngabagatong zhing// mi bzod sems can gang dag des bskul ga khro dang tha pa nga rgyal lo/
spangs shing// de dag rtag tu bzod mos dga' bar n+d+hagyur// sdig ldan rnams kyi nyes byas bzod byas te// byang chub don tu 'khrug pa ma byas shing// bzod pa'i yon tan rtag tu bsngags brjod pa/

mchod pa byed par 'gyur/ dgos par brtson pa dkon mchog gsum rnams la// sbyorab skyo ba med pas mchod byas so// de dag bdud bzhi'i lam las rab 'das te/ byang chub bla med myur du reg
pa 'gyur// sems can mang po brtson 'grus 'dzin bcug sta/ dkon mchogagasum la mchodabarapa byas nas// zad pa'i dus na dam chos las gabyungabs// des na sbyangs dang ldan pa'i

mdzad pa'i rgyal bar 'gyur/ rgyal sridi nor dang bdag pas yongs btang ste// byang chub don du chos gang btsal byas pa// chos de gus par byas nas rab bshad bas// shes rab bkod pa'i/

ba'i 'od grub bo// mi 'jigs sbyin pa'i 'od zer rab gtong zhing/ 'jigs nyen sems can gang dag des reg pa// 'byung po gza' dang gsang brdag bcing ba dang/ nad 'go 'jigs ba
kun las kha bar 'gyug/ mi 'jigs sbyin pas sems can gang bskyabs dang/ srog chags gsod las bzlog pa byas pa dang/ 'jigs pa skyabasatshol rnamasal bskyabs byas pas// mi
'jigs sbyin pasi'od zer des grub bo// bde bkun byed 'od gzer rab gtong zhing// nadab na ba gang dge des rogapa/ ]rnam pa kun tund kyi sdug bsngal bar// bsam gtan ting 'dzin
gde ba rnams kyang thob// nad gsos 'bras bu sman dang rtsa ba dang// rin chen bcud len sngos dang byug pa dang/ dbu ma sbrang rtsi 'o ma man dag dang// 'bru mar zas skom byin bas de thob

'gyur// chos kyi mu ge byung tshe chos brjod de// chos tshol rnams kyi bsam pa rdzogs byas shing// 'odunapa bskyed de chos la brtson gyis shes// brjod pas chos rab brjod pa de thob bo//
sangs rgyas sras rnams yongs su bskul ba'i phyir// dbyangs dang ldan pa'i 'od zer ba gtong zhing// 'jig rten gsuman sgra sgyurjesnyad ga/ kun kyang de bzhin gshegs/ sas rgyas sras thams sangs
pa'i gsung du thos// gsang bstod sgra yis drang srong che bstod do// rgyal ba'i gsung sgra don tu sil snyan dang// sgra chen dril bu sbyin rnams 'gro kun la// rab tu bsgrags pas dbyangs ldan 'od
grub bo// 'chimadasbyin pa'i 'od zer rab gtong zhing// soms can gang dag 'od des bskul byas pas// bag med spyod pa thams cad ba spangs te// yon tan kun la brtson pa nyams su len/

bskul byas ba/ mi la mid sa yid 'ong tshor gyur nas// sas rgyas yon tan rnams la nges par 'gyur// mi dang lha yi sngos dang byug pa yis// mi yi gtso la mchod pa rang byas te// sos/

snyan bsgrags shing sos kyis gdugs ba yis// pho brang dmab mdzes byas me tog bkram// sil snyan ngag gis rgyal ba rnams bsu zhing// ma tog byugs pa bdug spos khyu ma dang//
rgyal mtshan ba dan gdugs mchog rnams kyis mchod// desan sna tshogs bkod pa rgyu 'gyug shin dang byed 'od zer ba gtong zhing// sa rnams lag mthil bzhin du gnas pa'abyed/
mchod rten drang srong gnas rnams sbyang byas pas// desan shin tudang byed 'od gruba'o// sbyin dang ldan pa'i 'od zer rab gtong zhing// spos kyi char 'bebs sbyin rnams kun tu gnag ]mchod/
rtan 'khor sa spos kyi nus btab pas// spren dang ldan pa'i 'od de rab tu thob// lhab lhub bkod pa'i 'od zer ba gtong zhing// gcer bu gos yod rgyan dang ldan bar 'gyur// gos dang
kha go ba rgyan 'phreng sna tshogs dag/ sbyin pa byas pas bsgrub bkod pa grub// ro mchog ldan pa'i 'od zer pa gtong zhing// bkres pa kha zam mchog thob par 'gyur/

mchog gsum la gtor bzhi'i mi zad nga// dbul ba byas bsanor ston 'od thob ga/mi rnams spyod ba'i 'od zer ba gtong zhing// de molong ba sna tshogs gzugs rnams mthong// rgyal ba dag dang
rgyal ba'i mchod rten la// mar ma lul bas mig sbyong 'od zer grub// rnab rnams sbyong 'od zer ba gtong zhing// rna ba nyams pas zla mang thos par 'gyur// rgyal b rnams dang rgyal ba'imachod
rton la// sil snyan phul bas rna sbyong 'od zer krung// sna rnams sbyong ba'i 'od zer rab gtor zhing// sngon 'chad mtshor dri zhim tshor bar 'gyur// rgyalab rnams dang rgyal pa'i mchod rtan la/
sos rab phul bas sna sbyong 'od zer thug/ lce rnams sbyong ba'i 'od zer ba gtong zhing// sgra snyan yid 'ong rnams kyis sangs rgyas bstod// mi snyan brlung pa sgyub rnam rgyas te/ 'jam par
sa pas lce sbyong 'od zer grug/ lus rnams sbyong ba'i bod zer rab gtong zhing// dbang po nyams pa dbang po ldan par 'gyur// rgyal ba rnams dang rgyal ba'i mchod rten la// lus btud
wa byas pas lus rnams sbyong ba thog gsemasa rnams sbyong ba'i 'od zer rab gtong zhing// smyos pa thams cad sems dang ldan par 'gyur// ting 'dzin dbang rjes sems 'gro byas pas na//

mchod rten brgyan byas gzugs sbyong 'od grub bo// sgra rnams sbyong ba'i 'od zer rab gtong zhing// sgra ni sgra men stong ngar rab tu shes/ rkyen lasabyung bas brag cha ba'o zhes// sgra rnams bstan
pas 'od zer de grub bo// dri rnams sbyong ba'i 'od zer 'ab gtong zhing/ 'dring thams cad drizhimamchog tu 'gyur// sos rab mchog chus rgyal ba'imachod rten dag/ khrus byas byang chub zhing gi

( gcig rab 'jug cing// zham 'di sangs rgyas sras rnams ston byed pa// de bzhin phyogs rnams ma lus kun tu ston tang 'dzan rnam par 'phrul pa 'di 'dra'o// de dag phyogs kyi dra ba khyab
gnas pa'i// ting 'dzin dam pa mnabar sgrub byed cing/ kha cig mnyam gzhag khacig ldang bar yang// phyogs rnams kun tu rang gi lus ston to// de dgashar gyi phyogs su mnyam gzhag cing
nub kyi phyogs nas dpa' bo rnam par ldang// nub kyi phyogs su mnyam par gzhag gyur cing/ bdag nyid chen po shar gyi phyogs nas ltang// de bzhin phyogs bcu rnams su rab tu 'jug/ gzhan
