gyi phyogs su mnyam par gzhag gyur la// ye shes yon tan phyug po gzhan nas ldang// drang srong ting 'dzin rnams 'phrul 'di 'dra'o// shar phyogs sangs rgyas zhing rnams gang yin dang//
grangs mang ma lus dag na'ang byung ba// de dag spyan sngar zhabs drung de dag rnams // zhi ba'i ting nge 'dzin la gnas par snang// phyogs der mnyam par gzhag pa bstan byas nas// dpa' bo nub/
sa kyi zhing rnams ma lus ba/ rnam par ldang zhing mngon sum rgyal kun la// mchod pa du ma rab tu byed bar snang// nub phyogs sangs rgyas zhing rnams gang len ba// grangs med ma lus dag na
bzhugs sangs rgyas/ de dag spyan snga pa zhabs drung de dag rnams // zhi ba'i ting 'dzin 'kha gnas bar snang// phyogs der mnyam par gzhag pa bstan byas nas/ dpa' bo shar gyi zhing rnams
malus pa// rnam par ldang zhing mngon sum rgyal kun l// mchod pa du ma rab tu byed par snang// de bzhin phyogs bcu dag gi zhing rnams su// phyogs rnams ma lus kun tu brtan ba 'jug de kha
cig mnyam gzhag kha cig las gyur cing// 'jig rten sgron ma rnams la mchod byed snang// de dag mig gi lam la mnyam gzhag cing// gzugs kyi lam las bdag nyid chen po ldang// gaphrug
rnamasabasam gyis mi khyab ston ban// de la lhas bcas 'jig rtan rmongs pa 'gyug/ gzugs kyi lam lam nyamakhar gzhag rgyun la// mig ni ma skyes ma byung rang bzhin te// stong pa byed ba
med par rab ston cing// mig gi lam nas dran ldan rnam par ldang// de dag rna ba'i lam la mnyam gzhag cing// sgra'i lamanas bdag nyid chen bo lung/ gang laM lhar bcas 'jig rten rmongs 'gyur
ba sgra dang skad rnams kun l ba cu zhugs// sgra yi lam la mnyam par gzhag gyur cing// rnab ma skyes ma khyung rang bzhin te// stong pa byed pa med par rab ston cing/ rna ba'i lam nas dran
[©]/ ldan rnam par ldang// de dag sna yi lag la mnyam gzhag cing// dri yi lam nas bdag nyid chen po ldang// gang du lhar bcas 'jig rten rmong 'gyur ba// dri mchog dam pa
'jug par rab tu zhugs// dri yi lam la mnyam par gzhagagyur cing// snani ma skyes ma byung rang bzhin te// stong pa byed ba'i dpal bab ston cing// sna yi lam nas dran ldan rnam par ldang// de dag
lce yi lam la mnyam gzhag cig/ ro mchog kun gyi lamanas rnam par ldang// gang du lhar bcas 'jig rten rmongs 'gyur ba// bdag nyid chen po ro mchog nams dang ldan// ro mchog rnams la
mnyam par gzhag gyur cing// lce ni ma skyes ma byung rang bzhin te// stong la byed pa med par rab ston cing// lce gi lam nas dran ldan rnam par ldang// de dag lus kyi lam la mnyam gzhag cing//
rig ba'i lam nas bdag nyid chen po ldang// gong du lhar bcas 'jig rten rmongs 'grub pa/ 'jig rten bde ba skyed pa'i 'gal zhugs/ 'jig pa'i lam la mnyam par gzhag gyur cing// lus
ni ma skyes ma byung rang bzhin te// stong ba byed pa med pa la ston cing/ lus kyi lam nas dran ldan rnam par ldang// de dgasems kyi lam la mnyamagazhag cing/ chos kyi lam nas bdag
chen po ldang// gang du lhar bcas 'jig rten rmongs 'gyur ba// chos la gnas pa'i 'jug pa rab tu zhugs// chos lam rnams lamanyam gzhag gyur cing// sems ni mi skyas ma byung nang
tha bzhin te// stong pa khyad pa med par rab ston cing// sems kyi lam nas dron ldan rnam par ldang// de dag byis pa'i lus la mnyam gzhag cing/ lang tsho shugs la gnas pa rnams las ldang
gang tsashugs gnas rnams lamanyam gzhag cing// rgas shing 'khogs pabalus las rnam par ltang// rgas shing 'khogs pas lamanyam gzhag cing// dad pa'i dge bsnyen ma'i lus
las ldang// dge bsnyen dad ma'i lus la mnyam gzhag cing// dad pa'i dge bsnyen lus las rnam par ldang// dad pa'i dge bsnyen lus lamanyam gzhag cing// dge slong ma'i lus las rnam par
snang/ dge slong ma'i lus l mnyam gzhag cing// dge slong mang du thos pa'i lus las ldang// dge slong mang thos lus la mnyam gzhag cing/ slob dang mi slob lus las rnam par ldang// slob dang
mi slob lus las mnyam gzhag cing// rkyen gyi sangs rgyas lus las rnam par ldang// rkyen gyis sangs rgyas lus l mnyam gzhag cing// sangs rgyas sku mchog rab las rnam par ldang// sangs
rgyas sku mchog rab la mnyam gzhag cing// lha yi lus gzugs las ni rnam par ldang/ lha yilus gzugs la ni mnyam gzhag cing// rdzu 'phrul chen po'i klu yi lus las ldang/ rdzu 'phrul
cha klu'i lus la mnyam gzhag cing// 'phrul chen gnod sbyin lus las rnam par ldang// 'phrul chen gnod sbyin lus la mnyam gzhag cing// 'byung bo kun gyi lus M las rnam par ldang// 'byung po
kun gyi lus la mnyam gzhag cing// sku yi sgo gcig nas ni rnam par ldang// spu sgo gcig la mnyam par gzhag gyur cing// smra sgo thams cad nas ni rnam pa snang
sba sgo kun la mnyam par gzhag gyur cing// skra rtse gcig gi khyon las rnam par ldang// skra rtse gcig gi khyonal mnyam gzhag cing// skra rtse kun gyi khyon la rnam par ldang// skra rtse
kun gyi khyon la mnyam gzhag cing/ phra rab rdul gyi rdul las de dag ldang// rdul gcig la mnyam par gzhag gyur cing// ma lus rdul rnams kun las rnam par ldang// rdul rnamu/
ma lus kun la mnyam gzhag cing// rgya mtsho'i rdo rje'i gzhi las rnam par ldang/ rgya mtsho'i rdo rje'i gzhi la mnyam gzhag cing// nor bu'i shing tog dag las rnam par ldang// shing
rtog rnams la mnyam par gzhag gyur cing// rgyal ba rnams kyi 'od zer sgo nas ldang// rgyal ba'i 'od zer sgo la mnyam gzhag cing// rgyamatsho'i chu'i chu klung rnams las ldang//
rgya mtsho'i chu klung rnams la mnyamagazhagacing// bdag nyid chen po ma'i lam las ltang// ma'i lam la mnyam par gzhag gyur cing// rlung gi lam las dranaldan rnam par ldang//
rlung gi lam la mnyam par gzhag gyur cing// bdag nyid chen po sa yi gzhi las ldang// sa yi gzhi la mnyam par gzhag gyur cing// lha kun gzhal med khang las rnam par ldang/
lha kun gzhal med khang la mnyam gzhag cing/ dran ldan de dag mkha' las rnam par ldang// yon tan bsam nas bsags pa de dag gi/ ting 'dzin rnam thar de dag gam mi khyab//
rgyal ba kun gyis bskal pa bsam yas su/ bshadab mdzad kyang zad par mdzad mi spyod// 'gro bas rnam smin bsam gyis mi khyab ste/ rgyal ba kun gyis de dag gsungs pa ni/ klu yi rnam
'phrul sas rgyas rnam 'phrul dang/ khasam byed bsam gtan rnam 'phrul bsam mi khyab// de dag la yang dpa stan brjod par bya// de dag 'dra ba'i dpa lta cang mad de// mkhas shing gang zhi
skya bo dpa rnams kyi// bstananamyur du don rnams shes par 'gyur// ma dza' brgyad kyi dbar la gnas pa yi// nyan thosagacig tu gyur nas mang por 'gyur/ ]mang por gyur nas phyir yang
gcig gyur te// mkha' lagrasamo gtana'acha' zhing 'bar bar byed// smad nas mo'abab stod nas chu yi rgyun/ stod nas me 'bar smad nas chu la rgyun// 'gro dang 'grang dang nyal dang 'dug
pa dang/ lus 'phrul skad cig gcig bsam mi khyab// donanang rdzachadang mi ldan zhing// byang chub mi tshol 'jig rten yang 'dor nang// lus kyi rnam 'phrul bsam las ston byed na//
'jig rten phan 'dod ci phyi ston mi byed// nyi zla ma khabs rnam par rgyu 'dod cing// phyogs rnams kun chu yi dngodag dang// mtsho mtshe'u tsho bran snod dang ni chen dang// rgya mtsho chu klung rnam
[r ©]// sugazugs bstan ston// de bzhin gzugs rnams bsam gyis mi khyab pa// skyes burapa' bo phyogs bcu kun tu ston/ ting 'dzi rnam thar kun gyi tshul la mkhas//
de' de bzhin gshegs pa rang byung dbang// pad kha'i mtsho ka yan lag bzhi pa'i dmag de dgaso so rang gagazugs bstanamathong/ ral gri mda' chen gzhu dang mda' rnams dang// go
rgyu gyon gzhon dang theg par bcasasu mthong// gang gi gzugs gang gnas gang cha byad gang// de dang de dgade ltar chu sa mthong/ 'on kyang chul byams sdang rnam rtogamad// drang srong ting

'dzin rnam 'phrul 'di badra'o// sgyu mtsho'i lha mo sgra ldan zhes bya ba// sems can rgya mtshor ji snyad skyas rnams kyi// sgra yi yan lag dbyangs kyi tshulo mkhas te/ karang gi skad kyis skad kun chem
(/ bar byed// sgra ldan chags sdang gti mug can de la'ang// skad rnams kun gyi skya li tshul mkhas na// gzungs dang chos kyi stobs la dbang thob rnams ) lhar bcas 'jig rten ci phyir mgu
mi byed// tam bu ra yi chung ma dbyangs ldan ma// tshangs pa'i bu mo yid las byung bde// bden dang dam bcas mi 'daga'a rnams kyi// sems dang yid dang kha yi sgor 'jug ste// dbang
ldan chags bcas zhe sdang can de yang// brtul zhugs grub mthun dbyangs kyi yon ga chades// yid 'ongaskad kyis 'jig rten mgu byed na// ye shes yon tan phyug rnams cis mi byed//
rig sngags tshul mkhas sgyu ma mkhan po na// sna tshogs gzugs dang mtha' yas ston pa khyed// nyin mtshan phud dang zla ba long rgya dang// khyim bzang rgyas pa shin tumadzes pa ston ]/'dod
chags sdang ldan sgyu ma'i mkhan po yang/ sgyu ma'i 'phrul gyis 'jig rten mgu byed na// bsam gtanamango shes rnam thar 'babarlabs pa// spyod tshul mkhas rnamasasu phye mgu mi byed// lha dang
lha mi'i dpang po 'thab pa'i tshe// dga' ldan lha yis lha min tham byas na/ de dag 'jigs pas gdugs bcas gzhon bcas shing// thogabacas dmag bcas ko gyon bzhin du 'byor// 'dod
chags sdang ldan lha dbang de dag kyang/ lus kyi rnam 'phrul bsam yas ston byed na/ dbang phyug rdzu 'phrul dbang gnas dpa' bo rnams // lus kyi rnam 'phrul ci phu'i ston mi byed// rdo
rje'achang ba'i glang po sa srung ba/ dbang po'i 'khor rgyu'i rdzu 'phrul chen po de// mgo bo sum cu rtsa sum mngon sprul cing// mgo rnams kun la'ang mche ba drug drug sku// mche ba de dag
so so re re la'ang// rdzing bu chus gang bdun bdun stsal ba bying/ rdzing bu de la'ang bad+ma sna tshogs pa// rnam par bkod pa bdun bdunasprul pa byed// bad de la'ang lha yi bu mo dag/ sgyu
rtsal kun shes bdunabadun la pa byed// de dag rtsed mo glu gar tshul la mkhas// sum cu rtsa sum dbang po de dang rtso glang bo de yang lus n bsgyur byas te lha rnams kun dngo
@#/ 'grogs shing 'driba' byed// spyod pa'i tshul dang longs spyod kun dang mthun// glang bo mchog gi rnam 'phrul de lta snang// glang po chags sdang gti mug ldan de
yang/ 'di 'dra'i rdzu 'phrul rab tu ston byedan// shes rab thabs kyi stongs la sbyangs ba rnams // ting 'dzin brgya yis rnam 'phrul cis mi byed// sgra gcan ji ltar 'dod bzhin lus

rdzu 'phrul te/ rdo rje'i gzhi laM rkang pa 'jog byed cing// rgya mtsho lta bar phyin pa tsam du ston// ri rab rtse dang nyid kyi mgo yang snyom/ sgra gcan chags sdang gti mug ldan do yang// 'di 'dra'i rdzu
'brul rab tu ston byed na// 'jig rten skyon ma bdud rnams ba 'jom pa// rdzu 'phrul mtha' yas si rab ston mi byed// brgya byin rnam 'phrul bsam yas rab snang ste// lha dang lha min dbang
po g.yul 'gyang tshe// lha min bye ba 'phyis pa ji snyed pa// de snyad brgya byin rang gis lus las sbral// lha min dbang dang lha min phal kunegyis brgya byin rang gi mdun na 'dug par shes// de
ni rdo rje'achang bas bzung ngo zhes// lha min dbang po kun yang mgo myos gyur// 'jigs par byed pa'i mig stong pa bstan te/ rdo rje ma lce 'bar ba thogs byed cing/ lus la go bgos gabri brjid
bsnyanaraka' ba'i gi/ brgya byin mthong nas lha min dbang po 'byed// de yang bsod nams bal pa'i mthu stobs kyis// lha rgyal don tu rnam par 'phrul byed na// 'gro ba ma lus kun gyi skyabs gyur/
ba/ bsod nams mi zad rnams lta cis mi 'phrul// lhal skul ma 'debs pa lha yi rnga// lha las rnam par smin pas grub gyur pa// lha rnams bag med gnas brda shes gyur nas/ rjed/
namamakha' lasani sgra sgrog/ 'dod pa thams cad mi rtag the'i zug min/ tha shal mi brtanadabu ba'i ngo bo nyid// sgyu ma smig rgyu chu zla mtshungs shing 'dra// srid pa thams cad rmi lam sprin
dang mtshungs// bag med thams cad dgra bcasamya ngan can/ 'chi ba'i lam yin mi 'chi'i lamam yin/ 'ji snyad tshu dag bag med gnas gyur pa// de dag 'chi bdag chu srin chen ngos zin//
sdug bsngal rtsa ba yongs 'dzin thams cad yin// skye ba thams cad 'phags pa rnams kyis smad/ 'dod pa'i bon tan rnams kyis yul la rmongs// chos kyi stobs la rtag dga' gyis shes
skul rtsades bskul nas brgya byin lha rnams dang// lha yi mdunas chos bza 'dug nas su// gtam gang zhi zhing 'dod chags bral mthun ba/ chos kyi gtam de lha rnams kun la rjod// rnga de
gzugs med bstanatu mi rung yang/ de ltar rnga sgras don chen rab byedan// bsam pa ji bzhin gzugs long stod rnams // 'gro ba kun gyi don chen cis mi byed// lha dang lha min dbang po g.yul
'byed tshe// lha yi bsod nams khyad par mthu stobasakyi lhal skul ma 'debs pa'i rje yi sgra// lha rnams ma 'jigs shigaces sgra 'byin te// rnga yis bskul nas lha rnams rab dga' zhing//
skrag pa med de stobs kyang skyes par gyur/ lha min dbang po skug pas nyen pa rnams // 'jigs nas dgags bcas de yi mod la 'byas/ de ltar sgra skad 'byin ba'i rdza
T+Tha 'dra ba// 'gro ba kun gyi skyabs dang dpung gnyen bo// nyon mongs bdud bcom snying rje che ldan rnams // zhi ba'i sgra bsgragasanyon mongs sel bar byed// dbang po'i lha yi bu mo dgu bcu gnyis/
klu dbang po'i sprul pas kun kyang dga' bar 'gyur// gcig kyang bdag dang brgya byani rtsa ba shes/ gcig ltar lha mo kun kyang de bzhin no// lha mo kun dang dga' bar gnas snang yang/ chos
bzangs 'dunos na yang de bzhin 'dug/ lha rnams kun la chos rab ston snang zhing// brgya byin skad cig gcig la rnam pa 'phrul// brgya byin chags sdang gti mug ldan pa yang//
sprul pas rang gi 'khor rnams dga' byed na/ 'gro don mi skyo sbyor rnams ci yi phyir// 'phrul stobs kyis 'jig rten mgu mi byed/ bdud kyi dkrugs ma 'gro nga 'i dbang sgyur ba// de yi
dbaing du sems can 'di kun bdong// las dang nyon mongs kun tu zhugs pa yis/ so so'i skye bo thams cad bdud des bcings// chags sdang gti mug ldan nga'i bdud de yang// 'gro ba thams
cad dbang du 'gyur byed na// dbang bcu dbang thob rnams lta ci smos te// 'gro ba thams cad rang gi phyogs mi gzhog/ stong gsum gnas kyi bdag po tshangs pa yang// stong gsum tshangs
gnas ji snyad yod pa na// de dag kun na bdug bar 'ab snang zhing// tshangs pa'i dbyangs shin tu yid 'ong sgrogs// tshangs de 'jig rten pa yi tshangs lam gyi// bsam gtan mngon shes/
rnam par 'phrul byed/ 'jig rten ba 'das bla na med pas yi// bsam gtan rnam par gnas pacis mi 'phrul// dbang phyug chen po shes pa'i rnam 'phrul ltos// rgya mtsho'i sprin gyis
char thigs 'babakyi ba// skad cig gcig la thams cad bgrangab byed// thigs 'ga'i cun kyang ma shes de med nA// bslab pa khaMskal pa bsam yas drang bslabais to// byang chub bla med ye
shes thob pa rnams // ci phyir skad cig gcigal sems kyis ni/ 'gro ba ma lus kun gyi sems mi shes// sems can lag smanabasam gyis mi khyab pas// 'jig rten 'di kun rlung
las yongs su byung// rgya mtsho'i dang lha yi gzhal med khang/ zhi chen rnam phya sabon bkram ba'ang byung/ rlung las sprin byung char pa'ang kun tu 'bag/ rlung gis sbyin kyang rab tu zhi bar byed
'jig rten lo tog 'phel bar 'ang rlung byed de// rlung ni 'gro ba kun la lan ba skyed// rlung de pha rol phyin la ma bslabs shing// sangs rgyas yon tan rnams la me bslabs kyang// 'jig rten
rnam smin bsam las ston byed na// dam pa thos nas rtse phyir ston mi byed// rgyamatsho'i 'brug sgra'i sprin gyi chu tshogs ni// bya skad ri dgas skad dang skyes pa dang// bud med bu mo khye'u skad
snyad pa// kun gyi sgra brnyan sems can rnams la sgrog de ltar sgra bsnyan rang bzhin med shes nas// sgrib pa med pa'i spobs dang ldan 'gyur zhing// 'gro ba kun la

sgra brnyan brjod byas nas// yid 'ong sgra yis 'jig rten mgu bar byed// rgya mtsho 'di la ngomatshar rmad kyi chos// 'gro kun rgya dang mtshungs bas rgya mtsho sta/ ]chudang 'byung po rin chen yong mi zad/
rgyu chu rnams bzung bas ngoms par 'gyur ba med// de bzhin de dag 'gro kun rgyu 'dra ste// bsod nams bsam gtan rnam par thar rnams dang// shes rab ye shes yon tan kun mi zad//
bsod nams yon tan sogs pas ngoms pa med/ rgya mtsho'i klu na rnam par rtse ba na// sa ya gzhi nas dbang sgyur gnas kyi bar// gling bzhi bcas bar sminachen rgyas 'gengs te// de dag
kun kyang sna tshogs bkod pa mang/ de dpang sgyur gnas su 'dzam gling gi/ gser gyi mdog gi sprin rnams rnam par sgrub// 'phrul dga' mu tig dmar po'i mdog lta bu // dga' ldan gnas
su kha ba ba mo'i mdog/ 'thab bral gnas su mthon ting ba'am// sum cu gsum du rdo'i sing po 'dra// skyong ba'i gnas su shel gyi mdog lta bu // rgyamatshon rdo rje mi phyed 'khregs 'dra ba/ mi
ci gnas su spos mchog 'khrigs lta bu / klu yi gnas su pad+ma'i mdog 'dra// gsang ba'i gnas su dang ba'i bya gar mngog/ lha min gnas su ri brag mdog 'dra ba// byang du gsar gyi 'od
zer mdog ston te// gling rnams gzhan du sna tshogasabakod pa ston/ ('dzam bu'i gling du ri sngon 'dra ba ste/ de gang na ci mtho srin rnams de bzhin no// dbang sgyur gnas su gser sprin des
bstan nas// nyi ma'i mdog 'dra klog kyang rab tu 'gyed// 'phrul dga'i gnas su zla 'od bzang 'dudang// dga' ldan gnas su 'dzam bu'i gser mdog 'dra// 'thab bral gnas su
ba ba mo'i mdog/ sum cu gsumadu gsar gyi 'od zer 'dra// skyong ba'i gnas su dpal gyi snying po'i mdog/ rgya mtsho mu tig dmar po'i mdog 'dra bkod// mi ci gnas su mkhron tung bo
klu yi gnas su dpal gyi snying po'i mdog/ gsang ba'i gnas ru shu shel gyi mdog 'dra ba// lha min gnas su rdo yi snying po 'dra// byang du nor bu skaramadog kha mdog 'dra// gling gzhan/
rnams na'od bkod pa zhan dang gzhan// 'dzam bu'i gling du zla ba'i nor bu 'bag/ sprin gyi mtshan nyid mthun pa'i glog kyang babyed// de ni dbang sgyur gnas su tshangs sgra sgrog 'phrul dga'i
gnas su rnga sgra sgrog par byed// dga' ldan gnas su sil snyan la mo'i sgra/ 'thab bral gnas su lha yi bu mo'i sgra// sum cu gsum du mi ci mang bo'i skad// skyong ba'i gnasaMsu dri ba'i

skad du ste// rgya mtshor 'i 'thab sgra skad 'dra ba'o// mi ci gnas su gling bu kun nal sgra// klu yi gnas su ka la ping+ka'i sgra// gsang ba'i gnas su klu yi bu mo'i sgra// lha man gnas su lha yi rdza
'i sku// mi yi gnas su rgya mtsho gling bu'i sgra// de ni dbang sgyur gnas su lha gros zhim// me tog sna tshogs bkod pa'i char yang 'bebs// 'phrul dga' zla ba zla bzadra
'dra ba yi// me tog mnar 'phreng dang byug pa 'debs// dga' ldan gnas sunoraM bu chen po'i mdog/ rgyan gyi dam pa rin chen sna tshogs dang// gtsug gi nor bu zla ba 'dra ba dang//
gser mdog 'dra ba'i dka' 'i char yang 'bebs// rgyal mtshan gdugs dang ba dan sna tshogs dang// 'brab rnams dang rgyan dang byug pa dang// mu tig dmar dang gsar dang dar la dang/
sil snyan yid 'ong 'thab bral gnas su 'debs// sum cu gsum du yid bzhin nor bu mchog/ skyong ba'i gnas su tsan dan snying po'i mchog/ gur kum sil ma lha shing ta ma la//
spos chu'i rgyun dang me tog rab tu 'babs// skyong ba'i gnas su klu yi dbang po de// nyam stobs skyo ba'i kha zas skom gyi rnams // kha dog dri zhim ro dang ldan pa dang// de min rin chen bsam
las ma yong 'babs// den rgya mtsho chen por rgyun tu yang// char rgyun mi 'chad mnya'ashing tsam dag dang// rnam rgyal chen po mdzod rnams mi zad pa// na chen dkod pa mtha' yas cha
! yang 'debs// mi ci gnas su rgyan 'phrang sna tshogs dang// pad+maut+palaras dang rin chen dang// me tog b.rang sha ma la phya ba smos// pa bang gling bu sgra snyan rdza rdza 'babs// klu yi gnas su
'a mu tig dmar po ste// gsang ba nor bu'i sa chen skar mdog 'dra// lha min gnas su ral gri mda' chen dang// dgra 'dun gzhudang stabu ka'i ra ba 'debs// byang du de ni rgyan 'phung na che
dang ma tog bsha ma la tsam pa'i 'phrang// ku ranagatsang dang a ti mug tu 'bebs// gling gzhan rnams na'ang sna tshogs char pa 'babs// 'dzam bu'i gling da chu gsal dang ba yi
char rnams chos bzhin phra ba'i rgyun tu 'bebs// me tog 'bras bu sman dang gos dngashing// lo tog bde byed 'jig rten rnams su skyed// de ltar sprin bkod bsam gyis mi khyab dang// glog
'byin 'brug sgrog bkod pa'i char 'bebs kyang// gnas nas mi g.yo rnam par rtog pa med/ klu yi rnam 'phrul de ltar bsam mi khyab// rgya mtsho'i mun gnas pa de ltar yang// klu yi rnam
'phrulabasaMm las ston byed na// chos kyi rgya mtshor zhugs pa'i yon tan phyug/ rnam 'phrul mtha' yas ci phyir ston mi byed// bag tsam smos pa'i dpe tshul 'di dag gis// skyes chen de dag rnam
kyi brjod pas// dpa' bo de dag dpe rnams kun dang bral de dag 'di 'dritsi rnam thar dbang sgyur ro// blo gros dam pa blo gros rgya chen ldan/ ]ma nor blo gros mtha' yas blo gros can// ye shes
mchog ldan khyad par blo can gyi// rnam thar mchog rnams 'di lta rnams kyis spyad/ rnam tharo dam pa 'di dag sus thos nas// yid ches 'dzin cing 'jig rten sgrogabyed pa// de dag ngo mtshar rmad
[z]@#// byung chos ldan te// de dag dka' byed gi yi 'jig rtenan// 'di 'dra chos 'dir gang dag dad gyur pa// sams can so so skye bo'i chogs na dkon// gang dag dag bsags
bsod nams byas gyur kaM/ de dag rgyu yi stobs kyis 'di la dang// gang dag nyan thos theg la 'od yid ches pa'i// mi dag mi yi 'jig rten rnamasu na nyung// de bas rkyen gyi theg par rab tu nyung// theg
ba chen por de dag de bas nyung// theg pa la zhugs pa de dkon to// gang dag chos 'dir dad pa'ang 'badakonan// 'jug cing 'dzin pa smos kyang ci dgos te// gang dag de bzhin sgrub pa smos ci
dgos// gang dag stod gsumar dang rgya mtshor bcas// phyi ma'i bskal pa/ra mgo bos 'deg byed kyang// chos 'dir dad pa'i bya dka' ci 'dra ba// de 'dra de ni de la yod ma yin// lo las stong
gsum rdul snyad sams can la// bde ba kun gyi bskal par bsnyen bkur yang// chos 'di'i dad pa'i bsod nams ci 'drab// bsod nams khyad par de 'dra de la med// la las zhing bcu'i
dang rgya mtshor bcas// lag pa'i mthil du bskal par mkhar 'dzin kyang// chos 'dir dad pa'i bya dka' ci 'dra ba// de 'dra de ni de lu yod ma yin// langs zhing bcu'i rdul snyed sems can la//
bad pa kun gyis bskal par bsnyen bkur kyang// chos 'di'i dad pa'i bsod nams ci 'dra ga// bsod nams khyad par de 'dra de la med// la las zhing bcu'i rdul snyed saMngs rgyas rnams // bde
ba kun gyis bsal par bstanobaskur bas// gang gis chos kyi le'u 'di bzung byas ba// bsod nams de ni de bas khyad par 'phags/ rnam thar de dag rab tu bstan pa'i tshe// thogs btu'u/
shing rnams thams cad g.yos par gyur/ bdud kyi gnas rnams mog chog byas gyur cing// sgra rab phyung bas ngan song rab tu zhi// phyogs bcu kun gyi mi yi sangag rnams // de dag kun gyis
mngon par zhal bstan te// phyag brkyang mdzad nas yon tan mtha' yas pa// bzang po dpal gyi mgo la kaMzhag par gyur// phyag gi mthil gyis mgo 'khyug mdzad de// rnam thar 'di dag leg
par bshadapa legs// khyod kyis legs bstan rjes su ded dgyes zhes// sangs rgyas de dag kun gyis gsum brjod do// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis tshigs su bcad pa bstan pa 'di
dag bka' stsal nas// cang mi gsung bar gyur to// de nas stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'din gang dag 'khod pa'i lha thams cad dang// mi dang mi ma
yin pa de dag thams cad kyis// de bzhin gshegs pas 'di legs par bka' stsal to/ kyis de bzhin gshegs pas chos kyi 'khor lo bskor ba gnyis pa 'di mdzad do// chos bstan pa/
bdisngon ma thos so// sems can gang dag chos kyi rnam grangs 'di dpar 'gyur ba de dag ni shin tu dkon te// sems can de dag ni dge ba'i rtsakhangan ngon dang ldan pa ma yin no// sems can
de dag ni sangs rgyas mang bo la bsnyen bkur byas pa yin no/ sems can de dag ni lha dang bcas// bdud dang bcas pa/ tshangs pa dang bcas pa'i 'jig rten la mchod
ton lta bu r gyur te// de dag ni bdud dam// bdud kyi 'is kyi lha rnams sam/ rab tu byung ba rnams sam// khyim na gnas pa rnams sam// de bzhin du rgyal po rnams sam// blon po chen po
rnams sam// khyim bdag rnams kyis gtso bar ma nus so zhes ca co dang ga zha'i sgra phyung ngo// de nas bcom ldan 'das la tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor gyis 'di skad ces gsol to//
bcom ldan 'das mdo sde dkon mchog 'di lta bu dag 'jig rten du'abyung ba ni red pa khaMka' ba lags te// 'on kyang de bzhin gshegs pa'i mthus chos 'di lta bu dag 'jig rten du byung zhing//
de bzhin gshegs pa'i mthu nyid kyis sems can de dag gis kyang thos lags so// de nas bcom ldan bs kyis ljags kyi dbang po byung nas// tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo la
bka' stsal ga/ kun dga' bo khyod kyis chos kyi rnam gras 'di zung shig/ chongs shig/ lhogs shig/ kun chub par gyis shig/ de nas tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bos/
bcom ldan 'das la lan gsum bskor ba byas te// 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das bdag gis chos kyi rnam grangs 'di bzung lags te// slan cad mi bskyod par bgyid do/ ]
bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsal nas// thams cad dang ldan pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i 'khor dang// byang chub sems dpa' 'phags pakun tu bzang po dang// 'jam dpal gzhon nu
gyur pa dang// tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu dang// nyan thos chen po gzhan dag dang// lha dang/ mi dang/ lha ma yin dang drithar bcas pa'i 'jig rten yid rangs te/ bcom ldan 'das kyis
gsungs pa la mngon par bstodado/ shin tu rgyas pa chen po'i mdo// 'phags pa sangs rgyas phal po che las// dkonamchog ta la la zhes bya ba'i gzungs kyi chos kyi rnam grangs rdzogs so
rgya gar gyi mkhan po su ren dra bo d+hi dang/ zhu chen gyi lo tsa ba ban d+ho la shes sdes bsgyur cing zhus te gtan la phab pa/
rgya gar skad du/ Arakar ma A ba ra Na bi shud d+hinAm mahA yA na sU ti/ bod skad du 'phags pa las kyi sgrib pa rnam par dag pa zhes bya ba theg pa chen po'i mdo//
sangs rgyas dang/ byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la phyag 'tshal// 'di skad bdag gis thos pa dus gcig na/ bcom ldan 'das langs ba can gyi a mas bsrungs
pa'i tshal na/ dge slong lnga brgya tsam gyi dge slong gi dge 'dun chen po dang thabs gcigatubazhugs te/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sum khri nyis stong la 'di lta sta/ byang chub
sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po nga rgyal rnam par 'joms dang/ 'od kyis rnam par rtse ba man pa shes pa dang/ rma tog pad lta bu dang/ 'od zer rab tu'agyed pa'i rgyal
bo dang/ rtag tu bu don ltar bris pa'i lus can dang ) som nyi thams cad mgu byed dang/ rin chen bkod pa'i rgyamatsho blo gros dang me tog sna tshogs gnas dang sgra dbyangs rnam par dka
rgyu pa'i rgyal bo dang/ 'od zer rgyal po'i sgron ma dang/ dpal gyi snying po gsar 'od dang/ dbang bo dang yul thams cad rab tu 'dzul ba dang/ sgra dbyangs mngon par sgrogs ba'i rgyal po dang/
gzi brjid yid 'ong kun bsdus dang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'achen bo 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa dang/ de la sogs pa byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sum khri
nyis stong dang yang thabs gcig go de nas de'i tshe dge slong dri med 'od ces bya pa yangs pa can gyi grong khyer chen por bsod snyoms kyi phyir rgyu ste 3 mthar chags su bsod

snyoms kyi phyir rgyub na/ khyim gyi rgyus mi shes pas smad 'tshong ma'i khyim zhig du song ngo// dge slong de smad 'tshong ma'i khyim gyi nang du song ma thag tu/ smad 'tshong ma des/ bdag dge slong 'di dang mi
nyal du mi gtang ngo// gal te ma grubanani bdag 'chi bar 'gyur ro snyam du de la 'dod chags kyi sems skyod de/ des dge slong nang du 'ongs ma thag tu sgo bcad nas ) dgoslong de la 'di skad ces
ba smras so// bdag dang lhan cig tumi nyal du mi rung ngo// gal te ma nyal na ni kho mo 'chi bar 'gyur ro zhes smos so// de nas dge slong dri med 'od kyi smad 'tshong ma de la 'di skad ces
skyasaso/ 2su mo kho bo ni sangs rgyas kyis bslabs pa chen po bcas pa la bslab dgos te/ 'khrig pa'i chos byed mi phod kyis thong shig/ kho bo ni shi yang gla'i 'khrig pa'i chos ni mi byed do
zhes byas so// de nas smad 'tshong ma de nyid snyam du sems te/ bdag gis gsang sngags dang/ sman gang gis dge slong 'di 'gug nas/ gdonami za bar bdag dang
lhan cig tu dga' ba nyams su myong bar 'gyur ba'i gsang sngags dang snyan ngag dag slong 'di la spyan gor ma chag go snyam mo// de nas des dge slong de la smras pa/ bdag kyang
sangs rgyas kyis bcas pa'i bslab pa bzhi'i kha 'am nyams pa ni bgyi ba mi 'tshol gyis/ thugs brtse ba'i slad du bsod snyoms bzhes shig ces byas nas de nang du song ste ) rig
sngags dang gsang sngags stobs bskyod pa dgagis bras de la bsngags nas dag slong de'i lhung bzed kyi nang du blugs// zas blugs ma thag tu dge slong de de'i mod la tshul
bzhin ma yin ba'i rnam par rtog pa skyes to/ de kun tu rtog cing shas cher gdung ba skyed do/// denas smad 'tshong ma des gaslong de'i bzhin gyi mdog gyur bar mthong nas/
bya lag pa g.yas pas dge slong de bzung ste/ mal du khrid nas de dang lhan cig tu nyal po byed do// de nas dge slong de smad 'tshong ma de dang lhan cig tu
dga' ba'i rtsed mo de nyams su myong nas// bsod snyoms de blangs te/ gtsug 'ag khang du song nas/ kye ma bdag ni tshul khrims kyi phung bo chen po las nyams par gyur gyis/
ngadag tshul khrims nyams pas dad pas byin ba longs spyod pa'i 'os ma yin te/ bdagani sems ca dmyal ba chen por ltung bar 'gyur ro snyam nas/ de dge slong grogs po rnams kyi
thad du 'ongs nas/ bdag nitshul khrims 'chal par gyur taM ) dag slong ma yin par gyur pas// gnasams can dmyal bar ltung bar 'gyur ro zhes smras so// dag slong grogs po/
de dag gis de la 'di skad ces smras so// khyod ci'i phyir tshul khrims 'chal bar gyur/ des kyang de dag la ji ltar gyur pa bzhin du sad do// de nas dge slong grogs po
de dag gis dge slong dri med 'od de la 'di skad ces smras so// tshe dang ldan pa dri med 'od byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa zhes bya ba/ nyes pa tham
cad las byin pa la mkhas pa// sgrib pa thamasacad sel ba la mkhas pa mi skye ba'i chos la bzod pa thob pa ) bcom ldan 'das kyis kyang bstod cing bsngags la snyan bar brjod pa yod
kyis: tshe dang ldan pa tshur shog/ 'o bu cag 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa ga la ba der 'dong ngo// de ni khyod kyi 'gyod ba de bsal nus so/ de nas dge slong du mar rtsod der
zas de ma thos par dge slong grogs po de dag dang lhan cig tu 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa ga la ba der dong ste lhags nas/ 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa dang lhan cig tumangon du bkar
par mgu ba dang yang dag par dga' bar 'gyur ba'i gtam rnam pa sna tshogs byas nas/ 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa la ji ltar gyur pa de bsnyad do// de skad ces smras pa dang 'jam
dpal gzhon nur gyur pas/ dge slong dri mar 'od de la 'di skad ces smras so// dge slong khyod bras 'di ji zo shig dang zas zos zin ba'i 'og tu/ bcom ldan 'das la zhus te/ bano
ldan 'das kyis ji skad lung bstan pa'i don bzhin du gzung bar bya'o// de nas dge slong dri med 'od dang dge slong de dag zan zlongan pa'i 'og tu 1 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur
ba dang lhan cig tu/ bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der dong ste lhags nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te ]bcom ldan 'das la lan gsum bskor ba byas nas/
phyogs gcig tu 'khod do// de nas dge slong dri med 'od ngo tsha ste/ bcom ldan 'das la gsol ma nus so// de nas 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa stan las langs taM ) bla
dgos phrag pa gcig tu bzar nas/ pus mo g.yas pa'i lha nga sa la btsugs te/ bcom ldan 'das ga la ba de logs su thal mo sbyar nas/ bcom ldan 'das la ji lta
gyur pa de thams cad gsol to// de skad ces gsol nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyis dge slong dri med deb 'di skad ces bka'astsal to// dge slong khyod kyis de lta bu byas pa bden nam gsol
kha bcom ldan 'das de mad lags so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ dag slong khyod kyis ci bdag gis 'dod chags spyad do snyam du snga nas bsams sam/ gsol pa//
khacom ldan 'das de ni ma lags so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ dag slo'adod chags pa de la byed pa ma skyes par khyod kyis 'dod chags ji ltar spang/ gsol pa/ bcom
ldan 'das bdag gi 'dod chags kyisams ni sladakyis skyes lags so// bka' stsal pa// dge slong sams des khyod kyi 'dod chags spyad dam/ gsol pa// decom ldan 'das de ni de lta
tshe lags so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ dge slong ci sams kun nas nyon mongs pas sems can rnams kun nas nyon mongs pa can du 'gyur la/ se mas rnam par dag pas
rnam par dag par 'gyur ro zhes pas chos ma bstan tam/ gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das de ni de lta lags so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa dge slong 'di ji snyam du sems//
ci khyod kyis gnya de log pa'i rmi lam na/ kun tu rtog pa'i tsho 'dod chags sbyang pa myong ngam/ gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das myong lags so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa// dag
slong sems kyis 'dod chags slad pa khyod kyis mi shes sam/ gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das de ni de lta lags so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ dge slong ci khyod kyis rmi
lam gyi sems dang 3 gnyid ma log pa'i sems 'di la bye brag dang/ tha dad du dbye ba zhig yod par mthong ngam/ gsol ba/ bcom ldan 'das bdag gis ni rmilam gyisams sam/
gnyid ma log pa'i sems la tha dad du bgyi ba cung zad kyang ma mthong lags so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ dge slong 'di ji snyam du sems 3 chos thams cad ni rmi lam lta bu zhes
ngas ma bstan tam 3 gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das de ni de lta lags so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ dge slong 'di ji snyam du soms ci rmi lam de yang dag pa yin nam/
gsol nga bcom ldan 'das de ni ma lags so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa 3 dge slong 'di ji sAm du sams/ ci rmi lam gyi sems gang yin pa dang/ gnyid ma log pa'i
sams gang yin pa 'di gnyis med pa ma yinanam ) gsol pa// bcom ldan 'das ma mchis lags so// bad bar gshegs pa mamachis lags so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa//
dadage slong 'di jisnyam du sems/ ci med pa de ga lhag na yod dam/ gsol pa// bcom ldan 'das de ni ga lags so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa// dag
slong 'di ji snyam du sems/ ci med pa gang yin pa de la skye ba yod dam/ gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das de ni ma lags so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ dge slong 'di ji sam
( du soms/ ci skya ba med pa skye 'am/ 'gag pa 'am kun nas nyon mongs pa can na// rnam par byang bar 'gyur ram/ gsol pa ! bcom ldan 'das de ni ma lags so// bcom ldan 'das
kyis bka' stsal pa/ dge slong 'di ji snyam du sems/ ci skye ba med pa'i chos rnams sa mas can dmyal bar 'gro bar 'gyur ram/ dud 'gro'i skye gnas sam ) gshin rje'i 'jig rten du
'gro bar 'gyur ram/ gsol pa// bcom ldan 'das skye ba ma mchis pa nyid kyang ma mchis pa lags na/ dran bgror mchi bar 'gyur ba lta ga la mchis/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal
ba dge slong chos thams cad ni de ltar 'od gsal ba yin na/ byis ba so so'i skya bo rnams ni yang dag pa ma yin pa'i chos rnams brtags/ phyin ci log la brtags/ gsob dang gsog/
lta bu'i chos thams cad la brtags pas/ sems can dmyal ba dang/ dud 'gro'i skye gnas dang/ gshin rje'i 'jig rten du 'gro bar 'gyur ro// dge slong gzhan yang chos thams cad ni yang
dag pa ma yin pa ste/ rnam par bsgrubs na nye bar gnas pa'i mtshan nyid do// dge slong chos thams cad ni sbyar ba ste 'dod chags dang/ zhe sdang dang ) gti mug rnams kyang khyis paso so'i
skye bo de dag gis kun nas bskyed pa yin no// dge slong chos thams cad ni brtags pa ste/ phyin ci log las byung ba yin no// dag slong chos thams cad ni med pa ste ) smig rgyu lta bu'i ngo bo/
nyid yin no// dge slong chos thams cad ni ya ma bar sta nam mkha' dang 'dra'o// dge slong chos thams cad ni dngos po dang bral ba'i phyir dngos po med pa'o// dge slong chos thamasaM cad ninam
mkha ba ltar zab pa'i phyir zab pa'o/ dag slong chos thams cad ni dngos po mi dmigs pa'i phyir yangs pa'o// dge slong chos thams cad ni shin tu dben pa'i phyir mi gnas pa'o// dge slong
chos thams cad ni yul thams cad gsog yin pa'i phyir mi rten pa'o// dge slong chos thams cad ni shin tu gsog yin pa'i phyir rtsa ba med pa'o// dge slong chos thams cad ni nyon mos
pa mi dmigs pa'i phyir kun nas dkris pa med pa'o// dag slong chos thams cad ni rang bzhinagyis ma skyes pa'i phyir yongs su gdung ba med pa'o// dge slong chos thams cad ni dbon pa'i
phyir sgrib pa med pa'o// dge slong chos thams cad ni rang bzhin gyis snang ba med pa'i phyir zhe sdang med pa'o// dge slong chos thams cad ni rang bzhin gyis 'od gasal ba'i phyir gti mug med/
0 'khyag ]pa'o[}]dge slong chos thams cad ni mig yor lta bu ste/ rnam par smin pa med pa'o// dge slod chos thams cad ni log par snang ba'i phyir sgyu ma lta bu 'o// dge/
klong chos thams cad ni yang dag pa ma yin par kun tu brtags pa'i phyir gnas pa med pa'o/ dge slong chos thams cad ni byis pa so so'i skya bo rnams kyis med bzhin du sgro btags pa'i
ts+tshe phyir rnam par smongs par byed pa'o// dge slong chos thams cadra ni rkyen phan tshun 'gal ba'i phyir skye ba med pa'o// dge slong chos thams cad ni lam chad pa'i phyir chags pa med pa'o// dgo
slong chos thams cad nyon mongs pa yang dag pa ma yin pa'i phyir nyon mongs pa med pa'o// dge slong chos thams cad ni nam mkha' ltar yongs su dag pa'i phyir phrim med pa'o// dge slong
chos thams cad ni ci las kyang dben pa'i phyir ci yang ma yin pa'o// dag slong chos thams cad ni ngo bo nyid kyis ma skyes pa'i phyir dul ba'o// dag slong chos thams cad ni sngon gyis mtha'
dang : phyi ma'i mtha' dang/ dbus yongs su bcad pa'i phyir mi bden pa'o// dge slong chos thams cad ni gcig la gcig rgyu'i 'gyur ba med pa'i phyir grol ba'o// dge slong chos thamA
cad ni rtswa dang/ shing dang/ rtsig pa dang/ bong ba dang 'dra ba'i phyir pems po yin no// dge slong chos thams cad ni nam mkha' dang tshul 'dra pa'i phyir do bo med pa'o// dge slong chos thams
0 cad ni chags ba med pa'i phyir mnyamapa'o// dag slong chos thams cadu ni namamakha'i lus dang nang pa stong pa dang 'dra ba'i phyir gzung du med pa'o// dge slong chos thams cad ni ye shes dang
ldan pa rnams kyis yongs su btsal ba'i phyir thob ba med pa'o// dge slong chos thams cad ni dus gsum yongs sudag pa'i phyi'i dus med pa'o// dag slong chos thams cad ni mun pa/
chags pa med pa'i phyir sbyor ba med pa'o// dge slong chos thams cad ni sgrib pa las dben pa'i phyir zug rngu med pa'o/ dag slong sa thams cad ni mya ngan las 'das pa dang mtshungs/
pa'i phyir bde ba'o// dag slong chos thams cad ni 'jigs pa dang bral ba'i phyir 'jigs pa med pa'o// dge slong chos thas cad ni tshu rol mi dmigs pa'i phyir pha rol ma yin no//
dge slong chos thams cad ni gras su bgrang ba med pa'i phyir dpag tu med pa'o// dge slong chos thams cad ni mtshan ma gsob yin pa'i phyi mtshan ma med pa// dge slong chos tham
cad ni smon pa chad pa'i phyir smon pa med pa'o// dge slong chos thams cad nibadu byed brdzun pa'i chos nyid yin pa'i phyir mngon par 'du byed pa med pa'o// dag slong chos thams cad ni rnam
par rtog pa nye bar zhi bab phyir spros pa med pa'o// dge slong chos thams cad n gnas dang bral ba'i phyir gnas med pa'o// dge slong chos thamasacad ni rtag tu dang ba'i phyir rtog pa med pa'o//
dag slong chos thams cad ni skye ba mi dmigs pa dang/ skya ba gso ba yin pa dang/ skya ba gsog yin pa dang/ ba stong pa yin pa dang/ skye ba zhi ba yin pa'i phyir yongs su
mya ngan las 'das pa'o// dge slong de'i phyir chos 'di dag ni ji skad bstan pa da bo nang shin te dge slongang byang chub kyi snying po la 'dug pas ni/ chos gang gi skya ba 'am 'jig ra 'am kun
nas nyon mongs pa 'am/ rnam par byang ba 'am/ sgrib pa 'am/ kun nas dkris pa 'am/ 'gyod pa bam ) yid la gcags pa'itos rdul tsam yang mi dmigs so/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ dge slong
chos thams cad ni rtag tu kun nas nyon mongs pa can ma yin pas rang bzhin gyis yongs su dag pa'i phyir ro// de nas dge slong dri med 'od kyis chos kyi rang bzhin 'di thos nas tshim zhing/
mgu la yid rangs te/ rab tu dga' zhing dga' ba dang yid bde ba skyes te// sgrib pa med par ngashin tu dag par gyur nas// bcom ldan 'das ga la ba de logs su thal mo sbyar ba btud nas// bcom
ldan 'das la tshigs su bcad de gsol pa// kye ma kyi ma sangs rgyas mthu che ba// lhar bcas 'jig rten skyabs ni khyod lags te// ma bslabs bzhin du'o na tan kun gyis 'phags// sdug bsngal
kun 'grel khyod la phyag 'tshal 'ako/ skyabs ma mchis pa rnams kyi skyabs khyod mdzod// 'dren pa ma mchis rnams kyi 'dren khyod mdzod// zhigyur bde ba'i lam la gnas pa po// sangs rgyas na b+hachen
[:l]khyod la phyag 'tshal lo// khyod ni 'jig rten long ba'i sgron ma lags/ mig ma mchis pa rnams la mig stsol khyod// sems can ma bsgral rub tu sgrol mdzad khyod/ 'duba' bo mthu chen khyod la
phyag 'tshal lo// chags dang snang la khyod ni chags migangag/ srid la chags rnams sdug bsngal 'grel pa khyod// 'khor ba'i 'khor ba mi bdon thugs su chud/ dmashes stobs 'phags khyod
la phyag 'tshal lo// rtog dang rnam rtog rnams kyi rtag mi chags// ye shes bsam mi khyab pas grol ba po// 'jig rten gsum na chog dri ma da nyon mongs grol// dri med dag pa'i sams can khyod
phyag 'tshal// byang chub la ni bdag kyang zhugs bgyis la// sems can sdug nga sngal skyabs ma mchis rnams dgrol// 'di 'dra'i ye shes bdag gis thob gyur cing// theg pa dman pas brag
ba las ma 'gyur// bskal pa bye ba khrag khrig bsam yas kyis// sdug bsngal bas bgyi byang chub yong mi song// skar ma'i tshogs kyi nang na dgung zla ltar/ 'jig rten mgon po bdag gis de 'drar
mthong// ji ltar bsam pa dman pa'i mi 'ga' zhig/ rgya mtsho nin po'inang du phyin gyur kyang// rin chen mang po mi len stong bgyidacing// mching bu'i nor bu blangs nas mchi bar bgyid// de bzhi
gang dag sangs rgyas rnam 'phrul stobs// thos kyang 'dir ni byang chub sems mi skyed// byang chub spangs nas nyan thos 'tshal ba gang// de dag ye shes las la 'jug mi 'gyur// 'dir ni mi zhig
byis pa'i rang bzhin can// rgyal bo 'bas kyis bskor ba mthong gyur kyang/ deni blon po'i thabs la sems bskyed na// de ye shes pa yangs par mi 'jug ltar// de ltar sangs
rgyas 'on tan mo nyid dang// ye shes rnam pa 'khrul ba thos gyur kyang// shes padaman pa la ni 'dun skyod pa/ de ni le lo can te sems kyang shum// theg pa dman pas 'jig rtenam chags ba/

mtshan mo srin bu me khye'u snang ba 'du// nyi ma'i gzi brjid kyis ni las bgyid ga/ snang ba thob nas mun dang bral bar 'gyur// sangs rgyas sgrasani mtho ris mchi bar 'gyur// sangs rgyas sgras ni bzang
'gror mchi bar 'gyur/ 'jig rten 'dir sangs rgyas sgron ma'i mchog/ lhar bcas 'jig rten 'di'i snang bar mdzad// lha yi khrod nasang ge mthong gyur na// wa yi skad la mdun ba skyid pa dang// sang

ga'i rnam par 'phrul ba spong bgyidacing// wa yi chos kyis dga' ba skyedapa ltag/ de bzhin gang dag nyan thos khrod dag tu// skyes bu khyu mchogasang ge rnam 'phrul mthong// theg pa dman la dga' ba skyed
pa ni de dag phyogs gcig pa yi rdzu 'phrul lags// ye shes 'tshal ba'i mis ni dus kun tu// 'jig rten don du sdug bsngal mang 'grel ba/ 3nyan thos mang po'i sa min ganga' gas pa'i// ste//
shes dam pa mchog ni btsal bar bgyi// de nas dge slong dri med 'od kyis tshigs su bcad pa stobs pa sbas pa 'di thos nas/ lha'i bu bzhi khri nyi stong bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs/
pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyod nas/ dudag gis bcom ldan 'das dang ) 'jam dpa'ab gzhon nur gyur pa dang/ dge slong dri mad 'od la me tog mnar ba dag gis gsute tshig 'di skad ces smras so//
dge slong legs so legasaso// 'di ltar sangs rgyas kyi byang chub rjes su 'dzin pa 'di ni/ de bzhin gshegs pa la byas pa gzo ba nyid yin no// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis de'i tshe

'dzum pa mdzad do// 'di ni sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi chos nyid de/ nama'adzum pa mdzad pa de'i tshe/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhal gyi sgo nas 'od 'phro ba 'di lta sta/ sngon po dang/ ser po dang/
dma' po dang/ dkar po dang/ bcod ka dang/ shel dang/ dngul gyi kha dog lta bu kha dog du ma dang/ kha dog sna tshogs byung sta 3 de dag gis 'jig rtan gyi khams mtha' yas mu med pa dag 'od kyis khyab
bar byas nas/ tshangs pa'i 'jig rten gyi bar du song ste/ nyi ma dang zla ba'i 'od kyang mog mog bor byas nas phyir log ste/ bcom ldan 'das la lan gsum bskor ba byas nas/ bcom ldan 'dus kyi
dbu'i gtsug tu mi snang bar gyur to/ da nasatshodang ldan pa kun dga' bo stan las las te/ chos gos phrag pa la gcig bgos nas pus mo g.yas pa'i lha nga sa la btsugs te/
bcom ldan 'das ga la ba de logs su thal mo sbyar ba btud nas/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegapa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogapa'igs rgyas rnamasam
rgyus mchis/ rkyen mamachis bar 'dzum pa mi mdzadan/ 'dzul ba mdzad pa'i rgyu gang lags/ rkyen gang lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ kun dga' bo// ngag

slong dri med 'od 'dis lhag pa'i bsam pa de lta bu s byang chub tu sems bskyod de/ de'i phyir ngas dge slong dri med 'od 'di bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub lung bstan par bya ste kun dga' bo dag
slong dri med 'od 'di ni/ ma'ongs pa'i dus bsal ba bcu 'das pa na/ sangs rgyas bye ba phrag nyi shu rtsa gnyis la mchod pa byed pa ra 'gyur te/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs
pa'i sangs rgyas byams pa las mi skya pa'i chos la bzod pa thob par 'gyu'o/ bskal pa bzang po gis ngas rgyas bcom ldan 'das thams cad la yang mchod pa byed par 'gyur tu )de'i 'og tu mngon pa
byung nas/ de bzhin gshegs pa yon tan pad+marnam par grags spyod seng ge'i sgra sgrogs zhes bya bar 'gyur/ kun dga' bo de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dgapar rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas lon

tan bad+ma rnam bar grags spyodasang ge'i sgra sgrogs de'i sangs rgyas kyi zhingagang 'an po che sna bdun las grub par 'gyul/ nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas med de/ byang chub sems dpa' 'bab shig 'du bar 'gyur

'o sangs rgyas kyi zhing dor yang phyir mi ldog pa'i 'khor lo zhes bya ba'i chos ston par 'gyuko/ de dag kyang myur ba nyid du bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang la mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya
thamanaM bar 'gyur te/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing yang ye shes kyi khyad bar kyis yongs su sbyong bar 'gyur ko 'jig rtenagyi khams de yang rnam grangs mtha' yas ldan zhes bya bar 'gyur ro/
bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo la bka' stsal pa kun dga' bo 'di lta ste dpa la na/ nyi ma shar ba na mun pa thams cad med par 'gyur ko/ kun dga' bod bzhin du gang dag gis
chos kyi rnam grangs 'di thos pa de dag gis ni kun nas snang ba thob par 'gyur te/ chos thams cad la yang sgrib pa med pa thob par 'gyur ro de nas bcom ldan 'das la tshe dang
ldan pa kun dga' bos 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das ji tsam gyis na sgrib pa dang/ sgrib pa ma mchis par 'gyur ba lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa kun dga' kho
thong shig/ gnas 'di 'dri bas khyedal ci zhig bya kun dga' bo gal tade bzhin gshegs pas sgrib pa dang/ sgrib pa med pa thams cad bshad du zin na ]lhar bcas pa'i 'jig rtenarmongs par
de nas bcom ldan 'das 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pas 'di skad ces gsol to/ bcom ldan bs sgrib pa dang 3 sgrib pa ma mchis pa gang thos na/ byang chub sems
dpa' rnams lnga brgya tha ma la bab pa'i tshe/ 'jig rten ba'i chos rnams la 'dod pa skyed par mi 'gyur ba de bshad du gsol// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ 'jam dpal sgrib pa zhes bya ba la
ka[9]@#// 'do chags ni sgrib pa'o// zhe sdang ni sgrib bgo/ gti mug ni sgrib ba'o// sbyin pa ni sgrib pa'o// tshul khrims ni sgrib pa'o/ bgrod pa ni sgrib pa'o// brtson 'grus ni sgrib pa'o//
bsam gtanan sgrib pa'o// shes rab ni sgrib pa'o// sangs rgyas su 'du shes pa'i sgrib pa'o// chos su 'du shes pa ni sgrib pa'o/ dge 'dun du 'du shes pa ni sgrib pa'o// stongab nyid du 'du shes ba ni/

sgrub pa'o// mtshan ma med pa'i 'du shes pa ni sgrib pa'o// smon pa med par 'du shes la ni sgrib pa'o// mngon par 'du byed pa med par bdu shes pa ni sgrib pa'o// skye ba med pa 'du shes pa ni sgrib pa'o
byang chub tu bdu shes pa ni sgrib pa'o// 'jam dpalamador na kun nas nyon mongs pa 'am/ rnam par byang bar dmigs pa de dag thams cad ni de'i sgrib pa yaniba' blta bar bya'o// 'jam dpal gyis gsol
pa bcom ldan 'as sbyin pa ji ltar sgrib pa lags/ tshul khrims dang/ bzod pa dang/ brtson 'grus dang/ bsam gtan dang/ shes rab ji ltar sgrib pa lags ) bcom ldan 'das
kyis bka' stsal pa// 'jam dpal chos thams cad la ni sgrib pa med mod kyi/ 'on kyang byis pa so so'i skya bo rnamasakyi rang gi rtog pas sbyin pa yang sgrib pa'i bya ba byed do// tshul khrims dang/
bzod pa dang/ brtson 'grus dang 3 bsam gtan dang shes rab kyang sgrib pa'i bya ba byed do// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'jam dpal byis ba so so'i skya bo rnams ni/ sbyin pa sbyin pa na sems ca/

ba/ se ra sna can rnams ma dad par byed de/ de dag ma dad pa des khong khro ba dang tha ba'i nyes ba skyed par byed do// khong khro ba dang/ tha bas pas sams can dmyal bar ltung bar 'gyur ro// de dag tshul
khrims bsrang ban/ tshul khrims 'chal pa la snod cing bcas par byedal/ bsngags pa ma yin pa brjod do// de dag las de dag gi bsngags bam yin pa thos pas so so'i skya bo gang bodag ma dad//
par byed de/ de dag ma dad pa des ngan 'gror 'gro bar 'gyur ro/ de dag bzod pa sgom pa na/ bdag cag ni bzod par smra ba yin gyi gzhan 'di dag ni gnod sems kyi sems dang ldan pa yin no zhes
bzod pa'i rgyags pas chos pa de dag bag med pa'i gzhi las byung ba'i sdug bsngal rnams skyed par 'gyur ro// de dag brtson 'grus rtsom pa na bdag sgrogs shing ) dge slong dag 'di dag ni de la
can du gnas pa yin te/ brtson ba mad pa dad pas sbyin pa las spyod pa'i byed do// de dag gis ni chu pa'i chu yang longs spyad mi 'os so snyam ste/ de dag brtson 'grus rtsom pas/ bdag la ni stod
par khyod gzhan la ni smod par byed de/ de dag ni byis pa yin zhes nga snya'o/ de dag bsam gtan la snyoms par 'jug ba na/ bsam gtan gyi dga' ba de la chags ba skyed par byed cing/
de dag 'di snyam du sems te/ bdag cag ni mnyam par gzhagabs gnas pa yin gyi 2 dge slong dag gzhan 'di dag ni sams g.yengs pas gnas ba yin te/ 'du 'dzi la dga' bas gnas/
pa yin no/ 'du 'dzi la dga' bas 'di dag sangs rgyas su ga la 'gyur te/ 'di dag ni sas rgyas kyi byang chub las 'di ngo snyam mo/ de dag 'du shes yid la byed pa des ji tsam

du brnyes par gyur pa'i sems skyed par byed ba de snyad kyi bskal par 'khor ba yongs su 'dzin par 'gyur go// phyis de dag gis gang du byang chug la spyod ba na gal te de dag mang du thos pa yin du zin kyang de
ngag gis chos thams cad ni yi ge med pa la rnam par shes pa yod par brtags te/ shes rab tu dmigs nas pha rol khyad du gsodapar byed pa de dag ni mi shes pa'o zhesanga'o// mi shes bzhin
du zla ba'o zhes nga ko/ skyes bu dam pa ma yin pa'o zhes nga sa'o// rnam bar rtog bas nyams pa'o zhes nga skya'o// gal te de dag theg ba chen po la zhugs par gyur na yang/ de dag 'di snyam du
soms te/ bdag cag ni 'jig rten na gtso bo yin no// bdag cag ni 'jig rten na yul yin no// bdag cag ni 'jig rtenan mchog yin no// snyam mo// gal te de dag gis nyan thos kyi theg
ba ba dag mthong na/ de dag la ma dad pa skyed cing snod pa dang/ 'phya ba dang/ bsngags pa ma yin brjod par byed de/ bsam pa ngan pa dang/ nyes par rjod pa des na/ ngan 'gror 'gro ba thob bar
'gyur ro gdonas bcom ldan 'das la 'dzem dpal gzhon nur gyur pas 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams
kyi bsngags pa rjod par mi bgyid lagasum/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa'ajam dpal 'di ji snyam du sems ci byang chub sems dpa' sems can thams cad la dga'/
bzhin du blta ba dang phan pa'i dngos po'i rang bzhin bskyod par mi bya 'am/ 'jam dpal gyis gsol pa// bcom ldan 'das de ni da ltar lags so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal
pa 'dzag dpal 'di ji sAm dus nas/ byang chub sems dpa' sems can nyan thos kyi thag ba pa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi thag pa pa 'am/ theg pa chen po pa 'ga' tsam yang longs su
sbyangs sam/ 'jam dpal gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das de ni ma lags te/ byang chub sems dpa' sems can thams cad la sems sgoms pa lags pas/ byang chub sems dpa' ni
sems can 'ga' lang yongs su ma gtang lags so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ 'jam dpal 'di lta ste dper na/ sman pas ni rgyal po 'am/ tshong dpon nam/ khyim
bdag gam )mi dbul po 'am/ sems can 'ga'atsam yang yongs su sbas pa med do// sman pa de ni 'di ltar sems sgoms pas nyer la gnas pa yin te/ ji ltar byas nasams can 'di dag
nad dang bral bar 'gyur zhig gu snyam mo// 'jam dpal de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni sams can thams cad la snying rje 'jug cing sems snyoms nye bar gnas pa yin te/
'di snyam du sems can 'di dag thams cad ji ltar byas na sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams la nges par 'byung ba'agyur zhig kusnyam mo/ 'jam dpal 'di lta ste 3 dper na/ snyan
pa ni sman dpyad kyi rgyud rgyun ma chad na dga' zhing mgu la li sa par 'gyugo/ 'jam dpal de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni sangs rgyas kyi gdung brgyudamachad na dga' zhing
mgu la yid rangs par 'gyur ro// 'jam dpal sems can thums cadran sman pa dang 'dra ba ma yin no// 'jam dpal gso bar byed pa'i sman pa ni dkon no// 'jam dpal de bzhin du sems can
thams cad ni sangs rgyas dang 'dra ba ma yin te/ byang chub kyi sems ni dkon no// byang chub kyi phyir go cha bgo ba na sams can thams cad kyis mi bzod do dpar na le lo can rnams ni bdag
gis sman pa khya'o snyam du sman pa mi choganams la lhag par dmigs pa med do// de bzhin du sems can thams cad ni byang chub tu sems bskyed mi nus te/ le las bdag nyid nadapar byed do// 'jam dpal/
rang byung ni dkonano/ ]gzhan la rag lasapa ma yin pa'i ye shes ni dkon no// sams rgya chab ni dkono// sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams la lhag par dmigs pa ni dkon no// de nas
bcomaM ldan 'das la 'jam dang la gzhon nur gyur pas 'di skad gsol to// bcom ldan 'das ji ltar byang chub sems dang ba chos thams cad l sgrib pa ma mchis par rnam par dag par 'gyur ba lagrwa
de skad ces gsol pa dang/ bcom ldan 'das kyis 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/ 'jam dpal byang chub sems dpa' chos thams cad 'dod chags kyi chos su
mthong ba gang yin pa des ni/ las kyi sgrib pa rnam par dag pa thob par 'gyurako/ chos thams cad zhe sdang gi chos su mthong ba des ni las kyi sgrib pa rnam par dag pa thob par 'gyur do/ chos
thams cadu gtig gi chos su mthong ba des ni las kyi sgrib pa rnam par dag pa thobakar tugyur ro/ 'jam dbal gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' 'dod ba'i yon tan lnga po dag la mngon par
dga' zhing mi gtong mi srong la/ sangs rgyasakyi chos rnams kyang 'dod pa'i ngo bo nyid du mthong ba des na las kyi sgrib pa rnam par dag pa thob par 'gyur ro// 'jam dbal gzhan yang byang chub mas

dbab ni sgrib pa lnga po dag gis byang chub tshol par byed de/ tshol ba dang byang chub kyang thobapa medacing sgrib pa rnams kyang med pa des las kyi sgrib pa thams cad rnam par dag pa thob pa'i 'gyur ro/
'jamadapa'o gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' gang kun nas mnar sems kyi gzhi dgu bo dag la byams pa thob par 'gyur ro// gang ba de'i kun nas mnar sems kyi gzhi skyabs 'gyur ba de dang/
tshul bzhin du so sor rtog bar byed cing/ bdag nyid kyang mi dmigs/ gzhan yang mi dmigs byams pa yang mi dmigasate/ 'di ltar chos thams cad mi dmigs pa de ni byams pa'i mchog mi/
@#/ no de ltar byang chub sems dang 'bazod pa dang ldan pa ni sgrib pa med pa nyid thob par 'gyur// 'jam dpal gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' gang ltung ba la ltung ba med par
mthong ba dang/ 'dul ba ma yin pa la 'dul bar mthong ba dang/ kun nas nyon mongs pal rnam par byang bar mthong ba dang/ 'khor ba'i khams la mya ngan las 'das pa'i dbyings su mthong bdes ni las
kyi sgrib pa rnam par dag pa thob par 'gyur ro/ 'jam dpal gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' gang 'dod chags kyi khams lamyang n las 'das ba'i dbyings su mthong ba dang/ zhe sdang gi khams la/
myongan las 'das pa'i dbyings su mthong ba dang/ gti mug gi khams la mya ngan las 'das pa'i dbyings su mthong ba des ni/ las kyi sgrib pa rnam par dag pa thob par 'gyur/ 'jam dpal
gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen bo// gang chos thams cad la sangs rgyas kyi chos su yang dag par mthong ba des ni/ las kyi sgrib pa rnam par dag pa thob par 'gyur ro// 'jam
rdza dpal gzhanayang byang chub sems dpa' gang chos thams cad nam mkha'i gzhi las byung bar mthong ba dos ni/ las kyi sgrib pa rnam par dag pa thob par 'gyur ro// 'jam dpal gzhan yang byung
chub sems dpa' gang sor sna'i chos rnams dang/ sbyin pa'i chos rnams la gnyis su mi 'byed pa dang/ 'chal pa'i tshul khrims kyi chos rnams dang/ tshul khrims kyi chos rnams la gnyis su mi
wa[d/]'byed pa dang/ gnod sems kyi chos rnams dang/ bzod pa'i chos rnamasal gnyis su mi 'byed pa dang/ le lo'i chos rnams dang/ brtson 'grus kyi chos rnams la gnyis su mi 'byed pa dang/
rnam par g.yengs ba'i chos rnams dang/ bsam gtan gyi chos rnams la gnyis su mi 'byedapang/ 'chal ba'ishes rab kyi chos rnams dang/ shes rab kyi chos rnams la gnyis su mi 'byed
pa desani las kyi sgrib pa rnam par dag pa thob par 'gyuko/ 'jam dpalagazhan yang byang chub sems dpa' gang nyon mongs pa thams cad la sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams su mos pa de ni las kyi slob
ba rnam par dag pa thob par 'gyur ro/ de nas bcom ldan 'dasal 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pas 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' ji
ltanyon mongs pa thams cad lasangs rgyas kyi chos rnams 'jug par bgyid lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ 'jam dpal 'di ji snyam du sems/ chos 'ga' tsam yang
chos 'ga' tsam la kun nas nyon mongs ba'i bya ba byed dam/ gsol ba/ bcom ldan 'das de ni ma 'gas so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ 'jam dpal 'di ji snyam du sems/
chos 'ga' tsam yang chos 'ga' tsamal rnam par byang ba'i bya ba khyadangam/ gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das de nam lags so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal ba ) 'jam dpal 'di ji/
[2 ]/snyam du sems/ khyod kyis mi skye ba'i chos la bgrod pa ji ltar thob/ 'as dpal gyis gsol ba/ bcom ldan 'das bdag gis ni nyon mongs pa thams cad la mi skye ba'i
chos la bzod pa thob lags so// de ci'i slad du zhe na/ bcom ldan 'das nyon mongs pa thams cad ni namamakha'i gzhi las byung ba'i slad du lta/ bcom ldan 'das bdag gis ni chos 'ga'
tsam yang yongs ma 'tshal cing na zangs la/ ma bsgoms shing mngon sum du ma bgyis lags so// bcom ldan 'das kyis ba so so'i skye bo thams cad nisangs rgyas kyi chos rnams dang bral
ba yang ma lags ) rtogs pa yang ma lags te/ bcom ldan 'das nyon mongs pa spang ba'i slad du/ sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams la dmigs pa de dag ni yongs par 'gyur ba lags so/
de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis/ 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa la legs so zhes bya bakhyin te/ 'jam dpal gnyis su med pa'i chos la gnas pa bstan pa 'di'i legs so legs
so 'jam dpal sngon byung ba 'dus ba'i dus bskal pa grangs med pa'i chos grangs med pa/ gzhal du med pa tshad med pa// bsam gyis mi khyab pa dpag tu med pa'i pha rol bas kyang ches
pha rol tugyur pa de'i tshe de'i dus na 'jig rten gyi khams shin tu dri ldan zhes bya bar nge bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dgapar rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyasa'age pa dang zhabs su ldan pa/ bde ba
00 gshegs pa/ 'jig rten mkhyen pa/ skyes bu 'dul ba'i kha lo sgyur ba/ bla na med pa// lha dang mi rnams kyi stonApa ) sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'dus nyi ma'i snying bo 'od zer dris med pa zhes/
bya ba 'jig rten du byung ngo// 'jam dpal de bzhin gshegs pa dgra com pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas nyi ma'i snying bo 'od zer dri ma med pa de'i sku tshe'i tshad ni bskal ba dag stong thub
par gyur to/ 'jig rten gyi khams de'i sams can gang yin pa de dag ni dmanab la mos par gyur to// rgya chen bo la chos ba ni nyung bar gyur to// de bzhin gshegs pa de yongs su mya ngan las/
khas pa'i dam ba'i chos ni lo stong gi bar du gnas par gyur to// de'i sku gdung rnams kyang 'di lta ste dper na ) nga'i sku gdung ji ltar rgyas par 'gyur ba bzhin du rgyas pa gyur to// 'jam dpal

de'i tshadag slong dpas byin zhes bya ba tshul khrims kyi phung bo la gnas pa/ ngo shes shing bslab pa 'dod pa mang du thos pa zhig byung ste/ dge slong de mdzes shing blta na sdug la kha dog bzang bo/
rgyas pa mchog dang ldan no/ de nang por smad g.yogs bgos nas/ lhung bzed dang chos gos blangs te/ grong khyer chen po rnam par rgyal bar bsod snyomasakyi phyir song ngo// de grong khyer de na

bsod snyoms kyi phyir rgyu zhingatshong dbon gyi khyim zhig tu song ba dang/ chong dpon gyi khyim de na yang tshong dbon gyi bu mo gzugs bzang zhing mdzes la blta na sdug pa mi la ma btang ba zhig yongo
de nas tshong dbon kyi bu mo des dag gling pas sbyin mthong nas/ 'do chags kyi sems skyes te/ 'di snyam du sems so// gal te bdag gi dge slong dbas sbyin 'di bdag gi
khyim thab ma thob nan bdag 'chi bar 'gyur ro snyam nas 2 su mang bsnyang m nus te/ de 'dod chags kyis yongs su gdus pa de nyid kyis nad zhugs par gyur to// de nas dge
slong dpas sbyin bsod snyoms kyi phyir rgyu ba byas nas/ gtsug lag khang du song/ bu mo de'i pha yang 'chi ba'i dus byas so/ de nas bu mo de'i mas bu mo de la khyod ci'i phyir 'di ltar
na bar gyur ces smras na/ de cadu mi saM zhing kha zas mi za ba 'dug go/ de nas bu mo de'i ne'u ldas bde ba dang sdug bsngal la mtshungs par spyod pa rnams kyis/ bu mo de la khyod
ci'i phyir 'di ltar na bar gyur ces dris so// des smras pa/ bdag gis dgoslong che ge mo zhig mthonganas/ de la 'dun pa 'dod chags skyes te/ bdag dge slong de dang phrang na ni nad 'di las
gsos par 'gyur ro// ji lta phrad bar ma gyur na ni 'chi bar 'gyur phyogs de nas bu mo de dag gis bu mo de bas thos nas de'i ma la bsnyad do// de nas de'i ma 'di snyam du sems te/
gal te dge slong dang sa sbyin dang phrad par ma gyur na ni ci byar yang tshod kyis/ bu mo 'di ni'achiba'agyus ro snyam mo// yang 'di snyam du bsams te/ bdag gis bu mo 'di dag slong dpas sbyin las
0/lung nod du gshugakob ma chag go 'on kyang dge slong dpasakhyin de khyim 'dir rtag tu 'ong bar 'gyur ro snyam mo/// de nas dge slong dpas byin yang grong khyer rnam par rgyal bar bsod

snyoms kyi phyir rgyu zhing tshong dpon gyi khyim der la nga bsod snyoms kyi phyir song ste/ de'i nang du zhugs pa dang/ tshong dpon gyi bu mo nyam chung brag hAgyur pa mthong nas/ des bu mo 'di ci'i phyir nyams chung
zhing na bar grub ces smasaso// bu mo de'i mas sbas pa/ bu mo 'di chosanyan par 'dod pa las ) bdag gis bgeTas byas nas de'i phyir 'di na bar gyur to/ 'daskad ces smos nas/ dge slong
dpas byin des/ bu mo de'i ma la 'di skad ces smas so// khyod bu mo 'di chos nyan pa la bkags ma byed cig/ des sas pa 3 gal te slob dpon gyis bu mo 'dil lung 'bog nani/ bdag bu mo
'dri chos nyan ba 'ad bgegs mi bgyid do// dge slong dang sa byin gyis smras pa/ bu mo 'di la bdag gis lung dbog par bya'o// bu mo'i mas smras pa 3 slob dpon rtag tu khyim 'dir gshegs
shig dpas byin gyis smas pa/ 'ong bar bya'o// de nas bu mo des dge slong gi tshig thos nas/ tshul bzhin ma yin pa yid la byed pa de 'as rtse zhil bar gyur ta 2 bdag gis
kyang ci nas bdag bdod ba bzhin byed par 'gyur bar chags par 'gyur bar byau0f38/ma mo// de nas bu mo des dge slong de la 'di skad ces smras so// bdagal thugs brtse ba'i srung/
@#/ gdu slob dpon khyim 'di gshegs pa gsol go de nas dag slong dngas byin des cang mi snapas khas sus nas/ bsod snyoms khyer te gtsug lag/ khang du song
de nas bu mo de'i mas bu mo de la 'di skad ces smras so// bu mo khyod da phyin chad rgyan gyis brgyal bar gyis la/ tsan dan gyis lus byug pa dang 2 gos kha dog sna
tshogs bgo bar gyis lA/ ci nas khyod kyi dbang du 'gyur ba de bzhin du khyod kyis nan tan byos shig des kyang de bzhin du nan tan byas so// de nas dge slong dang sa byin yang
dang yang dukhyim der 'ong zhing yid brtan par gyur to// des rtag tu mthong bas bu mo de la 'dod chags kyi sems bskyed de/ de 'dod chags yid la byed pa de dang lhan cig gnas nas/ 'ad/
chags kyis kun nas dkris par gyur to// de bu mo de dang lhan cig tu shin tu 'dres par gnas shing 'dug par gyur te/ der 'dris shing der mngon pa la dga' nas/ yang dang yang du gnas par
gyur to// de nas dag slong dang sa byin de bu mo dang lhan cig tu 'du'ang 'dug pa/ sngon bu mo de gang gis bslangs pa'i khyim thab des shosaso// gaslong pas byin de bu mo de
dang lhan cig tu yang dang yang du 'dug pa dang ) de 'di snyam du sems te/ dge slong dpas byin 'di bdag 'os thabs kyis gzung ste gsad do snyam mo// dag slong bas phyin des kyang bu mo de'i
[/]khyim thab kyis bdag bsad par byas shes thos nas/ de 'di snyamadu sems te/ bdag gis bu mo 'di'i lag tu gang gis tshongs dpon gyi bu mo de 'chibar 'gyur ba'i dug bskur gor ma chag
sAmamo// de nas dge slong dpas byin des bu mo de'i lag tu dug byin te 'di skad ces smras so// gal te bdag khyod kyi snying du sdug na ni/ duge 'as khyim thab 'di gsod cig
de nas bu mo des dge slong de las dug de blangs nas kha zas dang sbyar te bran mo'i lag tu bskur nas khyod song la/ nga'i khyim thabade la 'di byin cig ces byas so//
denas phun mo des dug dang sbyar ba'i kha bras de tshong dpon gyis bu thod la byin no// de nas tshong dpon gyis bu des kha byas dug dang sbyar bde bros nas shi'o// de nas dge slong dpas byin des
tshong dpon gyi bu de shi'o zhes thos so// thos nas kyang de 'gyod pa chen po skyes te/ bdag gis ni 'jigs su rung ba'i las byas so// bdag gis ni las mi bzad pa byas to )'di ltar bdag gis
'dod pa yang yongs su spyod 'a/ ) mi yang gsod du bcug na/ bdag gi 'gro ba ni gang yin/ bdag gi tshe phyi ma ni gang yin zhe gu/ bdag ni sems can dmyal bar ltung bar 'gyur ro snyam nas/ de'i lus
yongs su gdung bar gyur te/ bdag ni shi nas gdon mi za bar sems can dmyal bar 'gro bar 'gyur ro snyam nas/ de 'di snyam du sems te/ bdag sdug bsngal 'di las thar par khyod nus pa su zhig/
yod snyam mo// de gtsug lag khang nas gtsug lag khang du 'gro zhing rgyu sta/ shing bcad pa bin du sa la 'gyel nas/ kyi hud kyi rgyud bdagan sams can dmyal ba pa

gyur to zhes tshig tu smra'o// de'i tshigatsug lag khang gangs shes bya ba zhig yod de/ gtsug lag khang de ga la bar song ste phyin nas/ gtsug lag khang gi sgor song ste/ sa la 'gyel nas kyihud kyi hud
bdag nisam can dmal ba par gyur to zhes tshig tu smra'o// de nas byang chub sems dang kha sems dpa' chen po 'jigs sgrol gtsug lag khang de'inang du 'gro bas/ drag slong de
na la 'khyol ba mthong nas des de la sbas pa/ dge slong khyod ci'i phyir sa la 'gyel/ dos de la smras pa// bdag ni sems can dmyal ba par gyur to// bdag gis ni 'jigs su rung ba'i las byas
tsa so bdag gis 'khrig pa gang byas la// mi yang bsad do// de nas byang chub sems dpa' 'jigasasgrolakyis/ dag slong dbas byin de la snas pa// dag slong ma 'jigs
zla shig dang/ ngas khyod 'jigs pa yod par bya'o/ de nas dge slong dpas byin des/ 'jigs pa med pa'i sgra thos nas/ dga' zhing mgu la yi rang ba' gyur to/
de nas byang chub sems dpa' 'jigs sgrol gyis/ dge slong dpas byin desalas bslangs/ lag ba galas kha nas bzung nas nag stug po zhig gi nang du song ngo song nas/ de nags stug po de
'dug go/ de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'jigs sgrol tala'i srid tsam gyi nam mkha' la 'dug sa dge slong de la 'di skad ces smras so// dge slong khyod
ngal yid ches sam/ de nas dgeslong nges thal mo sbyar nas tshig tu smras pa// bdag ni bcom ldan 'das dang mjal to// bdag ni bde bar gshegs pa dang mjal to/
de nas de'i tshe byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'jigs sgrolasangs rgyas thams cad kyi yulal 'jug pa'i sgo de bzhin gshags pa'i ye shes kyi phyag rgya zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la
snyoms par zhugs so// de ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs ma thag tu de'i lus las de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku gsar gyi mdog can skyes bu chen po'i mtshan sum cu gnyis mnga' ba de dag phyung ngo//
de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku de dag gis kyang nags stug po de dag thams cad kyang khyab par gyur te/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku de dag gis gsungamathun par tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag gsungs so//
chos rnams 'di dag gzugos brnyan 'dra ba ste// chunang zla ba snang la med pa bzhin// byis pa soms ni rmongs shing skrag gyur nas/ 'dod chags dug dang de bzhin zhe sdang rtog/ chos rnams mkha'i
'dra rtag tu dag cing gas// myang ngan 'das shing gnas medazhib yin// 'din tshor ba po dang byed pa med// chos rnams 'di gzhi gsog snying po med// nang du btsal kyang 'dod chags ma red de/
zhe sdang sus kyang red par ma gyur na// byis pa'i skya bo bdag lags snyam sags// su yang 'di na chags par gyur ba med// rmi lam du ni bdag gis gzugs mthong snyam//
de la chags shing snang la rmos par gyur// mtshon cha thogs shing gsad par rtsol na// gsod pa po dang mtshon cha ci yang med// de bau0f00na 'di na byis pa 'dod paspyod// 'thab mo dag kyang 'byed
mi gsod par byed// gti mug dbang gis skrag cing rmongs par gyur// bdag ni gas so snyam ste draga' bar 'dzin// 'jig rten 'di dag thams cad rmi lam bzhin// chos rnams gsog ste stong

zhing snying po med// smig rgyu 'dra zhing sbyin drang mtshungs pa ste// 'dod chags mtshan nyid med tsang gti mug zhi/chos rnams 'di dag rtswa dang rtsig pa bzhin// sems ni ngan med cing phyi rol mod//
'dod chags srog dang sems can gso bamin// zhe sdang gang zag ma yi dngos po che// chos rnams 'di dag rkyen dang rgyu 'as grub// rgyu rkyen de la rmos shing byed pa med// chu zla 'dra bar byas pa
kyi ma yin te// lus kyang yod de 'dod chags gsog yin no// sgyu mas bsgrubs pa yin te stong ba nyid// byis pa dngos por 'dzin pas dpyad cing brtags// sgyu ma gsog ste med cing stong ba yin//
'dren 'dod chags zhe sdang gti mug med// chos 'di thams cad mtshan nyid mid ba ste// rtsa ba mi dmigs bzod nas rab tu zhi// mtha' ma gzung med dban zhing snying po mad// 'dod chags 'od gsal/
gti mug rab tu zhi// 'di na byis pa gzugs b.ran mthong ba na// 'di'i bdag yin snyam dusems par byed// gsog dang gzung du yod la yong min dang// snying bo med pa de la log par rtog/
chos rnams 'di dag mig yod 'dra ba ste// 'dod chags gti mug zhes gzung du med// sbya marmi lam chu zla lta bu ste// 'di lasu yang chags shing sdang ba med// yul 'di dag ni dug med stong
ba sta dngos por dmigs pa thams cad gazung du med// 'di dag brtags pa'i chos can yod ma yin// dngos bo mi rigs rtsa nas rab tu zhi// sgyu ma 'dod chags zhe sdang gtimug mad/ 'di
la nams kyang yod par 'gyur ma yin// chos rnams sgyu ma 'dra zhing rmi lam 'dra// thog ma mi dmigs thams cad yod ma yin// ji ltar chu la zla ba snang bzhin du// dar ni nam kyang zhugs pa/
gyur pa med// de bzhin byis pa snang zhing chags gyur kyang// 'di na 'dod chags mud ci zhe sdang med// 'dod chags gzung du med cing zhe sdang med// gti mug 'od gsal rkyen rnams stong pa ste/
sems can dmigs su med mi srog kyang med// chos 'di gsogasta zhi la snying bo med// mig kyang med de rna ba med pa len/ sna yang mi snang lce la dbazhinato/ 'di dag bamag bo'i chos can/
snying po med// byis pa'i skye bo rmos byed mos par byed// nam mkha'i la na ji ltar mkhayod cing/ khrad par mi 'gyur skye ba med pa bzhin// chos rnams 'di dag thams cad de bzhin te// rnam
mkha'i nultar dag cing rnamakhar dag/ chos rnams rnam pa sna tshogs brtags pa ste// brtags na de gang zhags kyang yod ma yin// byisapa phung bo 'di dag 'dra bar 'dzin// de yang/
de la nams kyang yod ma yin// shes ldan dngos dang dngos med rnam 'jig cing// chos nyid 'di dag thams cad zhi bar mthong// thams cad ma skyes gzung du med par mthong// de yi lus ni nams
kyang yod ma yin// chos rnams 'od gsal grol zhing rab tu grol// zhi zhing mi gnas mya ngan 'das gyur la// de la nams kyang gzung du med pa ste// shes ldan de ltar rtogs na grol bar 'gyur/
de nas nags khrod der byang chub sems dpa' 'jigs sgrol las chos mnyan pa'i phyir// lha'i bu bzhi khri nyis stong lhags par gyur pa de dag gis tshigs su bcad pa bstan pa de dag/

N+NaM thosanas// mi skye ba'i chos la bzod pa thob par gyur to// dge slong dpas khyen de yang kun nas bkris pa dang bral bar gyur te// de bzhin gshegs pa'i sbal pa bkod pa de dag mthong nas/ byang chub

kyi tshul dang ldan pa'i sems kyis chos kyi rang bzhin rab tu rnam par 'byed pas ma skye ba'i chos la bzod pa thob par gyur to// 'jam dpal khyed kyis de'i tshe de'i dus na/ byang chub sems dpa' 'jigs/
sgrol zhes bya ba de gzhan zhig yin pa snyam na de ltar mi bltago/ de ci'i phyir zhen/ byang chub sems dpa' byams pa de'i tshe de'i dus na// byang chub sems dpa' 'jigs sgrol zhes bya bar gyur to//

[4]'jam dpal khyod kyis de'i tshe de'i dus na// dge slong dpas byin zhes bya ba gzhan zhig yin pa snyam na de ltar mi blta'o// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de bzhin gshegs pa rin chen zla ba byang chub kyi spyad pa spyod
bde: de'i tshe de'i dus na 2 dge slong dpas byin zhes bya bar gyur to// de nas bcom ldan 'das la 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pas 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'dA
dge slong dpas byin de byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas lags sam/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa// 'jam dpal mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas zin te ) de ni nub phyol/

logs su sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'di nas sangs rgyas kyi zhing gats+tsha'i klungag bye ma snyed 'das pa na/ 'jig rten gyi khams 'od zer rtag pa zhes bya ba der de bzhin gshegs pa rin chen zla ba zhes bya
bar gyur to// 'jam dpal chos 'di dag gi sgrib pa med pa dgu ji tsam 'dod pa dag kyang longs su longs spyad la/ srog gi bar chad kyang byas bzhin du mi skya pa'i chos la bzod pa shor par gyur pa la
ltos// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di ltar do'i khams gsum ba thams cad yang dag pa ma yin par shes shing/ sems can thams cad mig lor dang 'dra bar shes ba'i ko 'jam dpal sgyu ma
lta bu'i sems la gnas pa la ni chos gang la yang sgrib pa med do// 'jam dpal yang byis pa so so'i skya bo rnams ni rang gi rtog pas sems can dmyal ba dang du 'gro'i skye gnas dang/ gshin
wa[f©]// rje'i 'jig rten du ltung bar 'gyur te 'amed pa'i chos rnams la los su rtags pas/ sdug bsngal 'bum phrag mang bo nyams su myong bar 'gyur ro
nas bcom ldan 'das la 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur bas 'di skad ces gsolato// bcom ldan 'angs byang chub sems dpa' gang/ chos kyi rnam grangs 'di 'dzin pa dang/ 'chang ba dang/
! kun chub pa bgyid pa dang/ bsti stang bgyid bde/ rmo 'di nyid la yon tan rjesnyad cig rdzob par 'gyur lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ 'jamadapal 'di ji snyam du sems
nyi ma'i dkyila'akhor shar ba na/ 'dzam bu gling pa'i mi rnams la/ yon tan gyi ban yon jisaMm du gyur/ 'jam dbal gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das yon tan gyi phan yon dpagatu
ma mchis shing/ snang ba tshad mamachis par 'gyur te/ des ni mi rnams sug las dag bgyid par 'gyur lags so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa ) 'jam dpal de bzhin du chos/
kyi rnam grangs 'dis ni/ byang chub sems dpa' de'i sgron mongs pa thams cad bsal nas/ shes rab kyi snang batshad med pa skyed par byed do// chos thams cad la yang sgrib pa med pa thob par
'gyur ro// yongs su gdung ba dang bral zhing kun nas dkris pa yang med par 'gyur ro/ de la chags pa med pa'i spobs pa yang myur du mngon sum du 'gyur/ bdud dang phyir rgol ba thams cad
kyis kyang mi brdzi bar 'gyur ro// chos kyang ston te/ spobs pa mthar thug pa med pas ston par 'gyur sogs// 'dram dpal 'di lta ste/ dpal na/ me byung na chu dang shing thams cad sreg par byed do/
'jam dbal de bzhin du chos kyi rnam grangs 'dis yang nyon mongs pa thams cad sreg par byedado// 'jam dpal 'di lta staban ri'i rgyal po gangs kyis ri nag po thams cad zil gyis gnon to//
'jam dpal de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa ba chos kyi rnam grangs 'di la mkhas pas ni pha rol rgol ba thams cad chos dang ldan pas tshar bcad nas/ thil gyis gnon par byed do/ 'jam dpal 'di
lta ste dper na/ 'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal bos ni khams kyi rgyal bo rnams zil gyis gnon to// 'jam dpal de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' chos kyi rnam gras 'di la gnas pas ni gang zag tshig
dang yi ga 'bru sna tshogs thumasaMcad la mkhas pa rnams zil gyis gnon to// 'jam dba'adi lta ste deb na/ dgo slong 'dul ba 'dzin pa ni ltung ba thamasacad 'dul ba lamakhas pa yin no// 'jam
dpal de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' chos kyi rnam grangs 'di la mkhas pa ni/ phyogs bcu'i sems can thams cad kyi 'gyod pa sel bar byed do// 'jam dpal 'di lta ste dad na/ nyi ma'i
dkyil 'khor shar na mun pa mun nag thams cad med par 'gyur ro// 'jam dpal de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' chos kyi rnam grangs 'di la mkhas pasani/ sems can thams cad kyi nyon mongs pa//
gsal bar byed de/ ye shes kyi snang ba yang byed bar 'gyur ro// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'jam dpal chos kyi rnam grangs 'di la slob pa gang yin pa de ni lhag pa'i shes rab la slob
ba yin pa'i phyi'i ko ba de nas bdud sdig can/ bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der song ste phyin nas/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das khyod ni
thugs rje chen po dang ldan pa lags te/ sams can thams cad la sman pa dang/ thugs brtse ba can lags na/ bcom ldan 'das bdud kyi gnas thams cad rab tu g.yos te bdug kyang myan
gyi zug rngus zug lags kyis/ bcom ldan 'das yang chos kyi rnam grangs 'di mi bshad par gsol/ bcom ldan 'das bdag gis kyang/ chos kyi rnam grangs 'dicinas 'dzam bu'i gling du spyod
par mi 'gyur ba de ltar bgyi'o// cinas chos kyi rnamagrangs 'dis yang 'dzin par mi 'gyur/ 'chang bar mi 'gyur/ kun chub par bgyid par mi bgyur ba de lta bu r yang bgyi'o// cinas chos kyi rnam
grus 'di la lam ngan par 'du shes par 'gyur bar yang bgyi'o// de dag shin tu rgyas pa'i mdo stadaga' log par lta ba'i 'du shesasu 'gyur bar yang bgyi'o// dge slong de dag ci nas chos kyi rnam
grangs 'di stong bar 'gyur ba'i kun nas dkris pa 'ga' 'byung bar yang bgyi'o// de nas sangs rgyas kyi mthus lha'i dbang po brgya byin bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar 'dug nas/ des
ba bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te/ bcom ldan 'das la me tog mnar ba dag gis gtoranas/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das gal te
bdud sdig can chos kyi rnam grangs 'di nub par bgyid pa'i slad du rtsol ba'agyur na/ bcom ldan 'das bdag gis chos kyi rnam grangs 'di gzung bar bgyi/ bcang bar bgyi/ kun chub par
bgyi'o// bcom ldan 'das dang/ btsun pa kun dga' bo yongs su mya ngan las 'das pa'i 'og tu yang/ bdagagis chos kyi rnam grangs 'di 'dzam bu'i gling du spyod par 'gyur bar bgyi'o//
chos sgrub de la yang rgyal bo bzhi gnod sbyin gyi tshogs kyi 'khor dang bcas pa rnams bsrung ba dang/ nga skyab pa dang/ sra babagyid du stsalar 'tshal te/ chos kyi rnam grangs 'di 'dzin pa dang/
'chang ba dang/ klog ba dang kun chub par bgyid pa gang lags pa del/ bdag gis kyang bsrung ba dang/ bskyab pa dang/ sra bar 'tshal lo// denas bcom ldan 'das kyis
tshadang ldan pa kun dga' bo la bka' stsal ba/ kun dga' bo khyod kyis chos kyi rnam grangs 'di zung shig/ chongs shig lcogs shig na chub par gyis shig/ gzhan dag la yang rgya cher ston cig/
de ci'i phyir zhe na/ kun dga' bo 'di ni chos thams cad kyi chos kyi ma long yin pa'i phyir ro// gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pas ji skad bka' stsal pa bzhin du chos kyi rnam gras/
[ur ]/'di dag gis bzungs lags na/ bcom ldan 'das chos kyi rnam grangs 'di'i ming cilags/ 'di ji ltar gzung bar bgyi/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa kun

dga' bo de'i phyir khyod kyis chos kyi rnam grangs 'di las kyi sgrib pa rnam par dag pa zhes bya bar zungs shig/ sgrib ba med pa'i lam shes la 'jug pa zhes bya bar yang zungashig/ chos kyi rnam grangs/
'di shad pa na/ dgeslong drug cus len pa med par zag pa rnams lasasams rnam par grol lo// byang chub sems dpa' brgyad cus ni mi skya ba'i chos la bzod pa thob par gyur to// bcom
ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsal nas/ 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa dang/ tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo dang/ dag slong de dag dang/ lha dang/ mi dang lha ma yin dang/ dri za
bcas pa'i 'jig rten yid rangs te/ bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa mngon par bstod do// 'phags pa las kyi sgrib pa rnam par dag pa zhes bya ba theg pa chen po'i mdo rdzogs so//
rgya gar gyis mkhan po 'dzin mi tra dang pradz+wa bar ma dang zhu chen gyi lo tsa ba ba la shes sde la sogs pas bsgyur cing zhus te gtan la phab pa/
rgya gar skad du/ Ar+ya 'dwa tsan pa 'a brid tsha nA ma mahA yA sU tra bod skad du/ 'phags pa rin chen zla bas zhus ba zhes bya ba theg pa chen po'i mdo/
dang bo// thams cad mkhyen pa la phyag 'tshal lo// 'di skad bdag gis thos pa dus gcig na/ bcom ldan 'das rgyal po'i khab na/ bya rgod phung bo'i la/ shari bu dang/ mo'u 'gal gyi bu
chen po la sogs pa dag slong 'bum phrag bdun cu rtsa gnyis kyi dge slong gi dge 'dun chen po rnams dang thabs gcig tu bzhugs so// byang chub sems dpa'i dgu khri la 'di lta sta/ byang chub
sams dpa' sems dpa' chen po byams pa dang/ byang chub sems dpa' soms dba' chen po 'jam dpal dang byang chub sems dga' sems dpa' chen po blo gros mi zad pa dang/ byang chub
sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po blo grosargya mtsho dang/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po blo gros mtha' yas dang/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po blo gros brtan pa dang/
byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po khams gsum rnam pa gnon pa dang/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po la gan rin po chadang/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/
smanagyi rgyal po dang// byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'achen po rin chen 'byung gnas dang/ byang chub sems dang 'asams dba' chen po dga' sdug dang/ de dag la sog pa byang chub sems
hanams dbang la brgya canagayog 'khor lha'i bu 'bum phrag du ma dang bcas pa dang/ mi mjed kyi
bdag po tshangs pa g.yog 'khor tshangs ris kyi lha'i bu 'bum phrag du ma dang bcas pa dang/ klu'i rgyal po rgya mtshodang/ klu'i rgyal bo ma dros ba dang/ klu'i rgyal po a la'i
'dab dang/ klu'i rgyal bo kun tu grags dang/ de dag la sogs pa klu 'bum phrag du ma dang/ gnod sbyin gyi sde dpon chen po 'brog gnas dang 3 kha spu canadang/ rtsi sman dang/ bong bu dang/ de dag
la sogs pa gnod sbyin gyi sde dpon 'bum phrag du ma dang thabs gcig tu bzhugs so// de nas bcom ldan 'das snga dro'i dus kyi tshe/ sham thabs dang chos gos gsol te
lhung bzed bsnams nas/ rgyal po'i khab kyi grong khyer chen por bsod snyoms la gshegs so// de'i tshe rgyal po gzugs can snying po'i sras khye'u rin chen zla ba zhes bya ba glang po che ltag
brgyad pa zhes bya ba/ rin po che sna bdun gyis brgyan cing gsar gyi drabs g.yogs pa/ dril bu g.yer ka sbyangs pa 3 gser gyis sbyas pa'id kyi lnga lde mang pos mdzes par byas pa/
rgyu bdug pas bdugs pa/ me tog sil mas gtor ba/ rgyal mtshan dang/ ba dan bsgangs pa/ gdugs dang dra bas brgyan ba/ rin po che'ingegang lton pas mdzes par byas pa/ stags khu
bdun gyis kho ra khor yug nas bskor pa la zhon nas/ rgyal po 'byor pa chen po dang/ rgyal bo'i mthu chen po dang ldan pas rgyal po'i khab kyi grong khyer chen bo nas byung ste sems can thamA
cad la sbyin pa dag sbyin zhing song ba las/ gzhon nu rin chen zla bas thag ring po zhig nas bcom ldan 'angs mdzes pa// dad pa bya ba/ dbang po dul ba/ thugs dul ba kha dog bzang po/
rgyas pa mchog dang ldan pa// dul ba dang 2 zhi ba'i mchog/ dul ba dang zhi ba dam pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa gtso bo chen po// dbang po bsrungs ba/ dbang po thul pa de mtsho ltar dngas zhing
gsal la/ rtog pa med pa/ skyes bu chen po'i mtshan sum cu rtsa gnyis mngar ba ) dpe byad bzang bo brgyad cus brgyan pa'i sku gas kyi mchod sdong ltara'aphags la/ dpal gyi mchog
gis lam me/ lhan ne/ lhang nge ste/ gshegs pa mthong ngo// mthong nas kyang sems dad par gyur to// sems dad par gyur nas glang po che'i steng nas skyon par babs te/ bcom
