nga/ ma dge ba'i las byas nas 'gyod tshangs ma byas par/ dge 'dun dang lhan cig tu stan gcig la 'dug pa dang/ khu zas lhan cig tu za ba dang/ dge 'dun dang lhan cig tugs sbyin byed
pa dang/ de la sogs pa'i ma dag pa'i las ngan pa mang bo byas pa dag tshe 'pho ba'i dus byed pa na lus grurtsi ltar shin tu dri ma zhimazhing mi bzod de/ 'di snyam du bdag nam zhig gi dus na
gnas gang na dri bsung ngan pa 'di mi bro bar 'gyur zhing/ spos kyi dri ngan zhig po bdag gis lus la rlung chen po phog nasim rung snyam bsams pa dang/ de ma thag tu srungs ma srin pos 'gan
bum pa ri mo can gyi nang spos kyis bkang ba lta bu sprul pa thogs te// sdig pa can gyi drung du 'ongs nas 'dug pa dang/ de la shin tu 'dod cing chags pa skyes pa dang/ de nas lcags
chad de tshe 'phos nas rlung drag pos sa bus pa bzhin du dri mi zhim pa'i lcags khu khol ba'i sems can dmyal bar lhung ngo// rab tu dri mi zhim pa'i lcags kyi srin bu ma rungs pa rnams kyis/
kyang/ lce'i rtsa ba dang srog rtsa la 'jig cing za'o// de lta bu r nyin zhag gcig la lan khri phrag brgya dgu bcu ni 'chi/ lan khri phragabargya dgu bcu ni 'tsho'o// de las thar nas kyang ngan
la dbul zhing phongs pa'i rigs su skyes te/ gzhan gyi dbang du gyur ba dang/ skyob blangs pa'itshonayang rgyal po ngan par lta ba can gyi khams su skye zhing sdug bsngal sna tshogs lus la mnar
bar gyur te/ 'brum bu sna tshogs dang/ 'chen gyis lus la gos gyon pa bzhin du 'gyur ro// de yang 'jig rten gyi mchos bcu drug spyad nga 'i dgaba'i rgyutsam gyis dgaba'i bshes gnyen
dang phradade gzod rab tu byung nas spyod pa la zhugs te/ dgra bcom par 'gyur zhing rigs pa gsum dang mngon b.rangashes ba drug dang/ rnam bangagro ba brgyad thob par 'gyur ro// bcom ldan
'das kyis dga' bol bka' stsal ba/ de la ji ltar na chu tshan khol ba'i sems can dmyal ba zhen/ chu tshan khol ba'i sems can dmyal ba zhes bya ba ni/ zangs chen po bco brgyad yod de//
zangs de gcig cing yang che khyad dpag tshad bzhi bcu yod do// den lcags kyi dra ba rim pa bdun gyis bskor zhing bla rer bres te ma rab tu 'bar ba'o// zangs chen po/ zangs dbacas
de dag kun gi nang na ) chu tshan khol ma lcags bu 'bar ba lta bu s yongs su gang ngo// de'i 'og na srin po lnga brgyas ni rdo thal gyi me 'bud de/ zangs de dag kun grag go/ rdo ba'i malce
rgyun mi 'chad par 'bar ba ni lan cag 'bar nas/ nyin zhag drug cu'i bar du ma 'chi ste/ dmu laba'i nyin zhag drugacu de'adzam bu gling gi nyam dang zla bas bgrang ba'i lo khri phrag bcu
gnyis so// de ltar zangs tshan 'bar ba'i nang nas chu tshan khol ma lcags khu 'barab lta bu skar mda' ltar gnam du yar te/ ma'i 'khor lor gyur nas phyir yang zangs kyi nang
du lhung ngo// gang zag la la sangs rgyas kyi tshul khrims bshig cing ltar rjed pa dang/ sems can gyi srog gcod cing sha khrag za ba dang/ ri dang 'brog la ma btang nasanas
can mang po bsregs pa dang/ gson por mer bcuganas bsregs pa dang/ sdig pa mang pos byas pa dag che ba'i dus byed pa na lus dang sems myos te dbang po kun 'gagasanas/
lus bar bar ni me'i phung po ltar tsha/ bar bar na chab brom gyi phung po ltar grang ste/ 'di snyam du lus chu dron zhig gi nang du zhugs te bkrusan ci me rung snyam bsams pa dang/ de ma thag tu/
[o/ ]dmyal ba'i srungs ma srin bos g.yog 'khor lta bu zhig tu sprul nas chu dron gyi snod chen po thogs to/ sdig pa can gyi drung du 'ongs pa dang/ chu dron de'i nang du 'jug par dga' zhing
chags pa'i sems skyes so// de nas tshe bos nas zangs khol pa'i nang du skyes te/ dem thug tu tshogs shing myags nas rus pa las ma lus so// de nas ma dung rtsa ba brag bas
blangs te/ phur byung ba dang lcags kyi khyi rnams kyis rus pa 'chos pa dang/ de ma thag tu phyir skyagasanas yang sos te snga ma bzhin no// grangs ma srin ngos yur yang zangs kyi nang du
ded pa dang/ zangs khol ma des 'jigs nas ral gri'isdong po la 'jus pa dang/ shudang rus pa kun dum bur chad de zangs khol ba'i nang du lhung ngo/ srog bcad pa'i dbang gi nyin
zhag gcig la lan gang+ga'i klung gi byed ma snyadan 'chi/ lan gang+gA'i klung gi byed ma snyad na 'tsho'o// de las thar nas byol song gi khams su skyes te/ byol song gi nang na yang gang tshe
thung ba'i gnas su skye ba khri phrag brgya stong gi bar du brgyud cing len no// de nas yang phyiramir skyes nas rnam par smin pa rnam pa gnyis yongs su smin pa gyur te/ nad rab tumang ba dang
tshe shAn tu 'thung bar 'gyur ro// de'i 'khor du gyur pa rnams kyang tshe thung zhing nad mang bar 'gyur ro// de nas kyang bskal pa brtsi ba dang bgrang ba las 'das nas/ gzod dge ba'i shes
gnyen dang phrad de khrims lnga 'dzin cing pha rol tu phyin pa drug spyod par 'gyur ro// bcom ldan 'das kyis dga' bo la bka' stsal pa// de la ji ltar

sa na thal chu'isams can dmyal ba zhen/ thal chu'i sems can dmyal ba zhes bya ba ni bcom ldan 'das kyis chur dpag tshad nyis brgya zhing dudapag tshad bcu gnyis skad de/ 'og nas kyang ral gri'i sorab tu
bltams la 'gram yang ral gri'i stong pos yongs su bltams te/ 'og gi gting nas kyang ma mur thags su 'a dom nyi shus bkang ba'i sbyong thal bas g.yogs te/ 'jig rtenan gang
zag gtin gcan pha dang ma la bsku 'phrog byed pa dang/ bskyed pa'i drin ngo mi shes shing lan gyon pa 'a sams med pa dang/ bla ma dang slob dpon dang phu nu dang gnyen bshes la brku
'phrog pa slob dpon dang pha ma dang/ mi brams bstan pa bzhin du mi byed cing 'dod chags kyi dbang du gyur nas khrel ba dang ngo tsha ba med pa dag/ 'chi 'pho ba'i dus byed nga na lus rab tu
gtsazhing grang pa'i nad kyis khong pa lhugs kyis gang ba dang/ 'tshangs shing rab tumi bde bar gyur pa las 'di snyam du bdag gi lus 'di ltar rab tu brtsi zhing lpags kyis tshangs ba 'di
la thal chu 'jam po zhig gis bkrus sa ma bshal na ci ma rung snyam sems pa dang/ de ma thag tu srungs ma srin po 'bar bas bdag gi bu dang chung mar sprul te/ lagan ma mur gyi snod thal
[z]/ bas ba kang pa thogs te drung du 'ongs pa dang/ sdig pa can des de mthong ba dang/ rab tu dga' ba'isams skyas te/ de ma thag tu tshe 'phos pa dang thul chu'i sams can dmyal bar lhung
du de nas ral gra'i sdong ngo'i bar kun n srin po 'a ga na ral gri'i so la me 'bar ba rnon po thogs pa mang po yod de/ srin po de dag kun gyi sa ral gris gzag pa dang/ 'jigs shing
skraganas thal ba'i nang du bros so// der yang gom pa dor ma thug tu thal ba'i nang nas ral gri'i so bltams pas rkang pa kun dum bur sran ma tsam du chad de/ ral gri'i sdong po las kyang
la grichar bzhin du bab nas/ ba spu'i bu ga kun tu zug go/ dmul sungs srin pos mdung rtse khra brag pa thogs te de'i snying dang klad pa phyung nas shi ma thag tu phyir yang sos so// de
ltar sdig pa can des sdig pa mang bo byas pa'i las kyi dang des de lta bu'i nyin zhag gcig la lan khri phrag lnga brgya ni 'chi/ lan khri phrag dogs brgya ni 'tsho'o// bkres shing skom pas yongs
su gdungs te kha gdangs pa dang/ ral gri'i sdong po las ral gri char bzhin du 'bas su// kha dang spyi bor zug pas lta ba dang/ rus pa yang thal byung du gshegs te shi nas tshe 'phos
so// sngon sangs rgyas dang/ chos dang/ dge 'dun gyi mtshan thos pa tsam gyis de las thar nas phyir yang mir skyes te/ rigs ngan pa dang robul zhing phongs par 'gyur ro//
de nas 'jig rten mi rtag pa shes nas gzod rab tu byung bar gyur te 3 mngon par shes pa drug dang/ rnam par grol ba brgyud thob par gyur te/ gal te sangs
rgyus ma bzhugs na yang rang sangs rgyas su 'gyur ro// bcom ldan 'das kyis dgo' bo la bka' stsal pa/ de la ji ltar na mtshon gyi tshal gyisams can dmyal ba khri phrag lta
brgya zhen/ mtshon gyi tshal gyisams can dmyal ba zhes bya ba ni/ khor yug cu khyud dpag tshadabargya stong skud yod de/ de'i nang ral gri'i sdong pos yongs su gang ste/ de'i lo ma ni
spu gri dang ) 'khor lo'o// 'bras bu ni lcags kyi thu lum ste/ ral gri'i sdong po ma tho khyud kyang dpag tshad nyeshu rtsa bzhi'o// sams can gang pha ma la sri zhu mi byed pa dang/
slob dponadang/ bla ma la sri zhu mi byed cing gnyan btsun du mi blta ba dang/ ngan du smra ba dang dkon mchog gsum la skur pa btab pa dang/ sems can mang po la 'tsho
zhing gnod pa byed cing snying rje'i sems med pa'i sdig pa can de dag 'chi'apho ba'i dusakhyodaban rlogacing yid kyis gnas kun chags pa dang/ 'di snyam du bdag gi rnam shes 'ditha/
cad kun la chags shing/ lus rab tun yang snying chags shing mi gtong na/ gri rnon bozhig gse chags pa'i snying 'di bcad na me snyam bsams pa dang/ dmyal ba'i srungs
ma sun pos de ma thag tu g.yog bran gyi lus su sprul nas drung du 'ongs te/ lag na me long thogs te sdig pa can de la 'di skad du/ khyod kyi snang ci la yang chags pa de ma lung 'di la
ltos zhes smras pa dang/ sdig pa can des bltas pa dang ma 'ong pa'i nangan ral gridang spu gri rnon po yod par mthong nas 'disnyam du nga nimatshon rnon po 'dis bdag gi snying dngos
po kun la chags pa 'di gcad dosAm nas rab tudaga' de dang/ tshe 'phos ta yi dgas kyi lus blangs nas ral gri dang/ grwa spyi'i nags tshal gyinang du skyes so// skyes ma
thag tu lcags tshan gyi thubum gyis spyi bor phog nas thal byungadu rkang pa'i mthil du phyung ngo// des khong pa nas glo snying dang rgyu long dang/ nang grol kun tsheg cing rol nas sa la 'gyil to//
dmyal ba'i srungs mas mdung rtse kha brag pa sa la brdabs ti/ sdong po la 'dzeg tu bcug go/ mtshon gyisdong po de'i khar phyin ma thag tu lcagasatshan gyi srin bu mang pos btogs shing
zos pa dang shin tu skrag cing sngangs nasasdong po gcig nas gcig tu mchongs te/ lus rdul bzhin du lhags so// de bzhin du mthar gyis sdong po kun la mchong zhing nyin zhag
gcog la lan khri phrag brgyad ni 'chi/ lon khri phrag brgyad ni 'tsho'o// de las thar nas kyang lamu ge can dang/ bskal pa zad du nye ba'i 'jig rten du bran khol gyi rigs su skyag te
kha dang lcags kyi dri ma zhim pa dang/ kun gyis mi 'dod par 'gyur ro// de ltar bskal pa brtsi ba dang bgrang ba las 'dras nas/ gzod dag ba'i bshes
gnyen dang phrad de byang chub tu sems bskyed par gyur to// bcom ldan 'das kyis dga' bol bka' stsal pa// de la ji ltar na tsher ma'i tshal gyisams can dmyal ba khri phrag
lnga brgya zhen tshor ma'atshal gyi sems can dmyal ba zhes bya ba ni/ dpag tshad bar stong gi nang lcags kyi tsher mas yongs su gang ste/ lcags kyi tshor ma de gcig gi rtsa ba na
yang lcags kyi thob dang/ titsadang skam pa grangs med pa yod do// de dag 'jig rtenan so so'i skye ba dang/ gang zag gtomug can drag zhi gcod pa'i tshig smra ba dang/ phra ma
skya bo dang/ dkon mchog gsum la 'khyalapa skya ba dang/ ngan tu rjod pa dang/ mdo sde zab mo dang bka' yang dag pa'i bden pa la bden pa ma yin par smra ba dang/ mi khyad par/
can la ngan du skyod pa'i sdig pa can da'achi ba'i dus byed pa na lce dang/ kha skam sa shing lhugs thung ba dang/ 'di snyam du tsher ma rnon po zhig gis bdag girtse dang rtsa dang/ yan
lag kun nas khrag dang/ chu sor phyungan tsam rung snyam bsams pa dang/ srungs ma srin po des sdig pa can gyi pha ma'i lus su sprul te ) lag na nor bu zla ba zhes bya b.latshor
ma rnon po yod par sprul nas/ sdig pa can de'i khar gzhug par gzas bu dang/ nor bu de 'chu'abab cing 'dzag par sdig pa can des mthong nas rab tu dga' ste/ bdag gi
yid la 'dod pa dang phrad do snyam nas dga' ste/ dbugs chad nas tshe 'phros so// de yang glog gi yud tsam gyis/ tsher ma'i tshal gyi sams can dmyal bar skyes
so// der skyes nas dmyal srungs srin pos lag na skam pa 'bar ba thogs te/ lce drangs nas phyung ngo// de la lcags kyi glang chen po la lcags kyi thong chen po bshal te
lce kun dral to// de nyid du tsher ma'i tshal dang/ tsher ma'i sdong po rnams kyang dmyal ba'i rlung chen pos bskyodanas/ de'i lus la 'jug cing brdeg ste/ gshag cing 'dral lo/
nyin zhag gcig la lan drug brgya ni 'chi/ lan drug brgyani 'tsho'o// de las bskal pa zade nas mir skyes na yang gzugs byad ngan pa dang/ bzhin mdog mi sdug pa dang/
dbang po mi gsal zhing dag lhags su smra ba dang/ lus la mdzo dang shu ba la sogs ba'i nad rnam pa mang pos gzir sring rnag khrag mang po lus la 'dzag pa dang/ skye
balnga brgya'i bar du kun gyis mthong mi 'dod par 'gyur ro// de las tshe 'phos nas phyir skye ba mi'i lus thob nayang smra ba'i tshig dang ngag sus kyang mi nyan par 'gyur ro/
de nas dge ba'i bshes gnyen chen po dang phrad nas gzod byang chub tu sems bskyed par 'gyur ro// bcom ldan 'das kyis dga' bo la bka' stsal pa// de la ji
ltaran lcags kyi sdong po'isams can dmyal ba chen po khri phrag lnga brgya zhen/ lcags kyi sdong po'i sems can dmyal bzhes bya ba ni )lcags kyi sdong pa'i dbyibs kyang ma'i ri lta bu ste/
mtho khud kyang dpag tshad drug brgya srid do// 'og ma rab tu 'bar te/ mde'inang nalcags tshan 'bar ba'i khra yod do// de'i steng na mtshon gyi 'khor la yod do// mtshon gyi
'khor lo'i bar na lcags tshan 'bar ba'i sran bu dang/ lcags tshan 'bar ba'i bu yod do// 'jigarten na gang zag glen zhing gti mug can dag/ 'dod chags kyi bag chags che
ba 'dod pas log par spyod pa la dga' ba/ dus dang gnas ma yin pa la mi tshangs par spyod pa'i las byas pa dang/ gzhan yang dge slong ngam/ dag slong ma 'am/ dag bsnyen
nam/ dag bston ma 'amo/ bram ze 'am/ de la sogs patshangs par spyod pa dag ) gal te dus dang gnas ma yin pa la ma tshangs par spyad pa dang/ 'dod pas lag par
g.yon pa'i las ngan pa spyad pa'i sdig pa can de 'chi ba'i dus byed pa na 3 gzhu ltar rengs te rab tu 'dar zhing brtse nas ma bzod par gyur pa dang/ 'di snyam du bdag gi lus
'di lcags kyisdong po chen pa zhig la drang por mi 'gul bar bsnamasanaci ma rung snyam bsam pa dang/ de ma thag tu dmul sungs sun pos g.yog branagyi lus su sprul te//
lag na lcags kyi 'khar ba thogs nas sdig pa can de la 'di skad du/ khyed kyi lus su zhing rengs par gyur pa de ngas mnyen bar bya yis/ khyod 'khar ba 'di la 'jus shog ces
smras nas spro ba bskyed pa dang/ sdig pa can de rab tu dga' bar gyur nas lcags chad de tshe 'phos so// lcegs g.yabs pa tsam gyi tshodan lcags kyi sdong po'i thog ma la skyes so//
del ma rab tu 'bar bas gdungs shing bsregs pa dang/ shin tu 'ojigs shing skraganas 'og tu bltas pa na ) lcags kyi khri'i stangan skyes pas bu mo sdug gu 'dug par/
mthong ba dang/ bud med kyisan skyes bu bzang po shin tu yod tu 'ong ba zhig 'dug pa lta bu r mthong ste/ chags pa'i sems skyes nas lcags kyi sdong po'i kha nas babs
snyam ste mchongs pa dang/ lcags kyi sdong pos lus thal byung du phuganas/ lcags tshan gyi dra bas kyang mgo dkris so// lcags kyi srad bu rnams kyis na 'jib cung
za'o/ de nas lus dum bu mang por chad de lcags khri 'bar ba do'i steng du lhung ba dang/ yan lag kun nas mo rab tu 'bar te/ lcags kyi srin bu rnams kyang mag gi nang
dang dbang po kun gyi nang dang/ pho mos kyi mtshan ma kun gyi nang du 'jug cing tha'o// srin bu de dag la khri phrag dgu brgya yod do// srin bu de gcig gi mgo la yang
mchu bcu gnyis yod de/ mchud nyid las kyang ma rab tu 'bar zhing de'i lus la la za zhing 'jib bo// gang zag la la zhig gis 'dod pas log par g.yem pa'i las kyis gang dag
tshul khrims can gyi khrims bshig pa dang/ mi dge ba spyad pa'i las kyi rnam par smin pas de lubur nyin zhag gcig la lan khri phrag dgu brgyani 'chi/ lan khri phrag dgu brgyan
'tsho'o// ci rgyu de las thar nas yang skye ba lnga brgya'i bar du bya blo ba dang/ phug ron gyi lus su skyes te/ de las thar nus kyang skye ba lnga brgya'i bar du klu dbul po'i lus su skye'o//
denas mir skyes na yang skye ba lnga brgya'i bar du ma ning dang mtshan med dang mtshan gnyis dang/ mtshan 'gyur du skyes te/ ci stadabang po dang ldan na yang 'kher ngan pa'i dang tshul can rtod
ba dang bcas pa'i bu smad dang bu tsha sri zhu med cing blo rman pa dang/ bran g.yog bka' blo mi bde ba'i 'khor thob par 'gyur ro// de nas gzod dag ba'i bshes gnyen
pas dang phrad nas byang chub tu sems bskyed par gyur to// bcom ldan 'das kyis dga' bo la bka' stsal pa/ di la tsa lcags kyi thags zangs kyi sems can dmyal ba khri/
brug lnga brgya zhe na/ lcags kyi thags zangs kyi sems can dmyal ba zhes bya ba ni/ lcags kyi khri me rab tu 'bar ba chu zheng du dang ga tshad bzhi pa gcig yod de/ de'i steng na lcag
kyi 'khrul 'khor 'bar ba grangs med pa las lcags kyi mda' gzhu khri phrag stong nyid yod par gyur te/ mda' de nyid las me rab tu 'bar ro// 'jig rtenan gang zag glan zhingagati mug
can 'dod chags kyi dbang gis 'dod pas log par spyod pa dang/ pha ma la sri zhu mi byed pa dang/ slob dpon dang bum la bkur sta ma byed pa dang/ legs par byon pa la mi gzhol the
dang/ sems can gyi srog bcad pa dang/ brtsod pa la dga' ba dang/ rnam par smin pas 'chi ba'i dus byed pa na ) lus kun 'gul te brdung nas ma bzod de bug drug nas zag pa rnams zag
ba dang/ sdig nga can des 'di snyam du bdag gnyalamal 'dirab tu snyazhing lugs te/ tsha bar gyuran bdag shin tu sazhing grang ba'i mal bde bar nyal te 3 gnyid cig log na ci ma rung
snyam bsams pa dang/ dmyal srungs srin pos mdung rtse kha brag pa'i kha nas lcags kyi khri la lcags kyi par tang bting ba khyer te 'ongs pa dang/ sdig pa canadas de mthong ba dang rab
dga' ba'i sams skyas te/ lcags kyi khril par tang bting ba de la nyal bar dga' ba dang de ma thag tu dbugs chad nas tsho'aphos so// de nas lcags kyi thag zangs kyi sams can dmyal
bar skyes te lcags 'khrul 'khor 'bar ba khri phrag brgya stong snyad lta 'og nas 'ben zhing dus gcig tu 'khrul zhing g.yos so// de las lcags kyi gzhu grangs med pa
pa las lcags tshan gyi mda' grangs med pa zhig sdog pa can gyi snying la thog nas rab tu sdug bsngal bar gyur to// de lta bu r nyin zhag gcig la lanakhri phrag drug brgya ni 'chi/ lan khri phrag
drug bdun 'tsho'o// de las thar nas kyang skye ba lnga brgya'i bar du byol song gi khams su skye'o// de las thar te mir skyes na yang dbul zhing phongs pa dang/ rigs ngan par skyes te/ rtag tu
gzhan gyis bkol ba dang/ dgra sdang bas zin cing btson chas dam por 'dzud pa dang rtag tu brdeg cing 'tshog par 'gyur ro// de nas gzod dge ba'i bshes gnyen dang/
phrad nas byang chub tu sems bskyed par 'gyur ro// bcom ldan 'das kyis dga' bo la bkar stsal pa// de la ji ltar na lcags kyi dra ba'i sems can dmyal ba zhen/ lcags kyi dra ba'i
rgyasams can dmyal ba zhes bya ba ni/ dmyal ba chen pa'i gnas de nyid na/ lcags tshan 'bar ba'i dra ba rim pa brgyad cu rtsa dgu sud yod do// dru ba de re re'i bar dang mgu na khab dbal ma khri phrag
brgya stong snyed yod de/ khab de dag kun gyi rtse mo la lcags kyi 'khrul 'khor 'bar ba grangs med pa 'khrul zhing rab tu 'bar ro// de dag 'jig rten sems can gang dkon gsumal smod cing log

par lta ba dang/ brdzun du sa zhing g.yo dang sgyus log par 'tsho zhing pha rol 'phrod par byed pa dang rtag tum dge ba'i las byed par sems pa'i sdig pa can de'achab 'i dus byed pa'i tsha na/ lus dang
yan lag kun rab tu g.ya' zhing brtse ste/ 'di snyan du bab rnon bosar gang gis lus kyi srin bu 'di dag brtso gas na ci rung snyam bsams pa dang/ dmyal ba'i srungs ma srin pos sman pa'i lus su gral
te lagan gtsags khab rnon po thogs nas 'di skad du bdag ni khyod kyi nad 'tsho bar byed pa 'o zhes smras te/sdig pa can de'i sems spro ba bskyed de dga' m thog tu lhags chen de tsho'abos so// de dag
de nas lcags kyi dra ba'i sams can dmyal bar skyes nas dra ba dang 'khrul 'khor rnams la drud cing 'dre'o// 'khrul 'khor rnams bskul zhingabaskyod pa las 'bo dbal ma lta bu'i lcags tshan

'bar ba grangs med pa ba spu'i bu ga kun tu zug ste/ de bzhin du lcags tshan gyi dra ba'i bar dang dra mig gcig nas gcig tu skad cig na 'chi/ skadatsugana'atsho'o// de las thur nas mir skyes nayang yul 'tha'

'khob tu sangs rgyas kyi chos med pa 'i gnas su skyo ste/ 'jig rten gyi tshig snyan pa bzang po yang mi thosan yang dag pa'i chos lta ci smos te mi thos so// gal te mi skyesan yang ngan song gsum gyi nang du
brtsi'o// bskal pa brtsi ba dang bgrang ba las 'das nas gzod dag ba'i bshes gnyen dang phrad de chos thos par gyur kyang sems kyis chud cing rtogs par mi 'gyur ro// bcom ldan 'das kyis dga'
la bka' stsal pa// de la ji ltar na lcags kyi thar pa 'isams can dmyal bachen po bco brgyad can lcags kyi khang pa'i sems can dmyal ba zhes bya ba ni/gshin rje'i 'jig rten du song ba'i

nang na sdug bsngal gyi mchog go/ de la lcags kyi rin po gcig yod de/ che khyad dpag tshad nyi shu rtsa lnga'o// ri de la lcags kyi thu lum 'bar ba khri phrag lnga brgya yod de/ thu lam de dag re re la che khyad dang gatshad bcu gsum

mod/ gzhan yang ra de la ral gri'i sdong bo dang mtshon gyi nags tshal khri phrag brgyad stong snyed do// lcags kyi ri de'i shar phyogasan lcags kyi khri mon ring po yul mnyam dka'i bre ka tsam cig yod de/ de'i nang nas dus

panag po dri ma zhim pa gsumagyis mi khyab pa byung ngo// 'jig rten na gang zag dug gsum gyi dbang gyur pa ser snas yongs su bcings pa 'dod cing chags pa'i sems rdo bas sra ba/ rtag tu g.yo dang sgyus 'tsho

zhing gzhan la 'tsho ba dang/ sems can mang po'i srog bcad pa dang/ sems can mi rtag pa la mi sams shing nor zas kyi dngos po la shin tu 'phangs par 'dzin pa// pha ma dang slob dponadang gshes gnyen dang budang

chung mdang 'akor la yang sbyin pa yongs su mi gtong ba dag ba'i rtsa ba yongs su bcad pa dag 'chi ba'i dus byed pa na dbang po kun nyams te sgra yang mo shes nas/ yod la 'di snyam du bdag shi ba'i 'og tu bdag gi zlas

dang nor la spyod pa 'di dag lcags kyi thu lum 'bar bar gyur cig/ nga'i khyimana'adug pa 'di dag kun nag tugyur cig ces smras sam bsams ma thag tu/ srungs ma srin pos ser san can zhigagalus su sprul te/

de'i nor zas kun bsdusanas sdig pa can de'i drung du bsregs pa lta bu r sprul pa dang/ sdig pa can de rab tu dga' ba'i sems sus kas gas chad de tshe 'phos so// de nas lcags kyi ri ma 'bar ba del skyes nas/

lcags kyi khri monadu lcags khu blugs pa bzhin du phyin nas lcags khang 'bar ba'i nang na lcags kyi srin bus za zhing mtshon= nags tshal gyis gtub cing 'dral lo// dud pa nag po de 'khrigs te mgacayang

mi mthong nas ma dang mtshon gyis 'jigs nas mgo la lcags kyi ra khyer bzhin du phan tshun du brgyugatsang snang ba tshol lo// lcagasakyi thu lum 'bar ba spyi bor thog nas rkang mthil du 'byung ste/ skad cig ma

tsamagyis 'chi/ skad cig ma tsam gyis ni phyir yang 'tsho'o// de las thar nas kyang yi dgas kyi khams su skyes te/ lus r zhung ring ba ni dang ga tshad nganu'i srid do// kha ni phra khyad bab tsam mo// lto ba'i cha

khyad rir ba tsam ste zas su ni lcags khu 'thung zhing lo brgyad stong gi bar du yi dgas chen po de'i lus su gnas so// de nas kyang yi dgas kyi khams su skye ba brgyud de ngar snabs za ba'i yid gs dang/
rnag khrag za ba'i yi dgas dang/ bshang gci za ba'i yi dgas su skye'o// de lasathar nas kyang khyi dang phag gi lus su skye'o// de las thar nasakyang dbul zhing phongs pa dang/ bran khol gyi
ris su skyes te zas dang longs sbyong kyis rab tu phongs par 'gyur ro// de nas dag pa'i shes gnyen dang phrad de/gzod byang chub tu sems bskyed par gyur to// bcom ldan 'das
kyis dga' bo la bka' stsal ba/ de la ji ltaganalcags kyi thu lumagyisams canadamyal ba zhe na/ lcags kyi thu lum gyi sems can dmyal ba zhes bya ba ni/ dpag tshad brgyad nu snyad lcag

kyi mkhar du gyur ba'inang na bar chadabargyad cu rtsa brgyad yod do// b.ratshadar ra'i nang na yang mtshon gyuragoza lngayod do// stong gi phyogs nas kyang mtshon gyi 'khor lo brelhams te/ de'i 'ogan lcags kyi sprul

chen po brgyadod yodado// sprul de kha gdangs po'atshan yang kha nas me 'bar te lce 'byin pa'atshin yang lci'i thog ma leral gri rnon po 'barab yodado// 'jig rtenan gang zag sdig pa can dag sbyin pa byed pa lagashe

shing spyod pa dang/ dge ba sogs pa'am dang dkon mchog gsum du gyur pa la 'tshe zhing ngan du smod pa dang/ dge ba dang gso sbyin byas pa la rnam par smin pa'i rgyu dang 'bras bu medado zhes zer ba'i sdig bcan de/

'chi'apho ba'i dus khyed banaganyal ba rengs nas mgo sbyar bar mi nus te lcami'adod cing smayang mi nus nas kha bub tu 'gyel te 'di snyam du bdag gis bsags pa'i nor dbyig thams cad bdag dang 'grogs na

tsamarung snyam bsam pa dang dmyal srungs srin pos tshong ma'i lus su bsgyur te/ 'gan lcags kyi thekhum 'bar pa thogs pa ni po che'i snod yid bzhin zhes bu bar sprul te drung du 'dug nas 'di skad du bdag

khyod kyi phyin 'gro'o zhes smras nas shin tu chags pa'i tshul gyon pa dang/ de la dga' nas dbugs chad detshe 'phos pa dang/ lcagasamakhara'abar bde'inang duskyas to tshogs rab tugadungs nas phan tshun dug

0 cing 'bros pa dang lcags kyi sprul gdug pa can gyis khanas gdug pa byung ste/ lus l bkris pa dang/ mgo dang lus kyi yan lag kun nas me 'bar bar gyur to// denas yang sdig pacan des 'di snyam du lha thag

la byamasan gnasanas char phobashig ces smon pa dang/ bsams ma thag tu myong nas/ lcags tshan gyi thu lum char bzhin du babanas spyi bor thog pa dag kyang rkang mthil du byung ngo// de las thar temar skyes

na yongashin tu dbul zhing phongs pa dang/ da dung mgon skyabs med pa dang/ degalkugs dang dbang po ma tshang bar 'gyur te/ de lta bu'i sdug bsngal len pa'itshad na lcags kyi khang pa'i sdug bsngal bshad pa
dang 'dra'o// da nas gzod dge ba'i bshes gnyen dang phrad nas byang chub tu sems bskyed par gyur to// bcom ldan 'das kyis dga' bo la bka' stsal nga// dal ji ltaran rdo zur

mang gi sems can dmya la pa zhen/rdo zur mang gsems can dmyal ba zhes bya bani/rdo brag gi rechen po nyashu rtsa lnga yod de/ ri dgacig la yang chab brom gyi rdzong chen po brgyad brgyad yod do// rdzing de re re'i nang yang/

klu gdug pa canalnga lnga yod de gnasago/ 'jig rten na gang zag sdig pa canaso so'i skye bo dang gzhan yang dag slong dang dag slong ma dang/ dag bsnyen dang/ dag bstan ma dang/ dge tshul can pho mo dang/ kun tu rgyab

rnam pa dgu bcu rtsa lnga la sogs pagang zhig chos rnams ni chos ma yin par bshad pa dang/ chos ma yin pa rnamasani chos su bshad pa dang/ nyes pa byung yang 'thol tshangasami byed pa dang/ rnam paro/
smin pa la mi 'dzom ste sems spre'u dang 'dra ba dag// sdig pa yongasasu smin te 'chiba'i dus byed pa na khong ra phrugs kyis gang ste shin tu rgyas par gyur nas/ chu'i dngos po yang ma thar te/

'di snyan du rdothunamang zhig gis/ bdag gi gre bar btsangs na mi rung snyam bsams pa dang de mthug tudamyal srungs srin pos sman pa'i lus su sprul te/ lag na rdo zur mangs thogs pa yang sman gyi ril bur

pa bsgyur nas sdig pa can gyi khar bcug nas kha tshums shig ces smras pa dang/ de la dga' ba'i sems skyes nas lcags chad de tshe 'phos pa dang rdo ba'i ri bar du skyes te/ rdo brag zur mangs can grangs med pa rgyab

tu phog nas brang du phyung ngo// dmyal ba'i srungs mas mdung rtse kha khrag pa khar btsugs te phunas rdo tshan 'bar ba khar bcug go/ de ma thag tu lus ma'i phung por 'bar ro// de ltar nyin zhag gcig la

lan khri phrag bcu na 'chi/ lan khri phrag bcu no 'tsho'o// de nas tsha 'gos nas thig nag po'i sems canadamyal bar skyes so// thig nag po'i sems can dmyal ba zhes bya ba na/ lcags kyi ri na po brgyad bats+tshan

[% ]yod de de'i khor yug tu lcags kyi sdong bo skyes te de la lcags thag khug gu rgyud kyis btags nas sdig pa can de la khur du skur ro// sdig pa can de dag lcags kyi ri dang sdong pa de dag khur nas lcags
thag gi zam pa la 'gror bcug go/ sdig pa can des ma thoganas de la lhungs lcags khu khol ba'i zangs kyi nang du lhung ngo// de nas yang srin pos phyir phyung ba dang/ bkres skom pas gdungs pas

la ma/ lcags tshan gyi thu lus za zhing lcags bu 'thung ngo// de ltar nyin zhag gcig la de lta bu r sdug bsngal khri phrag dgu bcu snyad myong bar 'gyur ro// de las thar temer skyes na yang gzhan gyi bran khol du skye bar
'gyur ro// de nas dge ba'i bshes gnyen dang phrad de theg pa chenapo'i tshes bstan pa dang/ ras dkar po tshon du bsgyur sla ba bzhin du dgra bcom par gyur to/ rig pa gsum dang mngon par shes
pa drug dang/ rnam par grol ba brgyad thob par 'gyur ro// bcom ldan 'das kyi dga' bo la bka' stsal pa// de la ji ltar na lcags khu 'thung ba'i sems can dmyal ba bco brgyad ce na/ lcags khu 'thung

ba'i semasacan dmyal ba zhes bya bani zangs kyi shing rta 'bar ba rnam pa snatshogs yod do// shing rtader ra'i gang na yang zangs kyi thu lum 'bar ba drug stong drug stong snyad yod de/ sems can gang ma dag

ba'i sams can che zhing ser sna'i dbang gyur pachos log par 'chad pa dang/ ngan par lta zhing pha dang ma la gnyan zhing btsun par mi lta ba dang/ sbyin pa mi gtong ba dang pha rol pos nor bas rnyed pa dang/

bdog bacheb dag mthong na sems kyi sdug bsngal chen po byed gang zag de'achi 'pho ba'i dus byed pa nand kyi rnam pas rab tu nyon mongs te/ sha khrag zad pa dang bla brdol byed pa dang/ bkres shing skom pas kyang/

gdungs de 'di skad du da dug shing gcigaza bar 'dod do zhes sma ste/ de skad smras ma thag tu dmyal ba'i srungs ma srin pos zangs kyi shing rta'i nang zangs kyi thu lum gyis bka' ba'i shing tog tu sprul
@#/ nas sdig pa can gyi drung du 'ongs te spro ba bskyed pa dang/ de mthong ba nas rab tu dga' ba'i sems skyes te/ 'disnyam du bdag shing tog bzang po 'di zar bcug nas chog mi/

shes na ci ma rung snyam sems nas sprob dang lhags chad detshe 'phos so// de ma thag tu zangs kyi ra la zangs kyi shing rta'abar ba'i steng du skyes par gyur to// de nas gnya' ba shing rta'i bar du bcug ste/
srin pos lcags kyi skam pa thogs te sdog pa can gyi ba phye nas lcags khu garablugs so// denas rgyal te sa la 'gyel ba dang kha nas bkres so// shin tu dkris so zhes 'dod do// denas srin pos yang

kha phusu khar lcags kyi thu lum 'bar ba bco brgyad bcug pa dang lus kyi yan lag kun nas me rab tu 'bar te thanatshun du brgyug go/ de lta bu r nyin zhag gcig la nyin lan cig mtshan lan cig 'chi rgyu/ de la dmul

ba'i srungs ma srin po gling gi mgo can dang/ gnod sbyin phag gi mgon gyis 'di skad du bsgo'o// mnar med sems can dmyal ba khyod rnams sngon log ba dang ngan par lta zhing g.yo dang sgyus 'og par 'tsho glu/

sdig po mi dag pa'i las mang bo byas ba'i rgyu dang rkyenagyis btso bsregs dang grang 'dar dang/ dra gshags dang/ lcags bu dang rgu rum 'bar ba 'di dag yongs su smin par 'gyuraro// gal te rab tu byung ba'i

dus na yang nyes pa phra mo byung ba 'gyodatshangs ma byas te spyin bdag dad pa'i sprin pa chud gsan pa de 'i rgyu de'i rkyen gyis lcags kyi thu lum za zhing lcags bu 'thung bar 'gyur ro// sdig ba can de dag kyon gyis

bu/ 'jig rten gyi chu'i ming yang ma thos mi mthong bar 'gyur ro// de nas thar nas yang skyob lnga brgya'i bar du don dgu'atshogs pa ra'agyur zhing dag lags dang zha 'theng dang smra ba mi bde ba dang/ slobs pa chung
bar 'gyur ro// sngon gyi las ngan pa'i bag chags kyis kha zas zos pa'i steng du yang sol ba dang bong ba za bar 'gyur ro// de nas gzod dag ba'i bshes gnyen dang phrad de byang chub tu so mA
bskyed par gyur to// sangs rgyas kyi thugs brtag pa'i 'od zer las rnam par sminapa bshadang 'ale'u ste lnga pa'o///sangs rgyas rjes su dran pa'i ting nge 'dzin gyi rgyan no/
zhes bya ba'i mdo bam bo drug pa/// de'atshasams can nyon mongs pa mang po dag de ltar gyur pa dang/ bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsal cing bstan nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyis
thugs rje chen po byams pa'i thugs ka nas 'od zer kha dog dkar po rnam pa bcu thugs las phyung ste/ phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams kun snang bar byas so// 'od de rnam par re las kyang sprul pa'i
sangs rgyas tshad med pa rin po che'i pad mo la bzhugs so// de'i tsho'akhor mang po thams cado kun gyis sangs rgyas kyi 'od zan de la so sor mthong ba tha dad de/ 'khor dal lasan yid bzhin nor bu lta

bur mthong ngo// la las ni shel gyi ri lta bu r mthong ngo// la las ni chu thams cad kyi rang bzhin du mthong ngo// la las rin po che'i rnam grangasasu ma thong ngo// la las ni sman rnams kyi rang bzhin du/
mthong ngo// la las ni pha dang ma lta bu r mthong ngo// gsan bla ma dang slob dpon lta bu r mthong ste/ de'i tshe sams can sdug bsngal ba rnams la dgongs pa'i phyir sprul pa'i sangs rgyas

rnams kyi snying thugs kar byung nas 'od dang bcas te phyir yang sku'alte bar zhugs so// denas yang phyir thugs kar byung nas rin po che'i grwar zhugs nas rgyud lnga'i sems can sdug bsngal gyis gdungs/

b+hU pa'i gnas kun tugashegs te 'od dang bcas par byung ngo// de'i rgyud lnga'i sems can sdig pa can sdug bsngal gyis go dungs pa de dag kun gyis sprul pa'i sangs rgyas rnams kyi thugs dang sangs rgyas
rnams so so'i pha ma'am/ dge ba'i bshes gnyen dang gnyen bshes lta bu r mthong ste// bags kyis 'jig rten las 'das pa'i chos kyang bshad pa thos par gyur to// de'i tsha byung gi nam mkha' las 'di
skad kyi sgrachen po byung nas 'khor mang bo rnams la bsgo ba/ khyed rnams de bzhin gshegs pa'i thugs rjes su dran par gyis shig/ sangs rgyus kyi thugs ni byams pa chen po ste byams pa chen po
kyi nisdug bsngal gyis gdungs pa'i sems can rnams la dgongs shing dmigasaso// bcom ldan 'das kyis dga' bo la bka' stsal pa/ de la ji ltar na byams pa'i thugs zhes bya banasdug bsngal

gyis gdung ba'i sa mas can yongasu 'dzin pa'o//sdug bsngal gyis gdungs pa zhes bya ba ni ngan song gsum du yongs su 'khor ba'o// bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsal cing bstan pa'i tshe/'khor mang

[z]bo rnams kyis kyang sems can dmyal ba dang/ yi dgas dang byol song du gyur pa rnams mthong bar gyur ba dang/ 'khor rnams kyis dge ba'i rnam par thar pa'i ting nge 'dzin gyis sems can de dag kun gyi sngon gyi
skye gnas dran par gyur te sdug bsngal gyis gdungs pa sems can de dag kun 'khor mang po rnams kyi sngon bskal pa grangs med pa'i sngon rol na bdag bdag gi pha ma dang gnyen bshes yin pa mthong ngo/
de ltar mthong nas mchi ma blags te sangs rgyas la phyag 'tshal nas/ bcomaldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to//bcom ldan 'das bdag cag rnams sangs rgyas kyi byin gyis brlabs kyis sdug
bsngal ba sems can 'di dag kun bdag gi pham dang slob dpon dang gnyen bshes su mthong bar gyur to zhes gsol ba dang/ bcom ldan 'das kyis 'khor mang po rnams la bka' stsal pa// rigs

kyi bu dag khams gsum gyi sems can lam rgyud drug tu sgyu ma'i 'khrul 'khor bzhin du 'khor bas/ pha dang ma dang bu dang chung ma dgaganyenangashisasu ma gyur pa gang yang mad de/khams gsum 'khor ba'i gnyen

bshes yin na de la gnod pa'i sems tsam yang mi bskyodon/gnod pa dngos su lta pa'i phyir bya zhesagasungs ba dang/ de'i tshozas gtsang ma la sogs pa'i 'khor mang po rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad
ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das bums pa'i thugs kyi ting nge 'dzin zhes bgyi bsilta bu lags dadag bcom ldan 'das kyis phyogs gcig tsam bshad du gsol zhes gsol ba dang/ bcomaldan 'das kyis
'khor mang bo rnams la bka' stsal pa/ 'di lta ste/ byams pa'i sems kyi ting nge 'dzin zhes bya ban/ 'di ltar 'du shes bskyed par bya'o// srid pa gsum gyi sa masacan/

thams cad la pha ma dang bu tsha'i 'du shes su bzhag go/ yid la byed pa dang bsgomazhing dmigs pa'atshon/ sems can de dgakun bdag gi pha ma dang butsha dang chung ma dang gnyen bshes su gyur pa shin tu 'phang
shing gces pa yid la sdug ba dag/ sdugabasngal gyis gdungs par gyur pa la shin tu brtse ba'i yid kyis brtag cing dmigs te yid la bya'o// sams can gang dgand dang sdug bsngal gyis nyon mongs pa
dag mthongan de'i skyabasajoltar bya snyam bsam mo// de dag kun gyi sdug bsngal spangs nas bde 'gro'i mtho ris la bkod par dmigs so// 'du shes de las su rung bar grub nas 'du shes gnyis la 'jug
par bya'o// 'du shes gnyis la 'dris nas gsum la 'jug bar bya'o// gsumal 'dris nas khang pa gcig gi nang gang ba la 'jug bar bya'o// khang pa gcig gi nang gang ba la 'dris nas// dge
( 'dun gyis gnas khang gcig gzhi gang la 'jug par bya'o// dge 'dun gyi gnas khang gang ba la 'dris nas/ kho ra khor yug tu dbag tshad gcog gi nang gang ba la 'jug par bya'o// dpag tshadagacig
gi nang gang ba la 'dris nas/ lho'i 'dzam bu gling ginang gang ba la 'jug par bya'o// 'dzam bu'i gling gi nang gang ba la 'dris nas gling gsum gang ba la 'jug par bya'o// de ltar gling chenapo
bzhi'i nang gang ba la 'dris nas/ de bzhin du mthar gyis rgya bskyed de/ phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad yongs su gang ba la 'jug par 'o// de la ji ltar blta zhen/ shar phyogs kyi sems
can thams cad ni phalta bu r blta'o// nub phyogs kyi sams can thams cad ni ma lta bu r blta'o// lce phyogs kyi sams can thams cad ni phu bo lta bu r blta'o// byang phyogs kyi sems can thams cad nan/

bo lta bu r bawu'o// 'og ma phyogs kyi sems can thams cad n bu dang chung ma lta bu r blta'o// stong gi phyogs kyi sems can thams cad ni slob dpon dang bla ma lta bu r blta'o// phyogasamatshams gzhan gyi semA
can rnams ni/ dge sbyong dang bram ze dang/ gnyen bshes su blta'o// sems can de dag kun kyang sdug bsngal gyis yongs su gdungs ba dang/ nad chen pos gzir ba dang/ mtshon gyi nags tshal/

dang rab tu tsha ba dang/ rang tu grang ba dang lcags tshan la sogs bas rang tu gdungs ngasha sdug bsngal b.ralta ste/ de lta bu r mthong nas de la snying brtse ba dang snying rje ba'i yid kyis sdug bsngal de
las 'don pa'i phyir/ bdag rin po che'i pad+mos btag ste/ de dag gi drung du 'dug nas lus manyos shing bkrus te nad rnams bsal bar 'du shes bskyang ngo/ nga la ba'i ma la yang snying rje chen pos mchi

a char bzhin du phab ste/ me de dag kun bsad bar 'du shes bskyed do// yi dgas rnams lan bdag gi lus las khrag byung ste khrag de dag kyang 'ogarab skyang nas yid gasa rnams la byin te/chog cing 'grangs pa

kun ts+tshAny+tsa don nang maran+ti/ dang rab tutshim par 'du shes bskyed de/de la chosabashadub dang// sangs rgyas la bstod pa dang/ dge slongag dge 'dun la yongs su bstod pa dang/ rjes su bsngags pa byed par 'du shes

chab skyed do// de yang lhag par snying brtse ba'i sems bskyod de skad cig tsam yang mi gtong ni/ khyams bachen po'i sams te shin tu yid la 'dzin cing dmigs pa dag rgyas par ni byams pa'i ting nga 'dzin gyi nang nas

bshad pa bzhin no// de ltar byams pa'i mkhas dang ldan bar bsgom pa ni byams ba chen po zhes bya'o// byams ba bsgoms nas snying rje chen po bsgom pabya'o// snying rje zhes bya bani khams gsum gyi bams can sdug bsngal

gyis gdungs pa dag mthong ba dang bdagagi snying la mdas phog pa 'am/mag gi 'bras bu sa la lhung ba tsam du rab tu snying rje bskyed do// sems canatsha das gdungs pa dang bkres shing skom ba bdag mthong na/ bdag gi

lus las khrag char bzhin phab myu/ de dag sdugabasngal las gnod par bsam mo// de lta bu r snying rje la yang sgo khri phrag brgya stong snyed yod de/ rgyus par ni snying rje chen po'i ting nge 'dzin las bshad pa bzhin no//

de ltar byams pa dang/ snying rje bsgoms nas dga' ba chen po bsgom par bya'o// dga' bachen po zhes bya ba na/ sems can rnams rab tu bde zhing skyid pa dag mthong na bdag nyid kyis nyams su myong ba dang/

'dra bar rab tu dga' ba'isams bskyod do// de ltar dga' ba bskyod nas btang snyoms chen po bsgom par bya'o// btang snyoms zhes bya banasems can de dag kun snang ba dang/ mesnang ba dang/ 'ongs pa dang/ song/
ba yang sems las byung ba tsam mo// sa las las bya ba rten cing 'brel te byung pa las zhes bla dgas su btags so// de ltar sems dang 'du shes nam mkha'i me tog ltar phan rtsa legs su bung ba'o

sdug bsngal dang kun 'byung yang 'du shes las byung lo/ bde ba yang 'du shes las byung bas sems ni chu shing gi sdong po dang 'dra ste snying po med pa'o// 'di dag rgyas pa ni mdo sde dpa bcu las shad
ba bzhin no// gang gis de ltar rjes su dran par byas n/ lug dang sems kyi dngos po yang ma thongs/ chosathams cad dben pa nyid du mthong ngo// de na byang chub sems dpa'i rnams kyis lus dang tshor

ba dang sems dang/ chos dran pa nyapar gzhag pa zhes bya ste/ chos 'di la brten pas byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos sum cu rtsa bdun yang bsgoms par 'gyuraro// gang chud pa len pan nyan thos kyi chos zhes
ba'o// chud pam lenang nibyang chub sems dpa'i chos zhes bya'o// de skad ces bka'astsal nas/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i thugs kyi 'od zer rnams lhag par gsal bar snang ste/ deng zhin gshegs

pa'i thugs kyi 'od zer las rin po che'i pad+mo dag skyes so// rinapotshe'i bde'ire la yang ni bo che'i padro gang+gA'i klung gabyemasnyad yodado// pad+ma de re re la yang sprul pa'isangs rgyas sku'i tshad sangs rgyas shAkya

thub pa dang 'dra ba tshad med pa grangs med ba dpag tu med pa gad bzhugs so// mtshan 'di mngon par bstan pa'i tshe na/ sangs rgyas kyi sku'i ba spu'i bu ga nas rin po che'i nga do brgyad khri bzhi stong snyed
edapar gyur to// pad+mo dor re'i stengan yang sbrul pasangs rgyas sku'atshad dang ga tu medatshad ma dgazhal du med pa brgyad khri bzhi stong snyed bzhugs so// sprul pa ke sangs
rgyas dedu kun gyi spu'i bu ga dang thugs las 'od zer brgyab yang sdor gong du bshad pa bzhineno// deltar 'od gzer des phyogs bcur snang bar byas nas/ sangs rgyas kyi spyogatsug tu
zhugs te/ phyarisangs rgyas kyi smanimatshams kyi mdzod spu dkar po nas byung ngo// mdzod spu dkarapo nas byung nas phyogs bcu'ajig rten du gser gyi rgyal mtshan lta bu r snang bar byas te/
phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi sa gtso kun gseragyi kha dog tu snangab byas na sprul pa'i sangs rgyasa rnams kyang sar bcom ldan 'das kyis zhal du bsdus so// de nas phyiratshang sangs rgyas kyi
lanasacung sa phyogs bcur snang rabyas s// dunas slar yang thugs karazhugs te/ thamipalas thugs ka nas byung nas phyogs bcu kun tugasal bar byas s// denas yang
zla slar 'dus te sangs rgyas kyi bar zhugs s/ sbra'od zer de dag lta bar zhugs pa na/ bcom ldan 'das kyi skubazung lta bu phyinang du gsal zhing chudang sAb ltaramagayo bar gyur ba dang/ khamA
gsum gyi rgyud lnga'i sems can thams cad de bzhin gshegs pa'i thugs kyi 'od zer las snang bar gyur// sgrol ba'i sangs rgyas rnams kyang rin po che'i khang pa brtsigs pan rani
checu la bzhugs pa ltar de bzhan gshegs pa'i thugs kyi bar na rgyu'angegashegs par stonano// sprul pa'asadas rgyasaded dkun kyang soso nas ma gned pa la bstan ra
sangs rgyas rjes su dran pa 'khastod pa dang/ chos rjesasu dran pa la bstodapa dang/ dga' dun rjes su dran pa la bstod pa dang/ tshul khrims rjes su dran pa la bstod pa dang/ sbyin sa
su dran pa la bstod pa dang/ lhasasu dran pa labastod pa dang/ 'dum bal gusapa rnam pa drug la bstod pa dang/ byams pa ting nge 'dzan la bstod tsang bsngags pa dag stonatsang
'tshad go/ dran pa de cu/gas dag pa'i chos rnams skyabar 'gyur/ dran pa 'dirngun sangs rgyas rnamasakyirgyu'o// sangs rgyas kyi thugs nirjes su dran pa drug gi thugs se/
'as pa la gusabarlagag las chos rnams thob par gyur/ mngon par rdzogasabar 'tshang rgya bar 'dod pa dgasaMngasargyasakyi thugs ltar bslab par bya'o/ bcom ldan snyan kyis de
skad ces bka' stsal pa dang/ de bzhin gshegapa'i sku'i[“]'od lhaga' snang zhing gsal bar gyur te/ sangs rgyas kyi sku dang sku'i 'od zer las sprul pa'i sangs rgyas dang rin po che'i rgyan dang
ma tog dang/ pad+mo grangasamed pa brjod du med pa rnamasakyang lhagapar gsal bar gyur to// rin po che'i rgyan dang me tog dang/ pad+madang/ 'od zer gyi rnam grangs mang po ni me tog snatshogs
@#// kyi mdolasabashad pa bzhinano// gang gis de lta bu r mthad bdenayod dag par mthong ba'o// gangags de lta malane par mthong ba de na leg par mthong ba'o//
ma bzhani gshags bamangasasumya ngan 'dasanas sangs rgyas kyi gnas sugyur pa rnams rjes su dran pa drugamangon du byedapanasangs rgyas su dran pa sems zhes bya'o// dbazhin
gdags pa thugs rtes suTanabarabyas n/ bskal pa khri phrag bcuganyisakyi 'kharabs pa mdosasusprod bar 'gyur ro/ )gang de ltar rjes su dran par byad pa ni gang nas gang
'a du skye ba'i gnas thams cad du/ dan par lta bar mi 'gyur ba dang/ semasalam dang sgyu med pa dang/ rtag tuban med pa sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa'a rnams dang phrad par
'gyur// gal te lu lan 'khab sangs rgyas kyi chos med bganas su skyesanamang/ sangs rgyasardzasasudran pa'i yon tan dang khyadegyis brlabs kyis chos kyi dono rnams bod du chud cing
rang sangs rgyas su 'gyur// de'i tshobcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsalanas/ sku'i 'od slab sdus te sdom bzhin dubazhugs so// de nas bcom ldan 'das
kyis rgyalapo ab la bka'astsal ba 3 'di lta ste/ skyes bu chen pa'atsho'amadzod spudakar po'i da bar dang/ gzhan yang mtshan thamasacad la dbu'i gtsug gtor man chad dang/ zhabs kyi 'o
lo yanachad nas brtag pa dang/ rnam pa sna tshogs su brtagakha dang/ sku tshodamathebadu jug pa dang/ 'od zlum po 'dom gang ba la nga rtag pa sems bskyed de/ mthong zhing rtogs na kha
nam thaba'i las don kun byang bar gyur ba na gong du bshad pa bzhin// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsalal/ rigs kyi bu dag gal du sbyin bdagadad pa zhig mngon par nganas pa ldadang
ldan te/ ade bzhin gyi nor bu rin patsho 'chang zhing phyogs bsun te gzhan gyi khams kun tu 'gruba'i dbang thob nas/ 'jig rten gyi khams gcigag sems can grangs kyang bgrang du med
pa la/ phyogs bcud 'jig rten gyi sems can tshad tshad grangs med dpag tu med pa dag thams cad dgra bcom pa gyur te/ dgra bcom pa de dag la sbyin badag chenang das/ bskal pa
btsa ba dngabagrang ba las 'das pa'amathar thug gi bar du o byang rnamasakyis rgyunam chad par mchod cing sbyin pa byinan/ de'i bsod nams rab tu mang ba tshaninam zhes bka' stsal pa dang/
rgyalapo yab kyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das phyogs gcigeg dgra bcom pa la tshodapa byas kyang gsod nams dpag tu ma mchis na/ phyogs bcu'i dag btsem pa la med pa byas
pa ltams kyang ci dgas/ bcom ldan 'das kyisayabargyal ba la bka' stsal pa/ gal te skyes bu zhags ngan par lta ba'askye ba gangs snga ma bas mang ba snyad dgra bcom pa lam la bcud de/
ragi pa gsum dang mngon par shes pa drug dang rnam par l ba brgyad thob par byas pa bas/ gang zhig gas sadas rgyas kyi mdzad spyod la byang chub tu sems bskyed de/
skad yig thad cig tsam rjes su dran par byas pa'achatsamatshayod do// bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsal pa na/ shAkya'i bu'adzugasum bcu rnams kyis bla namad pa ya pa
dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tusems bskyed// nyan thos dang/ rang sangs rgyas kyi las lam 'jug pa'am dam bcas nas bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// bzhi
ldan 'das kyi sku'i yan lag nas bsdu'i bu ga gcig gibaran yang tshad ma mchisapa' sprul pa'i sangs rgyas dag ston gyi/ nyan thos rnams ni sa bon tshig pa dang 'dra ste/de lta bu dgam
mchisago/ tshad med pa bzhi brtag pa'i le'u ste drug pa'o// dunas bcom ldan 'das 'a khor mang pa'i nang nas bzhengs tenamamakha dalagam bsags/
so// de dag rgyal pa ab kyis mthong bar gyur pa dang/ rab tu dga' ba'i sems skyes tesangs rgyas kyi zhabs 'bring du sad de// dbazhin gshegs pa'i zhabs brtag pa/
tshon/ zhabs kyis thal gyi 'khor latsanges dang ldan pa mtshan las/ 'khor lo rtsibs kyi bar gzhanasarinapatsho'i nga dornam pasAtshogasachar bzhin du 'bab bo// padod/
gcig las kyang bad+mo khri phrag brgyad khri bzhi stong sded dusbrul to/ pad+modar la mang pa po'i khang pabastsagasapa'i par gyur to/ pad+mo'i red pa dang 'dabazhade dag re res kyad phyogs bcu'i
'jig rten gyi khams tshad ma dpa snying khebs par gyurago/ pad+mod gcug cing yang 'dab ma brgyad khri bzhi stedasnyad dad ldan no// bcom ldan 'dasashAkya thub panam mkha' lam
pa 'dor ba de'i tshon/ napa tsha'ame tog charab zhani dubabaste/ pad+ma dadag las kyang rdul phra rab snyedakyisangs rgyas tshadamed pa yang nam mkha' la g.yo ba 'dor zhing gshegs
sa// rgyal pa ga ba kyis de lta bu dag mthong nas kyang rab tu dga' ba'i sems lhag par skyes te/ phyiramaldogapa 'brasabu thob par gyuranas yan lag lnga sa la gtugs te/
sangs rgyas la phyag 'tshal// danas 'khor mang pa'a rnams kyis daltabu'adings pa dgamangonas/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsalato/ btsam ldan 'das
phyogs bcu'a'ajig rten gyi khamasan sprul pa'i sangs rgyas grangasamams par gyur pa da rnams lasasangs rgyas mang dag pa gang lags/ sprul pa'i sangs rgyas gang lags zhes
gsol pa dang/ bcom ldan 'das kyis 'khor mang po rnams la bka' stsal pa/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'dasan stong pa nyid kyis zhi ba'i gnas rnam par grobu ting nge hAdzin/
snyoms par zhugs te/ dwagongs palamanga' bsus pas/ tshang dgabaran sbrul pa zhes byabamed de da lta zhen/ de bzhazhig thugasapa thugasakyang stod pa
nyid kyi zhib nel/ stod banyidisazhiba'irnam par grol bar snang ba'i rgyal pa zhes bya ba'i tid de 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs// tang ngo 'dzin de'i mthus sangs rgyas bcom ldan
wA'adas tshad dang grangs/zhal dus dwapa nyid kyi sku zla la 'go/ gzhal du med pa'i sku zhes bya ba ni/ thams cad mkhyen nga ni mi shes// thams cad mkhyenang ba de ngashas zhes bya
'a ban chags pa med pa itong dzin to// chags pa med pa'i ting nge 'dzanagyi skonas de bzhin bzhugs pa'i spyod lam ston te/ gal te bsod snyoms la gshegs sam/ rgyu
zhing spyod pa 'an/ gnyags pa'i sgo gnyis nas kyang sems can la phan pa dang bdeb de namadzad do// de la sems can la lan sangs rgyas 'jig rten na bzhugs pa'atsho/ sadas
rgyas gshegs pa 'a zhabs kyis thal gyi 'khor lo'i rtsibs stong dang ldan pa'i mtshan mthong na/ bskal pa steng skyid kyi kha na ma thoba'i sgrib pa kun byang bar 'gyur ro// sangs rgyas mdos su
myang n las 'dasanas ting nge 'dzin la mnyam par gzhag ste/ bcom ldan 'das gshegs pa 'a 'dushasayid la byas na yang bskal pa stod snyad kyi khanam tho ba lasangan pa kun byang
bar 'gyur// gshegs pa 'di la ma byas nas/ sangs rgyas kyi zhi bas kyi rjes yid la byas sam/ sku gzugs gshegs pas de la byas na gom pa re res kyang bskal pa steng sA'i
kyi khanAm thang lis kyi sgrib pa kun byang bar 'gyur ro// bcom ldan 'das kyis dga' la bka' stsal pa/ khyed dang nas de bzhinagashegs pa'i gsung 'di gzungs su rdung las sa
rgyas kyi nyib/nas su gyurab rnams la rang gebar bsnyes shig/ de bzhin gshags nga yongs su mya ngan las 'das nas sangs rgyas kyi sku gzugasamtshan dang ldan bar brabs bya'o// de
yin pa ga zhan yang sprul pa 3 sku gzugs tshadamad pa dang skur 'od dang zhabs kyis kyang brab r bya'o/ kha tshar phram 'am/ shal gyi nor bu yang smanematshams kyi mdzadas+yA kyi gnas su
gdags te/ samos nyin rnams kyis kyang mtshan demathongo bar bya'o// mtshan dmathong nas dga' ba'i sems bskyed pa tsam gyis skal pa khri phrag gang+ga'i klung gi bye ma snyad kyi 'khor ba/
nyes pa tshados su spong bar 'gyur/ de skad ces bka' stsal nas de bzhin gshegs pa slar gadan la bzhugs so// denas bcom ldan 'das la rgyal ba yab sa
gsal pa/ sangs rgyas 'jig rten du gshagasanas ban pa dang bdeba'i dkon da pa tsho'i na dzadanasaskyabemod brnamasal phanang dngab dngar gyur ba dak+kanitu legs so zhes
gsel te// denas yang bcom ldan 'das kyis rgyal po ab la bka' stsal pa/ sngon yul mnyan du med pan khyim bdag skyabs med zas sbyin
ma zhes bya ba dang/ chung ma gnang btsani zhes bya ba dang gnyis/ zon mo byatil zhes bya ba dang 'jig rtenanA'atshonanam shin tu 'grubs pas khyim bdag gsebran mo dalanor dbyig
sku dang bang mdzod thams cad kyang gtad dbyud ba dang/ 'thor ba dang/ sdud pa dang/ byab thams cad kyi dbang ang bskur ro// khyim bdagaskyabs med zas sbyin gyis sangs rgyas
dang dag slong gdeg 'duna rnams spyan drangs nas cho byad thams cad sbyarato// de'i tshe dag slonganadab dgag cig slengazhing 'dod pa mdabar gyurang dang/ bran mo rgan ma da gsar
byed pas sangs rgyas dang/ sa dang dge 'dun rnams la gsha zhing spyod nas 'daskad ces smras so// bdag ga ji tsami bdag 'a don gti mugags rmongs pas dge spyod ga sgyus
sku bslus te/ med phod 'di rnams ni tshol bas mchog ma shes na/ jaltar bya zhes smras nas/ yang 'di skad kyi smon lam nganapa btab po// bdag nam zhig ga dusan/ sangos
rgyas mtshan dang dga' dun gyi ming yang ma thos pa dang/ skra dang kha spubregs nase kha dog ser par bsgyur ba'i gos gyon pa 'di dag ma mthong bar gyur cig ces smras pa'i tshag nganang
ma gzhan dab/tsa sa thos par gyur nas/ de bzhin du mthar gyis yul mnyan du yod pa'am thams cad kyis kyang thos par gyurapa dang/ btsuname phreng ldan mas kyang thos bsgyurataM/
btsunamos thos pa dad 'di skad dutsa'aphyariskyabs med zas sbyin parlobazang po dang 'drab/ kun gyis blta bar 'dod pa 'drilubran ma sbrul gdug pa can lta bu s bsrungs par gyur ma ru zhes
smras nas khyim bdag skyabs med zasasbyin la bsgob/ khyodakyis chung ma gnang btsun de la smargyu zhags dpasatshurathongashaganyis smasaso/ de'i tshe khyim bdag gis rlung na gnang ba ban
zhes khyab dmagyogs par rgyal po'i pho brang du btang nas phyin pa dang/ des btsun mo la phyag 'tshal/ phyogs gcig tu 'aglengago/ btsun ma 'phreng ldan mas 'dugashig ces bsganas
snyanabatang ba la 'dug pa dang/ 'daskad cesasmras so/ khyod khyaman banamo rganam zhige tsheg ngan pas 'phags pa la skur pa 'debs zhes zeran ci'i phyir de ma spyad pas bsgo'o/ gnangab/
ban des gsal nga/ de bzhin gshegs pa nyi ma dang 'dra ba'ajig rten dugshegs nas phan pa dang bde ba'i don mang ba'i mtho ra/ bdud sdig de dun sor ma 'phrang ba tsan dang/ rkun ma
ma rungs pa dang/ rigs ngan ba bu yan chad sangs rgyas kyis btul na) branaorgan mo 'di lta smos kyang ci 'tshal zhes btsanamalo de skad ces gsol pa dang/ btsun ma dag rab tu
dga' ba'i sems bskyedad gnang btsun la 'di skad du sangs rgyas dang dge slong gi dege 'dun rnams spyan 'drenas/ khyod kyi bran mo ngan par ltab de phozad dum thang ga
cas bsgogo/ de'i phyir nyin ma thobrang nod du sangs rgyas dang dge slong gdeg 'dun rnams spyan drangasanasamachod pa byas go/ de tsho khyim bdag des khran mo dal gtugaser gyi bum
pa'i nang dugaser gyi nor bus ba krang ste/ sangs rgyas dang drag slong gdag 'dun rnams la mchod cig rtsis rgyal po pho brang du bskur to// de'i tshe bran mo rgan mo de rab tu dalag 'a ba'agyur te/
wAran po cha' bum pa thogasanas nges par gsago/ de'atshobatsuname phung ldan ms branamagonamo de 'ongs pa mthong nas/ 'di snyam du sems te/ bran mo ngan par lta ba med sangs
rgyus kyisama'i dul lam/ bdag gsazan mo 'ad btul bamathengon chos kyabade ba thob dug don ma wa'osnyam bsams so// de'atsho bcos ldan 'dasardzu 'phrul gyisesgochenapor gshegs/
tA/ zhabs 'khride dga' bo niyi yon rol nas 'od do// gnyen dga' bon las rol nas 'od go/ sgrogracan zinani phyinas 'od de// de'atshobran mo rgan mo des sangs rgyas
gshegs pa mthong ba dang skrag cinge dngangs te/ gsar bar rgyuranas/ 'disnyam dum rungs pa chen po 'di skad bdag go bzhin du 'ongosab lta zhig skum// phyir zhur nas sgatshan
[5]0 pa bsnyags pa las/ sgetshan ngo ang 'gags par gyur te// khu rgyu ba khung du 'dzul te bros pa las/ 'gruba'i khung da gab/sa par gyur nas/ su nga phra ma gzhan du yang mtha nga par
gyurato// de nas de ma thag tu skatshan po nyid bye bar mthong nas ) rgan mo ngan par lta ba des sangs rgyasamathong mi 'dod pas/ gog 'gas kyang ma phanataM/ mi 'da' gzugs
brnyanasnang ba dang 'dra bar gyur to// mgo bsgyur te shar phyogs su bltasan yang shar phyogs nas sangs rgyas mthong bar gyur to// lho phyogs su bltasan yang lho phyogs nas kyang
sangs rgyas mthong bar gyur te// nub phyogs su bltas na ad nub phyogs nas kyang sangs rgyasamathong bar gyur to// byang phyogs su bltas na yang byang phyogs nas kyang sangs rgyas
mthong bar gyurato// yar gnam du bltasan steng gnemamakha' las sangs rgyas mthong bar gyurado// kha bub tu sal nyal du sa la bltas na yang sa las sangs rgyas kyis gang bar mthe
bar gyur to// thalams de baban ga nga sor ma banu'i b.ranas sangs rgyasam thed bar gyur to// rgan mo des mig btsums dusangs mas kyi mig gis rtag chen drug gi phyogs ngan spyi
pa'i sangs rgyas kyis gang bar mazed de// chen 'di mngon par bstan pa'atshonamanyan du yod pa'i grong khyer gyi rigs ngan gyi bu mo nyi shu rtsa lnga dang/ bram ze bu mo lnga bcu la sogs ti/
@#/ rigs sna tshogs kyi bu mo btsun mo zung ldan s ki khoran/ sbyaribum lnga brgya zhig yod pa las/ gang sangs rgyas kyi chos la ma dad de skur cing 'phya ba'i rnams la/
kyang sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'dasanam mkha' la gom bsagshegs te/ thonamorgan mo de la grangasamed pa sprul ba'i skub stan pa de dag mthong nas rab tu dga' ban+tasems skyes te/
napar lta ba'i dra ba dral do zhes brjod de/ ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag tshol to// de'i tshe bcom ldan 'das kyis tshadas pa'i dbyangs kyis bum rnams spro ba bskyed de bkag
stsal pa/ chos kyi bum rnams khyed cag sangs rgyas shAkya thub pa'amtshananas brjod la phyag tshol cig/ khyed kyis nga mtshananas brjod dam nga'i rjes su dran par byas nas/ rnam
par grol bar 'gyur rogs bka' stsal pa dang/ bu mo rnams kyis skad 'phunang sangs rgyas shAkya thub pa la phyag 'tshal lo zhes smras so// de'atshosangs rgyas kyismon mtshams
sgomadzod spu dkar po'i 'od gzer bkyanas/ bumo rnams gyi sems snang bar byas te/ bumo rnams kyis sangs rgyasagashagasapa spyod lamamadzesapa dang/ zhabs kyi bo nas
paNon bzhin du 'bab pa dang/ pad+mo gdugs lta bu r gyur pa dang/ sprul pa'i sangs rgyasa'adaa khu tshol lam/ 'dom 'tsholaltaragongs dbag cing brjod du med pa dag bu mo rnams /
kyis ma thong nas/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed do// branamo zatan mas de ltar sangs rgyas mthong ang ngan da ra lta ba dang/ mdad pa'osam ra/[21]
med kyi/ 'on kyang bskal pa khri phrag brgyad du snyed kyi 'khor ba zhes pa byang bar 'gyuran ) gdadad pa'asims dang bcas te/ bsta stang gis phyag byed pa dang ) maNod par
skyes de nas de'i tshe bran mo rgan mo des de ltar sangs rgyas rnams mthong pa dang lam gyi seng rnams kyang phyir byed par snang ngo// de nasabran mo rgan me sad rangs pas
khyim du song nas/ jomal 'di skad ces smras so// bdag dang ma rungs pa chen pa dag sbyong go'u ta ma dang phrad de/ dge sdong gis rgyal po'i pho brang gi khab sger mag pa cha
'phrul rnam pa sna tshogs bstan taM/ lus gser gyi ri lta bu la/ me togarnam pa sna tshogs kyis brgyan pa// migapad+mo ldan ng u0f7clta bu l red zer ldaphrag du ma 'barab ) rdzogs
nga rab ltaram snang zhing brjod du med pa ste/ dag sbyong gi rdzu 'phrul lta bu ni'ajigartanan dpe zla medad/ jomo khyed nas gzhon te ther bu na de lta bu dgagazags par ma bzhed dam zhes smras
nas/ shing sgrom gyi steng du 'phags bsanang du zhugs te/ ras dkar pos mgo dkris te/ de lta bu'i mun pa nag po'i gnas su nyal lo// de'i tshabcom ldan 'das slar rgyal bu dzaM
[/]@#// ta'i tshal du gshegs pa las/ btsun mo phreng ldan ms 'di skad ces gsal te// bcom ldan 'das bud medam rud mu ngan par lta ba 'di btul te slar gasheg
paragasal zhes gsal pa dang/ bcom ldan 'das kyis slar batsunamo phreng ldan ma la bka' stsal pa/ rgan mo 'ad sdig pa rab tu chabs de bzhinagagasab la gdul ba'i rgyud dang
thabs de las med de/ sgragacan 'dzin dang 'dra ste rgyu'athun no// dang bcom ldan 'dasakyis cho 'phrul gyisagashegs pa dang/ rdzu 'phrul mang por bstan pa 'danaM/ rgan mo 'di'i
sdig pa 'byung ba'i phyir ro zhes bka' stsalanas slar gashegs so// sar gshegs pa na sgra gcan 'dzin la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// khyod khyim bdag skyabs med zas sbyin
gyi khyim du song la/ rgan mo ma ru sa ma 'di thul cig/zhesagasungs so// de skad ces bka' stsal pan dag sladag dege 'dun brgya phrag phyed dang bdugasuma rnams kyang bcom ldan
'das kyi phyi bzhinam chu ber gsol to// de'i tshosgra gcan 'dzin sangs rgyasakyi byin gyis brlabs kyis yid bzhin zhes bya ba ni tingade'adzinal snyoms par zhugs te/ bcom ldan 'das
la phyag 'tshal nas/ lan bdun bskor te/ 'khor los sgyurab 'i rgyal bor sprulanas/ zhabs 'brangegams nas dga' bo// g.yon nas bsnyen dga' bor bcas te/ 'go
ni/ dge slabargya phrag phyed dad bcu gsum na bu steng dubasgyur/ dga' bo rin po chagater la dbang ba'akhyen pa rin po char sprul/ bsenadaga'aben din gdungo narin po cher bskyar tu 38na pa[–]
sna bdun dang/ dmagarnam bzhi dang ldan par chas so// de'i tshogaser gyi 'khor lo rin po che zhig steng gzhim mkhaM' ma rin po che'i pad+mos bteg ste/ khyim bdag skyabs med rdzas sbyin
gyi khyim ga la ba de logs su lhang ngo// gnod sbyana rnams kyis nam mkha3 lasa'adi skad ces smras so// 'phrul gyi rgyal po 'jig rten du byung ste/ sdug pa mi dge ba kun zhi nas/
dgaba'achos rnams grangs par 'gyur nas sgruba'i tshig rgan mo desazesanas rab du dga' ba'i sems skyes te/ 'phrul gyi rgyal po 'jig rten du gshagasan/ yadebananad+ma nor
bu rin po chachar bzhin du 'bab pas/ dani bdagel slongabamad dosAm bsamasas// de'atsho'akhor los sgyurab 'i rgyal pos dril dker/ rnga sgra 'byin cing/ chos kyi dung chenang don nga
bsgrugs te/ rinapa tsha'i phyogs la 'duganas/ khyim bdag skyabs med zas sbyin gyi khyim du song ngo// bran mo rgan mo des thos nas rab tudaga' ba'i sems skyes te/ 'phrul gyi
rgyal po 'di 'jigarten du byung nas yin padangabadabar 'gyur ba mang po yod da/ legs nyes kyi bye brag kyang khyad pas dgasbyong gis kyang bslus par ma 'gyur ro snyam bsamasanas nga shing sgom nas//
khyung ste/ 'phrul gyi rgyal ba la gus par phyag 'tshal te// de nas rgyal pos rin po cha'agater la dbang ba'asmon pa la bka'astsal ba/ khyod song la rganam la 'di
skad gyis shig/ khyod sngon gyi bsod nams dad ldan bs/ rgyal pa[']min dang ldan te/ khyod bud med ni po cher bzhes dgos so// zhes skabadag/ de skad gaganam la bskong
dang de'i tshoslar tshanams 'daskad ces gsol to// bdaganarigs dmar la ngan te/ shani dudamanang lags n/ rgyal po chenapas bka' stsal nga la rab tu dga' mod kyi/
bud mda'an po charanapo dgama'i dgo/ gal te rgyal pas dgas te bka' stsalan bdagagadzibal bka' stsal te/ bdag bran mo las phyudangashig par gsal te// de nas rgyal
bas khyim bdag skyabs med zas sbyin la 'di skad ces bka' sal to// khyod kyi bran mganama'adimtshan dang ldan tu/ zhibudam dar po chararung gas zhesas zhes bka' stsal
to// skyabasamad nas sbyin gyis gsol pa/ bka' stsal pa khazhan du rgyal po chen po la dbul la// rganamos deskad du btangabatatshig thos nas lhag par dga' bar gyur to///
de'i tsho 'phrul rgyal bos tshadibazhani rgyanir bu rin po mgon ma la bstan pa dang/ rganamoang bud med rin patshalta bu r gyur te/ rab tu dga' nas 'di skad du dge sbyong la sogs pa ni
ngargya lastsatshog chen po sgra zhing nga' chos bzang po zhes smramed gyi mngon rtags gcig kyang mams te/ 'phrul gyi rgyal po 'ji'i rten dugashegs nas phan pa dang bdaba'i den chung pa la
mAdzad de/ bdag lta bu'i bran mo ngan ba yang bud med rin patshorab sgyur Do shas smras nas/ lus kyi yan lag lnga sa la gtugs te 'khrul gyi rgyal ba la phyag 'tshal to/ de nas/
rin po che'i gter la dbang ba'iblon pas/ rgyal po' ul chos dang khrims dang/ dag pa bcus kyi bya ba bka'abatags te bsgrugs go/ bud med ren nga cha dasadas//
babadu thosanas rab tu dga' sta/ 'di skad du 'phrul gyis rgyal po bstan pa'i don rnams la ma dbang med dozhes smras nas/ rgyal pal phyag 'tshal te/ ces pa 'gyod pas
sems skyes so// de ltar dul bar gyur nas/ sgragacan 'dzin la sogs pa rnams phyi'i dge slong brgya phragaphyed dnge btsugasum du sgyur ba/ rganams mthong nas 'di skad du sangs
rgyasakyichosarnam par dag pa ste/ sems can yongasasum gtong bsab dag lta bu'i nganapa yang bkrol dbatul to zhes smras nas/ khrims lnga 'dzanApar gsol to/ rnyed nas smra ba
'dzan gyis skyabs su 'gro ba gsum dang/ khrims ldabashadanas rganams thos pa dang/ phyog 'tshal ba lasamagom bteg par rgyun tuzhungs par 'bras bu thob par gyur/ nan+te
rnams kyangs nang nas byung// skyobasam du zas sbyin la nyan tu legasase// don par lta ba drug bcad do// de bzhin gshags pa 'jig rten du
gshags pa donan 'dalta bu 'o zhes smras so// de'itshosgra gcan 'dzan gyis gnam de dag khrod de rgyal bu tshe tanitshal du phyin pa dang/ dbazhin gshags pa'i sku
bya gser gyi kha dog ltabu mthong nas rab tu dga' ste/ thal mo sbyanas sangs rgyas la phyag 'tshal nas 'phel bas sa byas te/ rab tu'abyung bar gsol to// bcom ldan 'das kyis sgra
lagacan 'dzin la bka' stsal pa/ khyod kyisargan mo 'di khridel dag slong ma'aganas su rab tu phyungasha gces bka' stsal to// dgeslong ma'i beganasasum phyin kyi bar du sgra gcan 'dzan gyis
sdug bsngal dang/ stadong nyid dang ma rtag pa dang bdag med palasogasapa'achos rnams bshadanas bstanapa las rgan mos thos pa dang sku yang rang lhung ste/ dge sladamar gyuranas/
zla go gsumadangamangon par shes pa drug dang/ rnam par grol ba brgyad thob ste/ steng gi bar snangalatsho'aphrula rnam pa bco brgyad bstan to// rgyalapo gsal rgya ladang btsunamed ldan
mas de ltar gyur pa mthonganas rab tudaga' bsams skyes// legasasarab tu legasas// bcom ldan 'das sangs rgyas kyi nyee 'jig rten du shar pas ma rig pa'amun bzams cad 'das/
subs lanas ngan bar lta ba dag kyang yang dag pa 'a lam la bkod do zhes de skad smras te/ de bzhin gshegs pa la phyag 'tshal nas 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan
'di sngon sdig pa ci bgyisanas/ gsanganacing bran mo'i skyes shin tu dmanarar gyur pa lags/ bsed nams ci bsagasanas/ bcom ldan 'das dang 'jal ti ra pas
tshonazhenaslab ba zhan du dgra bcom pa thob par gyur ba lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyisargyal bal bka' stsalapa/ rtagapa nyonalalegs par mdel zung shis// dang de bzhineg shig/
rgyal ba chen po la sngon bskal pa grangs med pa 'das pa'aunarade po'i gtam gleng bar bya'o// sngon 'das pa'i dusanasangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rin chen gdugs gcig gamar me rgyal po nas
bya ba de bzhin gshegs bamtshanabadudang ldan pa 'jig rten du byung ste/ sangs rgyas de angosasumyang n las 'das nas/ gzugs kyi chos byed pa na 3 rgyal po nichen sna tshogs me tog red ces bya
ba zhes mdo dag ra zhes bya ba rab tu 'acungabangags nas/ rgyal pas rab tu 'byung bar gnang ste/ rgyal bu de rab du'abyung bar dgon pa'il dag slong gaganas su song nas rab tu 'khyudab ragol
tod 3de'i tshon dge slong 'degazhungs la shes rab dang dbang bogasal ba don zab mo maMtshan nyidi la mkhas pa zhig yod de/ de'i slob ma rab tu byung// gzhanas nga dge slong yon taname tog 'od/
ces bya ba chos ston nyidi chad pa la mkhas pa/ gsar slob rnams chos 'chad cing ston pa mkhas pa zhig kyang yod de/ de las bar chad 'driba'i mkhan pa byas te/ rgya la bu dge slong de
gnyis la rab tu byung med kyi nga rgyal gyis rnam par gzung bas/ slob dpon chen pas shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa stod chen po'i de shAn tu zab mo bshad palas/ chos lagapar bstan ces the tsom
zas par gyurato// de nas slob dponon bo de tsho'aphos nas rgyal bu dge slong de 'daskad du/ bdag gi slob dpanachenapa dpeshes rab dang ma ldan te/ stong pa don med pa bshig ston

gyis bdag gang nas gang du skye ba'aganas tham cad du mthong bar mi 'dod do// bdag gi bar chad 'dra ba 'amakhanapakhyodojigs rab dang spobang ldan te/ bdag ganganasagang du skye ba'i se gnas thams cad du dge

ba ni bshesagazhan du gyur cigaces spyasas// dge slong rgya 'bu des de skad du smras nas/ chosan tshosamayin par bashad/ tshos ma napa'atshosasungashad cing/ dge 'dunagyi 'khor la ston te/thams cad nabar
lta ba la btsud do// tshul khrims yongs su bsrungasate/ spyod lamam namasan yang lta bskor bas tshon posam thag tu mda' 'phangs pa bzhani dumanar med pa sems canadamyal brten par skyesas// bskal

ba 'phrog brgyad cu'i bar dusdug bsngalagyis gdungasanas/ de skathar te phyi mar skyes naang dbul zhing phongs pa dang/ rigs ngan par skyes te skyab lnga brgya bar du don pa dang gling zhugs dang lango bar gyur te/ skyab

stod nyes brgya'i bar du pha rol gyi khran ma gyur pa an no// bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsal pa na/ btsun mo phreng ldan m ri'akhor na khramalnga brgya zhig yod pa rnams kyis kyang nyes pa 'phel zhing
gshag te/ byang chub tu sems bskyedanas/ skyab khe nas rastod pa chen po shes rab kyi lo tunang don bzhes shing rtog par gyur cas smon lam btab bo// bcom ldan 'das kyi

rgyal pagasal rgyal la bka' stsal ba/ de'i tshad ni dus kyi slob dponochanapa drani da ltar gying nino// bar chad 'drab 'am 'chapadonazlogacan 'dzinaAnano// rgyal bu dge slong de na rgan ma 'ad yin no// ba danag

su gyur pa 'degaslong gi de khor rnams ni ngan par ltaba'abumo ldabargyabyang chub tu semasabaskyed pa 'dirnamasainano// bcomaldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsalangan/ mnyan du yodapa srid khyer gyi deb bstan
stong phragari shus byang chub tu sems bskyed de/ sangs rjes sudran pa'i ting nge 'dzin thobanas ting nge 'dzanatsa nanganasasangs rgyas kyi chos bstanab lung mthong ba dang thos par gyur to/
de nas btsonaldan 'das kyis rgyalaboab bka' stsal ba/ ngan par stab sdig pa nade dag kun gyis bcom ldan 'das gshegs pa mthong ba tsam gyis kyang tshad med pa bsadonams de lta bu thob par
gyuran/ sangs rgyasagashegs pa'am/ skugazugagashegasapa rjesasu dran par byedapa ltacaslas/ angargyal po yab kyis bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// sangs rgyas taM
bla@#// yum sgyu ma'alha masum cu rtsa gsum gnam du skyes pa la/ bcomaldan 'das 'od zer dang mtshan dang dpe khyad dang ldan pas yum la chos ston cingagashegasapa tshul ji lta bu r
gshegs/ bcom ldan 'das kyis rgyal po yab la bka' stsal pa/dobazhin gshegs pa ni 'khor los sgyur ba'agyel bobazhin du zhabs kyis 'dzam bu glangasasum banu rtsa gsum ga nam dug shig
yum sgyu ma la gsong por smras nas dmapa'i tshos skyonato// de'i tsho'akhe nang nabyang chub sems dang nasoms dpa'achen pos 'dzin zhesabyab 'dugapa las langs nasadapa' bar 'gro ba zhes bya ba'i

hang nge 'dzanil snyoms par zhugs// ting nge 'dzan de'i mthus rdo rje'i mtha' la thug pa nas/ rdo rje'i 'khor lo rtsa ba yang rdo rdzalas byas pa/me tog kyang rdo rdzalas grub pa'ame tog 'dab chags su 'dug

pa'adzam bu gling ga sa gzhi'i stod du byung ngo// de'atshoklurgyal po dga' bo dang bsnyen dga' bo dang/ madres pa la sogasapa'i mtsho mching rnams kyi klu'i skyel po rnams kyisas sa nasan pa tshosna bdun thogs/
byang rlabasems dpa'as 'dzanabangan bar 'ongs te phun pa dang/ nipa tshasna bdun bul te/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das sum cu rtsa gsum gnam du gshigs pa'arinapo che'i them skas gsum byas so// g.yon na

dngul las sa/ g.yas shel las byas/ dbusanagaseralas byas te 'dzam bu gling gi sa gzhi'i mtshams rdo rje'amatha'anas sum cu rtsa gsum gyi pho brang 'thug pa'ibaradu'o// nepa tsha'i them skas de re re yang mu lame

0 pa bdun bdun no// su ran de dag kyang nipatshornam pa khri phrag brgya las byas tre/ 'od zer yang khru zug brgya yod de// 'od zer de re re la yang ran po cha' me tog bu khre bsnyed yod do// me tog pad+meng le 2mang

rolamo'i cha byad tshad med pa snyed rang byung ngo// de'i tshe byang chub semasadapa'i sa 'dzin se gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed kyi ren pemasna bdun gyi ngos sangs rgyas gshegs pa'i skasalabad do// skasamug pas ban 3

pe tshe'i rgyal mtshan rnam pa sna tshogs bgrang nas nipatsho ba danatshadamed pa snyed dpyangs// shing tsha gdugs dang rgya re khri phrag sked na blorar bris so// sum curtsa gsum gnam gyi we rnams kyis ni/ tsa tag
man rab dang 1 mnar ba chen pa dang/ man dzu sha ka dang/ man dzu na ka chen dang/ ut+pal dang/ kusu dA la sogs pa char bzhin du phab nas/ sangs rgyasagshegs pa'askas labad de
rgyal don lag na bdug spos thogs nas/ tshangs pa' 'khor dang bcas te skas kyi g.yas g.yon nas bstod ro// bdug spos kyi dud pa dag be wAts+tsha'i sprin lta bu r gyur nas/ stengaganem mkha' la/ rang
kyispron du gyurd// sprin gyi nang nas rolamo'i sgra dbyangs brgya stong du ma snyed sgrogasas// klu'i rgyalapo dga' bo la sogs pas ni rgya mtsho 'gram gyi tsan dan la sogs pa'i spos sna tshogs
sangs rgyas la 'thor ro// sbos kyi 'od 'tsher ba ni gser gyi kha dog lta bu r gyur/ mtho khyad kyang srid pat+ti rtse mal gtugs tegaser gyi bad pa btsugs par gyur to// tshad med patat+taMlhan8
@#/ dkyis kyang rgyan dang lhabalhab kyis skasalabargyan te/ yo byadatshad med pa rnam pa mang po dag gis brgyan to// de'i bcom ldan 'das kyis 'dzam bu'i gling nas chos gos/ dus
bsams te/ dga' bo dang bsnyen dga' bo dang/ sgra gcan 'dzana'as gsapa dge slong ldabargya rnams kyang zhapas 'bradad 'dus pa na pa de/ bcom ldan/ ra Na ta sa na//
ban sa rnam pa drug tu gsas// zhadwa phab panas lasarin patsha' le brang tshangs pa'irgyal pa'i gzhal med khang lta bu byung nas ) gzhalamed khang 'dab chags su nam ma kA: lung ring ni/
ldan 'dasagashegs pa'i skyes kyig sag don brgyan to// byang chub sems dang las 'dzin dang phanan
phrag du mas de bzhin gags pat+taan tanatshad med pa la bstod do// de'i tshatshangs pa'argyal po 'khor dag pa brgya stong du mas ra sa na bdug spos thegasangashadare pam tshadamadang na sa
mchod cing g.yon rol nas 'greng ngo// brgyabyin lha dang nga ngor sogasapa lha'abu tshad med pa dang lha'i bu mo brgya stod [“] rnams kyis bya dang dung dang/ ro lo pA man+tad d+ha
rol nas 'grang ngo// nyan thos dang dgra bcom pa rnams dang byang chub sems dpa' rnams ni sangs rgyas kyi gsarol nas mched pa byed do// de'i tshabatsem ldan 'das kyis 'od dzam+b+han de btang na//

skas kyi mthar dang 'gramatshunargyad snang bar byas te/'od zur de ang sprin lta bu r gyur nas kha dog brgya stod du ma dang ldan n )'dapa btsugs pa mangs nga thog lta bu r gyur te// de'i nang na de bzhinagag
ba bzhugs shing 2lor angasprul pa'i sangs rgyas brgyad khri pen steng sud kyis bskor te/ de las dang sprul ngane sa sa skuchedasangs rgyas gzhan dang ma nang la brgya sAranachos gos dang lhung
bzedathog te/ spyod lam mdzes par gshegasas// sprul pa'i sangs rgyas de dag kyang so sanas 'khor dga' bo dang/ bsanadaga' bar bcas so// de'atshobadud sdig tonan ang stengaginamamakho'
las bdud kyi 'khor dang bcas te/ tshigs bcad pa du mas deba'anig bags pa'i yon tan stags shing bskyed do/ 'acu bun las[… '' ]sU mol smras pa da bzhinagashegapa
'jig rtenagyi mgonapon yum la drin gyi lan glan pa'i sked du gnas 'daregs sa zhes yum lags l pa/yum sgyums bcom ldan 'dasagashagasase zhesasanas lha'i bu mo rnamasalha'i rin po che dang/
lha ril mo dang/ lha'amitog mnarab dang/ u dumabar mi dogal sogs pabastar te/ mdun na bcom ldan ngawanasanAyA ba'agage lce de bzhin ga ga nga sa zhabs brtag pa dang bzhag pa'i
lam kun tu gzhal med khang grangasamed par gyur te// gzhalamed khangadegacigagananganayang sprulapa sangs rgyas lnga d+hagyi 33skyolamo krung bcas tobazhugs s/ (da don sa pa deraral nga
'khor byang chub sems dpa' ad lnga brgya skad yod do// de'i tshe skalas 'phros pa'asangs rgyas lnga brgya rnams dang/ sangs rgyas shAkya thug par bcas te/ sum du rtsa gsum gnam/
rgyagazhal med khang du gshegs pa na/ lha rnams rab tu dga' ste/ tshegasasubanud pa 'od skad skyas sa// sangs rgyasarnam pa ragags// bkra shis dam pa mchog/ 'od zer rab btang nas//
bganas 'diregshegs par gyur// bdagashegs gtsug tor can/ bkra shis dam pa'amchog/ grangs med sku sprul nas// gnas 'dir gshags par gyur// sa ngas rgyas thams cad skyob/
smani mtshams 'od bkyanas// kun du snangagyur te// gnas 'dir gshegs par gyur// bde gshags lag dad selaM// zhal nas 'od bkya ste// phyogs bcur snang byas nas// gnas 'dir gshegs
par gyur// sangs rgyasagaser thub kyang// grangs med sku sprul te// tshad med 'od bkyinas// gnas 'dir gshegs par gyur// bde gshags 'od srungs da// nachen khang btsugs nas/ mkha'
las tsho 'phrul ston// gnas3daregshegs ngar gyur// sangs rgyas shAkya mang ) dalnga brgya'i skur sprasata// sprul pa gangs med dang// 'od bkyi gnas 'dare gshags// byamasapa byang chub dang
bskal ba bzadapa'agatso// kun gyis 'od btang nas// gnas 'dir gshegs par gyur/ bkra shis dang la gyigenas// dog d+hAskyon 'dusam byas// btsun ldan gshegs pa'i// thub pa sku
ba'aganas// mya ngan 'da'akha' khyim// mkhas pa pha rol phyin// ces brjod de// de'i tshabcom ldan 'das sum cu rtsa gsum gnas gyi pho brang du gshegs nas smanematshams kyi mdzod spu dkar po las

'od zer ba dang nas/ 'od zer de nyid napa tshosna bdun gyi gdugs chen ngal gyur te/ lum sbyama'i steng du bla rer byesas/ 'tshan pa tshosna bdun gyi khro rab tu mdzes pa dag yum gyi gdan du gyuranas de
la yum bzhugs so/ yum rgyas sangs rgyas gsheg pa mthong nas/ thal mo sbyar durob tupatung nas phyatshal ba dang/ sprul pa'i sangs rgyas lha brgya rnams kyis kyang phyag brkyangs umal

bteg gdo'akher lta rnams kyis kyang yum las bzung ste/ phyag 'tshal du ma skor ro// sprul pa'i sangs rgyas 'ban steng snyed kyang gdon las bzhengasas// de'i tshe yum sgyu ma'alha mo'i pho brang gnang nas 'od
ze khra brag lnga brgyarnamasamangon par byung nas/ 'od zer de las rin po che'i khang pa brtsigs par gyur te/ med pa brtsigs pa de dag ra la'i steng na phyogs bcu'asad rgyus rnams bzhugasi nga/
se sanas mtshonanas brjod de/ sangs rgyas kyang yum la gsod par smra zhing spro ba bskyed do// 'dilta ste/ bshar phyogs kyi legs pa'i yon tan zhes byapa' de bzhinagashegs pas phuganarin pa che'i/
me togo bsnamasanas/ bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub pa dang/ umasgyu ma'i lha mo lagater te/gterapa 'ame tog rnams kyang steng gi nam mkha' la me tog gi gdug sugyurato// me togagi gdugs nang na/
sprul pa'i sangs rgyas khri phrag du ma thal mo sbyar dbazhengasanas/ sangs rgyas kyi yum sgyu ma lags dparagasudad// wa gsanatsan dan yon tanazhes byab/de bzhin gshegs
kyang phyagarinapo che'ipad+mobasnyams du/ bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub pa dang/ yum sgyu ma'i lha mo la gtor to// de yang steng gnam mkhar me tog gdugs su gyurato// gdugs kyi nang na sprul pa'i
sangs rgyas grangs med pa snyedi thal mo sbyar te bzhengs nas/ yum sgyu ma la gsong por gsung ngo/ nub phyogasan snang ba mtha' yas zhes bya ba de bzhin gshegs pas kyang phug pa tsipad+mo
bsnyams nas/ bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub pa dang/ yum sgyu ma'alha mo la gtor te// de yang steng ginamamakha' lami tag gagadu sugyurata/ gdugs kyi nang nas sprul pa sdod rgyu zla mched
bsnyed thal mo sbyar tibazhengs nas/ yum sgyu ma la gsang pordzogasung ngo// byang phyogs na legs pa mtshanazhesakhyab de bzhinagashegs pas kyang na po che'abarlobasams skad+ha : Na pa
zlathub pa dang/ um sgyu ma'alha ma la gdor to// dem nga steng gnam mkha' la me tog gdugasasu gyur to// gdugs de nanganas/ sbrul pasangs rgyas grangasamed pasnyadathal ma sbyar bkod na/

tshumasgyum lagasong por gsung ngo// sharalce phyogasanamya ngan dang bral ba zhes bya ba'i deba'anagashagasapa dang/ lho nub kyi phyogasamatshamasanarin chen gtong ba zhes ba'i dbazhadagags pa dang nub
byadag phyogs mtshams naon tan me tog ces bya ba'i de bzhinagashegs pa dang/ byang shar gyi phyogs mtshamasanatheg pa gsum spyod ces bya ba de bzhin gshegs pa dang/ bla ma'aphyogasan tshayon
tanazhes bya ba'i de bzhin gshegs pa dang/ 'og ma'aphyog na snang ba yin tan zhes bya ba'i de bzhin gshegs pa la sogs pa'i sangs rgyas de dag kun gyis kyang ses nas thugan nganipo che'ibadebasmaAte/
btsemaldan 'das shAkya thub pa dang/ yum sgyum lhamo la gtor to// gtor ba'ame tog dedag kyang steng gnemam bat+ta la sos nas me tog ga gdugs su gyurato// so so'i me togag ga gdugs kyanenganas
sprulapa'i sangs rgyas grangs med pasnyed thalamasbyar tabazhengs nas/ yum sgyu ma lagasod por gsung ngo// de'atshosum du rtsa gsum nam gyi pho brang nang na sprul pa'i sangs rgyas kyis yongasasu
gang bar gyur to// denas de'atshium sgyu ma'adebu3gtsuganas mchod pa'i yo byad/ gdugs dang rgyal mtshan dang ba dan la sogs pa grangs med pa rang byung nas/ sangs rgyas de dag kun lamatshodapachen
po byas so// gdugs dang rgyal mtshan dang don de dag gnanganasasangs rgyas la bstod pa dang dam pa chos bsngags pa dang/ dge slang gi dge 'dun bstan pa'i sgrudabyangs dag byung ba gyur to//
bcom ldan 'adas kyis dga'olabaka' stsal pa/ shud degan de bzhin gshegs pa 'dzamabu'aglinge nas sum paru tsu gsum gnam dugshegs pa'i sku gzugs dang/ mtshan dang dpe khyad 'od zer
dngasprul pa 'dedas pa na 'da rnams nano// de bzhinagashegs pa yongs su ma ngan las 'das nas sangs rgyas kyi dus nas su gyu ra pa 5 6 gA IpurA tsan da
yang dag par mthong ba'o// gang gis de lta ma yan par mthadab de ni gapar mthong ba'o// gangags da ltar rjes su dranapar byas nabaskal pa chen po khri phrag skyil ga lor ba'i 33 pa skyengs/
spong bar 'gyur zhing/ tshe'aphos pa'i dus byed pa na lang phyogs bcu'asangs rgyas rnams mthong ste/ gdan ma the bar yongs su dag pa sangs rgyas kyi zhing du sku par 'grwa/ ra ro/ btsem ldan/
'das kyi dga' pe labaka' stsal pa/ khyod kyis nga'i tshig 'dage zungs su zung laphya che ma 'ongs pa'i skye ba rnams la rgyas par sten cig/ shed cig/ tshig 'dab+basanas// don 'di sems pa de la
phyogs bcu'asangs rgyas rnams kyis dgongs shing skyob pa dang/ tshe 'phos nas kyang nges par sangs rgyas kyispyan sngar skye bar rig par bya'o// de nas s+sa[<w]ldan3 d+ha na[']
rgyal po yab la bka' stsal pa: de la ji ltaran dbazhin gshags pa sum cu rtsa gsum gnas nas 'dzam bu gling dugashegs pa nye 'od zer dang/ mtshan dang sprul pa bdang non/ 85da ra['',]
na lha'i bu gang med pa dang/ lha'i bu mo brgya stong mang po rnamasakyis bskyal te/ de'i tshabcom ldan 'das nyag cig 'od zlum pa 'dom gang ba dang/ gzhan yang dom in pa'i 'od zer steng gtang nas/
rin po cha'i them skas la zhabs kyis gshegs pa las/ sangs rgyas kyi 'od zer gyi nang nas sangs rgyas bdun bdun gshegs par lha'i bu dang bu mo rnams kyi kyaathong ngo// de'i tshe rgyal pa a'u then
bcom ldan 'das la rjes su dranazhing chagasabs/ gserabyasku gzugs shig byas te/ de la phyag 'tshalado// de nas bcom ldan 'das sum curtsa gsum gnam nas/ slar 'dzam
bu glange dugashegs zhes pa thos nas rab tu dga' ste/ gser gyi sku gzugs kyang glang gi steng du bzhag ste/ bcom ldan 'das kyi mdun nas bsus sa// de'atsho dge slong ma pad+mo'i mdog ces bya bas kyang
bam ri zhig sprul te/ ra de'i phug na skyil mo krung du 'dug nas yo byad tshad med pa mang po dang chas te/ ba ldan 'das kyi mdunanasabasubar chas sa// de'atshogaser las byas pa'i sku gzugs de yang
bklad las babs te/ sangs rgyas dang 'du bar nam mkha' la zhabs kyis bgshegs te/ zhabs kyi mthalagu de kher las me tog char bzhin du yang rung nod ther btang nas bcom ldan 'das mdun
sa bsus so// denas bam ldan 'das de nyid du gshigs ba dang/ gser gyi sku gzug des thal mo sbyar tebcom ldan 'adas la phyag 'tshal la/de'atshobcom ldan 'das kyis kyang sku gzugs kyi phyog/
sutha' ma sbyaranas dbu btud do// de'i tshonam ma kha'o 'a sa sbrul pa'i sangs rgyas stong snyid kyis kyang sku gzugs ga la b.logs su thal mo sbyar nas/ pus mo btsugasaso// de'i tshabcom ldan 'das
[n, ]@#// kyis kyang sku gzugs de la bka' stsal pa// khyod phyema'i dus nasangs rgyas kyi mdzad pa chenang mdzad par 'gyuraro// nga yongasasu mya ngan las 'das nas:nas snyapas+sa
rnams khyed lagatamasaso// nam mkha' labazhugs pa'i sprul pasangs rgyas rnams kyis kyang gasung 'thunaparade skad du gsungs// sams rin gang 'asang bor 3sags pa song
