sum ngan las 'das nas/ sangs rgyas kyi sku gzugs byas/ ma tog dang gdugs dang rgyal mtshanadang ba dan dang/ spyis la na gan pa 'tsher mA 9 pa na ma
sangs rgyasarjes su dran pa'i rnam par dag pa 'dode nga 'dzani thob par 'gyur// sems canagang dag sangs rgyas gshagu nga mtshan dang dpe byad badzad pa rnams pad lan 6
rgyas mang po rnams mthong bar 'gyur ro// bcom ldan 'das kyis dga' bo la bka' stsal pa/ sangs rgyas yongs su myong nas ngus nas sangs rgyu[… - ]sa/
bcom ldan 'das sum cu rtsa gsum gnam du gshegs pat+ta 'od zer dang mtshan dang dpe byadadangargyus shes pa nyam/ sangs rgyas kyi sku gzugasamathong ba dag bskal pa chenapasteng skyi rmaye
lcab kun byang bar 'gyuraro// gang gis de lta bu r mthong bden yang dag par mthong ba'o// gang gis de lta ma son pa mthong ba de log par mthong ba'o// sa ngasargyasardzusu dranapa3dngang 'dzin gyi
rgyaatshozhes bya ba'i mdo/// bam po bdun pa// bcom ldan 'das kyis dga' bo la bka' stsal pa// de la ji ltar na de bzhin gshegs pa 'breg dgen pa'i ma deg kyashe ba

ba chen pabatul zhe na/ngas mnyan du yodapa' rgyal bu r-ita' myil gyi gzhal med khang nas gser gyi kha dog lta bu 'a'od zer ba dang sa/ mnyan du yod pa'i grong khyer gser gyi kha dog lta bu r snang bar gyur to//
mu lamanyan du yod pa khyim bdaganor dpal zhes bya ba zhig yod de// khyim bdag de la bu lagasum lon pa zhig yod pa las khyimabadag gi bu de la skyabasasu'agrong ba sum bstan do// 'o tsha'abrogadan

pa' yi dgas kyi bdag po bkres skom pas gdunganas/ mnyanadu yod pa'agrong khyer du sengonas/ byis pa chung du de bzung ngo// de'atsho bam bdag gabus sangs rgyas la phyag 'tshal lo zhes smras s// daskad
ces brjod pas yi dgas kyi bar/ pa kha 'thams nas zan ma nus te dmaganas me phyung ste khye'u de labasagasas// adegakyilus m sdug pani/ngeka na ngo gsum yod pa ltabanangogasedapa/dus

mo gnyisanaang do raramed ba lus ba glang mge lta bu la mche bgyen du bgrang ba dmiganas me rab tu yapade la khye'u des mthong nas/ khye'u de skag ste/ sangs rgyas la phyag 'tshal lo// chos la phyag tsho la
lo// dga' dun la phyag 'tshal lo// zhesaskyasas// de'atshobcom ldan 'das kyi 'phrul gyi snyan gyis khye'u des smras pa/ rgyang m nasagasananas/ zhabs 'breng du dga' bo dga' dede/ nam mkha' la gem pas
gshegasas// dga' zhabs 'bring du mchis pa phyi'i lus te/ ma slebs nas bcom ldan redas kyisoran pe'i pad+mosprul te/ pad+mo'i 'od zer gyis dga' bo bsus te/ dga' bo

padal 'dug par byan gyis brlabs so// de'atshe dga' bo 'dzam bu glangeg nang na sprul pa'i sangs rgyas kyis yongs su gang bar mthong ste/ sprel pa 'asangs rgyas de re re'isku'i tshod kyang stong gsum gyi
stong chen po 'jig rten khams dang mnyam pa'i sprul pa'asangs rgyas dus kun kyang theg pa gsum 'chad cing byang chub sems dang 'a rnams la sangs das rjes su dran nyen ti na paro pa

gyis shig sa ston par mthobazhang thos so// dga' bos de lta bu dgamathong zhing thos nas/ sngon 'das pa'asangs rgyasakhri phrag dgu bdunams kyi tshesakyi sde snod kun dran par gyur taM// da'atshabarte
ldan 'das kyis 'brog dgon par gshags nas/ smanematshams kyi mdzod spu dkarapa'a'adab btang nas/ 'od zer des khye'u chud du skrag cing dngangs pa de lus reg par sa5// khye'u des
'od zerade mthong ba dang/ pha ma mthong ba dang 'dra bar 'jigs pa'am/ bag tsha ba'asemasamed do// det+tatsho'abrog dgon nga 'a sa dogs kyi bdagadas 5beng[R, ]nangol dkaTha da na mthe brgya
1pa cig blangasate/ bcom ldan 'das lagazasanas/ ma de nas me dang glog byung ste/ 'brug gi sgra lta bu bsgrigasanas ser ba che khyad bya nam malad+d+ha sa/sgo da ra
pa'i steng gi nam mkha' las btegage/ sangs rgyas kyi skalam reg bar sprul pa sangs rgyas su gyur te sprulapa sangs rgyas de dag nas me dbal zhes bya ba'o dang nga 'dzin la bzhus
so// me dbal gyis 'brog dgon pa'as gnas kun rab tu 'bar ma byas kyang oM degs kyabadag po ma skagaste/ nam mkha3las phapeng 'phangasas// pha bongad yang ran po 'khang pa brtsigs par
gyur te/ khang ba brtsegasapa de las sangs rgyas khri phrag du ma gsung 'thunapar byams pasems dang ldan pa bsngags shangebastodapa 'chad kyang/ adegs kyabadag pa ma thul do// de'i tshe de nyid du
lanardo rje do rdzogasar zhing ral gri phyar nas ) khro gnyorab skum mganalog ltar bar/ ag rtsom ngamatshon ltar sno// rdo rje yi dgas kyi bdag po lagazas pa dang/ gnam sa kun tu dar ces grag

pa'i skad chen po phyung bas a de gas de skraganasakhye'u chung ngu de pang du blangs te/ bcom ldan rtadas gang na ba de lags su pus mo btsugasanas/ sangs rgyas la phyag 'tshal te dgongs shig/ bcom ldan

'das thugs brtso ba'i slad du bdagag srog gi skyabs mdzod cig ces gsol to// de'atsho lagadugardo rje'ardo rje de nyid lcags kyi re chen po ngos bzhi nas me 'bar ba'ir mang bdun gyis bskor bar sprul to//
yi dgas kyi bdag po de mes rab tu gdungs pa lasapang na khye'u 'dug pa des lagapa bteg ste/ a rigs kya bdag polasmras pa/sangs rgyas la phyag 'tshalal zhesags shage/ khobasaMkyang
sangs rgyas zhes brjod pas 'chib las sos par gyur gyis/ khyed kyad sangs rgyas la phyag 'tshal lo zhes gse shage ces brjod de// de'i tshe a degs kyabadag po 'jigs skrag/
nas mtsho bar sangs rgyas la phyag maMl lo zhes smras te/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsel to// dag sbyang go'u ta ma bdag gi srog gi skyabs mdzad du gsol lo mas brjod do// de'i tshe
bcom ldan 'das kyisatshangs pa'i gsung dbyangs kye pha mas bu la sgrub lha mi degs kyi bdag po'isprob bskyed do/ lagan rdo rjes a rtegs kyi bdag la smras pa/ khyod dang myur du sangs rgyas
dang chos dang/ dge 'dunal skyabasasu sangashig/ khyodagal da skabs su mi 'gron khyodadang khyod kyi 'bor khriphrag brgya stong dubacas tu rdulabazhinaduphye mar smug go/ de nas
'brogaduganapa' o dgas kyi bdag pa 'jigashing skraganas yan lag lngas la gdugs te/ sangs rgyas la phyag 'tshal nas/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcomaldan 'das
ba dgagu thasasu mag 'tshalan/ da srog ma kuman tsazhige'atshal bar gyi/ bcom ldan 'das kyis ma dgas bdagapa 'baka' stsal pa/ khyadasrog ma gcod par nusan/ nga'i nyeganas rnams
chosamed par m gyur gyi bar du khyod kyazesasbyin du gzhug go/ pa'ibyin gyis brlabakyis khyod 'grangs par yang bya'o// yodags bdag pas de skad cesabaka' stsal pa thos nas rab tudaga' ste/
thal mo sbyar nas de de bzhin gshegs pa las khrims lta mnosas// khrims ldaanasanas/ me'ar rnams 'dab chags su sprul pa'i sangs rgyas kyis 'brog dgon par yongs su gang zhing/ sprul pa'i/
sangs rgyas gcid/ zhabs 'bring dgabor ra med par mthong de// sprul pasangs rgyas de dag sosanas gsung 'thun parokhrims la 'chad par thosas// 'brog dgenang 'a degs kyi bdag pas

lag 'dodzal 'di skad ces gsol te// bdag yon tan can khyod kyi phyi bdud rtsi dang 'dra ba tha na med pa'i chos kyi ri myongob gyur to// de'atsholag na rdodzos rdo rje denamamakha' dbyings su bor ba dang/ de bzhin
gshegs pa'i gyis brlabs kyis rdodzade gser gyi ri rab lhun pobargya phrag du mgyur to// ri rab lhun po gcig la ang brag phug 'di ga dum snyadayodog brag phug dera'i nanganaang sprul pa'i sangs
rgyas khri phrag du ma 'chag cing gshegasas// sprul pasangs rgyas de dgazhabasa'adegasama'ajog pa na zhabs kyi 'og na nipo tshasna bdun gyi khang pa brdzogs pa rang byung ngo// khang pa brtsigs
pa de dag re re'i stenganasprul pa'i sangs rgyas gang+gA'i klong gi bye ma snyed skyale mo krung bcasanas bzhugs pa mthongango// bcom ldan 'das kyis rgyalabotshanApo la bka' stsal pa/ de bzhin gshegs
payongasasumya ngan las 'das nas/ sangs rgyasaM kyi nyi gnas su gyur pa rnams de bzhin gsapas 'breg dgon pa'i yadegasajaltarab tulabato deb dngardzu 'phrul shes par 'dod pa dag/
la rta/ @#// de la de ltar bltabar bya'o// gang gses de lta bu r mthong ba de ni med dag par mathong ba'o// gang gis de lta ma yin par mthong ba don leg par mthong ba'o// de bzhin gshegs/
ma pa yongs su mya ngan las 'das nas/ sems can gang tshos 'dasems pa 'am) chos 'dirjes su dranabar byed pa'am/ de ltar 'du shes yodil byed pa na bskal pa khri phrag brgyad cu snyed kyi
'khor ba'i nyes pa yongs su spyod bar gyur zhing/ ba/nganas gang du skyes kyang sa degs kyi lus sum 'gyur te rtag tu sangs rgyas dang 'bral zhinge phradapar 'gyur ro ste sangs rgyasam bzhugs pa'i
dus su skyes na yang/ rang sangs rgyas dang phrad par 'gyuraro// gal ten ngasangs rgyasamadan yod drang srong chen pa dang phrad de/ yang dag pa'i lam sten par 'gyur ro// bcom ldan
'das kyis dga' bo la bka' stsal pa/ khyod rjes su dranapar bya ba'i spyod yul 'di zungs su zung la/ phyi ma ma 'ongs partadusakyi sems can rnams la rgyas par ston cing/ shig
jug 'di ni sangs rgyas kyi mngonapar shes pa'i spyod yul zhes bya// dngos 'di las lab na sangs rgyas la skur pa dang/ byang chub kyisaban bcad pa zhes bya'o// gang ches 'du 'dzan pa la
degs dang ba/don gyis ma tshugs te/ sangs rgyas thams cad kyis dgongs shang skyobabar 'gyur ro// bcom ldan 'das kyis dga' bo la bka' sats+tsal pa/ de la ja lta na de bzhinagashegs pa

[d, ]tshulanag ha la zhes bya ban/drang srong snyadebag ri gtsam pa ka' tshelaklugadug pa can gyi rdzong ga 'gram/bad+mosdonapa'i chemag ga byed phyogs kyi ri anasazhes bya ba lho phyogasanasAnipa'ikhrig
phug yod do// de'atshobragayug de nasrim lta zhib klu'abumar sprul te/ klu gdug pa canadang 'khrig nas/ klu'i gdug pasanas rab phab/ srinamesanamasamtshanang spyod do// muge dang nad yam
byung nas lo bzhi'ibar dum chad do// detItshayul de'i rgyal bo du 'jigs shing skraganas/ bdagags lha la mchod pa byas kyang phanaparamagyur to// yul gyi sngags mkhan gyis klu gdug pa can la sngags
byas kyang san mo'i mthu tshabs sngagasakyisam tshugasas// de rgyal po de 'di snyam du lha 'am ma zhig gis srin mo 'di yang bskyad la/ klugadugapa can 'di yang btulan/ bdag galus m ngan pa
gzhan du yang ma thangasas snyam bsams so// de'i tshe yul den kun tu rgyu ba sher rab zhung chad du shes pa dang ldan pa zhage gas rgyal po la 'ad skyed ces gsol to// ulaser skya zhes bgyi ba nargyal
po zasagatsang ma'i srasashig thog ma bltams pa na/ lha thams cad kyis bsrungs te nangon sna bdun dang ldan nas/ drangasrangamtshanamakhan mi dkar bas bltasan/ 'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal par

'gyur// glangebazhi debang bar 'gyur ro// dil ma la la dga' zhing mos par 'gyun angamangon par 'tshang rgya'ongs lung bstan to// daltaramangonaparasangs rgyasanas shAkya thub pa zhes bgyi ba/ sku'i tshod/
[# ]@#// namathe banu drug la mtshanasum bcu rtsa gnyis dang/ dang khyadabazang po brgyad cur ldan zhing/ zhabs nipad+mal 'dor zhinge gshags pa/ mgur dang sku kun nas stod nyi ma lta bu ragasal
ma zhingamadzos te/ gser gyi ri dang 'dra ba zhig bzhugs s zhes gsol te// rgyal pos de skad ces smras pa thos nas rab tu dga' ba'asems skyes te/ bcom ldan 'das bzhugs pa'i sa phyogs suphyag/
'tshalanas skyabasasu ga gsal to// gal te kun turgyu 'dis smras pa bden te/ shAkya thub pa zhes bya ba'i de bzhin gshags pa 'jig rten du gshegs pa lta srade dam/ bdag cag gi gtsug lagabashad
pa las kyang bskal pa dgu 'dasanasagadod sangs rgyas shAkya thub pa zhes khyab zhig 'jig rten du 'khyud ngozhan/cid ltar sangs rgyas 'jig rtenan jisrid bzhugs sam/ rtsisteng zhugs na'i slad du yul

'di'i phyogs su thugs brtse ba'i gnas su ma gyur snyam mo// de'i tshe steng gnem mkha' las 'di skad du rigs kyi bu the tshom ma byed cig/ sangs rgyas shAkya thub pa shin du brtun pa'abartson 'grus kyis
bskal pa dgu las 'das so zhes smra ba'asgragragasas// sgrub tshig tho nas bu mo sa la btsugs te/ bdug spos bsregs shing thal mo sbyar nas bsngags shing bstod dad 'daskad du bcom ldan
'dasamangon par mkhyenapa dang ldan pa bdag gis sems pa 'di mkhyenan/ byams pa dang thugs rjes yul 'dir gshegs par smon to// de'i tshe spos kyi dud pas sangs rgyas bzhugs pa'i gzhal
med khang du phyin//ba mdakar po 'a sprin du gyur nas/ de bzhanegashegs pa la lan bdunubaskor te/ gser gyi gdugs su gyur te// gdug kyi dril bu lus 'di skad kyi sgra snyan pas/ sangs rgyas
spyan 'dren pa dang/ dge slong gi dge 'dun yang gshags par gsal ba'i sgra skad byung bar gyur to/de yod bzhin gshegs khrims cad mkhyenaba'i yo shes kyis gzigasanas/ dag slad gdeg
'duna rnams las mngonapar shApa drugapa thob pa dag zhabs 'bring du chos shig nag hAla'irgyal pa phurapa phud de 'bod pa'i yul der 'dang zhes bka' stsal nas 'od bsrungs chen po'akhelnga
brgya dang bcas te dab zlum+madir sprulanas/ru de la 'bab chu dang chu mig dang/ khrus kyi rdzongabu dang) rin pachasna bdun shing dang/ shang ga'og nagasaragyikhri'itsugs pa la dngul gyi nyid ba

'od las phug dugyur pa'i zhing na/ 'od srung chen pa de nartag tumi nyal bar 'dugago/ slob ma rnams kyang sbyang sapa'i yon tanabacu gnyis la gnas so// ridisprin mgyogs pa 'am/rlung drug pa ltar drang

srong snyingeg ri la phyin par gyur te/ mo'u 'gal na po yang 'khor lnga brgya dang bcas ste/ klu 'khyil pa brgya stong sprul nas/ de la 'dug cing klu'i kha nas me phyung ste/ gser gyi bang po btsugs pa dang/

ne pomasnabadun gyi khro deng/ rinapo che'i bla re dang/ gdugs dang/ rgyalamtshanadang ) ba dan tshod med par sprul ba'i nonganama'u 'gal ya na zlum 'o mo lta bu r phyi nang gsal ba 'dug pa dag drang srong
sAnge gi rel lhagaso// shAri'i bu yang mngon par shes pa'i mthus gangs kyi re lta bu 'adeshal gyi re sgul te/ shel gyi phug gnangan dag tshul kun til sogs pa lnga dge tshulawA
brgyadang/ ni po cha sna bdun gyi lug tu bcas/ gangs lta bu rel gyi res bskor nas/ shAri bu thol gyi dkarapo 'phug ginung nasagaser gyimi lta bu r sprul te/ gser gyi kha dog gi 'od btang nas

'od rnam pa sna tshogasakyis thams cad zilakyis nan te/ chos kyi sgrachenang yongasas sgrog cing dge tshul rnams nyan bzhin du yul der lhagasas/ dkar+ya a nachen po yang 'khor dge slong lnga brgya dang/
partogaser gyi khangab btsugs pa lta bu mang pa dag sprul te/ dge slong rnams de la 'dug gnas lus kyi smadanas 'od zeratshulta bu byung te/ chumag lta bu'i 'od zer papo bar kun n 'bab kyangs lam zag

go/ steng nas kyang yang gser gyi bla bris te/ dge slong rnams de'i nang na 'dug ste/ ul der lhagasaso// de ltaradagrab so ba chen po brgya phrag phyedang bcu gsuma rnams kyang so sonas 'khor dag slong
lnga brgya dang bcas te/ mngon par shes pa yang hUbudang mo'agalaa nadang 'dAb byas nas steng gnam mkha' las 'phagasanas ) ngangapa'argyal bo ldangs pa bzhin du yul der lhagasas//
de'atshobaldan 'dasasogs bsnabasalhung bzed bsnamasanas/ chos gos bting ba yang dag 'bol gtubaskurato/ bcom ldan 'dasanamamakha'al gatshabasagashegasas// bcom ldan
xxx
bdun bskor te phyag 'tshal nasazhangs 'khring du chasas// de'i tshabamaldan 'das kyisamaguranas gser gyi kha dog lta bu'i 'od zer btang nas/ 'od zeradi las sprul pa'isangs rgyas khri/
phrag brgya stod smral to// sprul pa'i sangs rgyas de dag kyang so so nas de bzhin du mgur gyi 'od thabatang// dbazhind sprulapa'i sangs rgyas khri phrag brgya stangasprul to/ sprul pa'i sangs rgyas
kyis 'dab chagasosunam mkha'i khams yongs su bkang ste/ ngang pa'i rgyal pa ldadis pa bzhin du yul der gshegs so/ ul der gshegasanas ) rgyalapos sangs rgyas bsus te/
sangs rgyas la phyag 'tshal lo/ de'i klu'i rgyal bo bcomaldan 'dus 'khor dang bcas te gshags pa mthong nas[）]klu chen bcu drug gsanam mkha' la sprane chenapo bskyed nas 'brug sgra chen/
po bsgrugasate/ seb phabab// miganas kyang glog dngam 'byin cung/ khams kyan phyung ste/ staram dang/ lus kyang spu'akhudabu kun nas dud pa 'thul zhe che rab tu 'bar ro// sngon mo lnga yang mi
sdug pa'i gzugs bstanamag glog dang 'dra bar 'barab zhin du de bzhazhigashegs pa'i spyan sngara'agreng go/ de'i tshe klu 'a bu zhig be si bltas nas) steng gnam mkha' la sprul pa'i sangs rgyas chos
@#// sugang b.ramad do// phatshal 'di skad ces smras s// 'daltaram dang gdug pas/ sangs rgyas gcig la gnod par bya ba chasan/ da ltar bar snang la sangs rgyas grangs
med pa zhig bzhugs nazhes smras s// denas klu gdug pa canagadug pa'aemasalhag par yang skyes te bu la skyo babyas nas/ daltar sangs rgyas gcig las med namang ga la
tshadatsasasmras so// de'i tshobcom ldan 'das kyis lag na rdo sa rdo rje thogs pa grangasamed pa'i lus sprul nas/ rdo dzam lame mgal bskor ba bzhin dume 'bar te/ me'i 'khor lo 'dab chags
susbyongaginam mkha' las babs nas me rab tu 'barab lcagasakhu dang 'dra bas klu ma rung pa'i lus bsagos// klu rgyal po da 'jagegs shing skragate/ 'bras bungamed nas sangs rgyas kyi grub
ma'i nang du zhugs s// sangs rgyasakyi grobs rab tubasal bas thal dngar bya ches phog pa bzhin du ) klu'atsheb zhi bar gyur nas nam mkha' laltosan steng bar snang la sangs rgyas kyis yongs
sugangab mthong ngo// sprul pa'asangs rgyas de dag kyang sanas 'od zer grangasamed pa stong ste/ 'dagacig gi nanganaang sprul pasangs rgyas tshad med pa dag bzhugs s// sprul pa sangs rgyas

de dag spyodaso sanas/ 'od grangs med pa brgya stong snyed gted ngo// 'od dgag meng na ang lag na rdo rjes rdordzagasar bas yongasasu gang bar mthong ngo// ku rnams kyis sangs rgyasamathong nas rab tu dga'/
ba' sems skyesas// lag na rdo rje thenganas rab tu 'jigs shing skrag ste/ thal mo sbyar nas blta steng dubacas te/ sangs rgyas la phyag 'tshal te// sraongayang de bzhin gshags pa la phyag 'tshal

de/ da'atshalha'i bu rnams kyis me tog mnar ba dang man+dar bachenapo dang) man 'dzugaka dang/ mda'adzuka chenapocharab zhin du phab ste/ mchod pa byas nas lha'i rjeang dang rdung zhang/ lha rnams tham sbyar/

nas steng gnamamakha' la snod do// de'i tshe rgyal po da 'khor lnga stong dngabacas te/ bdug spos snatshogs bsreg nas spyabasasangs rgyas kyi zhabs la phyag 'tshalatagadan la bzhugs bar gsol to// de'i

tsheklu'i rgyal pos kyang rgyamatsho'i nang nas rinapo chesnabadunagyi khri byung ste/ sangs rgyas la lag gis datu/ bulanas kyang 'daskyidaces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das bdag gamagon dang skyabs mdzad cing
lag na rdo rje'adi deb kha lus la mgabamadzadangar caganang nagasolate// da'atshadabazhin gshags pas changs pa'idabyangs kyisams bu lasmras bzhin du klu'i rgyalapo la slobabaskyed do// klu rgyal
po dang srinam yang chos kyi rgyal po btul to// de'atshorgyal pos khrimathonapebatsugs te gdan rab tu 'jam pa btAnge nas ras dkar po elabasabaskor cing/ mu tagagiT bsaT par bresanas/ bcom ldan
'dasagadanadel bzhugs par gasol to// de'i tshobatsasoldan 'dasabasab dag nas gshegasapan/ ri dgas kyi rgyalapo'abyopa lta bu'i zhabs kyibyin pa las/ 'od kha dogornamapa ljadang ldan pa byung ste//
[/ ]@#// sangs rgyas la lan bdun bskur nas/ lha me tog dam pa'i bla rer gyur te/ me tog gi 'dab ma'abar na sprul pa'i byang chub sems dpa' grangs med pa snyed thal mo sbyar te/
dbyangs du mas tshags su bcad nas skad do// steng gnam mkha' la sprul pa'isangs rgyas bzhugs pa'i rnams kyi zhabs kyi byin pa las 'dabakyang angasngamabazhaneno// klu phra mo bcu drug laganar ding
pha bong dang/ gnam lcags thagos te/ sangs rgyas kyi spyan sngaralhagasanas/ 'khor mngapas 'jigs skrags ste/ sangs rgyas kyi 'od kyi nang du zhugs so// de'atshobacon ldan 'das kyis gser btso ma

lta bu'i phyag brkyang nas/ phyagasar 'brel ba'i dra ba'abar na rin po chachen pe'aping+kachar bzhin du phab ste/ 'khor mang po rnams kyis na sprul pa'i sangs rgyasasu mthongang// klu rnams kyis na nam mkha' lding/
gargyal bos 'chag cange za ba lta bu r mthong ste/ klu rnams namamakha' lding gis 'jigs skraganas sangs rgyas kyi gribaa3phag de zhugs/ sangs rgyas la phyag 'tshal nas srog skyabs mdzad du gsol
zhes smras so// bcom ldan 'das yul ba dang/ nyi bar gshegs nas dga' lagadadeb bde'i cabaka' stsal to// dga' bos ol ba zheng dusad// lag pa g.yas pa bteg nas phrug nga yon

nas gtang ba blangs pa'i tshe/ gdange ba las gsar gyi khang pa brtsigs pa rin po che sna bdun gyis spras pa/ khri phrag ldabargyar gyur to// gtang ba'atshogasar gyi bed+mo la ni pa tshosna bdun gyis brgyan pa'i khre

phrag lnga brgyar gyur to// gabs la brkyang ba'atshogrugacig la yang rinapatshostabadunagyi pad+mo khri phrag lnga brgyar gyurataM ) paNes tadang rgyas na su yal ba dang gang bar gyur to// de nas bcom ldan sa
rin po chesna bdun gyi khri la skyol mo krung bcas nas bzhugs// pad+mo rnams kyi steng naang sadasargyas dang zhugs par gyur to// dge slong rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das bzhugs par mthong nas/sangs/

rgyas la phyag 'tshal te/ lan bdun bskor nas/ so so nasagadadeb bting nas 'dug go/ dge slong rnams gding ba na btange ba thams cad po rdzum+ma'i stanatu gyurato// dge slongornamasab rtum+maka stan la 'dug/
nas nga rtud+ma' stan las 'od byung ste dang rtul brag phug tu gyur to// dag slong rnams me'a'od kyi teng nge 'dzan la snyams par zhugs pas/ dge slong dag gi lus gser gyi kha dog lta bu r gyur to//
de'atsho rgyal pas des sangs rgyas kyaphyinagyis brlabasadang/ cho 'phrul de lta bu dag mthong nas/ ngomatshar rmad kyi dga' baskyas te thal mo sbyar nas ) de bzhin gsheg pa la lan bdun
bskorab byas te 1 phyag 'tshal nas/ sangs rgyas kyi cho'aphrul mang po mthong nas/ bla named pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tusems bskyed do// gzhan la nga 'baramang po rnams
kyang byang chub tu sems bskyed du bcug go de'itso klu'i rgyal/// mdo 'di sngon rgyalas gyur ba'i 'jugamadzog ba sgyur 'phro lus par snang ste mkhas pas leg bgathag 'tshal//
rgyagar skad du/ Arlung mAt+mad+harmab dzi lanAm hAyAn sU trabod skad du/ 'phags pa don dam pa'achos kyirnam par rgyal ba zhes bya ba theg pa chen pa'i med/
sangs rgyas dang byang bsems dpa' thams cad laphyag 'tshal lo// 'di skadabadag gis thos pa'adus gcig na/ bcom ldan 'dasamangonapar rdzogs pasangs rgyasanas/ rangaporam lenapag yati'i la

dag slongasangon par zhugs ramangon par zhugs pa rnams dang/ byang chub sems dpa' bye ba phrag dgu bcu tshu dgu dang thabs cig tubazhugs ste/ lhabye ba phrag nyi shu rtsa brgyadadang/ dge slong dang/ dge slongam

dang dge bsnyenam brgyad khri drug stong dang/ rgyad drug khri deng/ gcer bum sgrub phrag bcuganyis dang/ drang srong chen po mngon par shes pa lda dang ldan pa/ gdung ba lngas an lab na chog pa lnga brgya/ an
lag dkarab/ sha med cingerus mgo pags kyis yogapa/ ltazhar zhing skya'i khurakher ba lus dgupa/ gaangagazhadeshangeshumakhyen ba/ 'gan rilab thogs pa brgyadakhraben stong dang yang thabs cig
go rgol bar 'dun rnams dang yang thabs cig go/ denas bcom ldan 'das nag bo rnams kyi nangan/ ri rgyalapo rib ltar drang srong rnams kyi nangan/ lham me/ lhan n lhang nge/

lug rnams kyi neng na/ glang po che'i rgyal po mchab drug pa 'dral/ tsanebumakhyer gyi drungan/ na zla dang mtshungasashing/ tsAkasha'amitogab ning naman+da ra ba'i yo lag dang 'dra la/ nam mkha' lding gi rgyal
0// po byaregags bskorab dang 'drab r bcom ldan 'das drang srong rnams kyi nangan nyis 'gyur du mdzas so// de nas ba ldan 'das rin po chagateng ba zhes bya bar ted nge 'dzin la snyas 8 dar nga
rdzu 'phrul gyi cho 'phrul dpag tu med par madzad cing/ glog mas g.yon gnyis nas 'od zer phyung ste/ de bzhinagshegs pa bye ba dpag tumed pa phyung byang chub sems dpa' bye ba dpag tu ma
pa dang/ brgya byin dang tshangs pa dang/ 'jig rten skyongabadapag tu med pa byung/ dgra bcom pa brgya stod dpagatumadapaphyung/ dge slongadang/ dge slong ma dang/ dge bsnyen dang/ dge bsnyen ma
steng dpag tu medang phyung/ 'khor los sgyur ba dang/ stobs kyis 'khor las sgyur ba dang/ khams kyi rgyal bo dang/ rig sngags 'chang dpag du med pa phyung/ rgyu dngar brags pa dang/ 'grelding pa
lhopa phyogs dang/ rdugasakhrod pa dpag tu med pa byung/ rgyal rigs shing sI lachen po lta bu dang/ bram ze dang/ khyim bdagashing sA la chen po lta bu dang/ mgazugs dang/ mdog dang sgrub
skad sna tshogs pa dza snyed pa dang/ ltarisaji snyed pa de dag thams cad de bzhinagashegs pa'i sku las phyung ngo// de nas 'khor chen po da btson du gyur nas/ phanatshun gdong du
lta'o// byang chub sems dpa' rnams rab tu dgaM' ste/ ni po che'i char 'bebs panas/ rgyan thamasacad kyi bar gyi char 'bebasas// de nas bcom ldan 'das rin po chagatong ba'i ting nge 'dzin
[f ]@#// las bzhengs te/ seng gabaskyangs bas phyogs bar rnam b.ragazigs so// bcom ldan 'das kyis phyogs bcur gzagis ma thag tu/ de nas phyogs
bcu'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing dag nas/ sangs rgyas bcomaldan 'das dzisnyad sangs rgyas kyi spyan la sbyang ba de dag thams cad lag mthal dubazhagapa bzhani du/ mamadzad kyi 'jig rten gyi khams su
kun tu snangago/ de bzhinagashegasab thams cad kyas kyang bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub pas ji ltar byung ba de 'dra ba'i 'phrul gyi tshogs yul phyung ste/ de bzhin gas pa rnams kyis sprul pa byung ba'i
snyad pa de dag thams cad kyang/ bcom ldan 'das ga la ba de logs su song stanyin nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi'akhor nang du 'dusupar gyur to// byang chub semasadapa 'dapag tumedapo dag kyang dge
slong dang/ dge slong ma dang/ dgabastanadang/ dge bsnyen ma gang+gA'abyam snyed dag dang lhanAtsasi tudabazhin gshegs pa la mchod pa chenApo dpe mdapa thogs te 'direlhagasaso// de bzhin du lha dang/
pal klu dang/ gnod sbyin dang/ drib dang/ lham yinadang/ namamakha' lding dang/ mi'i dang/ lta'aphyin pa dang/ mi dang mi ma yin pa du ma dag kyang/ bam ldan 'das kyi 'khrul de mthong
nas/ bcom ldan 'adas galab der dong ngo/ denas gang dag phyogs bcunas lhags pa byang chub sems dang nya de dag gse mchod pa blon med bas/ bcom ldan 'das labasnyen
0 bkur byas te/ pha rol tu phyinepa drugags yongasasu bsgrubs pa stan dag 2ta2med do// mdang ma me anepa bar du lad ci riges pat+tastan dag la bod do// gang dag bcom ldan 'das
pa phyung pa de dag kyang mnar med pa an chad rtog mare gnas man chad du mngon par phyung stasar log go/ phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas rnamasakyis sprul pa phyung ba ji snyed pa de dag thams cad ni
bcomaldan 'das shAkya thub nga'ispu'i khung thams cad du nub ba// gang dag bcom ldan 'das kyi sprul pa phyungab de dag ni/ sangs rgyas thams cad kyi sku rnamasasu nubab/ da
nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dang 'chen po rgyal ba'aphung po zhesabya ba stanalas langs te/ bla gos phrag pa tsagatubazanas/ pus mo g.yasapa'i lha nga sa la btsugs te/ bcom
ldan 'das ga la de logs su thal mo sbyar ba btud nas/ bcom ldan 'adasalatshagasasubacad pa 'di dagagasamangon par bastodad// kyam ma rnams kyan 'drenang yis// sngon chad ma byung mdzad

pasnatshogasa'ad// cad du kun la myur du kun bastan pa dang// demasu bdud thams cad mog mog bgyis// ban tshun drug tu tshig tu smra bgyid pa// kyema'oshan tu ngo mtshar che zhesamachi// bdag cag ci'i pe
phyir 'dir lhagasas// bdag cag bcom mo bdagacagabcom ma zhasamachi// dka' thubatsan bdag dka' thubananaman gyur// nyamachungalus l pags pa tsam zhig las// bdag 'khegs
bdag skams bad b rnams las nyams// bdag cag rdzu 'phrul thob bar gyu ni// tshag ma mchas rdzu 'phrul suma rnams kyis// bstan pa 'dem rnamasamog mog gyur
pamadzad// bstanapa 'dren pa khyod kyis darangan// sangs rgyasasras la dus ston chenapomadzad// 'kher 'di thams cad the tsoma'atshalabar gyur// dga' ba skyesangashangesems kyang rab dga'/
gang zhigeganas nas lha tshogs bdag cag/kyang// 'jag rten mgon po sangs rgyas gyur cig mchis// 'jam dbyangs sangs rgyas mang po bstan bkur bgyis// sangs rgyas sras bamatha'
asa rnams kyis bskor// 'jamapa'idabyangs na 'khor gyi nang na mchis// cho 'phrula rnam ba phye ste bstan dugasol// 'di dag chos ni gangag ltasagi lags// thub pa chosan gang zhi'i/
gsung bar bzhed// 'khor 'di thams cad 'gyod cing mchis lags nas/ sems can thugs brtsi slad du bdag lagasungs// da nas sangs kyis byin gyis brlabasae/
'khord na nang nas/ drang srong chen pos sgron zhus bya ba gcigags/ byang chub sems dang/ rgyal ba'iphudapa la 'di skad ces smras so// kya gzhon nu'ashage kha rog sha/ kho bo'i dri ba dri bar bya'o//

gal te kho bo'idri ba kheng du chub pa byadan ni/ de thams cad mkhyen ng zhes bya ba'i mong dang mnga'athunano// don dmed med kyi bu dpe dadabang phyug chen pas phyung ba'i 'gro lding ba rnamasakyis sprul pabyed
[0, ]du zad na ni/ 'dir ngo mtshar ltad choste/ skyes bu ngan pa dang sgyu ma mkhan rnams kyisan nyid grub// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis 'dzum pa zhal gyis/ dwangasrongag
tshogs la kun tu gzigs nas/ drang srong chenang mi sgronal 'ad skad ces bka'asAl to// tsho dang ldan pa drang srong chen po tsanus kyis drab drisangashig dang/ rnam par byang bar byardo// de nas
bam ldan 'das la drang srong chen po me sgron gyis 'daskadaces gsol te// kyi 'u dmasams can gyi skyob gang nas byung/ rtsa'i slad du bskal ngas sregs par 'gyur/ sems can rnams
gnas gang du 'dubar 'gyur/ nang nas sems can phra ba khru gang tsam nyam/ mtho gang tsam mam/ mjug mo tsamamam/ mthe bong tsam mam/ nas dang/ ge dang/ mon sunasde'u dang/ mon
gre'u dang/ til dang/ yungs 'bru tsam 2ma/ seman dzo tsam 'ge nang na mchis bka' stsol cig/ de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis drang srong chen pa mi sgronal ) drang srong chen
po legasas lags s zhes )legasasazhes bya ba bya ni// drang srong rinapo tshabaskal pa drug btupa'i dri ba 'bri 'dane'athun nga 'o// de nas drang srong chen po rnams ngo mtshar du gyur/ drang srong
chen po me skrunagyi tsho'atshad ni ma brjod pa bdag cag lhan cig gnas gnas gnas pa rnams kyis kyang ma gsana'adis dza ltar shas snyam mo// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' snalapa// drang sung
chen po de'i phyir legs par rab tu nyon la ade la zung yi dung bshad do// drang srong chenapa gang de la sems can gyi skye bgang nas byung zhes smras pa rin nages brjod pa ma

an pa'o// sems can zhes bya ban ma rageg pa'i rkyen las skye ba dang/ rgashanyeber du byung ba'o// drang srong chenang yang rgyu rkyen las sems can skye ste/ rgyu rkyen phama'o// drang srong chenapo ang pha

ma 'gregs pa ni de'i rgyu'o// gang gi tshemedas su rtog pas kun nas bslad pa'i las kyi rlung rnams kyisobud med kyi 'god du 'jugapa de ni de'i rkyen to// drang srong chen po yang sdug bsngal 'phags pa'i
bdenupa dang/ sdug bsngal kun 'byung ba dang/ sdugabasngal 'gog pa dang/ sdug bsngal 'ogog par 'grobatAlam 'phags pa'ibaden pa nasems canan// rtobalen pa'i phung po lnga dang/ khams
bcobargyadanasems can no// drang srong chenaposems canaang gzhanal las kyang gazhan ma yani/ lasakyang gazhan lasems can yang gzhanam an no// drangasob chen po sems can de'agrib
tshigs pa ma yane/ 'phel ba neno// drang srong chen dngos gsol pa/ kyago'u tan gal tugs can la 'thob pa ma mchis/ 'phel ba ma mchisan/ ci'i slad du sems canakhyi'i gnasashi
'phos te dbang sgyur du 'gyur/ ba ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ drang srong chen po de ni ji skad smras pa de bzhin dum yoneno// gal te dbang sgyur dbang sgyur ni du thaninan/ dbang med par 'chiba'i/

mi rigs su// drang srong chen po gang rang galus kyi ge tso'i ma ane pa phaltar dbang sbyar du 'gyur drang srong chen pa 'di lta ste dper nasan ngo ma khyer nasnyam du bdag gis 'dzam bu'i gling snang bar byasnos du

sems dang twen gyis sun bu me khyer gyis 'dzam bu'i gling snang bar byed dam ) sems ma dul ba ni dbang sgyur yang dag pa ma nyan no// drang srong chen po yang gal te dbang sgyur nyon mongs nga 'dri bar rgyun

ni khyi la nyon mongs pa shas chab r 'gyur ro// gang gi tshe dbang sgyur dang nyon mongs pa dag khu le sang yod cadi/ dbang sgyur la song yod pa de:/ sems canal grib pa ngalangam dmages 'phelab mang mi
dmape desas// drang srong chenangos gsal la/ go'u ta mas nyonisongs dang 'grib par mdzad dam/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsalang/ drang srong chenapo ngas phyin cig log dag bzlog pa gang yang
med 'thob par bsang yang med do// drang srong chenapos gsolang ) gal te de lta na khyed kyang dbang sgyur ma lags s// btsem ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ drang srong chen po de de bzhin te//
ma byung ba'i phyir nga yang dbang sgyur ma lon no// drang srong chen pos gsal pa/ ge'u dam bka' mchid 'de rakogazhag/ go'u ta ma sus kyis pha ma 'grogs pa las sems can skye'o zhes gsungs na//
sems can mang du'agrogasapa lasasems can skye ba nyung b.ragyur pa 'di ji ltebu/ bcom ldan 'adas sob stsalapa ) khyed lad bstanapar bya'o// drangasrong chanapo 'di lta ste dper na/sa bon gcig las
shingaskyabar 'gyur/ 'brasabugacig las kyang 'bras bumatha' yas par 'gyu/ dalas res 'ga'an gsabon gyi sasu 'gyur gyi lhag mas len rgyase'osasum 'gyur
bdelta bu / drang srong chenAsagaselab/ tshego'u ta marlud dang sems shing tog rnamasam rangs par gyisas// bcom ldan 'das kyi bka'astsalapa/ drangasngon bod de bzhin te/ las kyi
b+hU rlung gis kyang semasacan gyi 'bras bu rnamasam rusabaracosas// drang srong chenapakha cigemepalanaganas pa nyid kyi tshe/ sunubu rnams kyi thosas// khacigenalas kyi rlung rnams kyis phyagar
byas so// drang srongatshanang shang gnyes pananyud ngo// sems canagyanyes pan mengo// drang srong chen po angasems canagyi khams ni yongasasu rtog pas kun nas slang ba ste/ drang srong chen pos

tsa rnams kyi sems dang sems las byung ba 'jug pa ji snyed pa de snyed du slade pal dmig te/ drang srong chenapod 'phuresems can gyi khe nasan yongs su rtog bas kun nas bslang btogasang spya'o// drang/
ra sango tshanApas gsalapa/ kyago'u tam di dbazhin tre/ zhub brjod pa 'di ni rnam par dag/ ci'i slad du de bskal ngasabasreg par 'gyur ba bka' stsol cig/ bcom ldan 'dasakyis bka' stsal pa//
drang srong chenang tshos kyi byings 'dusam byas ba phyir bskal pas bsregs par 'gyur ro// drang srongachenapa gal te bskal ngas bsregasab in/tshos[”]de byang sagasasu 'gyur te/ la lami
tsa ) rnagal/ la la rtag par 'gyur ro// detshad bzhin gshegs pa bden par skyabaram 'gyur ro// drang srong chenang gang gaphur 'dithams cad rtag pa ma yin/ brtan pa ma lon ) dbugs
phyin pa ma yin pa de'i tsho/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad mkhyen pa zhes khyabade'atshong thob bo// drangasrong chen pos bram ze'i khyilul smras pa/ 'di thams cad mkhyen par mtshanagasal pa/
ni thun no// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa// drang srong chenapo gal ti bskal pas bsregs par m gyuran/ 'di ni dus bzang po'o/ 'dani dus ngan pa'o zhes
bya bar dus tha dad pa med par 'gyur ro// drang srongatshan pa gal te angabaskal ngas bsregasapar mgyur na/ legs par byas pa dang/ zhesapor byas pa las
rnams kyi rnam par smon pa tha dad pa med par 'gyur ro// drang srong chen po yang 'diwaste/ bskalapas bsregs pa de ni de bzhinagashegasala rnams kyi thongs mkhas pa ste/
drang srong chen pa sems canadzanyid bskal pas bsregs par 'gyur ba thos nas dad par 'gyur ba'asems cand snyan dbazhin gshags pas bsduba'adengs pas sdud par 'gyur// drang srong
chenapo 'dilta ste/ dang ran/ khatshubaldag pasprulatshog gas kyang rdub/ rnab dang sna dang/ kha'i sgon kyang jub bo// drang srong don ngod bzhin gshegs la ang de ltar lta/
sbyin pas kyang sdud snyan par skyakhar kyang sdud/ den spyod pas kyang sdud/ don 'thun pas kyang sdud do// drang srong chen po 'di lta ste dper na/ gser la gnod par bya'i phyir/
mera'ajug pa ma yin gyi/ gser dul mon yunang 'di ji ltar na dul mar 'gyur snyamanas/ de'i phyi mer 'jug ste/ shin tubasregs pa'i phyir nib tshos su 'gyur ro// rinapa mas smras
pa de'i rinithang med par 'gyur te/ drang srong chenapada' phyir gsar brdung ba dang/ bsregs pas rnam par sbyongango// drang sronganapo dbazhin dusangs rgyasabcomaldan 'dasa rnams kyang rgyu med
parab sregs pa'i bskal pa mnyeban te/ 'dirasems canagang la yongaganod pa ma 'gyuraro/ da nasabcom ldan 'das la phradang po me sgron gyis 'di skad ces gsal
te// bcom ldan 'das bskal pas sregs pa'ame phyung yang sems can gang la yang gnodapa ram 'gyur banango mtshar te// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa// drang srong chen po dang zhani gshag
pa rnamasan/ sems can gang la lang gnod pasamadzad do// drang srong chen po 'di lta ste dper na/ phyogs bcu rnams su char phrama'i rgyun 'bab pa dang san/ drang srong chen po dbazhin gshag
pa rnams dang/ sa bcul gnas pa'i byang chub sems dang 'a rnams nye bar gnas te// rang ga lagagasaMsems can tharapar byed pa tshosang pa// drang srong chen poda'i tsho sems can de bzhanegasheg
pa dang/ byang chub sem dpa' de dag gi gzugs kyang mthong// kha dag/mdzes bayang mthong/ bskal pasabasregs pa'i 'jigs pas bdag nyid skyel bar mang mthong nas dag[- {]ratshes
tu dga' ba skyes te/ 'daskad cas bdag cag kyang 'di ltar sgrolab par gyur cig/ bdag cag kyang 'daltaragazugs mdzes pagyuracig/ bdag kyang 'di ltar kha dog mdzes par gyur cig ces 'dzar to
khacugen yod byung nas sems rnam par grol te/ rgyun du zhugs pa'a'abras bumangonasum du byed/ kha cig nalen le ga phyir 'od b2'bras bu dang/ phyiram 'ong ba'a'abras bu mngon sum du byed
kha cig na de bas bde/ kha cig na red byang chub/ kha cig nam skye ba'i chos la bzod pa rab tu thob/ kha cig ni phyiram ldogapa aganon/ khacig na rgyal chen bzharis nangawA
rnamasakyanang du skye/ kha cagan sum cu rtsa gsumadu/ kha gnamatshamar/ khacigan dga' ldan du/ kha cig ni 'phrul dga' ) khacig na gzhana'aphrul dbang byed kyi lha rnams kyi nang du
skya'o// drang srongachenapo rnam grangs 'di lta bu r/ 'og minagyi bgyi lta rnams kyi nang duskye'o// de bzhan du 'khor los sgyur b rnams dang/ stabs kya)khoralasagyurang rnamasadang
khams kyi rgyal rnamasasu'agyur[R ]) drangasrong chen po rgyal rigs dang/ bram ze dang/ khyim bdag rnams kyi rab tu yang 'gyur// drang srong chenaparnam ngas 'di lta bu de ba gags
pa'i gzugs kyi sku mthong zhade/ bdag nyid kyang 'japachinapo 'a9sa sgrol bar mthong nas// de bzhin gshegs pa la byas pa gzo zhing byas pa shes par 'gyur//
debagashegs pa la chos nyid des sa bslabapadagenasa rnams la bag byed pa gyur// thabs 'daden sod du 'gro bar ma 'gyur// drang srong chen po yangs bculaganas pa'i byed sgrub
mas dpa' rnams kyi chog la sa'i khams ji snyed snang bar gyurab debasan// semasaMcanagyi khams ga nga 'khor ba la skyon chags par shesas/ phungaposalus b myongan las 'das pa'i bde
sumya ngan las 'da' bar byedapa tshesamang ste/ drang srong chen po don phyir bskal bas bsregasal gyuro// de nas drang srongatshanapatshosgron gyi rang ga yodakyirnam par dpyad nas/
tshig tu smasapa ma'ogang dgal drang 'tshan ngozhes 'bod pa/ shAkya'i sras 'di'i tshib nyid gyi che'o// bdagag 'dal bgam bas kyang chog ste// 'di thams cad mkhyen pa mngonagyis/ bdag gsakyang
'di la yang dag pa'i mingegs bsal khya'ozhasagasas// danas bcom ldan 'das la trang srong chenapos sgron gyis 'daskyed cesagasol to// yon tan gyi 'byung gnas su gyur cing mkhyen pa dpag tuamachasib
tham cad mkhyen pa zhesamatsho gsol pa/ sems canaganas gang du 'dubar 'gyurab badag labaka' gi kham ldan 'dasakyas bka' lab/drang srotsan po gnasamed palasemasacana'adul bar
'gyur ro// mnyam ba nyid lasamasacan 'dubar 'gyur// drang srong chen po theg pa gcig/gas 'byung ba la sems can du par 'gyur ro// byang chub kyi snying po lasems can 'du bar 'gyurano//

drang srod chen po phud po ma lus pa mya ngan las 'das pa 'di+ingasasu sems can 'du bar 'gyur ro// drang sring chen po 'dalta ste/ dperan/chu klung chen nga tha dad pa dang/ klung phran dang/ klung chen pa dag
rgya mtshochen por bab nas/ rogacig tu 'gyurar// drang srong chen pa da bzhin dusems can gyikhams jisnyad/pa zad pa byadang de dag thams cad rnam par grol ba'i dad du gyurapas 'du bar 'gyur ro//
drang srong chen pa 'khor bar 'du bsasems can gdubar 'gyur bam ning 'onas ngas+sa'o// drang srong chen pa 'daste skadaban/ rlung gsebadasanas phye ma leb phyagyi zhal 'du bar 'gyur te/ rlung med nas

'gyas so// drang srong chen pa dbazhin dusems canadamyal bar 'gro bar 'gyur bsa'adonalas 'brelapasems can khrims dadaso khyadadar 'du bar 'gyuyaro// drang srong chenapa rnam grangs 'di lta bu phan tshun
kyis 'brelapa dag yadegs skyobar 'gyur ro// dud 'gror skye 'gyurataM/ der dedag tu 'du bar 'gyur ro// drang srongominabalhadang ma rnams su de dag 'du bar 'gyur ro// drang srong chen pasagasol pa/
thams cad lagyisaganonapa/ thams can mkhyen pa mar skyesapa 'dasems can tshagam zhes bgyisab zhig dang 'dus par gyur to// dud 'gror skyes pa 'di zhes bgyi ba nas/
ba @#// yi dgas su skyes pa 'dus par gyur to zhes bgyi ba'i bar du ji ltar 'tshal bar bgyi ba bka' stsal cig/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/drang srong chen po sems can gang zhig sems

dA can gang dang lhan cig tu/ bems can dam la bar skyes nas 'dus par gyur pa des de mthong na yid mi bde bar 'gyur/ dezhe sdang bar yang 'gyur/ des de mthong nas/ gal te na de glad pa na bar yang 'gyur/
bshang ba dang/ gci ba 'byung bar yang 'gyur te/ drang srong chen po 'di na sems can dmyal bar skyes po rnams kyi 'du ba'i mtshan nyid do// gang la la de ltar gyur pa des kyang/ bdag dang
'di lhan cig tu sems can dmyal ba rnams na gnas gnas par mngon no zhes de ltar khong du chud par bya'o// drangang srong chen pos gsol pa// rigs gsal bar mdzad pa// thams cad mkhyen
pa dud 'gro dang lhan cig pa nas gnas pa rnams kyi mtshanamar 'gyur pa ji lta bu lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa// rim skyes pa'isams can rnams gang gi tshe/ phan tshun
mthong ban 'khor du 'dud par 'dzin cing 'di las bdag gis skyon ji ltar gad snyam du skyon tshol ba 'di ni/ drang srong chen bo dud 'gror skyes pa'i sems can rnams kyi 'du ba'i mtshan nyid de/
bdag dang 'di lhan cig tu dud 'gro'inang na gnas gnas par mngon no// zhes de ltar shes par bya'o// drang srong chen pa yi dgas su skyes pa rnams ni drang ba 'dod cing kha zas langashin tu sred pa ra
'gyur ro// pha rol ba sbyin par bsams kyang chags pa skyo bar 'gyur ro// gang dag de yi dgas su skyes nas lhan cig dus par 'gyur ba de'i dbang phyug mthong nas phrag dog skya bor 'gyur/ gzhan gyi nor

la 'dod par 'gyur te/ 'dan yi dgas su skyes pa rnams kyi 'du ba'i mtshan nyid do//de la bdag dang 'di lhan cig tu yi dgas kyi nang na gnas par mngon no zhes de ltar shes par bya'o// drang srong chen po

mir skyes pa gang la la zhig tshe rabs gzhan dag la 'dus par gyur pan des de mthong na/'dod chags kyi sams skye bar 'gyur te )drang srong chen po ni mar skyes pa'i sams can rnams kyi 'du ba'i mtshan nyid/
do[：]de la bdag dang 'di mi rnams kyi nang na gnas gnas par mngon no zhes de ltar shes par bya'o// drang srong chen pos gsol pa// bcom ldan 'das gang dag lhar skyes te// 'dus par gyur
pa las mir skyes pa de dag ga ji lta bu lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa// drang srong chen po gang dag lhar skyes te 'dus par gyur pa de dag ni phan tshun mthong na lta ba la 'jug pa/
'gyur te/ des na bdag dang 'di lhar skyes te/ lhan cig 'dus par gyur to zhesang shes par bya'o// drang srong chen po rnam pa de lta bu dag tu sems can 'du bar 'gyur ro//
de nas drang srong chen po me sgron dga' mgu yi rangs nas/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad gsol to// bcom ldan 'das gang dag thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du smon par mi bgyid
pa'asems can de dag nube skrus pa'ozhes bdag 'chad do// de nas yang bcom ldan 'das kyis drangasung chen be mi sgronul 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// drang srong chanapa
nang sems canazhes bya'aphrab dzatsamazhagayod casang la de skad ces zer ban/ drang srong chen po gang semasacan du dmags pa desemasacan phra mor rnams par byed do// drang srong chan/
rgyu pa'adi lta ste dper na/ lalazhigags dmus ledazhig la 'di skad du/ kyi skyes bu kha dog dkarang zhes bya ba/ ci'adrab nas smras n/ drad srong chen pa'od dzesnyam dusemasam mthong ba'i
yaphyir kha dog dkar po 'di 'dra'ongs da slabaranus sam/ drang srong chen pos gsol ba/ 'brel pa ga la mchis/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal ba/ drang srong chen po de bzhin dungs
kyang dmus long lta mamathong ba'i phyir/ sems can zhes bya ba nipra ma 'di lta bu zhig go zhesasems canabarjod par ma nus so// drang srong chen po yang mag las sems can zhes bya ba ma red do//
rnab dang sna dang/ lcad ng lus dang/ mdelasems can zhes byabam rnyed do// =pasrong chanang nyibar len pa phung bo dag la sems can zhes byabam rnyed do// drang srong chen pa khams bcobargyad
dang rtan cing 'brel par 'byung yan lag bcuganyis pa dang/ nangastongapa nyidel sems can zhes byabam rnyed do// phyi stong ba nyid dang/ tsanangaskodapa nyid la semasacan zhwa
bya bam red do// drang srong chen po mgonarin pa'o// 'jab pa'o// skad cig kyang ma gnas pa'o// de bzhin dunab dang/ sna dang ) lce dang/ lus dang yod kyang donapa'o// 'gog pa'o//
skad cig kyang mi gnas pa'o// drang srong chenapon bar len pa'i phung po ldangan pa'o// 'jig pa'o// skad cig kyang ma gnus pa'o// drang srong chen po ma getsang ba'i rdzas sum nurtsa drug kyang
pa'o// 'ag pa'o// skad cig kyang ma le nas pa'o// sems canazhes bya ba yang med/ gzugs kyang med de/ drang srong chen po rdzas 'dus pa nasems canazhes bya ba'i grangs su 'groT//
yongs su rtog b.lagang dag rdzas rnams rnam par 'byed pa de dag ni srog dang/ gso ba dang/ skyes bu dang/ gang zag dang/ shid las skyes dang/ shadabum dmagasas// drang srong chenango
gal tasems can med du thanan/ dbazhin gshegs pa 'phags pa de bden pa bzhapo dgags shin tuchos ston par m 'gyur ba zhigen/ drang srong chen po gang gi phyir/sems can med pa de'aphyir/de bzhin
gsheg pa de thob ste/ de'i phyirajaltajaltar ang dag par sgrub par byed de lta de ltaraang dag par 'grubab// de nas bcom ldan 'das ladrang srong chen po me sgronagyas 'di skad ces gsol to//
bcom ldan 'das deng slanamado drang srong chenapemasgron bdag thams cad makhyen pa nyid dusmonaparab gyid do// bcom ldan 'das gal te bdag bskaladamumamatshapesems can dmyalaba'i zhugs kyi 'obasasu
gnas par 'gyur ba 'am/ rir ba 'og min gyi gnas tsam du gyur bam thon po la de nas/ bdag gis bdag 'dor bar 'gyur pa 'am/ gdung ba sogs bskul bas bsregs pa lta
bur 'gyur ba 'am/ rim bskul b.raganas par 'gyur ba 'am/ bskal ba sum cu'i zla ba gcig tu da bar 'gyur ba de lta bu'i dka' ba spyad par ni/ bcom ldan 'das bdag sogs sku 'dun gyi/ thams

cad makhyen pa nyid kyi slad du ni brtson 'grus nyams par ma bgyid pa'o// drang srong mngon par shes pa lnga dang ldan pa jisnyad/ bcom ldan 'das kyi gan du lhags pa de dag kyang stan las langs te/ bcom
ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das bdag cag kyang dang sman chad blo na mdab yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu smon bar bgyi'o// dzecu go gis brtson 'grus brtsam bar bgyi//
drang srong chen po rnams kyis tshig de skad sas mazagatu/ bcom ldan 'das kyi smin mtshams nas 'dul ba can zhes bya pa'i 'od zer phyud/ phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas thams cad kyis kyang smin mtshams
spyi nas 'dul ba can zhes bya ba'i 'od zer phyudis/ 'od zer de dag gi mthus sa chen po yod rnam pa drug tu g.yo sa/ rab tu g.yos/ 'gul rab tu 'gul/ lce rab tu ldeg ste/ shar phyogs mngon/
lho phyogs dma'/ nub phyogasadama'on/ byang phyogs mtho/ shar phyogs dma' na lho phyogasamany+nyo/ nub phyogs mtho na byang phyogs dma'o// phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas thams cad kyis
kyang de bzhin gshes gas ba'i sku dadu ma tog gi char bab/ rnga bo che rnams brtudas so// dri za'i bdag po [“] nga du 'ong ba rnams kyis kyang yan lag lnga'i sil snyan gyis/ bcom ldan 'o das la mngon
bar ba spyod do// lha'i bdug pa ni rab tu 'chi bo dag kyang rlung gi ngad bslang ste/ de bzhin gshags pa'i gan dungad ldang bar byed do// byang chub sems dpa' rnams rab tu dga' sto/ mchog tu bde
ba'isams kyis de bzhin gshegs pa'i steng du do shal dang/ sa mo de rnams mthor zhing rin po che'i char yang 'bebs/ ma tog dang/ bdug ba dad/ spos dang/ phreng ba dang/ byug pa dang/ phye ma
dang ges dad/ gdugs dang/ rgyal mtshan dang/ ba dan dag gis kyang mchod pa byed do// lha'i tshogs rnams kyang rab tu dga' nas/ ma togaman+da ra ba dang/ man+da ra bachen po'i char 'bags so//
thams cad dang ldan pa'i 'khor de yang dga' mgu yi rang te/ ji ltar gyon gyonaba'i gos rnamA de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku la gsol te//de nas 'dul ba can zhes bya ba'i 'od zer des 'og min gyi gnas
man chad/ sems can dmyal ba chen po mnar med pa yan chad snang bar byas te/ phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas thams cad la bskor ba byas nas slar log ste/ bcom ldan 'das kyi dbu gtsugatu
chub 'o// de nas bcom ldan 'das la tshodang ldan pa rab 'byor gyis 'di skad ces gsol to/rgyu ma mchis par shAkya thub de ring 'dir//phyogs bcu dag tu 'od zer mi gtong ste// 'khor
'dims cad pemagyur lags na// thub pas rgyu dad byed de bdag lung ston// mi yi 'dren pa'irnam par 'phrul mthong nas// dga' khar gyur cing skyo ba che gyur ten pa cudaga'
! bas lhag par bstod bgyis nas//kha cu'i ga 'di na bcom ldan legs shes mchi/brgya byin tshangs pa 'jig rtan skyong ba rnams // nam mkhar gnas 'byung bo'i tshogs dang bstod// mkher las lha'i matog

sbya char du 'bebs// ma bzung rje chen dgan sgra yang 'byin// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// rab 'byor khyod kyis drang srong ma sgron mthong ngam
rab 'byor gyis gsol ba/ bcomaldan 'das ma gleng lags so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal ba/ rab 'byor drang song chen bo ma sgron 'di ma 'ongs pa'i dus na/ sangs rgyas stong 'das pa'i
bog tu bskal pa bzang po 'di nyid la zla ba can gyi 'jig rten gyi khams su de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnam par gzigs zhes bya bar 'gyur ro// rab sbyor

zla de bzhin gshegs pa rnamapar gzigs kyi ming yang yid bzhin gyi nor bu ma par dag pa'i bya ba byed bar 'gyur ro// rab 'byor dang srong chen bo brgyad khri bzhi stong gis chos kyi rnam grangs 'di thos
ma thag tu phyir mi ldog ba'i sa rjes su khos/ rab 'byor de dag thams cad na de bzhin gshegs pa byamaMs ba'i gsung rab la sa bcu la gnas par 'gyur ro// bskal ba sum brgya'i 'og tu de
bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa la de dag bar rdzogs pa'i sa das rgyas bdag bka' blo bde ba zhes bya bar 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro// rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' tshod med pa dag gi kyang chos

kyi rnam grangs 'di smos ma thag tu dpa' bar 'gro ba'i ting nge 'dzin theb// skad dang skad ma yin pa shes pa'i teng nge 'dzin dang/ rgyal ba'i dbang bskur ba'i to de 'dzan dang sgyu ma lta bu'i ting nge

'dzin dang/ khams rnam par 'byed pa ting nge 'dzin dang/ blo gros rgyal bo'i ting nge 'dzin dang/ rgya mtsho'i lhad po'i teng de 'dzin mnyen pa'i sa'i ting nge 'dzin dang/ bsam pa'i snying po'i ting nge 'dzin dang/

'od pa gsal ba'i ting nge 'dzin thob bo// rab 'byor lta bye ba thub ba ng+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag gis mi skya ba'i chos la bzod pa thob bo// dge slong dang/ dge slong ma dang/ dag bson dang/ dag bse/nam stod

brag tshad med pa dag gis dgra bcom pa nyid mngon sumadu byas so// rab 'byor lha dang klu dang/ gnod sbyin dang/ dri zadang/ lha ma yin dang/ nam mkha' lding dang/ mi 'am ci dang/ lta'aphya chen po dang//

mi dang/ ma ma yin pa gang+ga'i bye ma snyed dag gis bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems skyod do// rab 'byor de bzhin gshegs pas don gyi dab nga de mthong nas 'dul can zhes bya ba'i/
'od zer rnams byung ngo// de nas bcom ldan ritA kited kyi ljags kyi dbang bo ga zhal khebs bar mdzad do/ljags kyi dbang po tilas kha dog dam/ kha dog tha dad pa'i 'od zer 'di lta ste/ sngon
po dang/ ban bo dang/ dmar bodad/ dkar po dang/ ge brganadang/ shel dang/ dngul gyi kha dog lta bu dag byung// de dag 'jig rten gyi khams mtha' yas mu med la
dgatumangon par byung nas slar log sta/ bcom ldan 'das la lan gsum bskor ba byas nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis su nub bo// de nas byang chub sems dpa'
blo sems dpa' chen po blo gros mizad pa stan las langs te bla gos phrag pa cig tu gzar nas/ pus mo g.yas pa'i lha nga sa la btsug to/ btsomaldan 'das ga la ba de legs su thalamo sbyar ba btud nas/
bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni rgyu ma mchis bar 'dzum pa mi mdzad na/ bcom ldan 'das 'dzum pa mdzad pa'i rgyu gang lags M/ rkyen gang
lags de skad ces gsol ba dang/ bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems dpa' blo gros mi zad pa la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// rigs kyi bu mo dad pa rnams kyi don du lcags 'di lta bu
ni badz+dzanam gsung ngosnyamadu byu ba'i phyir/ lcags kyi yang de/sa 'dzum pa mdzad de// de nas bcom ldan 'das la byang chub sems dpa' blo gros mi zad pas 'di skyedaces gsol
bcom ldan 'das gangagis chos kyi rnamegangs 'di las ban tshogs su bcad pa gcig tsam lung 'ashegan/ rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo de dag bsod nams kyi phung po ji tsam bskyed par/
'gyur/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal ba/ rigs kyi ba phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das kyis da sa rgyus kyi spyan la snang bar 'gyur pa ji snyed pa de dag las yongs su mya nganalas 'das kyi
b.redu gang zhig gis bde bar sbyar bu thams cad gyi bstan bkur byas taM/ yongs su mya ngan las 'das nas kyang rin po che sna bdun gyi mchod rten byed pa de bas/ gang zhig chos kyi rnam grangs 'di
las tha na tshigs su bcad pa gcig tsam lung 'bog na/ 'di tshes bsod nams tshad du bskyod de// rigs kyi bu chos kyi rnam grangs 'di 'chad pa na/ gang zhig dang ba'i sems kyis legs so/
zhes bya ba sbyin pa de la/ sangs rgyas thams cad kyis bstod par 'gyur ro// gang gis 'di lo rim gro byas pa des dra la rim gro byas par 'gyur ro// de nas bcom ldan 'das
kyis thams cad dang ldan pa'i 'a khor de la rnam par gzigs nas/'di skad ces bka' stsal to// rigs kyi bu dag da na bden par sa ba lta/ sa phyogs gang na chos kyi rnam grangs dang gal gas pa'i mi/
phyogs de la/ sangs rgyas thamasacad dgongs par 'gyur ro// rigs kyi bu dang/ chos kyi rnam grangs 'di ni 'dzam bu glud pa'i sams can rnams kyi snyan du gyur par 'gyur ro// gang gis chos kyi rnam
grangs 'di lan gsum brjod dam/ brjod du bcug na/ des ston pa la chos kyi ba lor ler ba tu bskor bar bskul bar 'gyur ro// rab 'byor gang zhig chos kyi rnam grangs 'di yi ger 'dra 'am/ yi ger 'dra'i
'jug ba de bde da dang bcas shing yid bde ba de ba dang bcas bzhin du/byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur ro/ des sang sa rgyas thams cad kyi mdzod kyang/
bzung bar 'gyur ro// rigs kyi bu dag chos kyi rnam grangs 'di na sams can rnams kyi sna 5mdu pa/ par 'gyur re: pa/[y]sa rapi 4 nas 8 yo ra/ su dag pa sang sargyang/ kyi zhing

rnams su skyo bo de dag gi rna lam du chos kyi rnam grangs 'di grag par 'gyur ro// rab 'byor gang gis sangs rgyas stong la dag la rgyu ba bskyed pa de'i rna lam du ches kyi rnam grangs 'di grag par gyur ro//
rab 'byar gas kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo ga nga chos kyi rnam grangs 'di thos nas/ dad dam 'chang ngan// ko ka dag nyed 'am ! a ma nga rgya che la b.rang ngos pa
ston par 'gyur ba re'i lag tu byang chub song ngo zhes bshad do// des mig la thong bar 'gyur/ dbang ma tshang ba phyi'i dza da badzra pa mang par 'chi ba'i dus byed nga ra 'gyur
sangs rgyas thams cad sgrub ba'i ting nge 'dzin thob par 'gyur/ rnam 'a snying mdzod rnam par sprul pa'i ting nge 'dzin dang/ gzungs kyi sAng po'i ting nge 'dzin dang/ gtsug gi
nor bu'i phyag rgya'i ting nge 'odzin dang/ dbang bskur ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang/ spyan ras gzigos kyi phyag rgya'i tang nge 'anya ra btu b+hob par 'gyur/ yi ge med pa'i za ma tob dba'i
0 gzungs thob par 'gyur/ chos thams cad la rnam par rgyal ba thob pa'i gzungs dang/ the tsom rnam par sbyong ba'i gzungs dang/ don dam pa rnam par nges pa'i gzungs thob
par 'gyur te/[“]de la sogs pa'i gzungs dang/ ting nge 'dzin gyi sgo brgya stong mtha' yas pa thob bar 'gyur ro// mngon par shes pa lnga dang ldan par 'gyur ro//
bsams bzhin du 'chi 'pho dang/ skya ba longs su 'dzin par 'gyur ro// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa la bka' sul pa 'jam dpal
sangs rgyas mang po la bsan bkur byas pa khyod la/ chos kyi rnam grangs 'di yongs su btad kyis yang dang yang rgya cher yang dag par rab tu shod cig/ 'jam dang la khyod kyis
bzhin gshags pa ji snyed cig la bsti stang byas pa dang/ btsun bar byas pa dang/ rim gror byas pa dang/ mchod pa byas pa de ji gam du sams/ 'jam dpal dge ba'i rtsa ba
del mtha' 'am/ mu yod dam/ dge ba'i rtsa ba de dang ga bar nus sam/ 'jam dpal gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das ma lags so// bde bar
gshegs pa ma lags so// bcom ldan 'dasakyis bka' stsal pa// 'jam dpal gang gis sAg ma lnga'i dus na/ chos kyi rnams grangs 'di 'jig rten gyi khams mi mje
[r]sgyu// 'dir rgyas par byed par 'gyur ba de dag de las dge ba'i rtsa ba chen por 'gyur ro// 'jam dpal gal te khyed da pin ga bag sa pa mang po da hopa u0f7aba wan bawa ra//
dang zhal zas dang/ gzims cha dang snyan gsos kyi snyan dang/ bud rnams kyis bsnyen bkur byed kyi chos kyi rnam gangasa'adi ston par ma byed na/ khyod da dung du yang de
bzhin gshegs pa rnams la nyes pa dang bcasapa 'gyulo// 'jam dpal ba la te khyed de bzhin gshegs pa gcig lod phyag ma byed kyi/ chos kyi rnam grangs 'di rgyas par byed na de
bzhin gshegs pa thams cad la khyod kyis mchod pa'i bar du bus par 'gyur ro// bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' lanas/ 'jam dang la gzhon nur gyur pa dang/ drang srong chen
mi skyon dang/ dge slong de rag dang/ lha dang mi dang/ lha ma yin dang/ dri bar bcas pa'i 'jig rten yi rang to/ bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs po la mngon par bstod do//
phags pa don dam pa'i chos kyi ma par rgyal ba zhes bya ba theg pa chen po'i mdo rdzogs so/// rgya gar gyi mkhan po dzi na mi tra dang/ dA na shAl dang/ zhuchen gyi lo tsA ba ban
b+he shes sngas bsgyur cing zhus te/ skad gsar chad kyis bcos nas gtan la phab pa// rgya gar skad du/ Ar+ya tsa dur d+harma nor de shan
nAm mahA yA na sU tra/ bod skad du/ 'phags pa chos bzhi bstan pa zhes bya ba theg pa chen po'i mdo/ (sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo/
'di yang bdag gis thos pa'i dus gcige na/ bcom ldan 'das sum cu rtsa gsum lha'i nang na/ lta'i 'dun sa chos bzangs na/ dge slong lnga brgya tham pa'i dge slong gi dge 'dun chen po dang/
byams pa dang 'jam dpal la sogs pa byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'achen po rab tu mang po dang brabs cig tu bzhugs so// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub
ri mas dang 'a sems dpa' chen po byams pa la bka' stsal pa// dum pa byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'achen po chos bzhi dang ldan na/ sdig pa chen po byas shing bsags pa zil gyis na/
par 'gyur ro/ gzhi gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/rnam par sun 'byin pa kun tu spyod pa dang/ gnyen po kun tu spyod pa dang/ sor chud par byed pa'i stobs dang/ rten gyi stobs so/

de la rnam par sun 'byin pa kun tu spyod pa ni/ ma dag pa'i las spyod na de la 'gyod ba mdzo ba yin no// de la gzhon po kun tu spyod pa ni rma ngag po'i las byas nus kyang dge ba'i las la shin tu brtson 'og
de la sor chud par byed pa'i stobs ni/ sdom pa yang dag par blangs pas mi byed pa'i sdom pa thob pa'o// de la rten gyi stobs ni sangs rgyas dang chos dang dge 'dun la skyabs su 'gro ba dang/ byang
chub kyi sems ma gtong ba ste/ de stobs dang ldan pa la rten bas sdig pas bul gyis gnon par mi nus so// byams pa byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos bzhi po
de dag dang ldan na/ sdig pa byas shing bsal nas ba thin gyis non par 'gyur ro// byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos mdo 'du rtag tu bklag par bya'o// kha ton du bya'o// bsam par
bya'o// sgom par bya'o// tshad du bya'o// des na nyes par spyad pa 'bras bu 'byin mi nus par 'gyur ro// bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsal nas/ byang chub sems dpa' sems
dpa' chen po byams pa dang/ dge slong de dag dang/ byang chub sems dpa'i de dag dang/ brgya byin la sogs pa lha'i bu rnams dang/ thams cad dang ldan pa'i 'khor de yi rang te/ bcom ldan 'das
kyis gsungs pa la mngon par bstod do// 'phags pa chos bzhi bstan pa zhes bya ba theg pa chen po'i mdo rdzogs so/// rgya gar gyi mkhan po su ren dra bo d+hi dang/ zhu
chachen gyi lo tsA ba ban d+he ye shes sdes bsgyur cing zhus te gtan la phab pa//rgya gar skad du/ Ar+ya tsa tur d+harma kun nAm mahAyAn sU tra
bod skad du/ 'phags pa chos bzhi pa zhes bya ba theg pa chen po'i mdo// sangs rgyas dad byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la phyag 'tshal la// 'di skad bdag gis thos pa
dus gcig na/ bcom ldan 'das mnyan yod na rgyal bu rgyal byed kyi tshal mgon med zas sbyin gyi kun dga' ra ba na/ dag slong stong nyis brgya lnga bcu'i dge slong gi dag 'dunachen po dang thabs cig tu/
kazhugs te/ byang chub sems dpa'i tshogs chen po dang yang thabs cig go/ de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis dag slong rnams la bka' stsal pa/ dge slong dag byang chub sems
dpa' sems dpa' chen pos chos bzhi pa 'di dag ji srid 'tsho'i bar du srog gi phyir yang yongs su mi gtong ngo// bzhi gang zhe na/ dge slong dag byang chub sems drang 'a sems dpa'/
chen pos ji srid 'tsho'i bar du/ byang chub kyi sems srog gi phyi'i yang yongs su mi gtong ba dang/ dag slong dag byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'i chen pos ji srid 'tsho'i bar
du dge ba'i bshes gnyen srog gi phyir yang yongs su mi gtong ba dang/ dge slong dag byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos ji srid 'tsho'i bar du/ bzod pa dang des
pa srog gi phyir yang yongs su mi gtong pa dang/ dge slong dag byang chub sems dpa' sams dpa' chen pos ji srid 'tsho'i bar du/ dgon pa la gnas pa thog gi phyir yad
yongs su mi gtong ste/ dge slong dag byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos ji srid 'tsho'i bar du/ tshos bzhi po 'di dag srog gi phyir yang yongs su gtong bar mi
phya'o: bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsal te/ bde bar gshegs pas de skad ces gsungs nas// ston pas gzhan
yud 'ad skad bka' stsal to// thams cad mkhyen nyid sems ni mi gtong zhing// mkhas bas rdzogs pa'i byang chub sems dpa' cig/ bzod dang des
ba'i stobs la rab gnas te// dge ba'i bshes ba nyan yongs su gtong ma bya// ri dgas rgyal po bzhin du 'jigs sngangs te// mkhas pas dgon gnas/
rtag tu bstan par bya// chos 'di dag la rtag tu rab gnas nas// bdud rnams bcom nas byang chub de 'tshang rgya// bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces
! dka' stsal nas/ dge slong de dag dang/ byang chub sems dpa' de dag dang/ brams cad dang ldan pa'i 'i khe ra de yi rang to/ bcom ldan
'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon par bstod do// 'phags pa tshes bzhi pa zhes bya ba/ theg pa chen po'i mdo rdzogs so//
